  4786                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4787                                  ; entry point from boot sector
  4788                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4789                                  
  4790                                  init:		; 27/12/2018
  4791                                  		; MSDOS 6.0 (MSINIT.ASM)
  4792                                  		;=============================================================
  4793                                  		;
  4794                                  		; entry from boot sector. the register contents are:
  4795                                  		;
  4796                                  		;   dl = int 13 drive number we booted from
  4797                                  		;   ch = media byte
  4798                                  		;   bx = first data sector on disk.
  4799                                  		;   ax = first data sector (high)
  4800                                  		;   di = sectors/fat for the boot media.
  4801                                  
  4802                                  		; 07/04/2018
  4803                                  		;=============================================================
  4804                                  		; Retro DOS v2.0 - registers from FD Boot Sector 
  4805                                                  ; DL = [bsDriveNumber]
  4806                                  		; DH = [bsMedia]
  4807                                  		; AX = [bsSectors] ; Total sectors
  4808                                  		; DS = 0, SS = 0
  4809                                  		; BP = 7C00h
  4810                                  		
  4811                                  		; 07/10/2023
  4812                                  		; (from MSLOAD)
  4813                                  		; ss = 0, sp = 700h, bp = any, ds = previous cs
  4814                                  
  4815                                  		; 12/12/2023
  4816                                  		;cli	; not necessary at this stage
  4817                                  
  4818                                  		; 21/12/2022
  4819                                  		; ds = 0 (?)
  4820                                  		;push	ax
  4821                                  		;xor	ax, ax
  4822                                  		;mov	ds, ax
  4823                                  		;pop	ax
  4824                                  	
  4825                                  ; 02/10/2022
  4826                                  ; ------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4827                                  ; Note: Retro DOS v4.0 Kernel does not use/contain MSLOAD part of IO.SYS (5.0)
  4828                                  ; 	Because, Retro DOS v2 boot sector loads complete/entire MSDOS.SYS
  4829                                  ;	(RETRODOS.SYS) Kernel file (IO.SYS & MSDOS.SYS together).
  4830                                  ;	As result of boot sector ve init differences, Retro DOS init code (here)
  4831                                  ;	moves kernel to segment 070h at first, then sets diskette parameters
  4832                                  ;	at segment 50h (while MSDOS 5.0 boot sector sets this).
  4833                                  ; ------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4834                                  
  4835                                  ; msload will check the extended boot record and set ax, bx accordingly.
  4836                                  
  4837                                  ;	msload passes a 32 bit sector number hi word in ax and low in bx
  4838                                  ;	save this in cs:bios_h and cs:bios_l. this is for the start of
  4839                                  ;	data sector of the bios.
  4840                                  
  4841 00001624 2EA3[8215]              		mov	[cs:bios_h], ax	; (start of) dos bios (IO.SYS) data sector
  4842 00001628 2E891E[8015]            		mov	[cs:bios_l], bx
  4843                                  
  4844                                  ; with the following information from msload, we don't need the
  4845                                  ;     boot sector any more.-> this will solve the problem of 29 kb size
  4846                                  ;     limitation of msbio.com file.
  4847                                  
  4848 0000162D 0E                      		push	cs		; Save a peck of interrupt vectors...
  4849 0000162E 07                      		pop	es
  4850                                  
  4851 0000162F 51                      		push	cx ; +++ ; ch = [MediaByte]
  4852                                  		;push	di ; *! (not necessary) ; 12/12/2023
  4853                                  
  4854                                  		; 12/12/2023
  4855                                  		; ds <> cs
  4856                                  		; ds = relocated MSLOAD segment, cs = BIOSDATA segment
  4857                                  		; 21/12/2022
  4858                                  		; ds = 0 (?)
  4859                                  		; 24/12/2022
  4860                                  		; ds = cs
  4861 00001630 31C9                    		xor	cx, cx
  4862 00001632 8ED9                    		mov	ds, cx
  4863                                  		; ds = 0
  4864                                  
  4865 00001634 B105                    		mov	cl, 5
  4866                                  		;mov	cx, 5		; NUMROMVECTORS
  4867                                  					; no. of rom vectors to	be saved
  4868                                  		;mov	si, offset RomVectors ; point to list of int vectors
  4869 00001636 BE[0001]                		mov	si, RomVectors
  4870                                  
  4871                                  		; 12/12/2023
  4872 00001639 FA                      		cli
  4873                                  next_int_:		
  4874 0000163A 2E                      		cs	; 16/10/2022
  4875 0000163B AC                      		lodsb		
  4876                                  		;lods	byte ptr cs:[si] ; cs lodsb
  4877 0000163C 98                      		cbw			; ax = interrupt number
  4878 0000163D D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1
  4879 0000163F D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1		; int no * 4
  4880 00001641 89C7                    		mov	di, ax		; interrupt vector address
  4881 00001643 87FE                    		xchg	si, di		; rombios interrupt vector address in si
  4882                                  					; saving address in di
  4883                                  		;lodsw			; movsw
  4884                                  		;stosw
  4885                                  		;lodsw			; movsw
  4886                                  		;stosw			; save the vector
  4887                                  		; 28/09/2023
  4888 00001645 A5                      		movsw
  4889 00001646 A5                      		movsw
  4890                                  
  4891 00001647 87FE                    		xchg	si, di
  4892 00001649 E2EF                    		loop	next_int_
  4893                                  
  4894                                  		; 12/12/2023
  4895                                  		;pop	di  ; *!
  4896                                  		;pop	cx ; +++ ; ch = [MediaByte]
  4897                                  
  4898                                  ; we need to save int13 in two places in case we are running on an at.
  4899                                  ; on ats we install the ibm supplied rom_bios patch which hooks
  4900                                  ; int13 ahead of orig13. since int19 must unhook int13 to point to the
  4901                                  ; rom int13 routine, we must have that rom address also stored away.
  4902                                  
  4903                                  		; 21/12/2022
  4904                                  		;mov	ax, [cs:Old13]	; save old13 in orig13 also
  4905                                  		;mov	[cs:Orig13], ax
  4906                                  		;mov	ax, [cs:Old13+2]
  4907                                  		;mov	[cs:Orig13+2], ax
  4908                                  
  4909                                  		; 16/10/2022
  4910 0000164B C7064C00[4607]          		mov	word [13h*4], block13
  4911                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:4Ch, offset	block13	; 13h*4
  4912                                  					; set up int 13	for new	action
  4913 00001651 8C0E4E00                		mov	[13h*4+2], cs
  4914                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:4Eh, cs ; 13h*4+2
  4915 00001655 C7065400[F507]          		mov	word [15h*4], Int15
  4916                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:54h, offset	Int15 ;	15h*4
  4917                                  					; set up int 15	for new	action
  4918 0000165B 8C0E5600                		mov	[15h*4+2], cs
  4919                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:56h, cs ; 15h*4+2
  4920 0000165F C7066400[B507]          		mov	word [19h*4], int19
  4921                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:64h, offset	int19 ;	19h*4
  4922                                  					; set up int 19	for new	action
  4923 00001665 8C0E6600                		mov	[19h*4+2], cs
  4924                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:66h, cs ; 19h*4+2
  4925                                  
  4926                                  		; 21/12/2022
  4927 00001669 0E                      		push	cs
  4928 0000166A 1F                      		pop	ds
  4929                                  		
  4930 0000166B A1[0601]                		mov	ax, [Old13]	; save old13 in orig13 also
  4931 0000166E A3[B400]                		mov	[Orig13], ax
  4932 00001671 A1[0801]                		mov	ax, [Old13+2]
  4933 00001674 A3[B600]                		mov	[Orig13+2], ax
  4934                                  					; ;
  4935 00001677 FB                      		sti
  4936 00001678 CD11                    		int	11h		; EQUIPMENT DETERMINATION
  4937                                  					; Return: AX = equipment flag bits
  4938                                  
  4939                                  ; we have to support a system that does not have any diskette
  4940                                  ; drives but only hardfiles. this system will ipl from the hardfile.
  4941                                  ; if the equipment flag bit 0 is 1, then the system has diskette drive(s).
  4942                                  ; otherwise, the system has only hardfiles.
  4943                                  ;
  4944                                  ; important thing is that still, for compatibility reason, the drive letter
  4945                                  ; for the hardfiles start from "c". so, we still need to allocate dummy bds
  4946                                  ; drive a and drive b. at sysinit time, we are going to set cds table entry
  4947                                  ; of dpb pointer for these drives to 0, so any user attempt to access this
  4948                                  ; drives will get "invalid drive letter ..." message. we are going to
  4949                                  ; establish "fakefloppydrv" flag. ***sysinit module should call int 11h to
  4950                                  ; determine whether there are any diskette drivers in the system or not.!!!***
  4951                                  
  4952                                  ; check the register returned by the equipment determination interrupt
  4953                                  ; we have to handle the case of no diskettes in the system by faking
  4954                                  ; two dummy drives.
  4955                                  ;
  4956                                  ; if the register indicates that we do have floppy drives we don't need
  4957                                  ; to do anything special.
  4958                                  ;
  4959                                  ; if the register indicates that we don't have any floppy drives then
  4960                                  ; what we need to do is set the fakefloppydrv variable, change the
  4961                                  ; register to say that we do have floppy drives and then go to execute
  4962                                  ; the code which starts at notsingle. this is because we can skip the
  4963                                  ; code given below which tries to find if there are one or two drives
  4964                                  ; since we already know about this.
  4965                                  
  4966                                  		; 12/12/2022
  4967 0000167A A801                    		test	al, 1
  4968                                  		;test	ax, 1		; floppy drives	present	?
  4969 0000167C 7524                    		jnz	short normalfloppydrv ;	yes.
  4970                                  
  4971                                  ; Some ROM BIOSs lie that there are no floppy drives. Lets find out
  4972                                  ; whether it is an old ROM BIOS or a new one
  4973                                  ;
  4974                                  ; WARNING !!!
  4975                                  ;
  4976                                  ; This sequence of code is present in SYSINIT1.ASM also. Any modification
  4977                                  ; here will require an equivalent modification in SYSINIT1.ASM also
  4978                                  
  4979                                  		; 12/12/2023
  4980                                  		; ((cx is already on top of the stack))
  4981                                  		;push	cx	; +++ ; ch = [MediaByte]
  4982                                  		;push	bx	; not necessary
  4983 0000167E 50                      		push	ax
  4984 0000167F 52                      		push	dx
  4985                                  		;push	di	; not necessary
  4986 00001680 06                      		push	es
  4987                                  
  4988 00001681 B408                    		mov	ah, 8
  4989 00001683 B200                    		mov	dl, 0
  4990 00001685 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - DISK -	GET CURRENT DRIVE PARAMETERS (XT,AT,XT286,CONV,PS)
  4991                                  					; DL = drive number
  4992                                  					; Return: CF set on error, AH =	status code, BL	= drive	type
  4993                                  					; DL = number of consecutive drives
  4994                                  					; DH = maximum value for head number, ES:DI -> drive parameter
  4995 00001687 7204                    		jc	short _gdskp_error
  4996                                  		;mov	[cs:flp_drvs], dl
  4997                                  		; 21/12/2022
  4998                                  		; ds = cs
  4999 00001689 8816[2316]              		mov	[flp_drvs], dl
  5000                                  _gdskp_error:				
  5001                                  		; 12/12/2023
  5002 0000168D 07                      		pop	es
  5003                                  		;pop	di
  5004 0000168E 5A                      		pop	dx
  5005 0000168F 58                      		pop	ax
  5006                                  		;pop	bx
  5007                                  		; 13/12/2023
  5008                                  		;pop	cx	; +++ ; ch = [MediaByte]
  5009 00001690 7210                    		jc	short normalfloppydrv
  5010                                  					; if error it is an old ROM BIOS
  5011                                  					; so, lets assume that ROM BIOS lied
  5012                                  
  5013                                  		; 21/12/2022
  5014                                  		;cmp	byte [cs:flp_drvs], 0 ; number of drvs == 0?
  5015                                  		;jz	short _set_fake_flpdrv
  5016                                  		;mov	al, [cs:flp_drvs]
  5017 00001692 A0[2316]                		mov	al, [flp_drvs]
  5018 00001695 08C0                    		or	al, al		; number of drvs == 0?
  5019 00001697 7403                    		jz	short _set_fake_flpdrv
  5020                                  
  5021                                  		;dec	al		; make it zero based
  5022                                  		; 18/12/2022
  5023 00001699 48                      		dec	ax
  5024 0000169A EB0A                    		jmp	short got_num_flp_drvs
  5025                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  5026                                  
  5027                                  _set_fake_flpdrv:
  5028                                  		; 21/12/2022
  5029                                  		;mov	ax, 1
  5030                                  		; 10/12/2023
  5031 0000169C 40                      		inc	ax ; al = 1
  5032 0000169D A2[9315]                		mov	[fakefloppydrv], al ; 1
  5033                                  		;mov	byte [cs:fakefloppydrv], 1
  5034                                  		;			; we don't have any floppy drives.
  5035                                  		;mov	ax, 1
  5036 000016A0 EB09                    		jmp	short settwodrive ; well then set it for two drives!
  5037                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  5038                                  
  5039                                  normalfloppydrv:			; yes, bit 0 is 1.			
  5040 000016A2 D0C0                    		rol	al, 1		; there	exist floppy drives.
  5041 000016A4 D0C0                    		rol	al, 1		; put bits 6 & 7 into bits 0 & 1
  5042                                  got_num_flp_drvs:			
  5043                                  		;and	ax, 3		; only look at bits 0 &	1
  5044                                  		; 18/12/2022
  5045 000016A6 2403                    		and	al, 3
  5046 000016A8 7505                    		jnz	short notsingle	; zero means single drive system
  5047 000016AA 40                      		inc	ax		; pretend it's a two drive system
  5048                                  settwodrive:				; set this to two fakedrives

  5052                                  		;inc	byte [cs:single] ; remember this

  5054 000016AF 40                      		inc	ax		; ax has number	of drives, 2-4
  5055                                  					; is also 0 indexed boot drive if we
  5056                                  					; booted off hard file
  5057                                  		; 13/12/2023

  5059                                  
  5060 000016B1 88C1                    		mov	cl, al		; ch is	fat id,	cl # floppies
  5061                                  
  5062                                  ; 16/10/2022
  5063                                  ; MSDOS 3.3 - "MSEQU.INC" (24/07/1987)
  5064                                  INITSPOT EQU	534h	; IBM wants 4 zeros here
  5065                                  BRKADR	EQU	1BH * 4	; 6CH, 1BH break vector address
  5066                                  TIMADR	EQU	1CH * 4	; 70H, 1CH timer interrupt

  5071

  5094

  5096

  5099 000016C2 7215                    		jb	short no_rom_system_conf ; just	use Model_Byte

  5463                                  
  5464                                  ; scan the list of drives to determine their type. we have three flavors of
  5465                                  ; diskette drives:
  5466                                  ;
  5467                                  ;   48tpi drives    we do nothing special for them
  5468                                  ;   96tpi drives    mark the fact that they have changeline support.
  5469                                  ;   3.5"  drives    mark changeline support and small.
  5470                                  ;
  5471                                  ; the following code uses registers for certain values:
  5472                                  ;
  5473                                  ;   dl - physical drive
  5474                                  ;   ds:di - points to current bds
  5475                                  ;   cx - flag bits for bds
  5476                                  ;   dh - form factor for the drive (1 - 48tpi, 2 - 96tpi, 3 - 3.5" medium)
  5477

  5487                                  					; to set aside two bdss	for the	two fake floppy	drives

  5491

  5493                                  ; do anything special. if we are faking floppy drives we need
  5494                                  ; to set aside two bdss for the two fake floppy drives. we
  5495                                  ; don't need to initalise any fields though. so starting at start_bds
  5496                                  ; use the link field in the bds structure to go to the second bds
  5497                                  ; in the list and initalise it's link field to -1 to set the end of
  5498                                  ; the list. then jump to the routine at dohard to allocate/initialise
  5499                                  ; the bds for harddrives.

  5928                                  ; if more than 2 diskette drives on the system, then it is necessary to remap
  5929                                  ; the bds chain to adjust the logical drive num (drive letter) with greater
  5930                                  ; than two diskette drives
  5931                                  ;
  5932                                  ; new scheme:	if more than 2 disktte drives, first map the bds structure
  5933                                  ;		as usual and then rescan the bds chain to adjust the  drive
  5934                                  ;		letters. to do this, scan for disk drives and assign logical
  5935                                  ;		drive number starting from 2 and then rescan diskette drives
  5936                                  ;		and assign next to the last logical drive number of last disk

  5950                                  ;we now decide, based on the configurations available so far, what
  5951                                  ;code or data we need to keep as a stay resident code. the following table
  5952                                  ;shows the configurations under consideration. they are listed in the order
  5953                                  ;of their current position memory.
  5954                                  ;
  5955                                  ;configuration will be done in two ways:
  5956                                  ;
  5957                                  ;first, we are going to set "static configuration". static configuration will
  5958                                  ;consider from basic configuration to endof96tpi configuration. the result
  5959                                  ;of static configuration will be the address the dynamic configuration will
  5960                                  ;use to start with.
  5961                                  ;
  5962                                  ;secondly, "dynamic cofiguration" will be performed. dynamic configuration
  5963                                  ;involves possible relocation of code or data. dynamic configuration routine
  5964                                  ;will take care of bdsm tables and at rom fix module thru k09 suspend/resume
  5965                                  ;code individually. after these operation, [dosdatasg] will be set.
  5966                                  ;this will be the place sysinit routine will relocate msdos module for good.
  5967

  6050                                  ; M065 -- begin changes
  6051                                  ;
  6052                                  ; On certain systems with Western Digital disk controllers, the
  6053                                  ; following detection scheme caused an unpredictable and serious
  6054                                  ; failure. In particular, they've implemented a nonstandard
  6055                                  ; Int13(ah=16h) which reconfigures the hard drive, depending on
  6056                                  ; what happens to be at es:[bx] and other memory locations indexed
  6057                                  ; off of it.
  6058                                  ;
  6059                                  ; Compaq was unable to tell us exactly which kind of systems have
  6060                                  ; the bug, except that they guarantee that the bug was fixed in
  6061                                  ; ROM BIOSs dated 08/04/86 and later. We'll check for the COMPAQ
  6062                                  ; string, and then look for date codes before 08/04/86 to decide
  6063                                  ; when to install the hook.
  6064                                  
  6065                                  ;checkcmosclock:
  6066                                  ; 02/10/2022				
  6067                                  checkcompaqbug:
  6068                                  		; 21/12/2022

  6077 00001A26 26813EECFF4D50          		cmp	word [es:0FFECh], 'MP'
  6078                                  		;cmp	word ptr es:0FFECh, 'PM'

  6080 00001A2F 26813EEEFF4151          		cmp	word [es:0FFEEh], 'AQ'
  6081                                  		;cmp	word ptr es:0FFEEh, 'QA'
  6082 00001A36 7539                    		jnz	short not_compaq_patch

  6375                                  ; Following are subroutines to support resident device driver initialization
  6376                                  ;
  6377                                  ;M011 -- note:  deleted setup_bdsms and reset_bdsms here
  6378                                  
  6379                                  ;	M035 -- begin changed section
  6380                                  
  6381                                  ;******************************************************************************
  6382                                  ; module name: remap
  6383                                  ;
  6384                                  ; descriptive name: all the code for himem that could be separated from msbio
  6385                                  ;
  6386                                  ; function:  remap the bds chain to adjusted logical drive numbers (drive
  6387                                  ;	     letters) if more than two diskette drives on the system.
  6388                                  ;
  6389                                  ;     scheme:  if more than 2 diskette drives, first map the bds structure
  6390                                  ;	       as usual and then rescan the bds chain to adjust the drive
  6391                                  ;	       letters. to do this, scan for disk drives and assign logical
  6392                                  ;	       drive number starting from 2 and then rescan diskette drives
  6393                                  ;	       and assign next to the last logical drive number of last disk
  6394                                  ;	       drive to the 3rd and 4th diskette drives.
  6395                                  
  6396                                  ; input:       none
  6397                                  ; exit:	drive letters have been remapped in bds chain
  6398                                  ; exit error:  none
  6399                                  ; called from: msinit
  6400                                  ;
  6401                                  ; notes:  this function  will be called only if more than 2 diskettes are
  6402                                  ;	  found in the system
  6403                                  ;	  this function assumes that there are no more than 26 drives assigned
  6404                                  ;	    this is guaranteed by the code that creates bdss for partitions
  6405                                  ;	  this function assumes that the first entries in the chain are
  6406                                  ;	   floppy drives, and all the rest are hard drives
  6407                                  ;	  will alter the boot drive if necessary to reflect remapping
  6408                                  ;
  6409                                  ;******************************************************************************
  6410                                  
  6411                                  ; 17/10/2022
  6412                                  ; 02/10/2022
  6413                                  		; 15/12/2023 - Retro DOS v5.0 (PCDOS 7.1) IBMBIO.COM
  6414                                  		; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSDATA:2464h)
  6415                                  		; (MSDOS 6.22 IO.SYS - BIOSDATA:1D9Eh)
  6416                                  
  6417                                  remap:		; proc near
  6418                                  
  6419                                  		; 15/12/2023
  6420                                  		; ds = cs
  6421                                  		;mov	di, [cs:start_bds] ; get first bds
  6422 00001B13 8B3E[1901]              		mov	di, [start_bds]
  6423                                  
  6424                                  ; search for 1st fixed disk physical drive num
  6425                                  
  6426                                  drive_loop:
  6427 00001B17 807D0480                		cmp	byte [di+4], 80h ; [di+BDS.drivenum]
  6428                                  					; first	hard disk??
  6429 00001B1B 7409                    		jz	short fdrv_found ; yes,	continue
  6430 00001B1D 8B3D                    		mov	di, [di]	; [di+BDS.link]
  6431                                  					; get next bds,	assume segment
  6432 00001B1F 83FFFF                  		cmp	di, -1 ; 0FFFFh	; last bds?
  6433 00001B22 75F3                    		jnz	short drive_loop ; loop	if not
  6434 00001B24 EB49                    		jmp	short rmap_exit	; yes, no hard drive on	system
  6435                                  
  6436                                  ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  6437                                  ;first disk drive bds, now change the logical drive num to 2 and the subsequent
  6438                                  ;logical drive nums to 3, 4, 5 etc.
  6439                                  ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  6440                                  
  6441                                  fdrv_found:
  6442 00001B26 B002                    		mov	al, 2		; start	with logical drv num=2
  6443                                  fdrv_loop:
  6444 00001B28 884505                  		mov	[di+5],	al	; [di+BDS.drivelet]
  6445 00001B2B 8B3D                    		mov	di, [di]	; [di+BDS.link]
  6446                                  					; ds:di--> next	bds
  6447                                  		;inc	al		; set num for next drive
  6448                                  		; 18/12/2022
  6449 00001B2D 40                      		inc	ax
  6450 00001B2E 83FFFF                  		cmp	di, 0FFFFh	; last hard drive ?
  6451 00001B31 75F5                    		jnz	short fdrv_loop	; no - assign more disk drives
  6452                                  
  6453                                  ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  6454                                  ; now, rescan and find bds of 3rd floppy drive and assign next drive letter
  6455                                  ; in al to 3rd. if the current drive letter is past z, then do not allocate
  6456                                  ; any more.
  6457                                  ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  6458                                  
  6459                                  		;mov	di, [cs:start_bds] ; [start_bds]
  6460                                  		; 15/12/2023
  6461 00001B33 8B3E[1901]              		mov	di, [start_bds]	; get first bds
  6462 00001B37 8B3D                    		mov	di, [di]	; [di+BDS.link]
  6463                                  					; ds:di-->bds2
  6464                                  		;mov	ah, [cs:dsktnum] ; get number of floppies to remap
  6465 00001B39 8A26[2501]              		mov	ah, [dsktnum]
  6466 00001B3D 80EC02                  		sub	ah, 2		; adjust for a:	& b:
  6467                                  remap_loop1:
  6468 00001B40 8B3D                    		mov	di, [di]	; [di+BDS.link]
  6469                                  					; set new num to next floppy
  6470 00001B42 884505                  		mov	[di+5],	al	; [di+BDS.drivelet]
  6471 00001B45 FEC0                    		inc	al		; new number for next floppy
  6472 00001B47 FECC                    		dec	ah		; count down extra floppies
  6473 00001B49 75F5                    		jnz	short remap_loop1
  6474                                  
  6475                                  ; now we've got to adjust the boot drive if we reassigned it
  6476                                  
  6477                                  		; 15/12/2023
  6478                                  		;mov	al, [cs:drvfat]
  6479 00001B4B A0[7E15]                		mov	al, [drvfat]
  6480 00001B4E 3C02                    		cmp	al, 2		; is it	a: or b: ?
  6481 00001B50 721D                    		jb	short rmap_exit
  6482                                  		;sub	al, [cs:dsktnum]
  6483 00001B52 2A06[2501]              		sub	al, [dsktnum]	; is it one of the other floppies?
  6484 00001B56 7204                    		jb	short remap_boot_flop ;	brif so
  6485                                  
  6486                                  ; we've got to remap the boot hard drive
  6487                                  ; subtract the number of EXTRA floppies from it
  6488                                  
  6489 00001B58 0402                    		add	al, 2		; bootdrv -= (dsktnum-2)
  6490 00001B5A EB04                    		jmp	short remap_change_boot_drv
  6491                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  6492                                  
  6493                                  ; we've got to remap the boot floppy.
  6494                                  ; add the number of hard drive partitions to it
  6495                                  
  6496                                  remap_boot_flop:
  6497                                  		;add	al, [cs:drvmax]	; bootdrv += (drvmax-dsktnum)
  6498                                  		; 15/12/2023
  6499 00001B5C 0206[7500]              		add	al, [drvmax]
  6500                                  remap_change_boot_drv:			
  6501                                  		;mov	[cs:drvfat], al ; alter msdos.sys load drive
  6502 00001B60 A2[7E15]                		mov	[drvfat], al
  6503 00001B63 FEC0                    		inc	al
  6504 00001B65 1E                      		push	ds
  6505 00001B66 BF3A04                  		mov	di, SYSINITSEG	; 46Dh
  6506                                  		;mov	di, 544h	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM
  6507                                  		;;mov	di, 46Dh	; SYSINIT segment
  6508 00001B69 8EDF                    		mov	ds, di
  6509 00001B6B A2[9802]                		mov	[DEFAULTDRIVE], al
  6510                                  		;mov	ds:296h, al	; [SYSINIT+DEFAULT_DRIVE]
  6511                                  					; pass it to sysinit as	well
  6512 00001B6E 1F                      		pop	ds ; ds = cs
  6513                                  rmap_exit:
  6514 00001B6F C3                      		retn
  6515                                  
  6516                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  6517                                  
  6518                                  ; 17/10/2022
  6519                                  ; 02/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (MSDOS 5.0 -actual-)
  6520                                  ; 28/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0 (MSDOS 6.21 -draft-)
  6521                                  ; 02/06/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0 (MSDOS 3.3)	
  6522                                  ; 19/03/2018 - Retro DOS v2.0 (MSDOS 2.11)
  6523                                  ;**************************************************
  6524                                  ; getboot - get the boot sector for a hard disk
  6525                                  ;
  6526                                  ; Reads the boot sector from a specified drive into
  6527                                  ; a buffer at the top of memory.
  6528                                  ;
  6529                                  ; dl = int13 drive number to read boot sector for
  6530                                  ;**************************************************
  6531                                  
  6532                                  ; 17/10/2022
  6533                                  bootbias equ 200h
  6534                                  
  6535                                  getboot:	; proc near
  6536                                  
  6537                                  		; 15/12/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 
  6538                                  		;	 (Modified MSDOS 6.22) IO.SYS
  6539                                  		; ds = cs
  6540                                  		
  6541                                  		; 08/04/2018
  6542                                  		; Retro DOS v2.0 (IBMBIO.COM, IBMDOS 2.1)
  6543                                  		; 28/03/2018 - MSDOS 6.0 - MSINIT.ASM, 1991
  6544                                  		; 02/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0
  6545                                  		;	      (disassembled IO.SYS code of MSDOS 5.0)
  6546                                  
  6547                                  		;mov	ax, [cs:init_bootseg] ; 17/10/2022
  6548                                  		; 15/12/2023
  6549 00001B70 A1[8915]                		mov	ax, [init_bootseg]
  6550 00001B73 8EC0                    		mov	es, ax
  6551                                  
  6552                                  		; 17/10/2022
  6553 00001B75 BB0002                  		mov	bx, bootbias ; 200h
  6554                                  		;mov	bx, 200h	; bootbias
  6555                                  					; load BX, ES:BX is where sector goes
  6556 00001B78 B80102                  		mov	ax, 201h
  6557 00001B7B 30F6                    		xor	dh, dh
  6558 00001B7D B90100                  		mov	cx, 1
  6559 00001B80 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - READ SECTORS INTO MEMORY
  6560                                  					; AL = number of sectors to read, CH = track, CL = sector
  6561                                  					; DH = head, DL	= drive, ES:BX -> buffer to fill
  6562                                  					; Return: CF set on error, AH =	status,	AL = number of sectors read
  6563 00001B82 7209                    		jb	short erret
  6564                                  		; 17/10/2022
  6565 00001B84 26813EFE0355AA          		cmp	word [es:bootbias+1FEh], 0AA55h
  6566                                  		;cmp	word ptr es:3FEh, 0AA55h ; [es:bootbias+1FEh]
  6567                                  					; Dave Litton magic word?
  6568 00001B8B 7401                    		jz	short norm_ret	; yes
  6569                                  erret:
  6570 00001B8D F9                      		stc
  6571                                  norm_ret:
  6572 00001B8E C3                      		retn
  6573                                  
  6574                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  6575                                  		
  6576                                  		; 16/12/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.22)
  6577                                  
  6578                                  chk_partition_type:
  6579                                  		; 16/12/2023
  6580 00001B8F 268A07                  		mov	al, [es:bx]	; partition type
  6581                                  
  6582                                  		; see if partitiontype == 1, 4, 6
  6583 00001B92 3C01                    		cmp	al, 1		; FAT12
  6584 00001B94 7406                    		je	short chk_ptype_retn
  6585 00001B96 3C04                    		cmp	al, 4		; FAT16 CHS (<= 32MB)
  6586 00001B98 7402                    		je	short chk_ptype_retn
  6587 00001B9A 3C06                    		cmp	al, 6		; FAT16 BIG CHS (> 32MB)
  6588                                  chk_ptype_retn:
  6589                                  		; zf = 1 -> primary DOS partition
  6590                                  		; zf = 0 -> not a primary DOS partition
  6591 00001B9C C3                      		retn
  6592                                  
  6593                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  6594                                  
  6595                                  ; 28/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0 
  6596                                  
  6597                                  ;***************************************************************************
  6598                                  ;   sethard - generate bpb for a variable sized hard file. ibm has a
  6599                                  ;   partitioned hard file; we must read physical sector 0 to determine where
  6600                                  ;   our own logical sectors start. we also read in our boot sector to
  6601                                  ;   determine version number
  6602                                  ;
  6603                                  ;   inputs:	dl is rom drive number (80...)
  6604                                  ;		bh is partition number (0....) 
  6605                                  ;		ds:di points to bds
  6606                                  ;   outputs:	carry clear -> bpb is filled in
  6607                                  ;		carry set   -> bpb is left uninitialized due to error
  6608                                  ;	trashes (at least) si, cx
  6609                                  ;	MUST PRESERVE ES:!!!!
  6610                                  ;***************************************************************************
  6611                                  
  6612                                  sethard:	; proc near
  6613                                  		; 16/12/2023
  6614                                  		; 12/08/2023
  6615                                  		; ds = cs = BIOSDATA
  6616 00001B9D 57                      		push	di
  6617 00001B9E 53                      		push	bx
  6618                                  		;push	ds  ; ds = cs = BIOSDATA ; 14/08/2023
  6619 00001B9F 06                      		push	es
  6620 00001BA0 885D05                  		mov	[di+5],	bl	; [di+BDS.drivelet]
  6621 00001BA3 885504                  		mov	[di+4],	dl	; [di+BDS.drivenum]
  6622 00001BA6 804D2301                		or	byte [di+23h], 1 ; [di+BDS.flags]
  6623                                  					; fnon_removable
  6624 00001BAA C6452205                		mov	byte [di+22h], 5 ; [di+BDS.formfactor]
  6625                                  					; ffHardFile
  6626 00001BAE C606[8615]00            		mov	byte [fbigfat], 0 ; assume 12 bit FAT
  6627 00001BB3 88FE                    		mov	dh, bh		; partition number
  6628 00001BB5 52                      		push	dx
  6629 00001BB6 B408                    		mov	ah, 8
  6630 00001BB8 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - DISK -	GET CURRENT DRIVE PARAMETERS (XT,AT,XT286,CONV,PS)
  6631                                  					; DL = drive number
  6632                                  					; Return: CF set on error, AH =	status code, BL	= drive	type
  6633                                  					; DL = number of consecutive drives
  6634                                  					; DH = maximum value for head number, ES:DI -> drive parameter
  6635 00001BBA FEC6                    		inc	dh
  6636 00001BBC 887515                  		mov	[di+15h], dh	; [di+BDS.heads] ; get number of heads
  6637 00001BBF 5A                      		pop	dx
  6638 00001BC0 7249                    		jb	short setret	; error	if no hard disk
  6639 00001BC2 80E13F                  		and	cl, 3Fh
  6640 00001BC5 884D13                  		mov	[di+13h], cl	; [di+BDS.secpertrack]
  6641 00001BC8 52                      		push	dx		; save partition number
  6642 00001BC9 E8A4FF                  		call	getboot
  6643 00001BCC 5A                      		pop	dx		; restore partition number
  6644 00001BCD 723C                    		jb	short setret
  6645 00001BCF BBC203                  		mov	bx, 3C2h	; 1C2h+bootbias
  6646                                  
  6647                                  ; The first 'active' partition is 00, the second is 01....
  6648                                  ;   then the remainder of the 'primary' but non-active partitions
  6649                                  
  6650                                  act_part:
  6651 00001BD2 26F647FC80              		test	byte [es:bx-4], 80h ; is the partition active?
  6652 00001BD7 740B                    		jz	short no_act	; no
  6653                                  ; 16/12/2023
  6654                                  %if 0
  6655                                  		cmp	byte [es:bx], 1 ; reject if partitiontype != 1, 4 or 6
  6656                                  		jz	short got_good_act
  6657                                  		cmp	byte [es:bx], 4
  6658                                  		jz	short got_good_act
  6659                                  		cmp	byte [es:bx], 6
  6660                                  		jnz	short no_act
  6661                                  %endif
  6662                                  		; 16/12/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.22)
  6663                                  		; check if it is a primary dos partition
  6664                                  
  6665 00001BD9 E8B3FF                  		call	chk_partition_type
  6666 00001BDC 7506                    		jne	short no_act
  6667                                  
  6668                                  got_good_act:
  6669 00001BDE 08F6                    		or	dh, dh		; is this our target partition #?
  6670 00001BE0 742D                    		jz	short set2	; WE GOT THE ONE WANTED!!
  6671 00001BE2 FECE                    		dec	dh		; count	down
  6672                                  no_act:
  6673 00001BE4 83C310                  		add	bx, 16
  6674 00001BE7 81FB0204                		cmp	bx, 402h	; 202h+bootbias
  6675                                  					; last entry done?
  6676 00001BEB 75E5                    		jnz	short act_part	; no, process next entry
  6677 00001BED BBC203                  		mov	bx, 3C2h	; 1C2h+bootbias
  6678                                  					; restore original value of bx
  6679                                  
  6680                                  ; Now scan the non-active partitions
  6681                                  
  6682                                  get_primary:				
  6683 00001BF0 26F647FC80              		test	byte [es:bx-4], 80h
  6684 00001BF5 750B                    		jnz	short not_prim	; we've already scanned
  6685                                  					; the ACTIVE ones
  6686                                  ; 16/12/2023
  6687                                  %if 0
  6688                                  		cmp	byte [es:bx], 1 ; see if partitiontype == 1, 4 or 6
  6689                                  		jz	short got_prim
  6690                                  		cmp	byte [es:bx], 4
  6691                                  		jz	short got_prim
  6692                                  		cmp	byte [es:bx], 6
  6693                                  		jnz	short not_prim
  6694                                  %endif
  6695                                  		; 16/12/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.22)
  6696                                  		; check if it is a primary dos partition
  6697                                  
  6698 00001BF7 E895FF                  		call	chk_partition_type
  6699 00001BFA 7506                    		jne	short not_prim
  6700                                  
  6701                                  got_prim:
  6702 00001BFC 08F6                    		or	dh, dh		; is this our target partition?
  6703 00001BFE 740F                    		jz	short set2
  6704 00001C00 FECE                    		dec	dh
  6705                                  not_prim:
  6706 00001C02 83C310                  		add	bx, 16
  6707 00001C05 81FB0204                		cmp	bx, 402h	; 202h+bootbias
  6708 00001C09 75E5                    		jnz	short get_primary ; loop till we've gone through table
  6709                                  setret:					
  6710 00001C0B F9                      		stc			; error	return
  6711 00001C0C E98502                  		jmp	ret_hard_err
  6712                                  
  6713                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  6714                                  
  6715                                  ;  until we get the real logical boot record and get the bpb,
  6716                                  ;  BDS_BPB.BPB_BIGTOTALSECTORS will be used instead of BDS_BPB.BPB_TOTALSECTORS
  6717                                  ;  for the convenience of the computation.
  6718                                  ;
  6719                                  ;  at the end of this procedure, if a bpb information is gotten from
  6720                                  ;  the valid boot record, then we are going to use those bpb information
  6721                                  ;  without change.
  6722                                  ;
  6723                                  ;  otherwise, if (hidden sectors + total sectors) <= a word, then we will move
  6724                                  ;  BDS_BPB.BPB_BIGTOTALSECTORS (low) to BDS_BPB.BPB_TOTALSECTORS and zero out
  6725                                  ;  BDS_BPB.BPB_BIGTOTALSECTORS entry to make it a conventional bpb format.
  6726                                  
  6727                                  set2:
  6728                                  		; 12/08/2023
  6729                                  		; ds = cs = BIOSDATA segment (0070h)
  6730 00001C0F 8816[8B15]              		mov	[rom_drv_num], dl
  6731                                  		;mov	[cs:rom_drv_num], dl
  6732                                  			; save the rom bios drive number we are handling now.
  6733 00001C13 268B4704                		mov	ax, [es:bx+4]	; hidden sectors (start	sector)
  6734 00001C17 268B5706                		mov	dx, [es:bx+6]
  6735                                  
  6736                                  ; decrement the sector count by 1 to make it zero based. exactly 64k
  6737                                  ; sectors should be allowed	
  6738                                  
  6739 00001C1B 83E801                  		sub	ax, 1
  6740 00001C1E 83DA00                  		sbb	dx, 0
  6741 00001C21 26034708                		add	ax, [es:bx+8]	; sectors in partition
  6742 00001C25 2613570A                		adc	dx, [es:bx+10]
  6743 00001C29 7305                    		jnc	short okdrive
  6744 00001C2B 800E[8615]80            		or	byte [fbigfat], 80h ; ftoobig
  6745                                  okdrive:
  6746 00001C30 268B4704                		mov	ax, [es:bx+4]
  6747 00001C34 894517                  		mov	[di+17h], ax	; [di+BDS.hiddensecs]
  6748                                  					; BPB_HIDDENSECTORS = p->partitionbegin
  6749 00001C37 268B4706                		mov	ax, [es:bx+6]
  6750 00001C3B 894519                  		mov	[di+19h], ax	; [di+BDS.hiddensecs+2]
  6751 00001C3E 268B570A                		mov	dx, [es:bx+10]	; # of sectors (high)
  6752 00001C42 268B4708                		mov	ax, [es:bx+8]	; # of sectors (low)
  6753 00001C46 89551D                  		mov	[di+1Dh], dx	; [di+BDS.totalsecs32+2]
  6754 00001C49 89451B                  		mov	[di+1Bh], ax	; [di+BDS.totalsecs32]
  6755                                  					; bpb->maxsec =	p->partitionlength
  6756                                  		;cmp	dx, 0
  6757                                  		;ja	short okdrive_1
  6758                                  		; 16/12/2023
  6759 00001C4C 09D2                    		or	dx, dx
  6760 00001C4E 7505                    		jnz	short okdrive_1
  6761 00001C50 83F840                  		cmp	ax, 64		; if (p->partitionlength < 64)
  6762 00001C53 72B6                    		jb	short setret	; return -1;
  6763                                  okdrive_1:
  6764                                  		;mov	dx, [di+19h]	; [di+BDS.hiddensecs+2]
  6765                                  		;mov	ax, [di+17h]	; [di+BDS.hiddensecs]
  6766                                  		; 16/12/2023
  6767                                  		;push	ax ; *
  6768 00001C55 8B4519                  		mov	ax, [di+19h]	; [di+BDS.hiddensecs+2]
  6769 00001C58 31DB                    		xor	bx, bx		; boot sector number - for mini	disk
  6770                                  					; usually equal	to the # of sec/trk.
  6771 00001C5A 8A5D13                  		mov	bl, [di+13h]	; [di+BDS.secpertrack]
  6772                                  		; 16/12/2023
  6773                                  		;push	ax
  6774                                  		;mov	ax, dx
  6775 00001C5D 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  6776 00001C5F F7F3                    		div	bx		; (sectors)dx:ax / (BDS.secpertrack)bx =
  6777                                  					; (track)temp_h:ax + (sector)dx
  6778                                  		; 17/10/2022
  6779                                  		;mov	[cs:temp_h], ax
  6780                                  		; 12/08/2023 (ds=cs)
  6781 00001C61 A3[1A05]                		mov	[temp_h], ax
  6782                                  		; 16/12/2023
  6783                                  		;pop	ax ; *
  6784 00001C64 8B4517                  		mov	ax, [di+17h]	; [di+BDS.hiddensecs]
  6785 00001C67 F7F3                    		div	bx
  6786 00001C69 88D1                    		mov	cl, dl
  6787 00001C6B FEC1                    		inc	cl
  6788                                  		;xor	bx, bx
  6789                                  		; 16/12/2023
  6790                                  		; bh = 0
  6791 00001C6D 8A5D15                  		mov	bl, [di+15h]	; [di+BDS.heads]
  6792                                  		;push	ax ; *
  6793 00001C70 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  6794                                  		;;mov	ax, [cs:temp_h]
  6795                                  		;mov	ax, [temp_h] ; 14/08/2023
  6796                                  		; 16/12/2023
  6797 00001C72 8706[1A05]              		xchg	ax, [temp_h] ; * (push ax)
  6798 00001C76 F7F3                    		div	bx
  6799                                  		;;mov	[cs:temp_h], ax
  6800                                  		;mov	[temp_h], ax ; 14/08/2023
  6801                                  		;pop	ax ; *
  6802                                  		; 16/12/2023
  6803 00001C78 8706[1A05]              		xchg	ax, [temp_h] ; * (pop ax)
  6804 00001C7C F7F3                    		div	bx		; dl is head, ax is cylinder
  6805                                  		; 12/08/2023 (ds=cs)
  6806 00001C7E 833E[1A05]00            		cmp	word [temp_h], 0
  6807                                  		;cmp	word [cs:temp_h], 0
  6808                                  		;ja	short setret_brdg ; exceeds the	limit of int 13h
  6809                                  		; 16/12/2023
  6810 00001C83 7786                    		ja	short setret
  6811 00001C85 3D0004                  		cmp	ax, 1024
  6812                                  		;ja	short setret_brdg ; exceeds the	limit of int 13h
  6813                                  		; 16/12/2023
  6814 00001C88 7781                    		ja	short setret
  6815                                  			; Retro DOS v3.2 note by Erdogan Tan - 28/07/2019
  6816                                  			; **MSDOS code accepts if ax = 1024 but it is nonsense here
  6817                                  			; ('ja' must be 'jnb')
  6818                                  okdrive_2:
  6819                                   		; 28/07/2019
  6820                                  ; dl is head.
  6821                                  ; ax is cylinder
  6822                                  ; cl is sector number (assume less than 2**6 = 64 for int 13h)
  6823                                  
  6824                                  ;*** for mini disks ***
  6825                                  
  6826 00001C8A 837D4701                		cmp	word [di+47h], 1 ; [di+BDS.bdsm_ismini]
  6827                                  					; check for mini disk
  6828 00001C8E 7503                    		jnz	short oknotmini	; not mini disk.
  6829 00001C90 034549                  		add	ax, [di+49h]	; [di+BDS.bdsm_hidden_trks]
  6830                                  					; set the physical track number
  6831                                  oknotmini:
  6832                                  ;*** end of added logic for mini disk
  6833                                  				
  6834 00001C93 D0CC                    		ror	ah, 1		; move high two bits of cyl to high
  6835 00001C95 D0CC                    		ror	ah, 1		; two bits of upper byte
  6836 00001C97 80E4C0                  		and	ah, 0C0h	; turn off remainder of bits
  6837 00001C9A 08E1                    		or	cl, ah		; move two bits to correct spot
  6838 00001C9C 88C5                    		mov	ch, al		; ch iscylinder (low 8 bits)
  6839                                  					; cl is sector + 2 high bits of cylinder
  6840 00001C9E 88D6                    		mov	dh, dl		; dh is	head
  6841                                  		
  6842                                  		; 12/08/2023 (ds=cs)
  6843 00001CA0 8A16[8B15]              		mov	dl, [rom_drv_num]
  6844                                  		;mov	dl, [cs:rom_drv_num] ; dl is drive number
  6845                                  
  6846                                  ; cl is sector + 2 high bits of cylinder
  6847                                  ; ch is low 8 bits of cylinder
  6848                                  ; dh is head
  6849                                  ; dl is drive
  6850                                  
  6851                                  ; for convenience, we are going to read the logical boot sector
  6852                                  ; into cs:disksector area.
  6853                                  
  6854                                  ; read in boot sector using bios disk interrupt. the buffer where it
  6855                                  ; is to be read in is cs:disksector.
  6856                                  
  6857 00001CA4 0E                      		push	cs
  6858 00001CA5 07                      		pop	es
  6859 00001CA6 BB[4E01]                		mov	bx, disksector	; for convenience,
  6860                                  					; we are going to read the logical boot sector
  6861                                  					; into cs:disksector area.
  6862 00001CA9 B80102                  		mov	ax, 201h
  6863 00001CAC CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - READ SECTORS INTO MEMORY
  6864                                  					; AL = number of sectors to read, CH = track, CL = sector
  6865                                  					; DH = head, DL	= drive, ES:BX -> buffer to fill
  6866                                  					; Return: CF set on error, AH =	status,	AL = number of sectors read
  6867                                  		; 16/12/2023
  6868 00001CAE 7303                    		jnc	short set3_read_ok
  6869                                  set3_err:
  6870 00001CB0 E9E101                  		jmp	ret_hard_err
  6871                                  
  6872                                  ; cs:disksec contains the boot sector. in theory, (ha ha) the bpb in this thing
  6873                                  ; is correct. we can, therefore, suck out all the relevant statistics on the
  6874                                  ; media if we recognize the version number.
  6875                                  
  6876                                  set3_read_ok:
  6877                                  		; 11/08/2023
  6878                                  		;mov	bx, disksector	; BIOSDATA:014Eh ; MSDOS 6.21 ; 11/08/2023
  6879                                  					; BIOSDATA:0152h ; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM
  6880                                  		; 18/12/2023
  6881                                  		;push	bx ; +
  6882                                  		;push	ax ; (not necessary)
  6883                                  
  6884                                  		; 16/12/2023
  6885                                  		;cmp	word [bx+1FEh], 0AA55h
  6886                                  		;jne	short invalid_boot_record
  6887                                  
  6888                                  		; 12/08/2023
  6889                                  		; ds = cs = BIOSDATA segment ('disksector:' is in BIOSDATA) 
  6890 00001CB3 803FE9                  		cmp	byte [bx], 0E9h
  6891                                  		;cmp	byte [cs:bx], 0E9h ; is it a near jump?
  6892 00001CB6 740B                    		je	short check_1_ok ; yes
  6893 00001CB8 803FEB                  		cmp	byte [bx], 0EBh
  6894                                  		;cmp	byte [cs:bx], 0EBh ; is it a short jump?
  6895 00001CBB 7523                    		jne	short invalid_boot_record ; no
  6896 00001CBD 807F0290                		cmp	byte [bx+2], 90h
  6897                                  		;cmp	byte [cs:bx+2], 90h ; yes, is the next one a nop?
  6898 00001CC1 751D                    		jne	short invalid_boot_record ; no, invalid bs ; 11/08/2023
  6899                                  check_1_ok:
  6900                                  
  6901                                  ; 18/12/2023
  6902                                  %if 0	
  6903                                  		; 14/08/2023			
  6904                                  		mov	bx, disksector+11 ; disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB
  6905                                  		;mov	bx, 159h	; disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB
  6906                                  					; point	to the bpb in the boot record
  6907                                  		;mov	al, [cs:bx+10]	; [bx+EBPB.MEDIADESCRIPTOR]
  6908                                  		mov	al, [bx+10] ; 14/08/2023 
  6909                                  					; get the mediadescriptor byte
  6910                                  		and	al, 0F0h	; mask off low nibble
  6911                                  		cmp	al, 0F0h	; is high nibble = 0Fh?
  6912                                  		jne	short invalid_boot_record ; no,	invalid	boot record
  6913                                  		;cmp	word [cs:bx], 512 ; [bx+EBPB.BYTESPERSECTOR]
  6914                                  		cmp	word [bx], 512 ; 14/08/2023
  6915                                  		jne	short invalid_boot_record ; invalidate non 512 byte sectors
  6916                                  
  6917                                  check2_ok:				; yes, mediadescriptor ok.
  6918                                  		mov	al, [bx+2] ; 14/08/2023
  6919                                  		;mov	al, [cs:bx+2]	; now make sure that
  6920                                  					; the sectorspercluster	is
  6921                                  					; a power of 2
  6922                                  					;
  6923                                  					; [bx+EBPB.SECTORSPERCLUSTER]
  6924                                  					; get the sectorspercluster
  6925                                  %endif
  6926                                  		; 18/12/2023
  6927                                  		; bx = disksector
  6928 00001CC3 8A4715                  		mov	al, [bx+21]	; [bx+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.MEDIADESCRIPTOR]
  6929                                  					; get the mediadescriptor byte
  6930 00001CC6 24F0                    		and	al, 0F0h	; mask off low nibble
  6931 00001CC8 3CF0                    		cmp	al, 0F0h	; is high nibble = 0Fh?
  6932 00001CCA 7514                    		jne	short invalid_boot_record ; no, invalid boot record
  6933 00001CCC 817F0B0002              		cmp	word [bx+11], 512 ; [bx+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.BYTESPERSECTOR]
  6934 00001CD1 750D                    		jne	short invalid_boot_record ; invalidate non 512 byte sectors
  6935                                  
  6936                                  check2_ok:	; yes, mediadescriptor ok.
  6937 00001CD3 8A470D                  		mov	al, [bx+13]	; now make sure that
  6938                                  					; the sectorspercluster is
  6939                                  					; a power of 2
  6940                                  					;
  6941                                  					; [bx++EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.SECTORSPERCLUSTER]
  6942                                  					; get the sectorspercluster
  6943                                  
  6944 00001CD6 08C0                    		or	al, al		; is it	zero?
  6945 00001CD8 7406                    		jz	short invalid_boot_record ; yes, invalid boot record
  6946                                  
  6947                                  ck_power_of_two:			
  6948 00001CDA D0E8                    		shr	al, 1		; shift	until first bit	emerges
  6949 00001CDC 73FC                    		jnc	short ck_power_of_two
  6950 00001CDE 7406                    		jz	short valid_boot_record
  6951                                  
  6952                                  invalid_boot_record:
  6953                                  		; 18/12/2023
  6954                                  		;pop	ax
  6955                                  		;pop	bx ; +
  6956 00001CE0 E9FE00                  		jmp	unknown		; jump to invalid boot record
  6957                                  					; unformatted or illegal media.
  6958                                  	; 12/08/2023
  6959                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  6960                                  ; 16/12/2023
  6961                                  ;setret_brdg:
  6962                                  ;		jmp	setret
  6963                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  6964                                  
  6965                                  unknown3_0_j:
  6966 00001CE3 E9FF00                  		jmp	unknown3_0	; legally formatted media,
  6967                                  					; although, content might be bad.
  6968                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  6969                                  
  6970                                  valid_boot_record:
  6971                                  		; 18/12/2023
  6972                                  		;pop	ax
  6973                                  		;pop	bx ; +
  6974                                  		
  6975                                  		; 18/12/2023
  6976                                  		; bx = offset disksector ; +
  6977                                  
  6978                                  ; Signature found. Now check version.
  6979

  7480                                  		; 8/8/2023 (Retro DOS v5.0)

  7483                                  		; FATsz	= (TmpVal1+(TmpVal2-1))/TmpVal2
  7484                                  		; 8/8/2023 (Retro DOS v5.0)
  7485                                  		; If(FATType == FAT32) {
  7486                                  		;   BPB_FATSz16 = 0;
  7487                                  		;   BPB_FATSz32 = FATSz;

  7489                                  		;   BPB_FATSz16 = LOWORD(FATSz);

  7491                                  		;}

  7701                                  ; 15/10/2022
  7702                                  
  7703                                  ; setdrvparms sets up the recommended bpb in each bds in the system based on
  7704                                  ; the form factor. it is assumed that the bpbs for the various form factors
  7705                                  ; are present in the bpbtable. for hard files, the recommended bpb is the same
  7706                                  ; as the bpb on the drive.
  7707                                  ;
  7708                                  ; no attempt is made to preserve registers since we are going to jump to
  7709                                  ; sysinit straight after this routine.
  7710                                  
  7711                                  setdrvparms:
  7712                                  		; 13/12/2023
  7713                                  		; ds = cs
  7714 00001ECB 31DB                    		xor	bx, bx
  7715                                  		; 18/10/2022

  7717                                  _next_bds:

  7721 00001ED7 80FB05                  		cmp	bl, 5		; ffHardFile
  7722 00001EDA 753E                    		jnz	short nothardff
  7723 00001EDC 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  7724 00001EDE 268B450E                		mov	ax, [es:di+0Eh]	; [es:di+BDS.totalsecs16]
  7725 00001EE2 09C0                    		or	ax, ax
  7726 00001EE4 7508                    		jnz	short get_ccyl
  7727 00001EE6 268B551D                		mov	dx, [es:di+1Dh]	; [es:di+BDS.totalsecs32+2]
  7728 00001EEA 268B451B                		mov	ax, [es:di+1Bh]	; [es:di+BDS.totalsecs32]
  7729                                  
  7730                                  get_ccyl:				
  7731 00001EEE 52                      		push	dx
  7732 00001EEF 50                      		push	ax
  7733 00001EF0 268B4515                		mov	ax, [es:di+15h]	; [es:di+BDS.heads]
  7734 00001EF4 26F76513                		mul	word [es:di+13h] ; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
  7735                                  					; assume sectors per cyl. < 64k.
  7736 00001EF8 89C1                    		mov	cx, ax		; cx has # sectors per cylinder
  7737 00001EFA 58                      		pop	ax
  7738 00001EFB 5A                      		pop	dx		; dx:ax	= total	sectors
  7739 00001EFC 50                      		push	ax

  7765 00001F1B 1F                      		pop	ds
  7766                                  
  7767                                  ; if fake floppy drive variable is set then we don't have to handle this bds.
  7768                                  ; we can just go and deal with the next bds at label go_to_next_bds.
  7769                                  
  7770                                  		; 10/12/2022
  7771                                  		; ds = cs
  7772                                  		; 17/10/2022 (ds=cs)
  7773 00001F1C 803E[9315]01            		cmp	byte [fakefloppydrv], 1
  7774                                  		;cmp	byte [cs:fakefloppydrv], 1
  7775 00001F21 7454                    		jz	short go_to_next_bds
  7776 00001F23 80FB07                  		cmp	bl, 7		; ffother
  7777                                  					; special case "other" type of medium
  7778 00001F26 753D                    		jnz	short not_process_other
  7779                                  process_other:
  7780 00001F28 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  7781 00001F2A 8B4525                  		mov	ax, [di+25h]	; [di+BDS.cylinders]
  7782 00001F2D F76536                  		mul	word [di+36h]	; [di+BDS.rheads]
  7783 00001F30 F76534                  		mul	word [di+34h]	; [di+BDS.rsecpertrack]
  7784 00001F33 89452F                  		mov	[di+2Fh], ax	; [di+BDS.rtotalsecs16]
  7785                                  					; have the total number of sectors
  7786 00001F36 48                      		dec	ax
  7787 00001F37 B201                    		mov	dl, 1
  7788                                  _again:					
  7789 00001F39 3DF60F                  		cmp	ax, 0FF6h	; 4096-10
  7790 00001F3C 7206                    		jb	short _@@
  7791 00001F3E D1E8                    		shr	ax, 1
  7792 00001F40 D0E2                    		shl	dl, 1
  7793 00001F42 EBF5                    		jmp	short _again
  7794                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7795                                  
  7796                                  _@@:					
  7797 00001F44 80FA01                  		cmp	dl, 1		; is it	a small	disk ?
  7798 00001F47 7405                    		jz	short __@@	; yes, 224 root	entries	is enuf
  7799 00001F49 C7452DF000              		mov	word [di+2Dh], 240 ; [di+BDS.rdirentries]
  7800                                  __@@:					
  7801 00001F4E 885529                  		mov	[di+29h], dl	; [di+BDS.rsecperclus]
  7802                                  
  7803                                  ; logic to get the sectors/fat area.
  7804                                  ; fat entry is assumed to be 1.5 bytes!!!
  7805                                  
  7806                                  		; 10/12/2022
  7807                                  		; ds = cs
  7808                                  		; 17/10/2022 (ds=cs)
  7809 00001F51 F726[C71E]              		mul	word [word3]
  7810 00001F55 F736[C51E]              		div	word [word2]
  7811 00001F59 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  7812 00001F5B F736[C91E]              		div	word [word512]
  7813                                  		;
  7814                                  		; 10/12/2022
  7815                                  		;mul	word [cs:word3]	; * 3 ; mul word [cs:word3]
  7816                                  		;div	word [cs:word2]	; / 2 ; div word [cs:word2]
  7817                                  		;xor	dx, dx
  7818                                  		;div	word [cs:word512] ; / 512 ; div word [cs:word512]
  7819                                  		;
  7820 00001F5F 40                      		inc	ax		; + 1
  7821                                  no_round_up:
  7822 00001F60 894532                  		mov	[di+32h], ax	; [di+BDS.rfatsecs]
  7823 00001F63 EB12                    		jmp	short go_to_next_bds
  7824                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7825                                  
  7826                                  not_process_other:			
  7827 00001F65 D1E3                    		shl	bx, 1		; bx is	word index into	table of bpbs
  7828                                  		;mov	si, bpbtable
  7829                                  		;mov	si, [bpbtable+bx] ; 15/10/2022
  7830                                  		; 09/12/2022
  7831                                  		;mov	si, BPBTABLE
  7832                                  		;mov	si, [bx+si]	; get address of bpb
  7833                                  		; 10/12/2022
  7834                                  		;mov	si, [BPBTABLE+bx]
  7835                                  		; 13/12/2022
  7836                                  		;mov	si, [SYSINITOFFSET+bpbtable+bx] ; wrong ! 14/08/2023
  7837                                  		; 14/08/2023
  7838                                  		SYSINIT_OFFSET equ (SYSINITSEG-DOSBIODATASEG<<4)
  7839                                  							; correct offset
  7840 00001F67 8BB7[5686]              		mov	si, [bx+SYSINIT_OFFSET+bpbtable]
  7841                                  		
  7842                                  		; 28/08/2023
  7843 00001F6B 81C6A03C                		add	si, SYSINIT_OFFSET
  7844                                  set_recbpb:					
  7845 00001F6F 8D7D27                  		lea	di, [di+27h]	; [di+BDS.R_BPB]
  7846                                  					; es:di	-> recbpb
  7847 00001F72 B91900                  		mov	cx, 25		; bpbx.size
  7848 00001F75 F3A4                    		rep movsb		; move (size bpbx) bytes	
  7849                                  go_to_next_bds:				
  7850 00001F77 5F                      		pop	di
  7851 00001F78 07                      		pop	es		; restore pointer to bds
  7852 00001F79 26C43D                  		les	di, [es:di]	; [es:di+BDS.link]
  7853 00001F7C 83FFFF                  		cmp	di, 0FFFFh	; -1
  7854 00001F7F 740A                    		jz	short got_end_of_bds_chain
  7855 00001F81 E94DFF                  		jmp	_next_bds
  7856                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7857                                  
  7858                                  		; 18/12/2022
  7859                                  ;got_end_of_bds_chain:			
  7860                                  		;retn
  7861

  7863

  7866                                  
  7867                                  ; al = device number
  7868                                  
  7869                                  print_init:

  7874                                  					; DX = printer port (0-3)
  7875                                  					; Return: AH = status
  7876                                  got_end_of_bds_chain:	; 18/12/2022
  7877 00001F8B C3                      		retn

  7892                                  					; 	AL = initializing parameters,
