  7900                                  ; 15/10/2022 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  7901                                  ; 30/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0
  7902                                  ; 03/06/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
  7903                                  ; (19/03/2018 - Retro DOS v2.0)
  7904                                  
  7905                                  ; domini **********************************************************************
  7906                                  ;
  7907                                  ;mini disk initialization routine. called right after dohard
  7908                                  ;modified for >2 hardfile support
  7909                                  ;
  7910                                  ; **cs=ds=es=datagrp
  7911                                  ;
  7912                                  ; **domini will search for every extended partition in the system, and
  7913                                  ;   initialize it.
  7914                                  ;
  7915                                  ; **bdsm stands for bds table for mini disk and located right after the label
  7916                                  ;   end96tpi. end_of_bdsm will have the offset value of the ending
  7917                                  ;   address of bdsm table.
  7918                                  ;
  7919                                  ; **bdsm is the same as usual bds structure except that tim_lo, tim_hi entries
  7920                                  ;   are overlapped and used to identify mini disk and the number of hidden_trks.
  7921                                  ;   right now, they are called as ismini, hidden_trks respectively.
  7922                                  ;
  7923                                  ; **domini will use the same routine in sethard routine after label set2 to
  7924                                  ;   save coding.
  7925                                  ;
  7926                                  ; **drvmax determined in dohard routine will be used for the next
  7927                                  ;   available logical mini disk drive number.
  7928                                  ;
  7929                                  ; input: drvmax, dskdrvs
  7930                                  ;
  7931                                  ; output: minidisk installed. bdsm table established and installed to bds.
  7932                                  ;	  end_of_bdsm - ending offset address of bdsm.
  7933                                  ;
  7934                                  ; called modules:
  7935                                  ;		  getboot
  7936                                  ;		  find_mini_partition (new), xinstall_bds (new), M038
  7937                                  ;
  7938                                  ;		  setmini (new, it will use set2 routine)
  7939                                  ;
  7940                                  ; variables used: end_of_bdsm
  7941                                  ;		  rom_minidisk_num
  7942                                  ;		  mini_hdlim, mini_seclim
  7943                                  ;		  BDS_STRUC, start_bds
  7944                                  ;
  7945                                  ;******************************************************************************
  7946                                  
  7947                                  		; 18/12/2023
  7948                                  		; 19/10/2022
  7949                                  domini:
  7950 00001F95 8A36[0316]              		mov	dh, [hnum]	; get number of hardfiles
  7951                                  		; 10/12/2022
  7952 00001F99 20F6                    		and	dh, dh
  7953                                  		;cmp	dh, 0
  7954 00001F9B 742E                    		jz	short dominiret	; no hard file?	then exit.
  7955 00001F9D B280                    		mov	dl, 80h		; start	with hardfile 80h
  7956                                  domini_loop:				
  7957 00001F9F 52                      		push	dx
  7958 00001FA0 8816[0216]              		mov	[rom_minidisk_num], dl
  7959 00001FA4 B408                    		mov	ah, 8
  7960 00001FA6 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - DISK -	GET CURRENT DRIVE PARAMETERS (XT,AT,XT286,CONV,PS)
  7961                                  					; DL = drive number
  7962                                  					; Return: CF set on error, AH =	status code, BL	= drive	type
  7963                                  					; DL = number of consecutive drives
  7964                                  					; DH = maximum value for head number, ES:DI -> drive parameter
  7965                                  		
  7966                                  		; 08/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
  7967                                  		; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSDATA:2B36h
  7968                                  		;inc	dh
  7969                                  		;xor	ax, ax
  7970                                  		;mov	al, dh
  7971 00001FA8 31C0                    		xor	ax, ax
  7972 00001FAA 88F0                    		mov	al, dh	; <= 255
  7973 00001FAC 40                      		inc	ax	; (0FFh -> 100h)
  7974 00001FAD A3[0816]                		mov	[mini_hdlim], ax ; # of heads
  7975                                  		;and	cl, 3Fh
  7976                                  		;mov	al, cl
  7977                                  		; 08/08/2023
  7978 00001FB0 88C8                    		mov	al, cl
  7979 00001FB2 83E03F                  		and	ax, 3Fh
  7980 00001FB5 A3[0A16]                		mov	[mini_seclim], ax ; # of sectors/track
  7981                                  
  7982                                  		; 18/12/2023
  7983                                  		;push	es ; * ; not necessary
  7984 00001FB8 8A16[0216]              		mov	dl, [rom_minidisk_num]
  7985 00001FBC E8B1FB                  		call	getboot		; read master boot record into
  7986                                  					; initbootsegment:bootbias
  7987 00001FBF 7203                    		jc	short domininext
  7988 00001FC1 E80800                  		call	find_mini_partition
  7989                                  domininext:
  7990                                  		;pop	es ; *
  7991 00001FC4 5A                      		pop	dx
  7992 00001FC5 FEC2                    		inc	dl		; next hard file
  7993 00001FC7 FECE                    		dec	dh
  7994 00001FC9 75D4                    		jnz	short domini_loop
  7995                                  dominiret:
  7996 00001FCB C3                      		retn
  7997                                  
  7998                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7999                                  
  8000                                  ; 15/10/2022 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  8001                                  ; 30/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0
  8002                                  
  8003                                  ;find_mini_partition tries to find every extended partition on a disk.
  8004                                  ;at entry:	di -> bdsm entry
  8005                                  ;		es:bx -> 07c0:bootbias - master boot record
  8006                                  ;		rom_minidisk_num - rom drive number
  8007                                  ;		drvmax - logical drive number
  8008                                  ;		mini_hdlim, mini_seclim
  8009                                  ;
  8010                                  ;called routine: setmini which uses set2 (in sethard routine)
  8011                                  ;variables & equates used from original bios - flags, fnon_removable, fbigfat
  8012                                  
  8013                                  
  8014                                  find_mini_partition:	
  8015 00001FCC 81C3C201                		add	bx, 1C2h	; bx ->	file system id
  8016                                  fmpnext:				
  8017 00001FD0 26803F05                		cmp	byte [es:bx], 5 ; 5 = extended partition id.
  8018 00001FD4 740A                    		jz	short fmpgot
  8019 00001FD6 83C310                  		add	bx, 16
  8020 00001FD9 81FB0204                		cmp	bx, 402h	; 202h+bootbias
  8021 00001FDD 75F1                    		jnz	short fmpnext
  8022                                  		;jmp	short fmpnextfound ; extended partition	not found
  8023                                  		; 18/12/2022
  8024                                  fmpnextfound:
  8025 00001FDF C3                      		retn
  8026                                  
  8027                                  ;		; 30/07/2019 - Retro DOS v3.2
  8028                                  ;		jb	short fmpnext
  8029                                  ;fmpret:
  8030                                  ;		retn	; 29/05/2019
  8031                                  
  8032                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8033                                  
  8034                                  		; 19/10/2022
  8035                                  fmpgot:					; found my partition.
  8036 00001FE0 E8A500                  		call	dmax_check	; check	for drvmax already 26
  8037 00001FE3 73FA                    		jnb	short fmpnextfound ; done if too many
  8038 00001FE5 8B3E[0616]              		mov	di, [end_of_bdss] ; get next free bds
  8039 00001FE9 C745470100              		mov	word [di+47h], 1 ; [di+BDS.bdsm_ismini]
  8040                                  		; 10/12/2022
  8041 00001FEE 804D2301                		or	byte [di+23h], 1
  8042                                  		;or	word [di+23h], 1 ; [di+BDS.flags]
  8043                                  					; fNon_Removable
  8044 00001FF2 C6452205                		mov	byte [di+22h], 5 ; [di+BDS.formfactor]
  8045                                  					; ffHardFile
  8046 00001FF6 C606[8615]00            		mov	byte [fbigfat], 0 ; assume 12 bit fat.
  8047 00001FFB A1[0816]                		mov	ax, [mini_hdlim]
  8048 00001FFE 894515                  		mov	[di+15h], ax	; [di+BDS.heads]
  8049 00002001 A1[0A16]                		mov	ax, [mini_seclim]
  8050 00002004 894513                  		mov	[di+13h], ax	; [di+BDS.secpertrack]
  8051 00002007 A0[0216]                		mov	al, [rom_minidisk_num]
  8052 0000200A 884504                  		mov	[di+4],	al	; [di+BDS.drivenum]
  8053                                  					; set physical number
  8054 0000200D A0[7500]                		mov	al, [drvmax]
  8055 00002010 884505                  		mov	[di+5],	al	; [di+BDS.drivelet]
  8056                                  					; set logical number
  8057 00002013 26837F0A00              		cmp	word [es:bx+10], 0
  8058 00002018 7707                    		ja	short fmpgot_cont
  8059 0000201A 26837F0840              		cmp	word [es:bx+8], 64 ; with current bpb,
  8060                                  					; only lower word is meaningful.
  8061 0000201F 72BE                    		jb	short fmpnextfound
  8062                                  					; should be bigger than 64 sectors at least
  8063                                  fmpgot_cont:				
  8064 00002021 83EB04                  		sub	bx, 4		; let bx point to the start of the entry
  8065 00002024 268A7702                		mov	dh, [es:bx+2]	; cylinder
  8066 00002028 80E6C0                  		and	dh, 0C0h	; get higher bits of cyl
  8067 0000202B D0C6                    		rol	dh, 1
  8068 0000202D D0C6                    		rol	dh, 1
  8069 0000202F 268A5703                		mov	dl, [es:bx+3]	; cyl byte
  8070 00002033 895549                  		mov	[di+49h], dx	; [di+BDS.bdsm_hidden_trks]
  8071                                  					; set hidden trks
  8072 00002036 268B4F02                		mov	cx, [es:bx+2]	; cylinder,cylinder/sector
  8073 0000203A 268A7701                		mov	dh, [es:bx+1]	; head
  8074 0000203E 8A16[0216]              		mov	dl, [rom_minidisk_num]
  8075 00002042 BB0002                  		mov	bx, 200h	; bootbias
  8076 00002045 B80102                  		mov	ax, 201h
  8077 00002048 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - READ SECTORS INTO MEMORY
  8078                                  					; AL = number of sectors to read, CH = track, CL = sector
  8079                                  					; DH = head, DL	= drive, ES:BX -> buffer to fill
  8080                                  					; Return: CF set on error, AH =	status,	AL = number of sectors read
  8081 0000204A 7293                    		jc	short fmpnextfound
  8082 0000204C BBC203                  		mov	bx, 3C2h	; 1C2h+bootbias
  8083                                  
  8084                                  		; 08/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
  8085                                  		; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSDATA:2C7Ch
  8086 0000204F 26817F3C55AA            		cmp	word [es:bx+3Ch], 0AA55h ; 03C2h+03Ch = 3FEh
  8087 00002055 7588                    		jne	short fmpnextfound ; not a valid boot sector !
  8088                                  
  8089                                  		; 13/08/2023
  8090                                  		;push	es
  8091 00002057 E80800                  		call	setmini		; install a mini disk.
  8092                                  					; bx value saved.
  8093                                  		;pop	es  ; 13/08/2023
  8094 0000205A 7203                    		jc	short fmpnextchain
  8095 0000205C E83E00                  		call	xinstall_bds	; -- install the bdsm into table
  8096                                  fmpnextchain:
  8097 0000205F E96EFF                  		jmp	fmpnext		; let's find out
  8098                                  					; if we	have any chained partition
  8099                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8100                                  
  8101                                  		; 18/12/2022
  8102                                  ;fmpnextfound:
  8103                                  		;retn
  8104                                  
  8105                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  8106                                  
  8107                                  ; 15/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  8108                                  ; 28/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0 (MSDOS 6.21)
  8109                                  
  8110                                  setmini:	; 'setmini' is called from 'find_mini_partition' procedure
  8111                                  	
  8112 00002062 57                      		push	di
  8113 00002063 53                      		push	bx
  8114                                  		; 12/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
  8115                                  		; ds = cs = BIOSDATA segment
  8116                                  		;push	ds
  8117 00002064 06                      		push	es
  8118                                  setmini_1:				
  8119 00002065 26803F01                		cmp	byte [es:bx], 1 ; FAT12 partition
  8120 00002069 741A                    		jz	short setmini_2
  8121 0000206B 26803F04                		cmp	byte [es:bx], 4 ; FAT16 partition
  8122 0000206F 7414                    		jz	short setmini_2
  8123 00002071 26803F06                		cmp	byte [es:bx], 6 ; FAT16 BIG partition
  8124 00002075 740E                    		jz	short setmini_2
  8125 00002077 83C310                  		add	bx, 16
  8126 0000207A 81FB0204                		cmp	bx, 402h	; 202h+bootbias
  8127 0000207E 75E5                    		jnz	short setmini_1
  8128 00002080 F9                      		stc
  8129 00002081 07                      		pop	es
  8130                                  		; 12/08/2023
  8131                                  		;pop	ds
  8132 00002082 5B                      		pop	bx
  8133 00002083 5F                      		pop	di
  8134 00002084 C3                      		retn
  8135                                  
  8136                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8137                                  setmini_2:
  8138 00002085 E987FB                  		jmp	set2		; branch into middle of sethard
  8139                                  
  8140                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  8141                                  
  8142                                  ; 30/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.2
  8143                                  ; (SYSINITSEG is 473h for MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS) 
  8144                                  
  8145                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8146                                  ; 28/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0
  8147                                  ;
  8148                                  ; dmax_check --- call this when we want to install a new drive.
  8149                                  ;		it checks for drvmax < 26 to see if there is
  8150                                  ;		a drive letter left.
  8151                                  ;
  8152                                  ;	drvmax < 26 : carry SET!
  8153                                  ;	drvmax >=26 : carry RESET!, error flag set for message later
  8154                                  ;			trash ax
  8155                                  
  8156                                  dmax_check:
  8157 00002088 803E[7500]1A            		cmp	byte [drvmax], 26 ; checks for drvmax < 26
  8158 0000208D 720D                    		jb	short dmax_ok	; return with carry if okay
  8159 0000208F 06                      		push	es
  8160                                  		;mov	ax, 46Dh	; SYSINIT_SEG (SYSINIT segment)
  8161 00002090 B83A04                  		mov	ax, SYSINITSEG	; 17/10/2022	
  8162 00002093 8EC0                    		mov	es, ax
  8163                                  		; 18/10/2022
  8164 00002095 26C606[8303]01          		mov	byte [es:TOOMANYDRIVESFLAG], 1 ; 09/12/2022 
  8165                                  		;mov	byte ptr es:3FFh, 1 ; [es:toomanydrivesflag]
  8166                                  					; set message flag
  8167                                  					; [SYSINIT+toomanydrivesflag]
  8168 0000209B 07                      		pop	es
  8169                                  
  8170                                  		;;push	es
  8171                                  		;;mov	ax,SYSINIT_SEG
  8172                                  		;;mov	es,ax
  8173                                  		;;mov	byte [es:toomanydrivesflag],1
  8174                                  					; set message flag
  8175                                  		;;pop	es
  8176                                  		;
  8177                                  		;mov	byte [SYSINIT+toomanydrivesflag],1
  8178                                  dmax_ok:
  8179 0000209C C3                      		retn
  8180                                  
  8181                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  8182                                  
  8183                                  ; 18/10/2022
  8184                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8185                                  ; 28/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0						
  8186                                  ;								 
  8187                                  ;	link next bds (at ds:di) into the chain. assume that the
  8188                                  ;	  chain is entirely within ds == datagrp. also update drvmax,
  8189                                  ;	  dskdrv_table, and end_of_bdss.	
  8190                                  
  8191                                  xinstall_bds:		
  8192 0000209D 56                      		push	si
  8193 0000209E 53                      		push	bx
  8194 0000209F 8B36[1901]              		mov	si, [start_bds]	; get first bds
  8195                                  xinstall_bds_1:				
  8196 000020A3 833CFF                  		cmp	word [si], 0FFFFh ; is this the last one?
  8197 000020A6 7404                    		jz	short xinstall_bds_2 ;	skip ahead if so
  8198                                  		;mov	si, [si+BDS.link]
  8199 000020A8 8B34                    		mov	si, [si]	; chain	through	list
  8200 000020AA EBF7                    		jmp	short xinstall_bds_1
  8201                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8202                                  
  8203                                  xinstall_bds_2:				
  8204                                  		;mov	[si+BDS.link], di

  8207 000020AE 8C5C02                  		mov	[si+2], ds
  8208                                  		;mov	word [di+BDS.link], -1
  8209 000020B1 C705FFFF                		mov	word [di], 0FFFFh ; make sure it is a null ptr.
  8210                                  		;mov	[di+BDS.link+2], ds
  8211 000020B5 8C5D02                  		mov	[di+2], ds ; might as well plug segment
  8212                                  		; 20/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
  8213                                  		;lea	bx, [di+BDS.BPB]
  8214 000020B8 8D5D06                  		lea	bx, [di+6]
  8215 000020BB 8B36[0416]              		mov	si, [last_dskdrv_table]
  8216 000020BF 891C                    		mov	[si], bx
  8217 000020C1 8306[0416]02            		add	word [last_dskdrv_table], 2
  8218 000020C6 FE06[7500]              		inc	byte [drvmax]

  8220 000020CF 5B                      		pop	bx
  8221 000020D0 5E                      		pop	si
  8222 000020D1 C3                      		retn
  8223                                  
  8224                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  8225                                  
  8226                                  ; 17/10/2022
  8227                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8228                                  ; 28/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0
  8229                                  ; 03/06/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
  8230                                  
  8231                                  		; 19/12/2023
  8232                                  cmos_clock_read:	
  8233 000020D2 50                      		push	ax
  8234 000020D3 51                      		push	cx
  8235 000020D4 52                      		push	dx
  8236 000020D5 55                      		push	bp
  8237 000020D6 31ED                    		xor	bp, bp
  8238                                  loop_clock:
  8239 000020D8 31C9                    		xor	cx, cx
  8240 000020DA 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  8241 000020DC B402                    		mov	ah, 2
  8242 000020DE CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- READ REAL TIME CLOCK (AT,XT286,CONV,PS)
  8243                                  					; Return: CH = hours in	BCD
  8244                                  					; CL = minutes in BCD
  8245                                  					; DH = seconds in BCD
  8246 000020E0 83F900                  		cmp	cx, 0
  8247 000020E3 7512                    		jnz	short clock_present
  8248 000020E5 83FA00                  		cmp	dx, 0
  8249 000020E8 750D                    		jnz	short clock_present
  8250 000020EA 83FD01                  		cmp	bp, 1		; read again after a slight delay, in case clock
  8251 000020ED 741B                    		jz	short no_readdate ; was	at zero	setting.
  8252 000020EF 45                      		inc	bp		; only perform delay once.
  8253 000020F0 B90040                  		mov	cx, 4000h	; 16384
  8254                                  delay:
  8255 000020F3 E2FE                    		loop	delay
  8256 000020F5 EBE1                    		jmp	short loop_clock
  8257                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8258                                  
  8259                                  clock_present:
  8260                                  		;mov	byte [cs:havecmosclock], 1 ; set the flag for cmos clock
  8261                                  		; 19/12/2023
  8262                                  		; ds = cs
  8263 000020F7 C606[EC04]01            		mov	byte [havecmosclock], 1 ; set the flag for cmos clock
  8264                                  		
  8265 000020FC E81000                  		call	cmosck		; reset	cmos clock rate	that may be
  8266                                  					; possibly destroyed by	cp dos and
  8267                                  					; post routine did not restore that.
  8268 000020FF 56                      		push	si
  8269 00002100 E8E9F2                  		call	read_real_date	; read real-time clock for date
  8270 00002103 FA                      		cli
  8271                                  		;mov	ds:daycnt, si	; set system date
  8272 00002104 8936[E904]              		mov	[daycnt], si
  8273 00002108 FB                      		sti
  8274 00002109 5E                      		pop	si
  8275                                  no_readdate:
  8276 0000210A 5D                      		pop	bp
  8277 0000210B 5A                      		pop	dx
  8278 0000210C 59                      		pop	cx
  8279 0000210D 58                      		pop	ax
  8280                                  cmosck9:	; 19/12/2023
  8281 0000210E C3                      		retn
  8282                                  
  8283                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8284                                  
  8285                                  ; the following code is written by jack gulley in engineering group.
  8286                                  ; cp dos (CP/DOS, OS/2) is changing cmos clock rate for its own purposes
  8287                                  ; and if the use cold boot the system to use pc dos while running cp dos,
  8288                                  ; the cmos clock rate are still slow which slow down disk operations
  8289                                  ; of pc dos which uses cmos clock. pc dos is put this code in msinit
  8290                                  ; to fix this problem at the request of cp dos.
  8291                                  ;
  8292                                  ; the program is modified to be run on msinit. equates are defined
  8293                                  ; in cmosequ.inc. this program will be called by cmos_clock_read procedure.
  8294                                  ;
  8295                                  ;  the following code cmosck is used to insure that the cmos has not
  8296                                  ;	had its rate controls left in an invalid state on older at's.
  8297                                  ;
  8298                                  ;	it checks for an at model byte "fc" with a submodel type of
  8299                                  ;	00, 01, 02, 03 or 06 and resets the periodic interrupt rate
  8300                                  ;	bits in case post has not done it. this initialization routine
  8301                                  ;	is only needed once when dos loads. it should be run as soon
  8302                                  ;	as possible to prevent slow diskette access.
  8303                                  ;
  8304                                  ;	this code exposes one to dos clearing cmos setup done by a
  8305                                  ;	resident program that hides and re-boots the system.
  8306                                  
  8307                                  cmosck:					; check and reset rtc rate bits
  8308                                  
  8309                                  ;model byte and submodel byte were already determined in msinit.
  8310                                  
  8311                                  	; 16/06/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
  8312                                  	; 19/03/2018 (Model: 0FCh, Sub Model: 01h, REF: AMIBIOS Prog. Guide)
  8313                                  
  8314                                  		; 19/12/2023
  8315                                  		; ds = cs
  8316                                  		;push	ax ; not necessary ; 19/12/2023
  8317                                  		;
  8318 0000210F 803E[2D06]FC            		cmp	byte [model_byte], 0FCh
  8319                                  		;cmp	byte [cs:model_byte], 0FCh
  8320 00002114 75F8                    		jnz	short cmosck9	; Exit if not an AT model
  8321 00002116 803E[2E06]06            		cmp	byte [secondary_model_byte], 6 ; 21/04/2024
  8322                                  		;cmp	byte [cs:secondary_model_byte], 6
  8323                                  					; Is it 06 for the industral AT ?
  8324 0000211B 7407                    		jz	short cmosck4	; Go reset CMOS periodic rate if 06
  8325 0000211D 803E[2E06]04            		cmp	byte [secondary_model_byte], 4
  8326                                  		;cmp	byte [cs:secondary_model_byte], 4
  8327                                  					; Is it 00, 01, 02, or 03 ?
  8328 00002122 73EA                    		jnb	short cmosck9	; EXIT if problem fixed by POST
  8329                                  					; Also,Secondary_model_byte = 0
  8330                                  					;   when AH=0C0h, int 15h failed.
  8331                                  					;	RESET THE CMOS PERIODIC RATE
  8332                                  					;  Model=FC submodel=00,01,02,03 or 06
  8333                                  cmosck4:
  8334 00002124 B08A                    		mov	al, 8Ah		; cmos_reg_a|nmi
  8335                                  					; NMI disabled on return
  8336 00002126 B426                    		mov	ah, 26h		; 00100110b
  8337                                  					; Set divider & rate selection
  8338 00002128 E80B00                  		call	cmos_write
  8339 0000212B B08B                    		mov	al, 8Bh		; cmos_reg_b|nmi
  8340                                  					; NMI disabled on return
  8341 0000212D E82000                  		call	cmos_read
  8342 00002130 2407                    		and	al, 7		; 00000111b
  8343                                  					; clear SET,PIE,AIE,UIE,SQWE
  8344 00002132 88C4                    		mov	ah, al
  8345 00002134 B00B                    		mov	al, 0Bh		; cmos_reg_b
  8346                                  					; NMI enabled on return
  8347                                  		; 19/12/2023
  8348                                  		;call	cmos_write
  8349                                  ;cmosck9:
  8350                                  		;pop	ax ; 19/12/2023
  8351                                  		;retn
  8352                                  
  8353                                  		; 19/12/2023
  8354                                  		;jmp	short cmos_write
  8355                                  
  8356                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  8357                                  
  8358                                  ;--- cmos_write ----------------------------------------------------------------
  8359                                  ;		write byte to cmos system clock configuration table	       :
  8360                                  ;									       :
  8361                                  ; input: (al)=	cmos table address to be written to			       :
  8362                                  ;		bit    7 = 0 for nmi enabled and 1 for nmi disabled on exit    :
  8363                                  ;		bits 6-0 = address of table location to write		       :
  8364                                  ;	 (ah)=	new value to be placed in the addressed table location	       :
  8365                                  ;									       :
  8366                                  ; output:	value in (ah) placed in location (al) with nmi left disabled   :
  8367                                  ;		if bit 7 of (al) is on. during the cmos update both nmi and    :
  8368                                  ;		normal interrupts are disabled to protect cmos data integrity. :
  8369                                  ;		the cmos address register is pointed to a default value and    :
  8370                                  ;		the interrupt flag restored to the entry state on return.      :
  8371                                  ;		only the cmos location and the nmi state is changed.	       :
  8372                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8373                                  
  8374                                  cmos_write:				; write (ah) to location (al)
  8375 00002136 9C                      		pushf			;
  8376 00002137 50                      		push	ax		; save work register values
  8377 00002138 FA                      		cli
  8378 00002139 50                      		push	ax		; save user nmi	state
  8379 0000213A 0C80                    		or	al, 80h		; disable nmi for us
  8380 0000213C E670                    		out	70h, al		; CMOS Memory/RTC Index	Register:
  8381                                  					; RTC Seconds
  8382 0000213E 90                      		nop
  8383 0000213F 88E0                    		mov	al, ah
  8384 00002141 E671                    		out	71h, al		; CMOS Memory/RTC Data Register
  8385 00002143 58                      		pop	ax		; get user nmi
  8386 00002144 2480                    		and	al, 80h
  8387 00002146 0C0F                    		or	al, 0Fh
  8388 00002148 E670                    		out	70h, al		; CMOS Memory/RTC Index	Register:
  8389                                  					; RTC Seconds
  8390 0000214A 90                      		nop
  8391 0000214B E471                    		in	al, 71h		; CMOS Memory/RTC Data Register
  8392 0000214D 58                      		pop	ax		; restore work registers
  8393                                  
  8394                                  		; 19/12/2023
  8395                                  		;push	cs		; *place code segment in stack and
  8396                                  		;call	cmos_popf	; *handle popf for b- level 80286
  8397                                  		;retn
  8398 0000214E EB18                    		jmp	short cmos_rw_popf
  8399                                  
  8400                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  8401                                  
  8402                                  ;--- CMOS_READ -----------------------------------------------------------------
  8403                                  ;		read byte from cmos system clock configuration table	       :
  8404                                  ;									       :
  8405                                  ; input: (al)=	cmos table address to be read				       :
  8406                                  ;		bit    7 = 0 for nmi enabled and 1 for nmi disabled on exit    :
  8407                                  ;		bits 6-0 = address of table location to read		       :
  8408                                  ;									       :
  8409                                  ; output: (al)	value at location (al) moved into (al). if bit 7 of (al) was   :
  8410                                  ;		on then nmi left disabled. during the cmos read both nmi and  :
  8411                                  ;		normal interrupts are disabled to protect cmos data integrity. :
  8412                                  ;		the cmos address register is pointed to a default value and    :
  8413                                  ;		the interrupt flag restored to the entry state on return.      :
  8414                                  ;		only the (al) register and the nmi state is changed.	       :
  8415                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8416                                  
  8417                                  cmos_read:				; read location (al) into (al)
  8418 00002150 9C                      		pushf
  8419 00002151 FA                      		cli
  8420 00002152 53                      		push	bx
  8421                                  		;push	ax ; *		; AL = cmos table address to be read
  8422                                  		; 19/12/2023
  8423 00002153 89C3                    		mov	bx, ax ; * ; input
  8424 00002155 0C80                    		or	al, 80h
  8425 00002157 E670                    		out	70h, al		; CMOS Memory/RTC Index	Register:
  8426                                  					; RTC Seconds
  8427 00002159 90                      		nop			; (undocumented delay needed)
  8428 0000215A E471                    		in	al, 71h		; CMOS Memory/RTC Data Register
  8429                                  		
  8430                                  		;mov	bx, ax ; output
  8431                                  		;pop	ax ; * ; input
  8432                                  
  8433                                  		; 19/12/2023
  8434                                  		; al = output, bl = input
  8435 0000215C 93                      		xchg	ax, bx ; *
  8436                                  		; bl = output, al = input
  8437                                  	
  8438 0000215D 2480                    		and	al, 80h
  8439 0000215F 0C0F                    		or	al, 0Fh
  8440 00002161 E670                    		out	70h, al		; CMOS Memory/RTC Index	Register:
  8441                                  					; RTC Seconds
  8442 00002163 90                      		nop
  8443 00002164 E471                    		in	al, 71h		; CMOS Memory/RTC Data Register
  8444                                  		;mov	ax, bx ; * ; output
  8445                                  		; 19/12/2023
  8446 00002166 93                      		xchg	ax, bx
  8447 00002167 5B                      		pop	bx
  8448                                  
  8449                                  		; 19/12/2023
  8450                                  cmos_rw_popf:
  8451 00002168 0E                      		push	cs		; *place code segment in stack and
  8452 00002169 E80100                  		call	cmos_popf	; *handle popf for b- level 80286
  8453 0000216C C3                      		retn			; return with flags restored
  8454                                  
  8455                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8456                                  
  8457                                  cmos_popf:				
  8458 0000216D CF                      		iret			; popf for level b- parts
  8459                                  					; return far and restore flags
  8460                                  
  8461                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8462                                  ; MSINIT.ASM (MSDOS 6.0, 1991)
  8463                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8464                                  ; The following routines provide support for reading in the file MSDOS.SYS.
  8465                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8466                                  
  8467                                  ; 15/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  8468                                  ;
  8469                                  ; (For Retro DOS, 'IO.SYS' and 'MSDOS.SYS' are already loaded together
  8470                                  ;  at once -as single kernel file- by the Retro DOS boot sector code.
  8471                                  ;  So, following disk reads -MSDOS.SYS loading- is not needed!
  8472                                  ;  Only needing is to move MSDOS Kernel to it's final memory location.) 
  8473                                  
  8474                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  8475                                  
  8476                                  ; GetClus, read in a cluster at a specified address
  8477                                  ;
  8478                                  ;  bx = cluster to read
  8479                                  ;  cx = sectors per cluster
  8480                                  ;  es:di = load location
  8481                                  
  8482                                  ; 17/10/2022
  8483                                  ;DISKRD equ diskrd - DOSBIOSEG_2C7h	; (8E5h for MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  8484                                  ; 09/12/2022
  8485                                  DISKRD equ diskrd
  8486                                  
  8487                                  		; 17/10/2022
  8488                                  getclus:
  8489                                  		; 13/12/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.22 IO.SYS)
  8490                                  		; ds = cs
  8491                                  				
  8492 0000216E 51                      		push	cx
  8493 0000216F 57                      		push	di
  8494                                  		;mov	[cs:doscnt], cx
  8495 00002170 890E[8415]              		mov	[doscnt], cx ; 13/12/2023
  8496 00002174 89D8                    		mov	ax, bx
  8497 00002176 48                      		dec	ax
  8498 00002177 48                      		dec	ax
  8499 00002178 F7E1                    		mul	cx		; convert to logical sector
  8500                                  					; dx:ax	= matching logical sector number
  8501                                  					;	  starting from the data sector
  8502                                  		;add	ax, [cs:bios_l]
  8503                                  		;adc	dx, [cs:bios_h]	; dx:ax	= first	logical	sector to read
  8504                                  		; 13/12/2023
  8505 0000217A 0306[8015]              		add	ax, [bios_l]
  8506 0000217E 1316[8215]              		adc	dx, [bios_h]	; dx:ax	= first	logical	sector to read
  8507                                  unpack:					
  8508 00002182 1E                      		push	ds ; ds = cs ; 13/12/2023
  8509 00002183 52                      		push	dx ; * ; 13/12/2023
  8510 00002184 50                      		push	ax
  8511 00002185 53                      		push	bx
  8512                                  		;mov	si, [cs:fatloc]
  8513 00002186 8B36[8715]              		mov	si, [fatloc] ; 13/12/2023
  8514 0000218A 8EDE                    		mov	ds, si
  8515 0000218C 89DE                    		mov	si, bx		; next cluster
  8516 0000218E 2EF606[8615]40          		test	byte [cs:fbigfat], 40h	; fbig
  8517                                  					; 16 bit fat?
  8518 00002194 752F                    		jnz	short unpack16	; yes
  8519 00002196 D1EE                    		shr	si, 1		; 12 bit fat. si=si/2
  8520                                  					; si = clus + clus/2
  8521 00002198 01DE                    		add	si, bx		;
  8522                                  					; (si =	byte offset of the cluster in the FAT)
  8523                                  		;push	dx ; 13/12/2023
  8524 0000219A 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  8525                                  		; 12/12/2023
  8526                                  		; ds = FAT buffer segment
  8527 0000219C E86500                  		call	get_fat_sector
  8528                                  		;pop	dx ; 12/12/2023
  8529                                  
  8530 0000219F 8B07                    		mov	ax, [bx]	; save it into ax
  8531 000021A1 750C                    		jnz	short even_odd	; if not a splitted fat, check even-odd.
  8532                                  		; 25/06/2023
  8533                                  		;mov	al, [bx]	; splitted fat
  8534                                  
  8535                                  		; 13/12/2023
  8536                                  		;mov	[cs:temp_cluster], al
  8537 000021A3 50                      		push	ax ; **	; al = low 8 bits of 12 bits cluster number
  8538                                  
  8539 000021A4 46                      		inc	si		; (next	byte)
  8540                                  
  8541                                  		;push	dx ; 13/12/2023
  8542 000021A5 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  8543 000021A7 E85A00                  		call	get_fat_sector
  8544                                  		;pop	dx ; 13/12/2023
  8545                                  
  8546                                  		;mov	al, ds:0
  8547                                  		; 13/12/2023
  8548                                  		; ds = FAT buffer segment
  8549                                  		;mov	al, [0] ; 19/10/2022
  8550                                  		;mov	[cs:temp_cluster+1], al
  8551                                  		;mov	ax, [cs:temp_cluster]
  8552                                  		; 13/12/2023
  8553                                  		;mov	al, [cs:temp_cluster]
  8554 000021AA 58                      		pop	ax  ; ** ; al = low 8 bits of 12 bits cluster number
  8555 000021AB 8A260000                		mov	ah, [0] ; high 4 bits (bits 7 to 11) of 12 bits cluster num
  8556                                  even_odd:				
  8557 000021AF 5B                      		pop	bx		; restore old fat entry	value
  8558 000021B0 53                      		push	bx		; save it right	away.
  8559 000021B1 D1EB                    		shr	bx, 1		; was it even or odd?
  8560 000021B3 7308                    		jnb	short havclus	; it was even.
  8561 000021B5 D1E8                    		shr	ax, 1		; odd. massage fat value and keep
  8562                                  					; the highest 12 bits.
  8563 000021B7 D1E8                    		shr	ax, 1
  8564 000021B9 D1E8                    		shr	ax, 1
  8565 000021BB D1E8                    		shr	ax, 1
  8566                                  havclus:				
  8567 000021BD 89C3                    		mov	bx, ax		; now bx = new fat entry.
  8568 000021BF 81E3FF0F                		and	bx, 0FFFh	; keep low 12 bits.
  8569 000021C3 EB0B                    		jmp	short unpackx
  8570                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8571                                  
  8572                                  unpack16:				
  8573                                  		;push	dx	; 13/12/2023	
  8574 000021C5 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx ; 0
  8575 000021C7 D1E6                    		shl	si, 1		; extend to 32 bit offset
  8576                                  		;adc	dx, 0
  8577                                  		; 13/12/2023
  8578 000021C9 D1D2                    		rcl	dx, 1
  8579                                  
  8580                                  		; 13/12/2023
  8581                                  		; ds = FAT buffer segment
  8582 000021CB E83600                  		call	get_fat_sector
  8583                                  		;pop	dx	; 13/12/2023
  8584 000021CE 8B1F                    		mov	bx, [bx]	;
  8585                                  					; bx = new fat entry.
  8586                                  unpackx:				
  8587 000021D0 5E                      		pop	si		; restore old bx value into si
  8588 000021D1 58                      		pop	ax		; restore logical sector (low)
  8589 000021D2 5A                      		pop	dx ; * ; 13/12/2023
  8590 000021D3 1F                      		pop	ds
  8591                                  		; 13/12/2023
  8592                                  		; (this is a fast kernel loading method by the MSDOS programmer)
  8593                                  		; ((consequtive clusters --> consequtive sectors))
  8594                                  		; ds = cs
  8595 000021D4 29DE                    		sub	si, bx
  8596 000021D6 83FEFF                  		cmp	si, -1		; one apart? (consequtive?)
  8597                                  					; (current = previous+1)
  8598 000021D9 7506                    		jnz	short getcl2	; no, read [doscnt] sectors 
  8599                                  		;add	[cs:doscnt], cx
  8600 000021DB 010E[8415]              		add	[doscnt], cx ; 13/12/2023 ; add to read count
  8601 000021DF EBA1                    		jmp	short unpack
  8602                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8603                                  
  8604                                  getcl2:					
  8605 000021E1 53                      		push	bx
  8606 000021E2 52                      		push	dx		; sector to read (high)
  8607 000021E3 50                      		push	ax		; sector to read (low)
  8608                                  
  8609                                  		; 13/12/2023
  8610                                  		; ds = cs
  8611                                  		;mov	ax, [cs:drvfat]	; get drive and	fat spec
  8612                                  		;mov	cx, [cs:doscnt]
  8613 000021E4 A1[7E15]                		mov	ax, [drvfat]	; get drive and	fat spec
  8614 000021E7 8B0E[8415]              		mov	cx, [doscnt]
  8615                                  
  8616 000021EB 5A                      		pop	dx		; sector to read for diskrd (low)
  8617                                  		;pop	word [cs:start_sec_h]
  8618                                  		; 13/12/2023
  8619 000021EC 8F06[1C05]              		pop	word [start_sec_h]
  8620                                  					; sector to read for diskrd (high)
  8621                                  		; 13/12/2023
  8622                                  		; ds = cs
  8623                                  		;push	ds
  8624                                  		;push	cs
  8625                                  		;pop	ds
  8626                                  
  8627 000021F0 0E                      		push	cs		; simulate far call
  8628                                  		; 17/10/2022
  8629 000021F1 BD[4E09]                		mov	bp, DISKRD	; 8E5h
  8630                                  		;mov	bp, 8E5h	; offset diskrd
  8631                                  					; 2C7h:8E5h = 70h:2E55h
  8632 000021F4 E820F4                  		call	call_bios_code	; read the clusters
  8633                                  		
  8634                                  		;pop	ds
  8635                                  		; 13/12/2023
  8636                                  		; ds = cs
  8637 000021F7 5B                      		pop	bx
  8638 000021F8 5F                      		pop	di
  8639                                  
  8640                                  		;mov	ax, [cs:doscnt]	; get number of	sectors	read
  8641                                  		; 13/12/2023
  8642 000021F9 A1[8415]                		mov	ax, [doscnt]
  8643 000021FC 86C4                    		xchg	ah, al		; multiply by 256
  8644 000021FE D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1		; times	2 equal	512
  8645 00002200 01C7                    		add	di, ax		; update load location
  8646 00002202 59                      		pop	cx		; restore sectors/cluster
  8647 00002203 C3                      		retn
  8648                                  
  8649                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  8650                                  
  8651                                  ;function: find and read the corresponding fat sector into ds:0
  8652                                  ;
  8653                                  ;in). dx:si - offset value (starting from fat entry 0) of fat entry to find. M054
  8654                                  ;     ds - fatloc segment
  8655                                  ;     cs:drvfat - logical drive number, fat id
  8656                                  ;     cs:md_sectorsize
  8657                                  ;     cs:last_fat_secnum - last fat sector number read in.
  8658                                  ;
  8659                                  ;out). corresponding fat sector read in.
  8660                                  ;      bx = offset value from fatlog segment.
  8661                                  ;      other registera saved.
  8662                                  ;      zero flag set if the fat entry is splitted, i.e., when 12 bit fat entry
  8663                                  ;      starts at the last byte of the fat sector. in this case, the caller
  8664                                  ;      should save this byte, and read the next fat sector to get the rest
  8665                                  ;      of the fat entry value. (this will only happen with the 12 bit fat.)
  8666                                  
  8667                                  		; 17/10/2022
  8668                                  get_fat_sector:	
  8669                                  		; 13/12/2023
  8670                                  		; ds = fat buffer segment
  8671                                  
  8672                                  		; 13/12/2023
  8673                                  		;push	ax ; (not necessary)
  8674 00002204 51                      		push	cx ; read count (sectors per cluster)
  8675 00002205 57                      		push	di ; IBMDOS.COM/MSDOS.SYS load offset
  8676 00002206 56                      		push	si ; FAT offset value (from fat entry 0)
  8677 00002207 06                      		push	es ; IBMDOS.COM/MSDOS.SYS load segment
  8678 00002208 1E                      		push	ds ; FAT buffer segment
  8679                                  
  8680                                  		; 13/12/2023
  8681 00002209 0E                      		push	cs
  8682 0000220A 1F                      		pop	ds
  8683                                  
  8684 0000220B 89F0                    		mov	ax, si
  8685                                  		;;mov	cx, [cs:md_sectorsize] ; 512
  8686                                  		; 13/12/2023
  8687                                  		;mov	cx, [md_sectorsize] ; 512
  8688                                  		;div	cx		; ax = sector number, dx = offset
  8689                                  		; 13/12/2023
  8690                                  		;nop
  8691                                  
  8692                                  		; 13/12/2023
  8693 0000220D F736[8C15]              		div	word [md_sectorsize] ; 512
  8694                                  
  8695                                  		; ax = FAT sector (sequence/index) number
  8696                                  		; dx = cluster number offset
  8697                                  
  8698                                  		; Get rid of the assumption that
  8699                                  		; there	is only	one reserved sector
  8700                                  
  8701                                  		; 13/12/2023 ; *
  8702                                  		;push	es ; *
  8703                                  		;push	ds ; *
  8704                                  		;push	di ; *
  8705 00002211 50                      		push	ax
  8706                                  		;push	cs ; *
  8707                                  		;pop	ds ; *
  8708                                  
  8709                                  		;mov	ax, [cs:drvfat]	; get drive # and FAT id
  8710                                  		; 13/12/2023
  8711 00002212 A1[7E15]                		mov	ax, [drvfat]	; get drive # and FAT id 
  8712 00002215 BD[6A05]                		mov	bp, SETDRIVE
  8713                                  		;;mov	bp, 4D7h	; setdrive
  8714                                  					; at 2C7h:4D7h = 70h:2A47h
  8715 00002218 0E                      		push	cs		; simulate far call
  8716 00002219 E8FBF3                  		call	call_bios_code	; get bds for drive
  8717 0000221C 58                      		pop	ax		; (sector number -without reserved and hidden sectors-)
  8718 0000221D 26034509                		add	ax, [es:di+9]	; [es:di+BDS.resectors]
  8719                                  					; add #reserved_sectors
  8720                                  		; 13/12/2023
  8721                                  		;pop	di ; *
  8722                                  		;pop	ds ; *
  8723                                  		;pop	es ; *
  8724                                  
  8725                                  		; 13/12/2023
  8726                                  		; ds = cs
  8727 00002221 3B06[8E15]              		cmp	ax, [last_fat_sec_num]
  8728                                  		;cmp	ax, [cs:last_fat_sec_num]
  8729 00002225 741C                    		jz	short gfs_split_chk ; don't need to read it again.
  8730 00002227 A3[8E15]                		mov	[last_fat_sec_num], ax
  8731                                  		;mov	[cs:last_fat_sec_num], ax
  8732                                  					; sector number
  8733                                  					; (in the partition, without hidden sectors)
  8734                                  		; 13/12/2023
  8735 0000222A 07                      		pop	es ; FAT buffer segment (DS on top of the stack)
  8736 0000222B 06                      		push	es ; (put it on top of the stack again)
  8737                                  
  8738 0000222C 52                      		push	dx ; cluster number offset
  8739                                  
  8740                                  		; 13/12/2023
  8741 0000222D 31C9                    		xor	cx, cx
  8742 0000222F 890E[1C05]              		mov	[start_sec_h], cx ;0 
  8743                                  		;mov	word [cs:start_sec_h], 0 
  8744                                  					; prepare to read the fat sector
  8745                                  					; start_sec_h is always	0 for fat sector.
  8746 00002233 89C2                    		mov	dx, ax
  8747                                  		; 13/12/2023
  8748 00002235 41                      		inc	cx ; cx = 1
  8749                                  		;mov	cx, 1		; 1 sector read
  8750                                  		;mov	ax, [cs:drvfat]
  8751 00002236 A1[7E15]                		mov	ax, [drvfat]
  8752                                  		;push	ds
  8753                                  		;pop	es
  8754                                  
  8755 00002239 31FF                    		xor	di, di	; 0	; es:di	-> fatloc segment:0
  8756                                  		
  8757                                  		; 13/12/2023
  8758                                  		;push	ds
  8759                                  		;push	cs
  8760                                  		;pop	ds
  8761                                  		
  8762 0000223B 0E                      		push	cs		; simulate far call
  8763 0000223C BD[4E09]                		mov	bp, DISKRD	; 8E5h
  8764                                  		;mov	bp, 8E5h	; offset diskrd
  8765                                  					; 2C7h:8E5h = 70h:2E55h
  8766 0000223F E8D5F3                  		call	call_bios_code
  8767                                  
  8768                                  		; 13/12/2023
  8769                                  		;pop	ds
  8770                                  		; ds = cs = biosdata segment
  8771                                  
  8772 00002242 5A                      		pop	dx ; cluster number offset 
  8773                                  
  8774                                  gfs_split_chk:
  8775                                  		; 13/12/2023
  8776                                  		;mov	cx, [cs:md_sectorsize] ; 512
  8777 00002243 8B0E[8C15]              		mov	cx, [md_sectorsize]
  8778                                  ;gfs_split_chk:				
  8779 00002247 49                      		dec	cx		; 511
  8780 00002248 39CA                    		cmp	dx, cx		; if offset points to the
  8781                                  					; last byte of this sector,
  8782                                  					; then splitted	entry.
  8783 0000224A 89D3                    		mov	bx, dx		; set bx to dx
  8784                                  		
  8785                                  		; 13/12/2023
  8786                                  		; bx = dx = cluster number offset in the FAT buffer
  8787 0000224C 1F                      		pop	ds ; FAT buffer segment
  8788 0000224D 07                      		pop	es ; IBMDOS.COM/MSDOS.SYS load segment
  8789 0000224E 5E                      		pop	si ; FAT offset value (from fat entry 0)
  8790 0000224F 5F                      		pop	di ; IBMDOS.COM/MSDOS.SYS load offset
  8791 00002250 59                      		pop	cx ; read count (sectors per cluster)
  8792                                  		;pop	ax
  8793                                  
  8794 00002251 C3                      		retn
  8795                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8796                                  ;Bios_Data_Init	ends
  8797                                  
  8798                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------

  8800                                  		; 09/12/2022
  8801                                  		;db 0
  8802

  8804                                  numbertomod	equ (numbertodiv % 16)
  8805                                  
  8806                                  %if (numbertomod>0) & (numbertomod<16) ; 17/09/2023
  8807 00002252 00<rep Eh>              		times (16-numbertomod) db 0
  8808                                  %endif
