  8823                                  ;============================================================================
  8824                                  ; DOS BIOS (IO.SYS) CODE SEGMENT 
  8825                                  ;============================================================================
  8826                                  ; 09/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  8827                                  ; 30/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
  8828                                  
  8829                                  section .BIOSCODE vstart=0 
  8830                                  
  8831                                  ; 30/12/2022
  8832                                  ; (BIOSCODE SEGMENT is 2CCh for MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)  -- ((25C0h+700h)>>4) --
  8833                                  
  8834                                  BCode_start:	 ; 09/12/2022
  8835                                   
  8836                                  ; 02/10/2022
  8837                                  
  8838                                  ;--- DOSBIOS code segment ---------------------------------------------------
  8839                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8840                                  ; MSBIO1.ASM (MSDOS 6.0, 1991)
  8841                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8842                                  
  8843                                  DOSBIOSEG_2C7h:	;db 30h dup(0)		; SEGMENT 2C7h (2C70h-700h=2570h)
  8844 00000000 00<rep 30h>             		times 48 db 0		; 19/10/2022	
  8845 00000030 7000                    BiosDataWord:	dw 70h
  8846                                  
  8847                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8848                                  ;BIOSDATAWORD	equ BiosDataWord - DOSBIOSEG_2C7h
  8849                                  ; 09/12/2022
  8850                                  BIOSDATAWORD	equ BiosDataWord
  8851                                  
  8852                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8853                                  
  8854                                  ; 15/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS) 
  8855                                  
  8856                                  ;************************************************************************
  8857                                  ;*									*
  8858                                  ;*	seg_reinit is called with ax = our new code segment value,	*
  8859                                  ;*	  trashes di, cx, es						*
  8860                                  ;*									*
  8861                                  ;*	cas -- should be made disposable!				*
  8862                                  ;*									*
  8863                                  ;************************************************************************
  8864                                  
  8865                                  	; 20/09/2023	
  8866                                  	; 10/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
  8867                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:0032h 
  8868                                  
  8869                                  _seg_reinit:
  8870 00000032 2E8E06[3000]            		mov	es, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]
  8871                                  					; at 2C7h:30h or 70h:25A0h
  8872                                  		;mov	di, (offset cdev+2)
  8873 00000037 BF[B606]                		mov	di, cdev+2	; 19/10/2022
  8874                                  		; 20/09/2023
  8875                                  		;mov	cx, 4		; (end_BC_entries - cdev)/4
  8876                                  		; 10/08/2023
  8877 0000003A B90300                  		mov	cx, 3 ; (PCDOS 7.1)
  8878                                  _seg_reinit_1:
  8879 0000003D AB                      		stosw			; modify Bios_Code entry points
  8880 0000003E 47                      		inc	di
  8881 0000003F 47                      		inc	di
  8882 00000040 E2FB                    		loop	_seg_reinit_1
  8883                                  
  8884                                  		; 10/08/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
  8885                                  		; (direct jump to i2f_handler from BIOSDATA:bios_i2f)
  8886                                  		; (instead of 'bcode_i2f: dw i2f_handler, IOSYSCODESEG')
  8887                                  		
  8888                                  		; 20/09/2023
  8889 00000042 26A3[0800]              		mov	[es:bios_i2f_seg], ax ; actual BIOSCODE segment
  8890                                  		
  8891 00000046 CB                      		retf
  8892                                  
  8893                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8894                                  
  8895                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8896                                  
  8897                                  ;************************************************************************
  8898                                  ;*									*
  8899                                  ;*	chardev_entry - main device driver dispatch routine		*
  8900                                  ;*	   called with a dummy parameter block on the stack		*
  8901                                  ;*	   dw dispatch_table, dw prn/aux numbers (optional)		*
  8902                                  ;*									*
  8903                                  ;*	will eventually take care of doing the transitions in		*
  8904                                  ;*	   out of Bios_Code						*
  8905                                  ;*									*
  8906                                  ;************************************************************************
  8907                                  
  8908                                  chardev_entry:				; 0070h:25B3h =	02C7h:0043h
  8909 00000047 56                      		push	si
  8910 00000048 50                      		push	ax
  8911 00000049 51                      		push	cx
  8912 0000004A 52                      		push	dx
  8913 0000004B 57                      		push	di
  8914 0000004C 55                      		push	bp
  8915 0000004D 1E                      		push	ds
  8916 0000004E 06                      		push	es
  8917 0000004F 53                      		push	bx
  8918 00000050 89E5                    		mov	bp, sp
  8919 00000052 8B7612                  		mov	si, [bp+18]	; get return address (dispatch table)
  8920                                  		;;mov	ds, word [cs:0030h]
  8921                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:0030h]
  8922 00000055 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD] ; 17/10/2022
  8923                                  		; 20/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1 - IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:005Ah)
  8924 0000005A C434                    		les	si, [si]
  8925                                  		;mov	ax, [si+2]	; get the device number	if present
  8926 0000005C 8CC0                    		mov	ax, es
  8927 0000005E A2[2100]                		mov	[auxnum], al
  8928 00000061 8826[E004]              		mov	[printdev], ah
  8929                                  		;mov	si, [si]	; point	to the device dispatch table
  8930 00000065 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]	; get pointer to i/o packet
  8931 00000069 268A4701                		mov	al, [es:bx+1]	; [es:bx+unit]	; al = unit code
  8932 0000006D 268A670D                		mov	ah, [es:bx+13]	; [es:bx+media]	; ah = media descrip
  8933 00000071 268B4F12                		mov	cx, [es:bx+18]	; [es:bx+count]	; cx = count
  8934 00000075 268B5714                		mov	dx, [es:bx+20]	; [es:bx+start]	; dx = start sector
  8935                                  		; 17/10/2022
  8936 00000079 81FE[3505]              		cmp	si, DSKTBL
  8937                                  		;;cmp	si, 579h	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM)
  8938                                  		;cmp	si, 4A2h	; dsktbl
  8939                                  					; at 2C7h:4A2h = 70h:2A12h
  8940 0000007D 7517                    		jnz	short no_sector32_mapping
  8941                                  
  8942                                  ; Special case for 32-bit start sector number:
  8943                                  ;   if (si==dsktbl) /* if this is a disk device call */
  8944                                  ;      set high 16 bits of secnum to 0
  8945                                  ;      if (secnum == 0xffff) fetch 32 bit sector number
  8946                                  ;
  8947                                  ; pass high word of sector number in start_sec_h, low word in dx
  8948                                  ;
  8949                                  ; note: start_l and start_h are the offsets within the io_request packet
  8950                                  ;	  which contain the low and hi words of the 32 bit start sector if
  8951                                  ;	  it has been used.
  8952                                  ;
  8953                                  ; note: remember not to destroy the registers which have been set up before
  8954                                  
  8955                                  		; 20/09/2023
  8956                                  		;mov	ds:start_sec_h,	0 ; initialize to 0
  8957 0000007F C706[1C05]0000          		mov	word [start_sec_h], 0
  8958 00000085 83FAFF                  		cmp	dx, 0FFFFh
  8959 00000088 750C                    		jnz	short no_sector32_mapping
  8960 0000008A 268B571C                		mov	dx, [es:bx+28]	; [es:bx+start_h]
  8961                                  					; 32 bits dsk req
  8962                                  		;mov	ds:start_sec_h,	dx ; start_sec_h = packet.start_h
  8963 0000008E 8916[1C05]              		mov	[start_sec_h], dx
  8964 00000092 268B571A                		mov	dx, [es:bx+26]	; [es:bx+start_l]
  8965                                  					; dx = packet.start_l
  8966                                  no_sector32_mapping:			
  8967 00000096 97                      		xchg	ax, di
  8968 00000097 268A4702                		mov	al, [es:bx+2]	; [es:bx+cmd]
  8969 0000009B 2E3A04                  		cmp	al, [cs:si]
  8970 0000009E 732B                    		jnb	short command_error
  8971 000000A0 98                      		cbw			; note that al <= 15 means ok
  8972 000000A1 D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1
  8973 000000A3 01C6                    		add	si, ax
  8974 000000A5 97                      		xchg	ax, di
  8975 000000A6 26C47F0E                		les	di, [es:bx+14]	; [es:bx+trans]
  8976 000000AA FC                      		cld
  8977                                  		; 17/10/2022
  8978 000000AB 2EFF5401                		call	near [cs:si+1]
  8979                                  		;call	word ptr cs:si+1
  8980 000000AF 7202                    		jb	short already_got_ah_status
  8981 000000B1 B401                    		mov	ah, 1
  8982                                  already_got_ah_status:
  8983                                  		;;mov	ds, [cs:0030h]	; 15/10/2022
  8984                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:0030h]
  8985                                  					; cas note: shouldn't be needed!
  8986 000000B3 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD] ; 17/10/2022
  8987                                  		;lds	bx, ds:ptrsav
  8988 000000B8 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]
  8989 000000BC 894703                  		mov	[bx+3],	ax	; [bx+status]
  8990                                  					; mark operation complete
  8991 000000BF 5B                      		pop	bx
  8992 000000C0 07                      		pop	es
  8993 000000C1 1F                      		pop	ds
  8994 000000C2 5D                      		pop	bp
  8995 000000C3 5F                      		pop	di
  8996 000000C4 5A                      		pop	dx
  8997 000000C5 59                      		pop	cx
  8998 000000C6 58                      		pop	ax
  8999 000000C7 5E                      		pop	si
  9000                                  		;add	sp, 2		; get rid of fake return address
  9001                                  		; 20/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1	- IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:00C8h)
  9002 000000C8 44                      		inc	sp
  9003 000000C9 44                      		inc	sp	
  9004                                  
  9005                                  		; fall through into bc_retf
  9006                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------	
  9007                                  bc_retf:
  9008 000000CA CB                      		retf
  9009                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9010                                  
  9011                                  command_error:				
  9012 000000CB E80700                  		call	bc_cmderr
  9013 000000CE EBE3                    		jmp	short already_got_ah_status
  9014                                  ; 15/10/2022
  9015                                  ; 01/05/2019
  9016                                  
  9017                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9018                                  ; The following piece of hack is for supporting CP/M compatibility
  9019                                  ; Basically at offset 5 we have a far call into 0:c0. But this does not call
  9020                                  ; 0:c0 directly instead it call f01d:fef0, because it needs to support 'lhld 6'
  9021                                  ; The following hack has to reside at ffff:d0 (= f01d:fef0) if BIOS is loaded
  9022                                  ; high.
  9023                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9024                                  
  9025                                  		;db 7 dup(0)
  9026                                  
  9027                                  		; 20/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
  9028                                  		; (PCDOS 7.1 - IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:0D0h)
  9029                                  		; 15/10/2022
  9030                                  		;dw 0		; pad to bring offset to 0D0h
  9031                                  
  9032 000000D0 00<rep 5h>              off_d0: 	times 5 db 0	; 5 bytes from 0:c0 will be copied onto here
  9033                                  				;  which is the CP/M call 5 entry point
  9034                                  		
  9035                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9036                                  
  9037                                  ;	exit - all routines return through this path
  9038                                  
  9039                                  bc_cmderr:				
  9040 000000D5 B003                    		mov	al, 3		; 2C7h:D5h = 70h:2645h
  9041                                  					; unknown command error
  9042                                  
  9043                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  9044                                  
  9045                                  ;	now zero the count field by subtracting its current value,
  9046                                  ;	  which is still in cx, from itself.
  9047                                  
  9048                                  ;	subtract the number of i/o's NOT YET COMPLETED from total
  9049                                  ;	  in order to return the number actually complete
  9050                                  
  9051                                  bc_err_cnt:	
  9052                                  		;les	bx, ds:ptrsav
  9053                                  		; 19/10/2022
  9054 000000D7 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]
  9055 000000DB 26294F12                		sub	[es:bx+18], cx	; [es:bx+count]
  9056                                  					; # of successful i/o's
  9057 000000DF B481                    		mov	ah, 81h		; mark error return
  9058 000000E1 F9                      		stc			; indicate abnormal end
  9059 000000E2 C3                      		retn
  9060                                  
  9061                                  ; 15/10/2022
  9062                                  
  9063                                  ;Bios_Code ends
  9064                                  
  9065                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9066                                  ; MSCHAR.ASM - MSDOS 6.0 - 1991
  9067                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9068                                  ; 15/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  9069                                  ; 10/01/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
  9070                                  
  9071                                  ; 30/04/2019
  9072                                  
  9073                                  ;title	mschar - character and clock devices
  9074                                  
  9075                                  ;MODE_CTRLBRK	equ	0FFh
  9076                                  
  9077                                  ; BIOSCODE:00E4h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
  9078                                  
  9079                                  ;************************************************************************
  9080                                  ;*									*
  9081                                  ;*	device driver dispatch tables					*
  9082                                  ;*									*
  9083                                  ;*	each table starts with a byte which lists the number of		*
  9084                                  ;*	legal functions, followed by that number of words. Each		*
  9085                                  ;*	word represents an offset of a routine in Bios_Code which	*
  9086                                  ;*	handles the function. The functions are terminated with		*
  9087                                  ;*	a near return. If carry is reset, a 'done' code is returned	*
  9088                                  ;*	to the caller. If carry is set, the ah/al registers are		*
  9089                                  ;*	returned as abnormal completion status. Notice that ds		*
  9090                                  ;*	is assumed to point to the Bios_Data segment throughout.	*
  9091                                  ;*									*
  9092                                  ;************************************************************************
  9093                                  
  9094                                  		; 20/09/2023
  9095                                  		; (PCDOS 7.1 - IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:00E3h)
  9096                                  		; 13/12/2022
  9097 000000E3 00                      		db 0
  9098                                  
  9099                                  		; 13/12/2022
  9100 000000E4 0B                      con_table:	db ((con_table_end - con_table)-1)/2 ; 11
  9101                                  					; 2C7h:0E4h = 70h:2654h
  9102 000000E5 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; bc_exvec at 2C7h:1FBh	= 70h:276Bh
  9103                                  					; 00 init
  9104 000000E7 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; 01
  9105 000000E9 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; 02
  9106 000000EB [D500]                  		dw bc_cmderr ; 0D5h	; bc_exvec at 2C7h:D5h = 70h:2645h
  9107                                  					; 03
  9108 000000ED [5C01]                  		dw con_read  ; 15Ch	; con_read at 2C7h:15Ch	= 70h:26CCh
  9109                                  					; 04
  9110 000000EF [9F01]                  		dw con_rdnd  ; 19Fh	; con_rdnd at 2C7h:19Fh	= 70h:270Fh
  9111                                  					; 05
  9112 000000F1 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; 06
  9113 000000F3 [0802]                  		dw con_flush ; 209h	; con_flush at 2C7h:209h = 70h:2779h
  9114                                  					; 07
  9115 000000F5 [FC01]                  		dw con_writ  ; 1FDh	; con_writ at 2C7h:1FDh	= 70h:276Dh
  9116                                  					; 08
  9117 000000F7 [FC01]                  		dw con_writ  ; 1FDh	; 09
  9118 000000F9 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; 0A
  9119                                  con_table_end:
  9120 000000FB 1A                      prn_table:	db ((prn_table_end - prn_table)-1)/2 ; 26			
  9121                                  					; 2C7h:0FBh = 70h:266Bh
  9122 000000FC [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; bc_exvec
  9123 000000FE [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 01
  9124 00000100 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 02
  9125 00000102 [D500]                  		dw bc_cmderr  ;	0D5h	; bc_cmderr
  9126 00000104 [1902]                  		dw prn_input  ;	21Ah	; prn_input
  9127                                  					; 04 indicate zero chars read
  9128 00000106 [C701]                  		dw z_bus_exit ; 1C8h	; z_bus_exit
  9129                                  					; 05 read non-destructive
  9130 00000108 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 06
  9131 0000010A [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 07
  9132 0000010C [1E02]                  		dw prn_writ   ;	21Fh	; prn_writ
  9133 0000010E [1E02]                  		dw prn_writ   ; 21Fh	; 09
  9134 00000110 [4F02]                  		dw prn_stat   ; 251h	; prn_stat
  9135 00000112 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0B
  9136 00000114 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0C
  9137 00000116 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0D
  9138 00000118 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0E
  9139 0000011A [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0F
  9140 0000011C [8902]                  		dw prn_tilbusy ; 28Bh	; prn_tilbusy
  9141 0000011E [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 11
  9142 00000120 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 12
  9143 00000122 [B702]                  		dw prn_genioctl ; 2BAh	; prn_genioctl
  9144 00000124 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 14
  9145 00000126 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 15
  9146 00000128 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 16
  9147 0000012A [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 17
  9148 0000012C [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 18
  9149 0000012E [EC02]                  		dw prn_ioctl_query ; 2F0h ; prn_ioctl_query
  9150                                  prn_table_end:
  9151 00000130 0B                      aux_table:	db ((aux_table_end - aux_table)-1)/2 ; 11			
  9152                                  					; 2C7h:130h = 70h:26A0h
  9153 00000131 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 00 - init
  9154 00000133 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 01
  9155 00000135 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 02
  9156 00000137 [D500]                  		dw bc_cmderr  ;	0D5h	; 03
  9157 00000139 [0703]                  		dw aux_read   ; 30Dh	; aux_read ; 04	- read
  9158 0000013B [2C03]                  		dw aux_rdnd   ; 335h	; aux_rdnd - 05	- read non-destructive
  9159 0000013D [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 06
  9160 0000013F [6203]                  		dw aux_flsh   ;	36Ch	; aux_flsh
  9161 00000141 [6903]                  		dw aux_writ   ;	374h	; aux_writ
  9162 00000143 [6903]                  		dw aux_writ   ;	374h	; 09
  9163 00000145 [4C03]                  		dw aux_wrst   ;	355h	; aux_wrst
  9164                                  aux_table_end:
  9165 00000147 0A                      tim_table	db ((tim_table_end - tim_table)-1)/2 ; 10
  9166                                  					; 2C7h:147h = 70h:26B7h
  9167 00000148 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 00
  9168 0000014A [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 01
  9169 0000014C [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 02
  9170 0000014E [D500]                  		dw bc_cmderr  ;	0D5h	; 03
  9171 00000150 [CE04]                  		dw tim_read   ;	435h	; tim_read
  9172 00000152 [C701]                  		dw z_bus_exit ; 1C8h	; z_bus_exit
  9173 00000154 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 06
  9174 00000156 [FA01]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 07
  9175 00000158 [CF03]                  		dw tim_writ   ; 3DBh	; tim_writ
  9176 0000015A [CF03]                  		dw tim_writ   ; 3DBh	; 09
  9177                                  tim_table_end:
  9178                                  
  9179                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9180                                  
  9181                                  ;************************************************************************
  9182                                  ;*									*
  9183                                  ;*	con_read - read cx bytes from keyboard into buffer at es:di	*
  9184                                  ;*									*
  9185                                  ;************************************************************************
  9186                                  
  9187                                  con_read:				; 2C7h:15Ch = 70h:26CCh
  9188                                  		;jcxz	short con_exit	; read cx bytes	from keyboard into buffer
  9189 0000015C E306                    		jcxz	con_exit	; 19/10/2022
  9190                                  con_loop:				
  9191 0000015E E80500                  		call	chrin		; get char in al
  9192 00000161 AA                      		stosb			; store	char at	es:di
  9193 00000162 E2FA                    		loop	con_loop
  9194                                  con_exit:				
  9195 00000164 F8                      		clc
  9196 00000165 C3                      		retn
  9197                                  
  9198                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  9199                                  
  9200                                  ;************************************************************************
  9201                                  ;*									*
  9202                                  ;*	chrin - input single char from keyboard into al			*
  9203                                  ;*									*
  9204                                  ;*	  we are going to issue extended keyboard function, if		*
  9205                                  ;*	  supported. the returning value of the extended keystroke	*
  9206                                  ;*	  of the extended keyboard function uses 0E0h in al		*
  9207                                  ;*	  instead of 00h as in the conventional keyboard function.	*
  9208                                  ;*	  this creates a conflict when the user entered real		*
  9209                                  ;*	  greek alpha charater (= 0E0h) to  distinguish the extended	*
  9210                                  ;*	  keystroke and the greek alpha. this case will be handled	*
  9211                                  ;*	  in the following manner:					*
  9212                                  ;*									*
  9213                                  ;*	      ah = 16h							*
  9214                                  ;*	      int 16h							*
  9215                                  ;*	      if al == 0, then extended code (in ah)			*
  9216                                  ;*	      else if al == 0E0h, then					*
  9217                                  ;*	      if ah <> 0, then extended code (in ah)			*
  9218                                  ;*		else greek_alpha character.				*
  9219                                  ;*									*
  9220                                  ;*	also, for compatibility reason, if an extended code is		*
  9221                                  ;*	  detected, then we are going to change the value in al		*
  9222                                  ;*	  from 0E0h to 00h.						*
  9223                                  ;*									*
  9224                                  ;************************************************************************
  9225                                  
  9226                                  		; 19/10/2022
  9227                                  chrin:		
  9228 00000166 8A26[DE04]              		mov	ah, [keyrd_func] ; set by msinit. 0 or 10h
  9229 0000016A 30C0                    		xor	al, al
  9230 0000016C 8606[0C00]              		xchg	al, [altah]	; get character	& zero altah
  9231 00000170 08C0                    		or	al, al
  9232 00000172 752A                    		jnz	short keyret
  9233 00000174 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD -
  9234 00000176 09C0                    		or	ax, ax
  9235 00000178 74EC                    		jz	short chrin
  9236 0000017A 3D0072                  		cmp	ax, 7200h	; check	for ctrl-prtsc
  9237 0000017D 7504                    		jnz	short alt_ext_chk
  9238 0000017F B010                    		mov	al, 10h
  9239 00000181 EB1B                    		jmp	short keyret
  9240                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9241                                  
  9242                                  ;  if operation was extended function (i.e. keyrd_func != 0) then
  9243                                  ;    if character read was 0E0h then
  9244                                  ;      if extended byte was zero (i.e. ah == 0) then
  9245                                  ;	 goto keyret
  9246                                  ;      else
  9247                                  ;	 set al to zero
  9248                                  ;	 goto alt_save
  9249                                  ;      endif
  9250                                  ;    endif
  9251                                  ;  endif
  9252                                  
  9253                                  alt_ext_chk:
  9254 00000183 803E[DE04]00            		cmp	byte [keyrd_func], 0
  9255 00000188 740C                    		jz	short not_ext
  9256 0000018A 3CE0                    		cmp	al, 0E0h
  9257 0000018C 7508                    		jnz	short not_ext
  9258 0000018E 08E4                    		or	ah, ah
  9259 00000190 740C                    		jz	short keyret
  9260 00000192 30C0                    		xor	al, al
  9261 00000194 EB04                    		jmp	short alt_save
  9262                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9263                                  
  9264                                  not_ext:				
  9265 00000196 08C0                    		or	al, al		; special case?
  9266 00000198 7504                    		jnz	short keyret
  9267                                  alt_save:				
  9268 0000019A 8826[0C00]              		mov	[altah], ah	; store	special	key
  9269                                  keyret:					
  9270 0000019E C3                      		retn
  9271                                  
  9272                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9273                                  
  9274                                  ;************************************************************************
  9275                                  ;*									*
  9276                                  ;*	con_rdnd - keyboard non destructive read, no wait		*
  9277                                  ;*									*
  9278                                  ;*	pc-convertible-type machine: if bit 10 is set by the dos	*
  9279                                  ;*	in the status word of the request packet, and there is no	*
  9280                                  ;*	character in the input buffer, the driver issues a system	*
  9281                                  ;*	wait request to the rom. on return from the rom, it returns	*
  9282                                  ;*	a 'char-not-found' to the dos.					*
  9283                                  ;*									*
  9284                                  ;************************************************************************
  9285                                  
  9286                                  		; 19/10/2022
  9287                                  con_rdnd:				
  9288 0000019F A0[0C00]                		mov	al, [altah]
  9289 000001A2 08C0                    		or	al, al
  9290 000001A4 754C                    		jnz	short rdexit
  9291 000001A6 8A26[DF04]              		mov	ah, [keysts_func]
  9292 000001AA CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD -
  9293 000001AC 751D                    		jnz	short gotchr
  9294 000001AE 803E[7900]00            		cmp	byte [fhavek09], 0
  9295 000001B3 7412                    		jz	short z_bus_exit
  9296 000001B5 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]
  9297                                  		; 12/12/2022
  9298 000001B9 26F6470404              		test	byte [es:bx+4], 04h
  9299                                  		;test	word [es:bx+3], 400h ; [es:bx+status]
  9300 000001BE 7407                    		jz	short z_bus_exit
  9301 000001C0 B80041                  		mov	ax, 4100h
  9302 000001C3 30DB                    		xor	bl, bl
  9303 000001C5 CD15                    		int	15h		; SYSTEM - WAIT	ON EXTERNAL EVENT (CONVERTIBLE)
  9304                                  					; AL = condition type, BH = condition compare or mask value
  9305                                  					; BL = timeout value times 55 milliseconds, 00h	means no timeout
  9306                                  					; DX = I/O port	address	if AL bit 4 set
  9307                                  z_bus_exit:				
  9308 000001C7 F9                      		stc			; 2C7h:1C8h = 70h:2738h
  9309 000001C8 B403                    		mov	ah, 3		; indicate busy	status
  9310 000001CA C3                      		retn
  9311                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9312                                  
  9313                                  gotchr:					
  9314 000001CB 09C0                    		or	ax, ax
  9315 000001CD 7508                    		jnz	short notbrk	; check	for null after break
  9316 000001CF 8A26[DE04]              		mov	ah, [keyrd_func] ; issue keyboard read function
  9317 000001D3 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD -
  9318 000001D5 EBC8                    		jmp	short con_rdnd	; get a	real status
  9319                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9320                                  
  9321                                  notbrk:					
  9322 000001D7 3D0072                  		cmp	ax, 7200h	; check	for ctrl-prtsc
  9323 000001DA 7504                    		jnz	short rd_ext_chk
  9324 000001DC B010                    		mov	al, 10h		; ('P' & 1Fh) ; return control p
  9325 000001DE EB12                    		jmp	short rdexit
  9326                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9327                                  
  9328                                  rd_ext_chk:				
  9329 000001E0 803E[DE04]00            		cmp	byte [keyrd_func], 0 ; extended keyboard function?
  9330 000001E5 740B                    		jz	short rdexit
  9331 000001E7 3CE0                    		cmp	al, 0E0h	; extended key value or	greek alpha?
  9332 000001E9 7507                    		jnz	short rdexit
  9333 000001EB 80FC00                  		cmp	ah, 0		; scan code exist?
  9334 000001EE 7402                    		jz	short rdexit	; yes. greek alpha char.
  9335 000001F0 B000                    		mov	al, 0		; no. extended key stroke.
  9336                                  					; change it for	compatibility
  9337                                  rdexit:					
  9338 000001F2 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]
  9339 000001F6 2688470D                		mov	[es:bx+13], al	; [es:bx+media]
  9340                                  					; return keyboard character here
  9341                                  bc_exvec:				
  9342 000001FA F8                      		clc			; bc_exvec at 2C7h:1FBh	= 70h:276Bh
  9343                                  					; indicate normal termination
  9344 000001FB C3                      		retn
  9345                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9346                                  
  9347                                  ;************************************************************************
  9348                                  ;*									*
  9349                                  ;*	con_write - console write routine				*
  9350                                  ;*									*
  9351                                  ;*	entry:	es:di -> buffer						*
  9352                                  ;*		cx    =  count						*
  9353                                  ;*									*
  9354                                  ;************************************************************************
  9355                                  
  9356                                  con_writ:
  9357                                  		;jcxz	short bc_exvec
  9358 000001FC E3FC                    		jcxz	bc_exvec	; 19/10/2022
  9359                                  		; 12/12/2022
  9360                                  		;jcxz	cc_ret
  9361                                  con_lp:					
  9362 000001FE 268A05                  		mov	al, [es:di]
  9363 00000201 47                      		inc	di
  9364 00000202 CD29                    		int	29h		; DOS 2+ internal - FAST PUTCHAR
  9365                                  					; AL = character to display
  9366 00000204 E2F8                    		loop	con_lp
  9367                                  cc_ret:					
  9368 00000206 F8                      		clc
  9369 00000207 C3                      		retn
  9370                                  
  9371                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  9372                                  
  9373                                  ;************************************************************************
  9374                                  ;*									*
  9375                                  ;*	con_flush - flush out keyboard queue				*
  9376                                  ;*									*
  9377                                  ;************************************************************************
  9378                                  
  9379                                  con_flush:
  9380 00000208 C606[0C00]00            		mov	byte [altah], 0	; clear	out holding buffer
  9381                                  flloop:					; while	(charavail()) charread();	
  9382 0000020D B401                    		mov	ah, 1
  9383 0000020F CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD - CHECK BUFFER, DO NOT CLEAR
  9384                                  					; Return: ZF clear if character	in buffer
  9385                                  					; AH = scan code, AL = character
  9386                                  					; ZF set if no character in buffer
  9387 00000211 74F3                    		jz	short cc_ret
  9388 00000213 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
  9389 00000215 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD - READ CHAR FROM BUFFER, WAIT IF EMPTY
  9390                                  					; Return: AH = scan code, AL = character
  9391 00000217 EBF4                    		jmp	short flloop
  9392                                  
  9393                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9394                                  
  9395                                  ; 15/10/2022
  9396                                  
  9397                                  ;************************************************************************
  9398                                  ;*									*
  9399                                  ;*	some equates for rom bios printer i/o				*
  9400                                  ;*									*
  9401                                  ;************************************************************************
  9402                                  
  9403                                  ; ibm rom status bits (i don't trust them, neither should you)
  9404                                  ; warning!!! the ibm rom does not return just one bit. it returns a
  9405                                  ; whole slew of bits, only one of which is correct.
  9406                                  
  9407                                  ;notbusystatus	equ 10000000b		; not busy
  9408                                  ;nopaperstatus	equ 00100000b		; no more paper
  9409                                  ;prnselected	equ 00010000b		; printer selected
  9410                                  ;ioerrstatus	equ 00001000b		; some kinda error
  9411                                  ;timeoutstatus	equ 00000001b		; time out.
  9412                                  ;
  9413                                  ;noprinter	equ 00110000b		; no printer attached
  9414                                  
  9415                                  ; 18/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
  9416                                  ;error_I24_out_of_paper	equ 9 ; MSDOS 6.0, ERR.INC, 1991
  9417                                  
  9418                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9419                                  
  9420                                  ;************************************************************************
  9421                                  ;*									*
  9422                                  ;*	prn_input - return with no error but zero chars read		*
  9423                                  ;*									*
  9424                                  ;*	enter with cx = number of characters requested			*
  9425                                  ;*									*
  9426                                  ;************************************************************************
  9427                                  
  9428                                  prn_input:				; 2C7h:21Ah = 70h:278Ah
  9429 00000219 E8BBFE                  		call	bc_err_cnt	; reset	count to zero
  9430                                  					; (sub reqpkt.count,cx)
  9431                                  		; 12/12/2022
  9432                                  prn_done:
  9433 0000021C F8                      		clc			; but return with carry	reset for no error
  9434 0000021D C3                      		retn
  9435                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9436                                  
  9437                                  ;************************************************************************
  9438                                  ;*									*
  9439                                  ;*	prn_writ - write cx bytes from es:di to printer device		*
  9440                                  ;*									*
  9441                                  ;*	auxnum has printer number					*
  9442                                  ;*									*
  9443                                  ;************************************************************************
  9444                                  
  9445                                  prn_writ:				; 2C7h:21Fh = 70h:278Fh
  9446                                  		;jcxz	short prn_done	; no chars to output
  9447 0000021E E3FC                    		jcxz	prn_done	; 19/10/2022
  9448                                  prn_loop:				
  9449 00000220 BB0200                  		mov	bx, 2		; retry	count
  9450                                  prn_out:				
  9451 00000223 E83600                  		call	prnstat		; get status
  9452 00000226 751D                    		jnz	short TestPrnError
  9453 00000228 268A05                  		mov	al, [es:di]	; get character	to print
  9454 0000022B 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
  9455 0000022D E82E00                  		call	prnop		; print	to printer
  9456 00000230 7419                    		jz	short prn_con	; no error - continue
  9457 00000232 80FCFF                  		cmp	ah, 0FFh	; MODE_CTRLBRK
  9458 00000235 7509                    		jnz	short _prnwf
  9459 00000237 B00C                    		mov	al, 0Ch		; error_I24_gen_failure
  9460 00000239 C606[0C00]00            		mov	byte [altah], 0
  9461 0000023E EB08                    		jmp	short pmessg
  9462                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9463                                  
  9464                                  _prnwf:					
  9465 00000240 F6C401                  		test	ah, 1		; timeoutstatus
  9466 00000243 7406                    		jz	short prn_con
  9467                                  TestPrnError:

  9469 00000246 75DB                    		jnz	short prn_out
  9470                                  pmessg:					
  9471 00000248 E98CFE                  		jmp	bc_err_cnt

  9479                                  prn_done2:

  9481                                  		; cf=0
  9482 0000024E C3                      		retn

  9484                                  
  9485                                  ;************************************************************************
  9486                                  ;*									*
  9487                                  ;*	prn_stat - device driver entry to return printer status		*
  9488                                  ;*									*
  9489                                  ;************************************************************************
  9490                                  
  9491                                  prn_stat:				; 2C7h:251h = 70h:27C1h
  9492 0000024F E80A00                  		call	prnstat		; device in dx
  9493 00000252 75F4                    		jnz	short pmessg
  9494 00000254 F6C480                  		test	ah, 80h		; notbusystatus
  9495                                  		;jnz	short prn_done
  9496                                  		; 12/12/2022

  9498 00000259 E96BFF                  		jmp	z_bus_exit
  9499                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9500                                  
  9501                                  ;************************************************************************
  9502                                  ;*									*
  9503                                  ;*	prnstat - utility function to call ROM BIOS to check		*
  9504                                  ;*		 printer status. Return meaningful error code		*
  9505                                  ;*									*
  9506                                  ;************************************************************************
  9507                                  
  9508                                  prnstat:				
  9509 0000025C B402                    		mov	ah, 2		; set command for get status
  9510                                  					; PRINTER - GET	STATUS
  9511                                  					; DX = printer port (0-3)
  9512                                  					; Return: AH = status
  9513                                  
  9514                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  9515                                  
  9516                                  ;************************************************************************
  9517                                  ;*									*
  9518                                  ;*	prnop - call ROM BIOS printer function in ah			*
  9519                                  ;*		return zero true if no error				*
  9520                                  ;*		return zero false if error, al = error code		*
  9521                                  ;*									*
  9522                                  ;************************************************************************
  9523                                  
  9524                                  prnop:	
  9525 0000025E 8B16[2100]              		mov	dx, [auxnum]	; get printer number
  9526 00000262 CD17                    		int	17h		
  9527                                  
  9528                                  	; This check was added to see if this is a case of no
  9529                                  	; printer being installed. This tests checks to be sure
  9530                                  	; the error is noprinter (30h)
  9531                                  
  9532 00000264 50                      		push	ax
  9533 00000265 80E430                  		and	ah, 30h
  9534 00000268 80FC30                  		cmp	ah, 30h		; noprinter
  9535 0000026B 58                      		pop	ax
  9536 0000026C 7506                    		jnz	short NextTest
  9537 0000026E 80E4DF                  		and	ah, 0DFh	; ~nopaperstatus
  9538 00000271 80CC08                  		or	ah, 8		; ioerrstatus
  9539                                  
  9540                                  ; examine the status bits to see if an error occurred. unfortunately, several
  9541                                  ; of the bits are set so we have to pick and choose. we must be extremely
  9542                                  ; careful about breaking basic.
  9543                                  
  9544                                  NextTest:				
  9545 00000274 F6C428                  		test	ah, 28h		; (ioerrstatus+nopaperstatus)
  9546                                  					; i/o error?
  9547 00000277 740A                    		jz	short checknotready ; no, try not ready
  9548                                  
  9549                                  ; at this point, we know we have an error. the converse is not true
  9550                                  
  9551 00000279 B009                    		mov	al, 9		; error_I24_out_of_paper
  9552                                  					; first, assume	out of paper
  9553 0000027B F6C420                  		test	ah, 20h		; out of paper set?
  9554 0000027E 7502                    		jnz	short ret1	; yes, error is	set
  9555 00000280 FEC0                    		inc	al		; return al=10 (i/o error)
  9556                                  ret1:					
  9557 00000282 C3                      		retn
  9558                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9559                                  
  9560                                  checknotready:				
  9561 00000283 B002                    		mov	al, 2		; assume not-ready
  9562 00000285 F6C401                  		test	ah, 1
  9563 00000288 C3                      		retn
  9564                                  
  9565                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9566                                  
  9567                                  ;************************************************************************
  9568                                  ;*									*
  9569                                  ;*	prn_tilbusy - output until busy. Used by print spooler.		*
  9570                                  ;*		     this entry point should never block waiting for	*
  9571                                  ;*		     device to come ready.				*
  9572                                  ;*									*
  9573                                  ;*	inputs:	cx = count, es:di -> buffer				*
  9574                                  ;*	outputs: set the number of bytes transferred in the		*
  9575                                  ;*		 device driver request packet				*
  9576                                  ;*									*
  9577                                  ;************************************************************************
  9578                                  
  9579                                  		; 19/10/2022
  9580                                  prn_tilbusy:				; 2C7h:28Bh = 70h:27FBh
  9581 00000289 89FE                    		mov	si, di		; everything is	set for	lodsb
  9582                                  prn_tilbloop:				
  9583 0000028B 51                      		push	cx
  9584 0000028C 53                      		push	bx
  9585 0000028D 30FF                    		xor	bh, bh
  9586 0000028F 8A1E[E004]              		mov	bl, [printdev]
  9587 00000293 D1E3                    		shl	bx, 1
  9588                                  		;mov	cx, ds:wait_count[bx] ;	wait count times to come ready
  9589 00000295 8B8F[E104]              		mov	cx, [wait_count+bx]
  9590 00000299 5B                      		pop	bx
  9591                                  prn_getstat:				
  9592 0000029A E8BFFF                  		call	prnstat		; get status
  9593 0000029D 7514                    		jnz	short prn_bperr	; error
  9594 0000029F F6C480                  		test	ah, 80h		; ready	yet?
  9595 000002A2 E1F6                    		loope	prn_getstat	; no, go for more
  9596 000002A4 59                      		pop	cx		; get original count
  9597 000002A5 740D                    		jz	short prn_berr	; still	not ready => done
  9598 000002A7 26                      		es
  9599 000002A8 AC                      		lodsb
  9600                                  		;lods	byte ptr es:[si] ; es
  9601                                  					; lodsb
  9602 000002A9 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
  9603 000002AB E8B0FF                  		call	prnop
  9604 000002AE 7504                    		jnz	short prn_berr	; error
  9605 000002B0 E2D9                    		loop	prn_tilbloop
  9606                                  		; 12/12/2022
  9607                                  		; cf=0 (prnop)
  9608                                  		;clc			; normal no-error return
  9609 000002B2 C3                      		retn			;   from device driver
  9610                                  
  9611                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9612                                  
  9613                                  prn_bperr:				
  9614 000002B3 59                      		pop	cx		; restore transfer count from stack
  9615                                  prn_berr:				
  9616 000002B4 E920FE                  		jmp	bc_err_cnt
  9617                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9618                                  
  9619                                  ; 15/10/2022
  9620                                  
  9621                                  ;************************************************************************
  9622                                  ;*									*
  9623                                  ;*	prn_genioctl - get/set printer retry count			*
  9624                                  ;*									*
  9625                                  ;************************************************************************
  9626                                  
  9627                                  ; IOCTL.INC (MSDOS 6.0, 1991)
  9628                                  ; 11/01/2019
  9629                                  
  9630                                  ;********************************;*
  9631                                  ; CHARACTER DEVICES (PRINTERS)	 ;*
  9632                                  ;********************************;*
  9633                                  
  9634                                  ;;RAWIO SUB-FUNCTIONS
  9635                                  ;;get_retry_count equ 65h
  9636                                  ;;set_retry_count equ 45h
  9637                                  
  9638                                  ;;struc A_RETRYCOUNT
  9639                                  ;;.rc_count: resw 1
  9640                                  ;;endstruc
  9641                                  
  9642                                  ;ioc_pc equ 5
  9643                                  
  9644                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9645                                  
  9646                                  		; 19/10/2022
  9647                                  prn_genioctl:				; 2C7h:2BAh = 70h:282Ah
  9648 000002B7 C43E[1200]              		les	di, [ptrsav]
  9649 000002BB 26807D0D05              		cmp	byte [es:di+13], 5 ; [es:di+IOCTL_REQ.MAJORFUNCTION]
  9650                                  					; ioc_pc
  9651 000002C0 7403                    		jz	short prnfunc_ok
  9652                                  
  9653                                  prnfuncerr:				
  9654 000002C2 E910FE                  		jmp	bc_cmderr
  9655                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9656                                  
  9657                                  prnfunc_ok:				
  9658 000002C5 268A450E                		mov	al, [es:di+14]	; [es:di+IOCTL_REQ.MINORFUNCTION]
  9659 000002C9 26C47D13                		les	di, [es:di+19]	; [es:di+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
  9660 000002CD 30FF                    		xor	bh, bh
  9661                                  		;mov	bl, ds:printdev	; get index into retry counts
  9662 000002CF 8A1E[E004]              		mov	bl, [printdev]
  9663 000002D3 D1E3                    		shl	bx, 1
  9664                                  		;mov	cx, ds:wait_count[bx] ;	pull out retry count for device
  9665 000002D5 8B8F[E104]              		mov	cx, [wait_count+bx]
  9666 000002D9 3C65                    		cmp	al, 65h		; get_retry_count
  9667 000002DB 7407                    		jz	short prngetcount
  9668 000002DD 3C45                    		cmp	al, 45h		; set_retry_count
  9669 000002DF 75E1                    		jnz	short prnfuncerr
  9670 000002E1 268B0D                  		mov	cx, [es:di]
  9671                                  prngetcount:				
  9672                                  		;mov	ds:wait_count[bx], cx
  9673 000002E4 898F[E104]              		mov	[wait_count+bx], cx
  9674 000002E8 26890D                  		mov	[es:di], cx	; [es:di+A_RETRYCOUNT.RC_COUNT]
  9675                                  					; return current retry count
  9676                                  		; 12/12/2022
  9677                                  		; cf=0
  9678                                  		;clc
  9679 000002EB C3                      		retn
  9680                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9681                                  
  9682                                  ;************************************************************************
  9683                                  ;*									*

  9710                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9711                                  
  9712                                  ;************************************************************************
  9713                                  ;*									*
  9714                                  ;*	aux port driver code -- "aux" == "com1"				*
  9715                                  ;*									*
  9716                                  ;*	the device driver entry/dispatch code sets up auxnum to		*
  9717                                  ;*	give the com port number to use (0=com1, 1=com2, 2=com3...)	*
  9718                                  ;*									*
  9719                                  ;************************************************************************
  9720                                  
  9721                                  ;	values in ah, requesting function of int 14h in rom bios
  9722                                  
  9723                                  ;auxfunc_send	 equ	1	;transmit
  9724                                  ;auxfunc_receive equ	2	;read
  9725                                  ;auxfunc_status	 equ	3	;request status
  9726                                  
  9727                                  ;	error flags, reported by int 14h, reported in ah:
  9728                                  
  9729                                  ;flag_data_ready equ	01h	;data ready
  9730                                  ;flag_overrun	 equ	02h	;overrun error
  9731                                  ;flag_parity	 equ	04h	;parity error
  9732                                  ;flag_frame	 equ	08h	;framing error
  9733                                  ;flag_break	 equ	10h	;break detect
  9734                                  ;flag_tranhol_emp equ	20h	;transmit holding register empty
  9735                                  ;flag_timeout	 equ	80h	;timeout
  9736                                  
  9737                                  ;	these flags reported in al:
  9738                                  
  9739                                  ;flag_cts	 equ	10h	;clear to send
  9740                                  ;flag_dsr	 equ	20h	;data set ready
  9741                                  ;flag_rec_sig	 equ	80h	;receive line signal detect
  9742                                  
  9743                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9744                                  
  9745                                  ;************************************************************************
  9746                                  ;*									*
  9747                                  ;*	aux_read - read cx bytes from [auxnum] aux port to buffer	*
  9748                                  ;*		   at es:di						*
  9749                                  ;*									*
  9750                                  ;************************************************************************
  9751                                  
  9752                                  aux_read:				; 2C7h:30Dh = 70h:287Dh
  9753                                  		;jcxz	short exvec2
  9754 00000307 E311                    		jcxz	exvec2		; 19/10/2022
  9755 00000309 E87500                  		call	getbx		; put address of auxbuf	in bx
  9756 0000030C 30C0                    		xor	al, al
  9757 0000030E 8607                    		xchg	al, [bx]
  9758 00000310 08C0                    		or	al, al
  9759 00000312 7503                    		jnz	short aux2
  9760                                  aux1:					
  9761 00000314 E80500                  		call	auxin		; get character	from port
  9762                                  					; won't return if error
  9763                                  aux2:					
  9764 00000317 AA                      		stosb
  9765 00000318 E2FA                    		loop	aux1		; if more characters, go around	again
  9766                                  exvec2:					
  9767 0000031A F8                      		clc			; all done, successful exit
  9768                                  auxin_retn:	; 18/12/2022
  9769 0000031B C3                      		retn
  9770                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9771                                  
  9772                                  ;************************************************************************
  9773                                  ;*									*
  9774                                  ;*	auxin - call rom bios to read character from aux port		*
  9775                                  ;*		if error occurs, map the error and return one		*
  9776                                  ;*		level up to device driver exit code, setting		*
  9777                                  ;*		the number of bytes transferred appropriately		*
  9778                                  ;*									*
  9779                                  ;************************************************************************
  9780                                  
  9781                                  auxin:					
  9782 0000031C B402                    		mov	ah, 2		; auxfunc_receive
  9783 0000031E E83A00                  		call	auxop
  9784 00000321 F6C40E                  		test	ah, 0Eh		; flag_frame|flag_parity|flag_overrun
  9785                                  		;jnz	short arbad	; skip if any error bits set
  9786                                  		;retn
  9787                                  		; 25/06/2023 (BugFix)
  9788 00000324 74F5                    		jz	short auxin_retn
  9789                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9790                                  
  9791                                  arbad:					
  9792 00000326 58                      		pop	ax		; remove return	address	(near call)
  9793                                  		;xor	al, al
  9794                                  		;or	al, 0B0h	; flag_rec_sig|	flag_dsr|flag_cts
  9795                                  		; 11/08/2023
  9796 00000327 B0B0                    		mov	al, 0B0h	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:0334h
  9797 00000329 E9ABFD                  		jmp	bc_err_cnt
  9798                                  
  9799                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9800                                  
  9801                                  ;************************************************************************
  9802                                  ;*									*
  9803                                  ;*	aux_rdnd - non-destructive aux port read			*
  9804                                  ;*									*
  9805                                  ;************************************************************************
  9806                                  
  9807                                  aux_rdnd:				; 2C7h:335h = 70h:28A5h
  9808 0000032C E85200                  		call	getbx
  9809 0000032F 8A07                    		mov	al, [bx]	; have bx point	to auxbuf
  9810 00000331 08C0                    		or	al, al		; if al	is non-zero (char in buffer)
  9811 00000333 7511                    		jnz	short auxdrx	; then return character
  9812 00000335 E82100                  		call	auxstat		; if not, get status of	aux device
  9813 00000338 F6C401                  		test	ah, 1		; flag_data_ready - test data ready
  9814 0000033B 740C                    		jz	short auxbus	; then device is busy (not ready)
  9815 0000033D A820                    		test	al, 20h		; flag_dsr - test data set ready
  9816 0000033F 7408                    		jz	short auxbus	; then device is busy (not ready)
  9817 00000341 E8D8FF                  		call	auxin		; else aux is ready, get character
  9818 00000344 8807                    		mov	[bx], al
  9819                                  auxdrx:					
  9820 00000346 E9A9FE                  		jmp	rdexit		; return busy status

  9826                                  
  9827                                  ;************************************************************************

  9832

  9836 00000351 74F6                    		jz	short auxbus	; then device is busy (not ready)
  9837 00000353 F6C420                  		test	ah, 20h		; flag_tranhol_emp - test transmit hold	reg empty
  9838 00000356 74F1                    		jz	short auxbus	; then device is busy (not ready)
  9839                                  		; 12/12/2022

  9841                                  		;clc

  9844                                  
  9845                                  ;************************************************************************
  9846                                  ;*									*
  9847                                  ;*	auxstat - call rom bios to determine aux port status		*
  9848                                  ;*									*
  9849                                  ;*	exit:	ax = status						*
  9850                                  ;*		dx = [auxnum]						*
  9851                                  ;*									*
  9852                                  ;************************************************************************
  9853                                  
  9854                                  auxstat:				
  9855 00000359 B403                    		mov	ah, 3		; auxfunc_status
  9856                                  
  9857                                  		; fall into auxop
  9858                                  
  9859                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  9860                                  
  9861                                  ;************************************************************************
  9862                                  ;*									*
  9863                                  ;*	auxop - perform rom-biox aux port interrupt			*
  9864                                  ;*									*
  9865                                  ;*	entry:	ah = int 14h function number				*
  9866                                  ;*	exit:	ax = results						*
  9867                                  ;*		dx = [auxnum]						*

  9871                                  auxop:		; proc near		
  9872 0000035B 8B16[2100]              		mov	dx, [auxnum]	; ah=function code
  9873                                  					; 0=init, 1=send, 2=receive, 3=status
  9874                                  					; get port number
  9875 0000035F CD14                    		int	14h		; SERIAL I/O - GET USART STATUS
  9876                                  					; DX = port number (0-3)
  9877                                  					; Return: AX = port status code
  9878 00000361 C3                      		retn
  9879                                  
  9880                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9881                                  
  9882                                  ;************************************************************************
  9883                                  ;*									*
  9884                                  ;*	aux_flsh - flush aux input buffer - set contents of		*
  9885                                  ;*		   auxbuf [auxnum] to zero				*
  9886                                  ;*									*
  9887                                  ;*	cas - shouldn't this code call the rom bios input function	*
  9888                                  ;*	      repeatedly until it isn't ready?  to flush out any	*
  9889                                  ;*	      pending serial input queue if there's a tsr like MODE	*
  9890                                  ;*	      which is providing interrupt-buffering of aux port?	*
  9891                                  ;*									*
  9892                                  ;************************************************************************
  9893                                  
  9894                                  aux_flsh:				; 2C7h:36Ch = 70h:28DCh
  9895 00000362 E81C00                  		call	getbx		; flush	aux input buffer
  9896 00000365 C60700                  		mov	byte [bx], 0	; get bx to point to auxbuf
  9897                                  					; zero out buffer
  9898                                  		;clc			; all done, successful return
  9899                                  		; 12/12/2022
  9900                                  		; cf=0 ('add' instruction in 'getbx')
  9901 00000368 C3                      		retn

  9915                                  					; move di pointer to next character

  9922 0000037B E959FD                  		jmp	bc_err_cnt	; call error routines

  9928                                  		;clc			; all done, successful return
  9929                                  		; 12/12/2022
  9930                                  		; cf=0 (test instruction above)	
  9931 00000380 C3                      		retn

  9955                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------
  9956                                  ;								:
  9957                                  ;		    clock device driver 			:
  9958                                  ;								:
  9959                                  ;								:
  9960                                  ;   this file contains the clock device driver. 		:
  9961                                  ;								:
  9962                                  ;   the routines in this files are:				:
  9963                                  ;								:
  9964                                  ;	routine 		function			:
  9965                                  ;	------- 		--------			:
  9966                                  ;	tim_writ		set the current time		:
  9967                                  ;	tim_read		read the current time		:
  9968                                  ;	time_to_ticks		convert time to corresponding	:
  9969                                  ;				  number of clock ticks 	:
  9970                                  ;								:
  9971                                  ; the clock ticks at the rate of:				:
  9972                                  ;								:
  9973                                  ;	1193180/65536 ticks/second (about 18.2 ticks per second):
  9974                                  ; see each routine for information on the use.			:
  9975                                  ;								:
  9976                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------
  9977                                  
  9978                                  ; convert time to ticks
  9979                                  ; input : time in cx and dx
  9980                                  ; ticks returned in cx:dx
  9981                                  
  9982                                  ;19/07/2019
  9983                                  ;09/03/2019
  9984                                  
  9985                                  time_to_ticks:				; 0070h:2906h =	02C7h:0396h
  9986                                  
  9987                                  ; first convert from hour,min,sec,hund. to
  9988                                  ; total number of 100th of seconds
  9989                                  
  9990 0000038A B03C                    		mov	al, 60
  9991 0000038C F6E5                    		mul	ch		; hours	to minutes
  9992 0000038E B500                    		mov	ch, 0
  9993 00000390 01C8                    		add	ax, cx		; total	minutes
  9994 00000392 B97017                  		mov	cx, 6000	; 60*100
  9995 00000395 89D3                    		mov	bx, dx		; get out of the way of	the multiply
  9996 00000397 F7E1                    		mul	cx		; convert to 1/100 sec
  9997 00000399 89C1                    		mov	cx, ax
  9998 0000039B B064                    		mov	al, 100
  9999 0000039D F6E7                    		mul	bh		; convert seconds to 1/100 sec
 10000 0000039F 01C1                    		add	cx, ax		; combine seconds with hours and min
 10001 000003A1 83D200                  		adc	dx, 0		; ripple carry
 10002 000003A4 B700                    		mov	bh, 0
 10003 000003A6 01D9                    		add	cx, bx		; combine 1/100	sec
 10004 000003A8 83D200                  		adc	dx, 0
 10005                                  
 10006                                  	; dx:cx is time in 1/100 sec
 10007                                  
 10008 000003AB 92                      		xchg	ax, dx
 10009 000003AC 91                      		xchg	ax, cx		; now time is in cx:ax
 10010 000003AD BB0BE9                  		mov	bx, 59659
 10011 000003B0 F7E3                    		mul	bx		; multiply low half
 10012 000003B2 87CA                    		xchg	dx, cx
 10013 000003B4 92                      		xchg	ax, dx		; cx->ax, ax->dx, dx->cx
 10014 000003B5 F7E3                    		mul	bx		; multiply high	half
 10015 000003B7 01C8                    		add	ax, cx		; combine overlapping products
 10016 000003B9 83D200                  		adc	dx, 0
 10017 000003BC 92                      		xchg	ax, dx		; ax:dx=time*59659
 10018 000003BD BB0500                  		mov	bx, 5
 10019 000003C0 F6F3                    		div	bl		; divide high half by 5
 10020 000003C2 88C1                    		mov	cl, al
 10021 000003C4 B500                    		mov	ch, 0
 10022 000003C6 88E0                    		mov	al, ah		; remainder of divide-by-5
 10023 000003C8 98                      		cbw
 10024 000003C9 92                      		xchg	ax, dx		; use it to extend low half
 10025 000003CA F7F3                    		div	bx		; divide low half by 5
 10026 000003CC 89C2                    		mov	dx, ax		; cx:dx	is now number of ticks in time
 10027 000003CE CB                      		retf			; far return
 10028

 10039                                  ;
 10040                                  ;	number of days since 1-1-80	(word)
 10041                                  ;	minutes (0-59)			(byte)
 10042                                  ;	hours (0-23)			(byte)
 10043                                  ;	hundredths of seconds (0-99)	(byte)
 10044                                  ;	seconds (0-59)			(byte)

 10047                                  ;
 10048                                  ;	NOTE: Any changes in this routine probably require corresponding
 10049                                  ;	changes in the version that is built with the power manager driver.
 10050                                  ;	See ptime.asm.

 10067                                  		;;call	ds:bintobcd	; call far [bintobcd]

 10080

 10082 000003F5 B200                    		mov	dl, 0		; dl = 0 (st) or 1 (dst)

 10086                                  					; CH = hours in	BCD, CL	= minutes in BCD

 10088                                  					; Return: CMOS clock set
