 12088                                  ; we have to go	to the block_floppy below to break up the operation.
 12089                                  
 12090 00000AA5 F606[1E05]80            		test	byte [multrk_flag], 80h
 12091                                  		;test	byte ptr ds:multrk_flag, 80h ; multrk_on
 12092 00000AAA 7406                    		jz	short block_floppy
 12093 00000AAC E82800                  		call	Disk
 12094 00000AAF 31C0                    		xor	ax, ax
 12095 00000AB1 C3                      		retn
 12096                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12097                                  
 12098                                  block_floppy:
 12099                                  
 12100                                  ; read at most 1 track worth. perform minimization at sector / track
 12101                                  				
 12102 00000AB2 268A4D13                		mov	cl, [es:di+19]	; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 12103                                  		;inc	cl
 12104                                  		; 23/12/2023
 12105 00000AB6 41                      		inc	cx
 12106 00000AB7 2A0E[3101]              		sub	cl, [cursec]
 12107 00000ABB 30ED                    		xor	ch, ch
 12108 00000ABD 39C8                    		cmp	ax, cx
 12109 00000ABF 7302                    		jnb	short gotmin
 12110 00000AC1 89C1                    		mov	cx, ax
 12111                                  gotmin:
 12112                                  
 12113                                  ; ax is the requested number of sectors to read
 12114                                  ; cx is the number that we can do on this track
 12115                                  
 12116 00000AC3 50                      		push	ax
 12117 00000AC4 51                      		push	cx
 12118 00000AC5 89C8                    		mov	ax, cx
 12119 00000AC7 E80D00                  		call	Disk
 12120 00000ACA 59                      		pop	cx
 12121 00000ACB 58                      		pop	ax
 12122                                  
 12123                                  ; cx is the number of sectors just transferred
 12124                                  
 12125 00000ACC 29C8                    		sub	ax, cx		; reduce sectors-remaining by last i/o
 12126 00000ACE D0E1                    		shl	cl, 1
 12127 00000AD0 00CF                    		add	bh, cl		; adjust transfer address
 12128 00000AD2 EBC6                    		jmp	short block
 12129                                  dskerr_brdg:
 12130 00000AD4 E9EA00                  		jmp	dskerr
 12131                                  
 12132                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12133                                  
 12134                                  ; 15/10/2022
 12135                                  
 12136                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 12137                                  ;perform disk i/o with retries
 12138                                  ; al = number of sectors (1-8, all on one track)
 12139                                  ; es:di point to drive parameters
 12140                                  ; xfer_seg:bx = transfer address 
 12141                                  ;		(must not cross a 64k physical boundary)
 12142                                  ; [rflag] = 2 if read, 3 if write
 12143                                  ; [verify] = 0 for normal, 1 for verify after write
 12144                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 12145                                  
 12146                                  		; 18/04/2024
 12147                                  		; 23/12/2023
 12148                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12149                                  Disk:
 12150                                  
 12151                                  ; Check for hard disk format and
 12152                                  ; if TRUE then set max error count to 2
 12153                                  
 12154 00000AD7 BD0500                  		mov	bp, 5		; MAXERR
 12155                                  					; set up retry count
 12156                                  		;; 23/12/2023
 12157                                  		;mov	cl, [es:di+23h]
 12158                                  		;and	cx, 1
 12159                                  		; 18/04/2024
 12160 00000ADA 26F6452301              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 1
 12161                                  					; [es:di+BDS.flags], fnon_removable
 12162 00000ADF 7408                    		jz	short GetRdWrInd
 12163 00000AE1 80FC04                  		cmp	ah, 4		; romverify ; Is this a	track verify?
 12164 00000AE4 7403                    		jz	short GetRdWrInd
 12165 00000AE6 BD0200                  		mov	bp, 2		; This is not verify so only 1 retry
 12166                                  GetRdWrInd:				
 12167 00000AE9 892E[2105]              		mov	[vretry_cnt], bp ; verify op. retry cnt for write-verify
 12168 00000AED 892E[2305]              		mov	[soft_ecc_cnt], bp ; soft ecc error retry count.
 12169 00000AF1 8A26[2001]              		mov	ah, [rflag]	; get read/write indicator
 12170                                  ;retry:
 12171                                  ; 09/12/2022
 12172                                  _retry:
 12173 00000AF5 50                      		push	ax
 12174 00000AF6 8B16[3301]              		mov	dx, [curtrk]
 12175                                  		
 12176                                  		;; 23/12/2023
 12177                                  		;jcxz	disk_not_mini
 12178                                  		; 18/04/2024
 12179 00000AFA 26F6452301              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 1
 12180 00000AFF 740B                    		jz	short disk_not_mini
 12181                                  		
 12182 00000B01 26837D4701              		cmp	word [es:di+47h], 1 ; [es:di+BDS.bdsm_ismini]
 12183                                  					; is this a mini disk? ((logical dos partition))
 12184 00000B06 7504                    		jnz	short disk_not_mini ; no. continue to next.
 12185 00000B08 26035549                		add	dx, [es:di+49h]	; [es:di+BDS.bdsm_hidden_trks]
 12186                                  					; add hidden trks.
 12187                                  disk_not_mini:
 12188 00000B0C D0CE                    		ror	dh, 1
 12189 00000B0E D0CE                    		ror	dh, 1
 12190 00000B10 0A36[3101]              		or	dh, [cursec]
 12191 00000B14 89D1                    		mov	cx, dx
 12192 00000B16 86CD                    		xchg	ch, cl		;  cl =	sector,	ch = cylinder
 12193 00000B18 8A36[3201]              		mov	dh, [curhd]	; load current head number and
 12194 00000B1C 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; physical drive number
 12195                                  					; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 12196 00000B20 26807D2205              		cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 5 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor], ffHardFile
 12197 00000B25 7411                    		jz	short do_fast	; hard files use fast speed
 12198                                  
 12199                                  ; if we have [step_drv] set to -1, we use the slow settle time.
 12200                                  ; this helps when we have just done a reset disk operation and the head has
 12201                                  ; been moved to another cylinder - the problem crops up with 3.5" drives.
 12202                                  
 12203 00000B27 803E[7600]FF            		cmp	byte [step_drv], 0FFh ; -1
 12204                                  		;jz	short do_writej
 12205                                  		; 23/12/2023
 12206 00000B2C 7460                    		jz	short do_write
 12207 00000B2E 80FC02                  		cmp	ah, 2		; romread
 12208 00000B31 7405                    		jz	short do_fast
 12209 00000B33 80FC04                  		cmp	ah, 4		; romverify
 12210                                  		;jz	short do_fast
 12211                                  		; 23/12/2023
 12212 00000B36 7556                    		jnz	short do_write
 12213                                  ;do_writej:
 12214                                  
 12215                                  ; reads always fast, unless we have just done a disk reset operation
 12216                                  			
 12217                                  		;jmp	short do_write	; reads	always fast
 12218                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12219                                  
 12220                                  do_fast:
 12221 00000B38 E8FB00                  		call	fastspeed	; change settle	mode
 12222                                  testerr:
 12223 00000B3B 7297                    		jb	short dskerr_brdg
 12224                                  
 12225                                  ; set drive and track of last access
 12226                                  
 12227 00000B3D 8816[7600]              		mov	[step_drv], dl
 12228 00000B41 26886D46                		mov	[es:di+46h], ch	; [es:di+BDS.track]
 12229                                  no_set:
 12230                                  		;cmp	word [wrtverify], 103h
 12231 00000B45 813E[2001]0301          		cmp	word [rflag], 103h ; check for write and verify
 12232 00000B4B 7452                    		jz	short doverify
 12233                                  noverify:
 12234 00000B4D 58                      		pop	ax
 12235                                  
 12236                                  ; check the flags word in the bds to see if the drive is non removable
 12237                                  ; if not we needn't do anything special
 12238                                  ; if it is a hard disk then check to see if multi-track operation
 12239                                  ; is specified. if specified we don't have to calculate for the next
 12240                                  ; track since we are already done. so we can go to the exit of this routine.
 12241                                  
 12242 00000B4E 26F6452301              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 1 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12243                                  					; fnon_removable
 12244 00000B53 7407                    		jz	short its_removable
 12245 00000B55 F606[1E05]80            		test	byte [multrk_flag], 80h ; multrk_on
 12246 00000B5A 7530                    		jnz	short disk_ret
 12247                                  its_removable:
 12248 00000B5C 80E13F                  		and	cl, 3Fh		; eliminate cylinder bits from sector
 12249 00000B5F 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
 12250 00000B61 2906[2201]              		sub	[seccnt], ax	; reduce count of sectors to go	next sector
 12251 00000B65 00C1                    		add	cl, al
 12252 00000B67 880E[3101]              		mov	[cursec], cl
 12253 00000B6B 263A4D13                		cmp	cl, [es:di+13h]	; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 12254                                  					; see if sector/track limit reached
 12255 00000B6F 761B                    		jbe	short disk_ret
 12256 00000B71 C606[3101]01            		mov	byte [cursec], 1 ; start with first sector of next track
 12257 00000B76 8A36[3201]              		mov	dh, [curhd]
 12258 00000B7A FEC6                    		inc	dh
 12259 00000B7C 263A7515                		cmp	dh, [es:di+15h]	; [es:di+BDS.heads]
 12260 00000B80 7206                    		jb	short noxor
 12261 00000B82 30F6                    		xor	dh, dh
 12262 00000B84 FF06[3301]              		inc	word [curtrk]
 12263                                  noxor:
 12264 00000B88 8836[3201]              		mov	[curhd], dh
 12265                                  disk_ret:
 12266 00000B8C F8                      		clc
 12267 00000B8D C3                      		retn
 12268                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12269                                  
 12270                                  ; 15/10/2022
 12271                                  
 12272                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 12273                                  ; the request is for write. determine if we are talking about
 12274                                  ; the same track and drive. if so, use the fast speed.
 12275                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 12276                                  
 12277                                  do_write:
 12278 00000B8E 3A16[7600]              		cmp	dl, [step_drv]
 12279 00000B92 7506                    		jnz	short do_norm	; we have changed drives
 12280 00000B94 263A6D46                		cmp	ch, [es:di+46h]	; [es:di+BDS.track]
 12281 00000B98 749E                    		jz	short do_fast	; we are still on the same track
 12282                                  do_norm:
 12283 00000B9A E87500                  		call	normspeed
 12284 00000B9D EB9C                    		jmp	short testerr
 12285                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12286                                  
 12287                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 12288                                  ; we have a verify request also. get state info and go verify
 12289                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 12290                                  
 12291                                  doverify:
 12292 00000B9F 58                      		pop	ax
 12293 00000BA0 50                      		push	ax
 12294 00000BA1 B404                    		mov	ah, 4
 12295 00000BA3 E89000                  		call	fastspeed
 12296 00000BA6 73A5                    		jnb	short noverify
 12297                                  
 12298                                  ; check the error returned in ah to see if it is a soft ecc error.
 12299                                  ; if it is not we needn't do anything special. if it is a soft
 12300                                  ; ecc error then decrement the soft_ecc_cnt error retry count. if
 12301                                  ; this retry count becomes 0 then we just ignore the error and go to
 12302                                  ; no_verify but if we can still try then we call the routine to reset
 12303                                  ; the disk and go to dskerr1 to retry the operation.
 12304                                  
 12305 00000BA8 80FC11                  		cmp	ah, 11h		; soft ecc error ?
 12306 00000BAB 750B                    		jnz	short not_softecc_err
 12307 00000BAD FF0E[2305]              		dec	word [soft_ecc_cnt]
 12308 00000BB1 749A                    		jz	short noverify	; no more retry
 12309 00000BB3 E83305                  		call	ResetDisk	; reset	disk
 12310 00000BB6 EB3E                    		jmp	short dskerr1	; retry
 12311                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12312                                  
 12313                                  not_softecc_err:			; other error.
 12314 00000BB8 E82E05                  		call	ResetDisk
 12315 00000BBB FF0E[2105]              		dec	word [vretry_cnt]
 12316 00000BBF EB1C                    		jmp	short dskerr0
 12317                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12318                                  
 12319                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 12320                                  ; need to special case the change-line error ah=06h.
 12321                                  ; if we get this, we need to return it.
 12322                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 12323                                  
 12324                                  dskerr:
 12325 00000BC1 803E[7700]00            		cmp	byte [fhave96], 0 ; do we have changeline support?
 12326 00000BC6 7403                    		jz	short dskerr_nochangeline ; brif not
 12327 00000BC8 E8F80C                  		call	checkio
 12328                                  dskerr_nochangeline:
 12329 00000BCB 803E[2505]01            		cmp	byte [multitrk_format_flag], 1 ; multi trk format request?
 12330 00000BD0 7508                    		jnz	short dochkagain ; no more retry.
 12331 00000BD2 BD0100                  		mov	bp, 1
 12332 00000BD5 C606[2505]00            		mov	byte [multitrk_format_flag], 0 ; clear the flag.
 12333                                  dochkagain:
 12334 00000BDA E8A900                  		call	again
 12335                                  dskerr0:
 12336 00000BDD 7420                    		jz	short harderr
 12337 00000BDF 26F6452301              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 1 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12338                                  					; fnon_removable
 12339 00000BE4 7505                    		jnz	short skip_timeout_chk
 12340 00000BE6 80FC80                  		cmp	ah, 80h		; timeout?
 12341 00000BE9 7414                    		jz	short harderr
 12342                                  skip_timeout_chk:
 12343 00000BEB 80FCCC                  		cmp	ah, 0CCh	; write	fault error?
 12344 00000BEE 740A                    		jz	short write_fault_err ;	then, don't retry.
 12345 00000BF0 C706[2305]0500          		mov	word [soft_ecc_cnt], 5 ; MAXERR
 12346                                  					; set soft_ecc_cnt back	to maxerr
 12347                                  dskerr1:
 12348 00000BF6 58                      		pop	ax		; restore sector count
 12349                                  		;jmp	retry
 12350                                  		; 09/12/2022
 12351 00000BF7 E9FBFE                  		jmp	_retry
 12352                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12353                                  
 12354                                  write_fault_err:
 12355 00000BFA BD0100                  		mov	bp, 1		; just retry only once
 12356                                  					; for write fault error.
 12357 00000BFD EBF7                    		jmp	short dskerr1
 12358                                  
 12359                                  		; fall into harderr
 12360                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12361                                  
 12362                                  ; entry point for routines that call maperror themselves
 12363                                  
 12364                                  harderr:
 12365 00000BFF E84C00                  		call	maperror
 12366                                  harderr2:
 12367 00000C02 C606[1E01]FF            		mov	byte [tim_drv], 0FFh
 12368                                  					; force a media check through rom
 12369 00000C07 8B0E[2201]              		mov	cx, [seccnt]	; get count of sectors to go
 12370 00000C0B 8B26[3501]              		mov	sp, [spsav]	; recover entry	stack pointer
 12371                                  
 12372                                  ; since we are performing a non-local goto, restore the disk parameters
 12373                                  
 12374                                  		;jmp	diddleback
 12375                                  		; 09/12/2022
 12376 00000C0F E916FE                  		jmp	diddle_back
 12377                                  
 12378                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12379                                  
 12380                                  ; change settle value from settlecurrent to whatever is appropriate
 12381                                  ; note that this routine is never called for a fixed disk.
 12382                                  
 12383                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12384                                  normspeed:
 12385 00000C12 803E[2706]00            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 0
 12386 00000C17 751D                    		jnz	short fastspeed
 12387 00000C19 06                      		push	es
 12388 00000C1A 50                      		push	ax
 12389 00000C1B A0[2801]                		mov	al, [settleslow]
 12390 00000C1E C436[2D01]              		les	si, [dpt]	; current disk parm table
 12391 00000C22 26884409                		mov	[es:si+9], al	; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 12392 00000C26 58                      		pop	ax
 12393 00000C27 07                      		pop	es
 12394 00000C28 E80B00                  		call	fastspeed
 12395                                  		; 24/12/2023
 12396                                  		;push	es
 12397                                  		;les	si, [dpt]
 12398                                  		;mov	byte [es:si+9], 1 ; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 12399                                  		;			; 1 is fast settle value
 12400                                  		;pop	es
 12401 00000C2B 1E                      		push	ds
 12402 00000C2C C536[2D01]              		lds	si, [dpt]
 12403 00000C30 C6440901                		mov	byte [si+9], 1
 12404 00000C34 1F                      		pop	ds
 12405                                  
 12406 00000C35 C3                      		retn
 12407                                  
 12408                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12409                                  
 12410                                  ; if the drive has been marked as too big (i.e. starting sector of the
 12411                                  ; partition is > 16 bits, then always return drive not ready.
 12412                                  
 12413                                  fastspeed:
 12414 00000C36 26F6451F80              		test	byte [es:di+1Fh], 80h ; [es:di+BDS.fatsiz]
 12415                                  					; ftoobig
 12416 00000C3B 750D                    		jnz	short notready
 12417 00000C3D 06                      		push	es
 12418 00000C3E 8E06[2605]              		mov	es, [xfer_seg]
 12419 00000C42 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK -
 12420 00000C44 8C06[2605]              		mov	[xfer_seg], es
 12421 00000C48 07                      		pop	es
 12422 00000C49 C3                      		retn
 12423                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12424                                  
 12425                                  notready:
 12426 00000C4A F9                      		stc
 12427 00000C4B B480                    		mov	ah, 80h
 12428 00000C4D C3                      		retn
 12429                                  
 12430                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12431                                  
 12432                                  ; map error returned by rom in ah into corresponding code to be returned to
 12433                                  ; dos in al. trashes di. guaranteed to set carry.
 12434                                  
 12435                                  maperror:
 12436 00000C4E 51                      		push	cx
 12437 00000C4F 06                      		push	es
 12438 00000C50 1E                      		push	ds		; set es=Bios_Data
 12439 00000C51 07                      		pop	es
 12440 00000C52 88E0                    		mov	al, ah		; put error code in al
 12441 00000C54 A2[4401]                		mov	[lsterr], al	; terminate list with error code
 12442                                  		;mov	cx, 11 ; PCDOS 7.1 ; 02/09/2023
 12443 00000C57 B90900                  		mov	cx, 9		; numerr (= errout-errin)
 12444                                  					; number of possible error conditions
 12445 00000C5A BF[3C01]                		mov	di, errin	; point to error conditions
 12446 00000C5D F2AE                    		repne scasb
 12447                                  		; 02/09/2023
 12448                                  		;mov	al, [di+10] ; PCDOS 7.1
 12449                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12450 00000C5F 8A4508                  		mov	al, [di+8]	; [di+numerr-1]
 12451                                  					; get translation
 12452                                  		; 19/10/2022 - Temporary ! 
 12453                                  		;db	8Ah, 85h, 8, 0	; mov al, [di+8]
 12454 00000C62 07                      		pop	es
 12455 00000C63 59                      		pop	cx
 12456 00000C64 F9                      		stc			; flag error condition
 12457 00000C65 C3                      		retn
 12458                                  
 12459                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12460                                  
 12461                                  ; set the time of last access for this drive.
 12462                                  ; this is done only for removable media. es:di -> bds
 12463                                  
 12464                                  set_tim:
 12465 00000C66 50                      		push	ax
 12466 00000C67 E8B1F8                  		call	GetTickCnt	; Does INT 1A ah=0 & updates daycnt
 12467                                  
 12468                                  ; we have the new time. if we see that the time has passed,
 12469                                  ; then we reset the threshold counter...
 12470                                  
 12471 00000C6A 263B5547                		cmp	dx, [es:di+47h]	; [es:di+BDS.tim_lo]
 12472 00000C6E 7506                    		jnz	short setaccess
 12473 00000C70 263B4D49                		cmp	cx, [es:di+49h]	; [es:di+BDS.tim_hi]
 12474                                  		;jz	short done_set
 12475                                  		; 12/12/2022
 12476 00000C74 740E                    		je	short done_set2
 12477                                  setaccess:
 12478 00000C76 C606[1D01]00            		mov	byte [accesscount], 0
 12479 00000C7B 26895547                		mov	[es:di+47h], dx	; [es:di+BDS.tim_lo]
 12480 00000C7F 26894D49                		mov	[es:di+49h], cx	; [es:di+BDS.tim_hi]
 12481                                  done_set:
 12482 00000C83 F8                      		clc
 12483                                  done_set2:		; 12/12/2022
 12484 00000C84 58                      		pop	ax
 12485 00000C85 C3                      		retn
 12486                                  
 12487                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12488                                  
 12489                                  ; this routine is called if an error occurs while formatting or verifying.
 12490                                  ; it resets the drive,and decrements the retry count.
 12491                                  ; on entry - ds:di - points to bds for the drive
 12492                                  ;	     bp    - contains retry count
 12493                                  ; on exit    flags indicate result of decrementing retry count
 12494                                  
 12495                                  again:	
 12496 00000C86 E86004                  		call	ResetDisk
 12497 00000C89 80FC06                  		cmp	ah, 6
 12498 00000C8C 7402                    		jz	short dont_dec_retry_count ; If	it is a	media change error
 12499                                  					; do not decrement retry count.
 12500 00000C8E 4D                      		dec	bp		; decrement retry count
 12501 00000C8F C3                      		retn
 12502                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12503                                  
 12504                                  dont_dec_retry_count:
 12505 00000C90 08E4                    		or	ah, ah
 12506 00000C92 C3                      		retn
 12507

 12518                                  ;
 12519                                  ; NOTE: GetAccessFlag/SetAccessFlag is unpublished function.
 12520                                  ;
 12521                                  ;      This function is intended to give the user to control the
 12522                                  ;      bds table flags of unformatted_media bit.
 12523                                  ;      GetAccessFlag will show the status -
 12524                                  ;	 a_DiskAccess_Control.dac_access_flag = 0 disk i/o not allowed
 12525                                  ;						1 disk i/o allowed
 12526                                  ;      SetAccessFlag will set/reset the unformatted_media bit in flags -
 12527                                  ;	 a_DiskAccess_Control.dac_access_flag = 0 allow disk i/o
 12528                                  ;						1 disallow disk i/o
 12529                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12530                                  
 12531                                  		; generic ioctl dispatch tables
 12532                                  
 12533                                  ; BIOSCODE:0C3Ch (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)

 12536 00000C93 00                      		db 0
 12537

 12612                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12613                                  ; Do_Generic_IOCtl: perform generic ioctl request
 12614                                  ;
 12615                                  ;    input: AL contains logical drive
 12616                                  ;
 12617                                  ;	functions are dispatched through a call. On return, carry indicates
 12618                                  ;	error code in al. Note::bES:b& ds undefined on return from
 12619                                  ;	subfunctions.
 12620                                  ;
 12621                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12622                                  
 12623                                  ; 11/03/2019
 12624                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12625                                  do_generic_ioctl:			; 2C7h:0C6Bh = 70h:31DBh
 12626 00000CC3 E8A4F8                  		call	SetDrive	; ES:DI	Points to bds for drive
 12627 00000CC6 06                      		push	es
 12628 00000CC7 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]	; ES:BX	Points to request header
 12629 00000CCB 26807F0D08              		cmp	byte [es:bx+0Dh], 8 ; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.MAJORFUNCTION]
 12630                                  					; RAWIO
 12631 00000CD0 268A470E                		mov	al, [es:bx+0Eh]	; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.MINORFUNCTION]
 12632 00000CD4 07                      		pop	es
 12633 00000CD5 7525                    		jnz	short IoctlFuncErr
 12634                                  
 12635                                  		; cas note: Could do the above two blocks in reverse order.
 12636                                  		; Would have to preserve al for SetDrive
 12637                                  
 12638                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12639 00000CD7 BE[940C]                		mov	si, IoReadJumpTable
 12640                                  		;mov	si, 0C3Ch	; IoReadJumpTable
 12641                                  					; at 2C7h:0C3Ch	= 70h:31ACh
 12642 00000CDA A820                    		test	al, 20h		; GEN_IOCTL_FN_TST ; test of req. function
 12643 00000CDC 7503                    		jnz	short NotGenericWrite ; function is a read.
 12644                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12645 00000CDE BE[A70C]                		mov	si, IoWriteJumpTable
 12646                                  		;mov	si, 0C4Fh	; IoWriteJumpTable
 12647                                  					; at 2C7h:0C4Fh	= 70h:31BFh
 12648                                  NotGenericWrite:

 12653 00000CEA 98                      		cbw
 12654 00000CEB D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1
 12655 00000CED 46                      		inc	si
 12656 00000CEE 01C6                    		add	si, ax

 12658                                  		;call	word ptr cs:[si]
 12659 00000CF3 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]
 12660                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:Bios_Data_Word]
 12661                                  					; 2C7h:30h = 70h:25A0h
 12662 00000CF8 B481                    		mov	ah, 81h		; Return this status in	case of	carry
 12663 00000CFA C3                      		retn			; Pass carry flag through to exit code

 12908                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12909                                  
 12910                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12911                                  ; FormatTrack:
 12912                                  ; if specialfunction byte is 1,then this is a status call to see if there is
 12913                                  ; rom support for the combination of sec/trk and # of cyln,and if the
 12914                                  ; combination is legal. if specialfunction byte is 0,then format the track.
 12915                                  ;
 12916                                  ; input: ES:di points to bds for drive
 12917                                  ;
 12918                                  ; output:
 12919                                  ;	for status call:
 12920                                  ;	specialfunction byte set to:
 12921                                  ;		0 - rom support + legal combination
 12922                                  ;		1 - no rom support
 12923                                  ;		2 - illegal combination
 12924                                  ;		3 - no media present
 12925                                  ;	carry cleared.
 12926                                  ;
 12927                                  ;	for format track:
 12928                                  ;		carry set if error
 12929                                  ;
 12930                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12931                                  
 12932                                  ; 16/03/2019
 12933                                  
 12934                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12935                                  FormatTrack:
 12936 00000E1D C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]
 12937 00000E21 C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; [bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET
 12938 00000E24 F60701                  		test	byte [bx], 1	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_SPECIALFUNCTIONS]
 12939                                  					; STATUS_FOR_FORMAT

 13084                                  		; Check specialfunctions to see if DO_FAST_FORMAT has been
 13085                                  		; specified if not we should go to the normal track verification
 13086                                  		; routine. If fast format has been specified we should get the
 13087                                  		; number of tracks to be verified and check it to see if it is
 13088                                  		; > 255. If it is then it is an error and we should go to
 13089                                  		; VerifyTrack_Err. If not multiply the number of tracks by the
 13090                                  		; sectors per track to get the total number of sectors to be
 13091                                  		; verified. This should also be less than equal to 255
 13092                                  		; otherwise we go to same error exit. If everything is okay

 13199                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 13200                                  
 13201                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13202                                  ;
 13203                                  ; TrackIo:
 13204                                  ;    performs track read/write/verify
 13205                                  ;
 13206                                  ;   input:
 13207                                  ;      rFlag	- 2 = read
 13208                                  ;		  3 = write
 13209                                  ;		  4 = verify
 13210                                  ;      AX	- Index into track table of first sector to io
 13211                                  ;      CX	- Number of sectors to io
 13212                                  ;      Xfer_Seg:BX - Transfer address
 13213                                  ;      ES:DI	- Pointer to bds
 13214                                  ;      CurTrk	- Current cylinder
 13215                                  ;      CurHd	- Current head
 13216                                  ;
 13217                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13218                                  
 13219                                  ; 16/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 13220                                  		
 13221                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13222                                  TrackIo:	
 13223                                  					; Procedure `disk' will pop stack to
 13224 00000F75 8926[3501]              		mov	[spsav], sp	; SpSav	and return if error
 13225 00000F79 E84DF9                  		call	checksingle	; Ensure correct disk is in drv
 13226 00000F7C 803E[2706]01            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 13227                                  					; See if we have already set	disk
 13228 00000F81 7407                    		jz	short Dptalreadyset ; base table
 13229 00000F83 50                      		push	ax		; set up tables	and variables for i/o
 13230 00000F84 51                      		push	cx
 13231 00000F85 E8CDFA                  		call	iosetup
 13232 00000F88 59                      		pop	cx
 13233 00000F89 58                      		pop	ax
 13234                                  Dptalreadyset:				; Point si at the table entry of the			
 13235 00000F8A BE[2A05]                		mov	si, tracktable	; first sector to be io'd
 13236 00000F8D D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1
 13237 00000F8F D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1
 13238 00000F91 01C6                    		add	si, ax
 13239                                  
 13240                                  		; WE WANT:
 13241                                  		; CX to	be the number of times we have to loop
 13242                                  		; DX to	be the number of sectors we read on each iteration
 13243                                  		
 13244 00000F93 BA0100                  		mov	dx, 1
 13245                                  		; 12/12/2022
 13246 00000F96 26F6452308              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 8
 13247                                  		;test	word [es:di+35], 8 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 13248                                  					; good_tracklayout
 13249 00000F9B 7402                    		jz	short ionextsector
 13250                                  		
 13251 00000F9D 87CA                    		xchg	dx, cx		; HEY! We can read all secs in one blow
 13252                                  ionextsector:				
 13253 00000F9F 51                      		push	cx
 13254 00000FA0 52                      		push	dx
 13255 00000FA1 46                      		inc	si
 13256 00000FA2 46                      		inc	si		; Skip over the	cylinder and head in
 13257                                  					; the track table
 13258 00000FA3 AC                      		lodsb			; Get sector ID	from track table
 13259 00000FA4 A2[3101]                		mov	[cursec], al
 13260                                  
 13261                                  		; assumptions for a fixed disk multi-track disk	i/o
 13262                                  		; 1). In the input CX (# of sectors to go) to TrackIo,
 13263                                  		;     only CL is valid.
 13264                                  		; 2). Sector size should be set	to 512 bytes.
 13265                                  		; 3). Good track layout
 13266                                  		
 13267                                  		; 12/12/2022

 13275                                  						; Allow multi-track operation?
 13276 00000FB3 740D                    		jz	short IoRemovable ; No,don't do that.
 13277 00000FB5 8916[2201]              		mov	[seccnt], dx
 13278 00000FB9 89D0                    		mov	ax, dx
 13279 00000FBB E819FB                  		call	Disk
 13280 00000FBE 5A                      		pop	dx
 13281 00000FBF 59                      		pop	cx
 13282 00000FC0 F8                      		clc
 13283 00000FC1 C3                      		retn
 13284                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13285                                  
 13286                                  IoRemovable:

 13288                                  					; table	and save it

 13299 00000FD6 1F                      		pop	ds

 13304                                  					; sector size

 13324                                  					; entries in Dpt.

 13331                                  
 13332                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13333                                  ;
 13334                                  ; The sector size in bytes needs to be converted to an index value for the ibm
 13335                                  ; rom. (0=>128,1=>256,2=>512,3=>1024). It is assumed that only these values
 13336                                  ; are permissible.
 13337                                  ;
 13338                                  ; On Input   AX contains sector size in bytes
 13339                                  ; On Output  AL Contains index
 13340                                  ; All other registers preserved

 13387                                  		; 10/12/2022

 13456                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 13457                                  
 13458                                  ; 16/10/2022
 13459                                  
 13460                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13461                                  ;
 13462                                  ; Set Media Type for Format
 13463                                  ; Performs the int 13 with ah = 18h to see if the medium described in the
 13464                                  ; BPB area in the BDS can be handled by the rom.
 13465                                  ; On Input, ES:DI -> current BDS.
 13466                                  ; The status of the operation is returned in AL
 13467                                  ;
 13468                                  ;	- 0 - if the support is available,and the combination is valid.
 13469                                  ;	- 1 - no rom support
 13470                                  ;	- 2 - illegal combination
 13471                                  ;	- 3 - no media present (rom support exists but cannot determine now)
 13472                                  ;
 13473                                  ; Flags also may be altered. All other registers preserved.
 13474                                  ; If the call to rom returns no error,then the current Dpt is "replaced" by
 13475                                  ; the one returned by the rom. This is Done by changing the pointer in [Dpt]
 13476                                  ; to the one returned. the original pointer to the disk base table is stored
 13477                                  ; in TempDpt, until it is restored.
 13478                                  ;
 13479                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13480                                  
 13481                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13482                                  SetMediaForFormat:	
 13483 00001055 51                      		push	cx
 13484 00001056 52                      		push	dx
 13485                                  
 13486                                  		; If we have a format error, then do not change Dpt, TempDpt.
 13487                                  		; but we need to call int 13h, ah=18h again.
 13488                                  
 13489 00001057 803E[2806]01            		cmp	byte [had_format_error], 1
 13490 0000105C 7425                    		jz	short SkipSaveDskAdr
 13491 0000105E 30C0                    		xor	al, al		; If already done return 0
 13492 00001060 803E[2706]01            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 13493 00001065 7502                    		jnz	short DoSetMediaForFormat
 13494 00001067 EB7D                    		jmp	SetMediaRet	; Media	already	set
 13495                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13496                                  
 13497                                  DoSetMediaForFormat:			
 13498 00001069 06                      		push	es

 13500                                  
 13501                                  		; 02/09/2023
 13502                                  		;mov	es, [zeroseg]	; Point to interrupt vectors

 13505                                  
 13506 0000106F 26C4367800              		les	si, [es:DSKADR]
 13507                                  		;les	si, es:78h	; [es:DSKADR]
 13508                                  					; Get pointer to disk base table
 13509 00001074 8936[2D01]              		mov	[dpt], si
 13510 00001078 8C06[2F01]              		mov	[dpt+2], es	; Save pointer to table
 13511                                  
 13512                                  		; Initialize the head settle time to 0Fh. See the offsets
 13513                                  		; given in dskprm.inc.
 13514

 13518                                  SkipSaveDskAdr:
 13519 00001083 268B4D25                		mov	cx, [es:di+25h]	; [es:di+BDS.cylinders]
 13520 00001087 49                      		dec	cx
 13521 00001088 80E503                  		and	ch, 3

 13523 0000108D D0CD                    		ror	ch, 1
 13524 0000108F 86CD                    		xchg	ch, cl
 13525 00001091 260A4D13                		or	cl, [es:di+13h]	; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 13526 00001095 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 13527 00001099 06                      		push	es
 13528 0000109A 1E                      		push	ds
 13529 0000109B 56                      		push	si
 13530 0000109C 57                      		push	di
 13531 0000109D B418                    		mov	ah, 18h
 13532 0000109F CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - SET MEDIA TYPE	FOR FORMAT (AT model 3x9,XT2,XT286,PS)
 13533                                  					; DL = drive number, CH	= lower	8 bits of number of tracks, CL = sectors per track
 13534 000010A1 7231                    		jb	short FormaStatErr
 13535 000010A3 803E[2806]01            		cmp	byte [had_format_error], 1
 13536 000010A8 7423                    		jz	short skip_disk_base_setting
 13537 000010AA 06                      		push	es		; Save segment returned	by the rom
 13538                                  
 13539                                  		; 02/09/2023
 13540                                  		;mov	es, [zeroseg]	; Point	to interrupt vector segment
 13541 000010AB 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 13542 000010AD 8EC6                    		mov	es, si ; 0
 13543 000010AF 06                      		push	es ; * ; 02/09/2023
 13544                                  
 13545 000010B0 26C4367800              		les	si, [es:DSKADR]
 13546                                  		;les	si, es:78h	; [es:DSKADR] (Int 1Eh)
 13547                                  					; Get current disk base	table
 13548 000010B5 8936[2906]              		mov	[tempdpt], si

 13550

 13618                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13619                                  ;
 13620                                  ; RESET THE DRIVE
 13621                                  ;
 13622                                  ; we also set [Step_Drv] to -1 to force the main disk routine to use the
 13623                                  ; slow head settle time for the next operation. this is because the reset
 13624                                  ; operation moves the head to cylinder 0,so we need to do a seek the next
 13625                                  ; time around - there is a problem with 3.5" drives in that the head does
 13626                                  ; not settle down in time,even for read operations!!

 13628                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------

 13639                                  					; Then verify operation in "fmt & vrfy"
 13640                                  		;mov	byte [had_format_error], 1 ; Might have failed.

 13646                                  					; DL = drive (if bit 7 is set both hard	disks and floppy disks reset)

 13656                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13657                                  ;
 13658                                  ; This routine sets up the drive parameter table with the values needed for
 13659                                  ; format,does an int 13. values in Dpt are restored after a verify is done.
 13660                                  ;
 13661                                  ; on entry  -	ES:DI - points to bds for the drive
 13662                                  ;		Xfer_Seg:BX - points to trkbuf
 13663                                  ;		AL    - number of sectors
 13664                                  ;		AH    - int 13 function code
 13665                                  ;		CL    - sector number for verify
 13666                                  ;		DS    - Bios_Data
 13667                                  ;
 13668                                  ; ON EXIT   -	DS,DI,ES,BX remain unchanged.
 13669                                  ;		AX and flags are the results of the int 13
 13670                                  ;
 13671                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13672                                  
 13673                                  		; 24/12/2023
 13674                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13675                                  ToRom:	
 13676 000010FF 53                      		push	bx

 13699

 13730                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 13731                                  
 13732                                  ; BIOSCODE:1124h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
 13733                                  
 13734                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13735                                  ;
 13736                                  ; get the owner of the physical drive represented by the logical drive in al.
 13737                                  ; the assumption is that we **always** keep track of the owner of a drive!!
 13738                                  ; if this is not the case, the system may hang, just following the linked list.
 13739                                  ;
 13740                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13741                                  
 13742                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13743                                  ioctl_getown:
 13744 00001155 E812F4                  		call	SetDrive
 13745 00001158 268A4504                		mov	al, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 13746                                  					; Get physical drive number
 13747 0000115C C43E[1901]              		les	di, [start_bds] ; Get start of bds chain
 13748                                  ownloop:				
 13749 00001160 26384504                		cmp	[es:di+4], al	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 13750 00001164 7507                    		jnz	short getnextBDS
 13751                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13752 00001166 26F6452320              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 20h
 13753                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 20h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 13754                                  					; fi_own_physical
 13755 0000116B 7514                    		jnz	short exitown
 13756                                  getnextBDS:				
 13757 0000116D 26C43D                  		les	di, [es:di]	; [es:di+BDS.link]
 13758 00001170 EBEE                    		jmp	short ownloop
 13759                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13760                                  
 13761                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13762                                  ;
 13763                                  ; set the ownership of the physical drive represented by the logical drive
 13764                                  ; in al to al.
 13765                                  ;
 13766                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13767                                  
 13768                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13769                                  ioctl_setown:
 13770 00001172 E8F5F3                  		call	SetDrive
 13771 00001175 C606[7A00]01            		mov	byte [fsetowner], 1
 13772                                  					; set flag for CheckSingle to look at.
 13773 0000117A E84CF7                  		call	checksingle
 13774                                  		; 02/09/2023
 13775 0000117D FE0E[7A00]              		dec	byte [fsetowner] ; 0
 13776                                  		;mov	byte [fsetowner], 0
 13777                                  					; set ownership	of drive reset flag
 13778                                  		; Fall into ExitOwn
 13779                                  
 13780                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13781                                  ;
 13782                                  ; if there is only one logical drive assigned to this physical drive, return
 13783                                  ; 0 to user to indicate this. Enter with ES:di -> the owner's bds.
 13784                                  ;
 13785                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13786                                  
 13787                                  exitown:				
 13788 00001181 30C9                    		xor	cl, cl
 13789                                  		; 12/12/2022
 13790 00001183 26F6452310              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 10h
 13791                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 10h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 13792                                  					; fi_am_mult

 13796                                  					; Get it 1-based
 13797 0000118E FEC1                    		inc	cl
 13798                                  exitnomult:				
 13799 00001190 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]
 13800 00001194 884F01                  		mov	[bx+1],	cl	; [bx+unit]
 13801                                  					; Exit normal termination
 13802                                  		; 12/12/2022
 13803                                  		; cf=0
 13804                                  		;clc
 13805 00001197 C3                      		retn

 13811                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13812                                  ;
 13813                                  ; moves the old Dpt that had been saved in TempDpt back to Dpt. this is done
 13814                                  ; only if the first byte of TempDpt is not -1.
 13815                                  ; all registers (including flags) are preserved.
 13816                                  ;
 13817                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------

 13821                                  RestoreOldDpt:
 13822                                  		; if we have already restored the disk base table earlier,
 13823                                  		; do not do it again.
 13824                                  
 13825 00001198 50                      		push	ax

 13828 0000119E 8606[2706]              		xchg	al, [media_set_for_format] ; get current flag setting

 13831 000011A6 56                      		push	si
 13832 000011A7 1E                      		push	ds
 13833 000011A8 06                      		push	es
 13834 000011A9 C536[2906]              		lds	si, [tempdpt]

 13837                                  		;mov	es, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]

 13864                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13865                                  ;	get media id
 13866                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13867                                  ;
 13868                                  ; FUNCTION: get the volume label,the system id and the serial number from
 13869                                  ;	    the media that has the extended boot record.
 13870                                  ;	    for the conventional media,this routine will return "unknown
 13871                                  ;	    media type" error to dos.
 13872                                  ;
 13873                                  ; INPUT :   ES:di -> bds table for this drive.
 13874                                  ;
 13875                                  ; OUTPUT:   the request packet filled with the information,if not carry.
 13876                                  ;	    if carry set,then al contains the device driver error number
 13877                                  ;	    that will be returned to dos.
 13878                                  ;	    register DS,DX,AX,CX,DI,SI destroyed.
 13879                                  ;
 13880                                  ; SUBROUTINES TO BE CALLED:
 13881                                  ;	BootIo:NEAR
 13882                                  ;
 13883                                  ; LOGIC:
 13884                                  ;	to recognize the extended boot record,this logic will actually
 13885                                  ;	access the boot sector even if it is a hard disk.
 13886                                  ;	note:the valid extended bpb is recognized by looking at the mediabyte
 13887                                  ;	field of bpb and the extended boot signature.
 13888                                  ;
 13889                                  ; {
 13890                                  ;	get logical drive number from bds table;
 13891                                  ;	rFlag = read operation;
 13892                                  ;	BootIo;		 /*get the media boot record into the buffer
 13893                                  ;	if (no error) then
 13894                                  ;	     if (extended boot record) then
 13895                                  ;		{ set volume label,volume serial number and system id
 13896                                  ;		  of the request packet to those of the boot record;
 13897                                  ;		};
 13898                                  ;	     else		  /*not an extended bpb */
 13899                                  ;		{ set register al to "unknown media.." error code;
 13900                                  ;		  set carry bit;
 13901                                  ;		};
 13902                                  ;	else
 13903                                  ;	     ret;	/*already error code is set in the register al
 13904                                  ;
 13905                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13906                                  
 13907                                  ;size_of_EXT_BOOT_SERIAL equ 4
 13908                                  ;;size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL equ 11
 13909                                  ;;size_of_EXT_SYSTEM_ID equ 8
 13910                                  
 13911                                  		; 24/12/2023
 13912                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13913                                  GetMediaId:
 13914 000011C0 E89900                  		call	ChangeLineChk
 13915 000011C3 268A4505                		mov	al, [es:di+5]	; [es:di+BDS.drivelet] ; Logical drive number
 13916 000011C7 C606[2001]02            		mov	byte [rflag], 2	; Read operation
 13917 000011CC E87500                  		call	BootIo		; Read boot sector into	DiskSector
 13918 000011CF 7224                    		jb	short IOCtl_If1
 13919                                  					; Valid? (0F0h-0FFh?)
 13920 000011D1 803E[6301]F0            		cmp	byte [disksector+15h], 0F0h
 13921                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.MEDIADESCRIPTOR]
 13922                                  		;jb	short IOCtl_If2	; brif not valid (0F0h - 0FFh)
 13923                                  		; 24/12/2023
 13924 000011D6 721B                    		jb	short IOCtl_If7	
 13925                                  
 13926                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13927 000011D8 BE[7401]                		mov	si, disksector+26h
 13928 000011DB 803C29                  		cmp	byte [si], 29h
 13929                                  		;cmp	byte [disksector+26h], 29h ; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG]
 13930                                  					; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
 13931 000011DE 7512                    		jnz	short IOCtl_If2	; not extended boot record
 13932 000011E0 C43E[1200]              		les	di, [ptrsav]	; es:di	points to request header
 13933 000011E4 26C47F13                		les	di, [es:bx+19]	; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 13934                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13935 000011E8 46                      		inc	si
 13936                                  		; si = disksector+27h 
 13937                                  		;mov	si, disksector+27h ; disksector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL
 13938 000011E9 83C702                  		add	di, 2		; A_MEDIA_ID_INFO.MI_SERIAL
 13939                                  IOCtl_If4:		; 24/12/2023
 13940 000011EC B91700                  		mov	cx, 23		; size_of_EXT_BOOT_SERIAL
 13941                                  					; L+size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL
 13942                                  					; +size_of_EXT_SYSTEM_ID
 13943 000011EF F3A4                    		rep movsb		; Move from Bios_Data into request packet
 13944                                  	
 13945                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13946                                  		; cf = 0
 13947                                  		;clc
 13948                                  
 13949 000011F1 C3                      		retn
 13950                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13951                                  
 13952                                  		; 24/12/2023
 13953                                  IOCtl_If2:
 13954 000011F2 F9                      		stc	
 13955                                  IOCtl_If7:
 13956 000011F3 B007                    		mov	al, 7		; error_unknown_media
 13957                                  		;stc
 13958                                  IOCtl_If6:
 13959                                  IOCtl_If1:
 13960 000011F5 C3                      		retn

 13962

 13964                                  
 13965                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13966                                  ;  set media id
 13967                                  ; ==========================================================================
 13968                                  
 13969                                  ; function: set the volume label, the system id and the serial number of
 13970                                  ;	    the media that has the extended boot record.
 13971                                  ;	    for the conventional media, this routine will return "unknown
 13972                                  ;	    media.." error to dos.
 13973                                  ;	    this routine will also set the corresponding informations in
 13974                                  ;	    the bds table.
 13975                                  ;
 13976                                  ; input :   ES:di -> bds table for this drive.
 13977                                  ;
 13978                                  ; output:   the extended boot record in the media will be set according to
 13979                                  ;	    the request packet.
 13980                                  ;	    if carry set, then al contains the device driver error number
 13981                                  ;	    that will be returned to dos.
 13982                                  ;
 13983                                  ; subroutines to be called:
 13984                                  ;	BootIo:NEAR
 13985                                  ;
 13986                                  ; logic:
 13987                                  ;
 13988                                  ; {
 13989                                  ;	get drive_number from bds;
 13990                                  ;	rFlag = "read operation";
 13991                                  ;	BootIo;
 13992                                  ;	if (no error) then
 13993                                  ;	     if (extended boot record) then
 13994                                  ;		{ set volume label,volume serial number and system id
 13995                                  ;		  of the boot record to those of the request packet;
 13996                                  ;		  rFlag = "write operation";
 13997                                  ;		  get drive number from bds;
 13998                                  ;		  BootIo;	  /*write it back*/
 13999                                  ;		};
 14000                                  ;	     else		  /*not an extended bpb */
 14001                                  ;		{ set register al to "unknown media.." error code;
 14002                                  ;		  set carry bit;
 14003                                  ;		  ret;	 /*return back to caller */
 14004                                  ;		};
 14005                                  ;	else
 14006                                  ;	     ret;		 /*already error code is set */
 14007                                  ;
 14008                                  ; ==========================================================================
 14009                                  
 14010                                  		; 24/12/2023
 14011                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14012                                  SetMediaId:
 14013 000011F6 E86300                  		call	ChangeLineChk
 14014 000011F9 268A4505                		mov	al, [es:di+5]	; [es:di+BDS.drivelet]
 14015                                  					; Logical drive	number
 14016 000011FD 88C2                    		mov	dl, al
 14017 000011FF C606[2001]02            		mov	byte [rflag], 2	; romread
 14018 00001204 52                      		push	dx
 14019 00001205 E83C00                  		call	BootIo		; Read boot sec	to Bios_Data:DiskSector
 14020 00001208 5A                      		pop	dx
 14021 00001209 72EA                    		jb	short IOCtl_If6
 14022                                  					; Valid? (0F0h-0FFh?)
 14023 0000120B 803E[6301]F0            		cmp	byte [disksector+15h], 0F0h
 14024                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.MEDIADESCRIPTOR]
 14025 00001210 72E1                    		jb	short IOCtl_If7	; Brif not
 14026                                  		
 14027 00001212 803E[7401]29            		cmp	byte [disksector+26h], 29h ; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG]
 14028                                  					; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
 14029                                  		;jnz	short IOCtl_If7	; not extended boot record
 14030                                  		; 24/12/2023
 14031 00001217 75D9                    		jnz	short IOCtl_If2
 14032                                  
 14033 00001219 06                      		push	es		; Save BDS pointer
 14034 0000121A 57                      		push	di
 14035 0000121B 1E                      		push	ds		; Point	ES To boot record
 14036 0000121C 07                      		pop	es
 14037 0000121D BF[7501]                		mov	di, disksector+27h ; disksector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL
 14038 00001220 C536[1200]              		lds	si, [ptrsav]	; ds:si	points to request header.
 14039 00001224 C57413                  		lds	si, [si+19]	; [si+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 14040 00001227 83C602                  		add	si, 2		; A_MEDIA_ID_INFO.MI_SERIAL
 14041                                  
 14042                                  		; 24/12/2023
 14043                                  		;mov	cx, 23		; size_of_EXT_BOOT_SERIAL
 14044                                  		;			; +size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL
 14045                                  		;			; +size_of_EXT_SYSTEM_ID
 14046                                  		;rep movsb
 14047 0000122A E8BFFF                  		call	IOCtl_If4       ; copy volume serial, label and system id
 14048                                  
 14049 0000122D 06                      		push	es		; point	ds back	to Bios_Data
 14050 0000122E 1F                      		pop	ds
 14051 0000122F 5F                      		pop	di		; restore bds pointer
 14052 00001230 07                      		pop	es
 14053 00001231 E891F5                  		call	mov_media_ids	; update the bds media id info.
 14054 00001234 88D0                    		mov	al, dl
 14055 00001236 C606[2001]03            		mov	byte [rflag], 3	; romwrite
 14056 0000123B E80600                  		call	BootIo		; write	it back.
 14057 0000123E C606[1E01]FF            		mov	byte [tim_drv], 0FFh
 14058                                  					; make sure chk_media check the driver
 14059                                  					; return with error code from BootIo
 14060 00001243 C3                      		retn
 14061                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14062                                  
 14063                                  		; 24/12/2023
 14064                                  ;IOCtl_If7:
