 15742                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15743                                  
 15744                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 15745                                  
 15746                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------
 15747                                  ; include msbio.cl2 (MSDOS 6.0, 1991)
 15748                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------
 15749                                  ; (MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS BIOSCODE:17D5h)
 15750                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------
 15751                                  ; 17/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 15752                                  
 15753                                  		; MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS offset 0070h:3D38h or 02C7h:17C8h
 15754 000017C5 0D0A                    sngmsg:		db 0Dh,0Ah
 15755 000017C7 496E73657274206469-     		db 'Insert diskette for drive '
 15755 000017D0 736B6574746520666F-
 15755 000017D9 7220647269766520   
 15756                                  
 15757                                  		; MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS offset 0070h:3D54h or 02C7h:17E4h
 15758 000017E1 413A20616E64207072-     drvlet:		db 'A: and press any key when ready',0Dh,0Ah
 15758 000017EA 65737320616E79206B-
 15758 000017F3 6579207768656E2072-
 15758 000017FC 656164790D0A       
 15759 00001802 0A00                    		db 0Ah,0
 15760                                  
 15761                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15762                                  
 15763                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15764                                  ; input : es:di points to current bds for drive.
 15765                                  ; return : zero set if no open files
 15766                                  ;	   zero reset if open files
 15767                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15768                                  
 15769                                  chkopcnt:		
 15770 00001804 26837D2000              		cmp	word [es:di+20h], 0 ; [es:di+BDS.opcnt]
 15771 00001809 C3                      		retn
 15772                                  
 15773                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15774                                  
 15775                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15776                                  ; at media check time, we need to really get down and check what the change is.
 15777                                  ; this is guaranteed to be expensive.
 15778                                  ;
 15779                                  ;	es:di -> bds, ds -> Bios_Data
 15780                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15781                                  
 15782                                  mediacheck:	
 15783 0000180A E8BCF0                  		call	checksingle	; make sure correct disk is in place
 15784 0000180D 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 15785 0000180F E84D01                  		call	haschange
 15786 00001812 742F                    		jz	short mediaret
 15787 00001814 E83C01                  		call	checkromchange
 15788 00001817 752B                    		jnz	short mediadovolid
 15789 00001819 50                      		push	ax
 15790 0000181A 52                      		push	dx
 15791 0000181B 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 15792                                  					; set logical drive number
 15793 0000181F B416                    		mov	ah, 16h
 15794 00001821 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - FLOPPY	DISK - CHANGE OF DISK STATUS (AT,XT2,XT286,CONV,PS)
 15795                                  					; DL = drive to	check
 15796                                  					; Return: AH = disk change status
 15797 00001823 5A                      		pop	dx
 15798 00001824 58                      		pop	ax
 15799 00001825 721D                    		jb	short mediadovolid
 15800 00001827 BE0100                  		mov	si, 1		; signal no change
 15801                                  
 15802                                  ; there are some drives with changeline that "lose" the changeline indication
 15803                                  ; if a different drive is accessed after the current one. in order to avoid
 15804                                  ; missing a media change, we return an "i don't know" to dos if the changeline
 15805                                  ; is not active and we are accessing a different drive from the last one.
 15806                                  ; if we are accessing the same drive, then we can safely rely on the changeline
 15807                                  ; status.
 15808                                  		; 19/10/2022
 15809 0000182A 8A1E[1E01]              		mov	bl, [tim_drv]	; get last drive accessed
 15810 0000182E 26385D04                		cmp	[es:di+4], bl	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 15811                                  					; (If the last drive accessed is not current drive
 15812                                  					; media	change status may be incorrect.	So,
 15813                                  					; "I don't now" will be returned even if it is indicated
 15814                                  					; as media is not changed.)
 15815 00001832 740F                    		jz	short mediaret	; (same	drive,
 15816                                  					; media	changeline indication is reliable)
 15817                                  
 15818                                  ; do the 2 second twiddle. if time >= 2 seconds, do a volid check.
 15819                                  ; otherwise return "i don't know" (strictly speaking, we should return a
 15820                                  ; "not changed" here since the 2 second test said no change.)
 15821                                  
 15822 00001834 50                      		push	ax
 15823 00001835 51                      		push	cx
 15824 00001836 52                      		push	dx
 15825 00001837 E8B6ED                  		call	Check_Time_Of_Access
 15826 0000183A 5A                      		pop	dx
 15827 0000183B 59                      		pop	cx
 15828 0000183C 58                      		pop	ax
 15829 0000183D 09F6                    		or	si, si
 15830 0000183F 7403                    		jz	short mediadovolid ; check_time	says ">= 2 secs	passed"
 15831                                  					; (volume id will be checked)
 15832 00001841 31F6                    		xor	si, si		; return "i don't know"
 15833                                  mediaret:				
 15834 00001843 C3                      		retn
 15835                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15836                                  
 15837                                  ; somehow the media was changed. look at vid to see. we do not look at fat
 15838                                  ; because this may be different since we only set medbyt when doing a read
 15839                                  ; or write.
 15840                                  
 15841                                  mediadovolid:				
 15842 00001844 E849EE                  		call	GetBp		; build	a new bpb in current bds
 15843 00001847 72FA                    		jb	short mediaret
 15844 00001849 E82D00                  		call	check_vid
 15845 0000184C 73F5                    		jnb	short mediaret
 15846 0000184E E9FDF3                  		jmp	maperror	; fix up al for	return to dos
 15847                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15848                                  
 15849                                  ; simple, quick check of latched change. if no indication, then return
 15850                                  ; otherwise do expensive check. if the expensive test fails, pop off the
 15851                                  ; return and set al = 15 (for invalid media change) which will be returned to
 15852                                  ; dos.
 15853                                  ;
 15854                                  ; for dos 3.3, this will work only for the drive that has changeline.
 15855                                  
 15856                                  ;	call with es:di -> bds, ds -> Bios_Data
 15857                                  ;	***** warning:  this routine will return one level up on the stack
 15858                                  ;			if an error occurs!
 15859                                  
 15860                                  checklatchio:	
 15861                                  
 15862                                  ; if returning fake bpb then assume the disk has not changed
 15863                                  			
 15864 00001851 E8B0FF                  		call	chkopcnt
 15865 00001854 741B                    		jz	short checkret	; done if zero
 15866                                  
 15867                                  ; check for past rom indications. if no rom change indicated, then return ok.
 15868                                  
 15869 00001856 E8FA00                  		call	checkromchange
 15870 00001859 7416                    		jz	short checkret
 15871                                  
 15872                                  ; we now see that a change line has been seen in the past. let's do the
 15873                                  ; expensive verification.
 15874                                  
 15875 0000185B E832EE                  		call	GetBp		; build	bpb in current bds
 15876 0000185E 720F                    		jb	short ret_no_error_map ; getbp has already called maperror
 15877 00001860 E81600                  		call	check_vid
 15878 00001863 7207                    		jb	short checklatchret ; disk error trying	to read	in.
 15879 00001865 09F6                    		or	si, si		; is changed for sure?
 15880 00001867 7908                    		jns	short checkret
 15881 00001869 E87B00                  		call	returnvid
 15882                                  checklatchret:				
 15883 0000186C E8DFF3                  		call	maperror	; fix up al for	return to dos
 15884                                  ret_no_error_map:			
 15885 0000186F F9                      		stc
 15886 00001870 5E                      		pop	si		; pop off return address
 15887                                  checkret:				
 15888 00001871 C3                      		retn
 15889                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15890                                  
 15891                                  ; check the fat and the vid. return in di -1 or 0. return with carry set
 15892                                  ; only if there was a disk error. return that error code in ax.
 15893                                  ;
 15894                                  ;	called with es:di -> bds, ds -> Bios_Data
 15895                                  
 15896                                  checkfatvid:				
 15897 00001872 E8BC01                  		call	fat_check	; check	the fat	and the	vid
 15898 00001875 09F6                    		or	si, si
 15899 00001877 7827                    		js	short changed_drv ;
 15900                                  
 15901                                  ; the fat was the same. fall into check_vid and check volume id.
 15902                                  
 15903                                  		; fall into check_vid
 15904                                  
 15905                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 15906                                  
 15907                                  ; now with the extended boot record, the logic should be enhanced.
 15908                                  ;
 15909                                  ; if it is the extended boot record, then we check the volume serial
 15910                                  ; number instead of volume id. if it is different, then set si to -1.
 15911                                  ;
 15912                                  ; if it is same, then si= 1 (no change).
 15913                                  ;
 15914                                  ; if it is not the extended boot record, then just follows the old
 15915                                  ; logic. dos 4.00 will check if the # of fat in the boot record bpb
 15916                                  ; is not 0.  if it is 0 then it must be non_fat based system and
 15917                                  ; should have already covered by extended boot structure checking.
 15918                                  ; so, we will return "i don't know" by setting si to 0.
 15919                                  ;
 15920                                  ; this routine assume the newest valid boot record is in cs:[disksector].
 15921                                  ; (this will be gauranteed by a successful getbp call right before this
 15922                                  ; routine.)
 15923                                  ;
 15924                                  ;	called with es:di -> bds, ds -> bds
 15925                                  
 15926                                  		; 19/10/2022
 15927                                  check_vid:
 15928                                  
 15929                                  ; check the disksector.EXT_BOOT_SIG variable for the extended
 15930                                  ; boot signature. if it is set then go to do the extended
 15931                                  ; id check otherwise continue with code below
 15932                                  
 15933 00001879 803E[7401]29            		cmp	byte [disksector+26h], 29h
 15934                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG],
 15935                                  					; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
 15936 0000187E 7427                    		jz	short do_ext_check_id
 15937 00001880 E8DC00                  		call	haschange
 15938 00001883 74EC                    		jz	short checkret
 15939 00001885 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 15940 00001887 803E[5E01]00            		cmp	byte [disksector+10h], 0 
 15941                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.NUMBEROFFATS]
 15942 0000188C 7411                    		jz	short checkfatret ; don't read vol id
 15943                                  					; if not fat system
 15944 0000188E E8EE00                  		call	read_volume_id
 15945 00001891 720C                    		jb	short checkfatret
 15946 00001893 E89201                  		call	check_volume_id
 15947 00001896 BEFFFF                  		mov	si, 0FFFFh	; -1
 15948                                  					; definitely changed
 15949 00001899 7505                    		jnz	short changed_drv
 15950                                  
 15951 0000189B 46                      		inc	si		; not changed
 15952                                  vid_no_changed:				
 15953 0000189C E8BA00                  		call	resetchanged
 15954                                  		; 12/12/2022
 15955                                  		; cf=0 ('and' instruction in 'resetchanged' clears cf) 
 15956                                  		;clc
 15957                                  checkfatret:				
 15958 0000189F C3                      		retn
 15959                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15960                                  
 15961                                  		; 12/12/2022
 15962                                  changed_drv:
 15963 000018A0 F8                      		clc			; cas -- return	no error
 15964 000018A1 C606[1E01]FF            		mov	byte  [tim_drv], 0FFh 
 15965                                  					; ensure that we ask rom for media
 15966 000018A6 C3                      		retn			; check	next time round
 15967                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15968                                  
 15969                                  ; extended id check
 15970                                  
 15971                                  ; 16/10/2022
 15972                                  
 15973                                  ; the code to check extended id is basically a check to see if the
 15974                                  ; volume serial number is still the same. the volume serial number
 15975                                  ; previously read is in cs:disksector.EXT_BOOT_SERIAL
 15976                                  ; ds:di points to the bds of the drive under consideration.
 15977                                  ; the bds has fields containing the high and low words 
 15978                                  ; of the volume serial number of the media in the drive.
 15979                                  ; compare these fields to the fields mentioned above. if these fields
 15980                                  ; do not match the media has changed and so we should jump to the code
 15981                                  ; starting at ext_changed else return "i don't know" status
 15982                                  ; in the register used for the changeline status and continue executing
 15983                                  ; the code given below. for temporary storage use the register which
 15984                                  ; has been saved and restored around this block.
 15985                                  ;
 15986                                  ; bds fields in inc\msbds.inc
 15987                                  
 15988                                  		; 19/10/2022
 15989                                  do_ext_check_id:
 15990 000018A7 50                      		push	ax
 15991                                  		;mov	ax, word ptr ds:disksector+27h
 15992                                  					; [DiskSector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL]
 15993 000018A8 A1[7501]                		mov	ax, [disksector+27h]
 15994                                  		; 02/09/2023
 15995 000018AB 31F6                    		xor	si, si ; 0
 15996 000018AD 263B4557                		cmp	ax, [es:di+57h]	; [di+BDS.vol_serial]
 15997 000018B1 750C                    		jnz	short ext_changed
 15998 000018B3 A1[7701]                		mov	ax, [disksector+29h] ; [DiskSector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL+2]
 15999 000018B6 263B4559                		cmp	ax, [es:di+59h]	; [di+BDS.vol_serial+2]
 16000 000018BA 7503                    		jnz	short ext_changed
 16001                                  		;xor	si, si		; 0
 16002                                  					; don't know
 16003 000018BC 58                      		pop	ax
 16004 000018BD EBDD                    		jmp	short vid_no_changed
 16005                                  					; reset the flag
 16006                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16007                                  
 16008                                  ext_changed:
 16009 000018BF 58                      		pop	ax
 16010                                  		; 02/09/2023
 16011 000018C0 4E                      		dec	si ; mov si, 0FFFFh ; -1
 16012                                  		;mov	si, 0FFFFh	; -1
 16013                                  					; disk changed!
 16014                                  		; 12/12/2022
 16015                                  		; ('changed_drv' clears cf)
 16016                                  		;clc
 16017 000018C1 EBDD                    		jmp	short changed_drv
 16018                                  
 16019                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16020                                  
 16021                                  ; at i/o time, we detected the error. now we need to determine whether the
 16022                                  ; media was truly changed or not. we return normally if media change unknown.
 16023                                  ; and we pop off the call and jmp to harderr if we see an error.
 16024                                  ;
 16025                                  ; es:di -> bds
 16026                                  
 16027                                  checkio:				
 16028 000018C3 80FC06                  		cmp	ah, 6
 16029 000018C6 75D7                    		jnz	short checkfatret
 16030 000018C8 E839FF                  		call	chkopcnt
 16031 000018CB 74D2                    		jz	short checkfatret
 16032 000018CD E8C0ED                  		call	GetBp
 16033 000018D0 7212                    		jb	short no_error_map
 16034 000018D2 E89DFF                  		call	checkfatvid
 16035 000018D5 7209                    		jb	short checkioret ; disk	error trying to	read in.
 16036 000018D7 09F6                    		or	si, si		; is changed for sure?
 16037 000018D9 7802                    		js	short checkioerr ; yes changed
 16038 000018DB 45                      		inc	bp		; allow	a retry
 16039 000018DC C3                      		retn
 16040                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16041                                  
 16042                                  checkioerr:				
 16043 000018DD E80700                  		call	returnvid
 16044                                  
 16045                                  checkioret:				
 16046 000018E0 F9                      		stc			; make sure carry gets passed through
 16047 000018E1 E91BF3                  		jmp	harderr
 16048                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16049                                  
 16050                                  no_error_map:				
 16051 000018E4 E91BF3                  		jmp	harderr2
 16052                                  
 16053                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 16054                                  
 16055                                  ; return vid sets up the vid for a return to dos.
 16056                                  ;  es:di -> bds, returns pointer in packet to bds_volid
 16057                                  ;  **** trashes si! ****
 16058                                  
 16059                                  returnvid:		
 16060 000018E7 BE1600                  		mov	si, 22		; extra
 16061                                  					; offset into pointer to return	value
 16062 000018EA E80700                  		call	vid_into_packet
 16063 000018ED B406                    		mov	ah, 6
 16064 000018EF F9                      		stc
 16065 000018F0 C3                      		retn
 16066                                  
 16067                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16068                                  
 16069                                  ; moves the pointer to the volid for the drive into the original request packet
 16070                                  ; no attempt is made to preserve registers.
 16071                                  ;
 16072                                  ; assumes es:di -> bds
 16073                                  ; **trashes si**
 16074                                  
 16075                                  media_set_vid:				
 16076 000018F1 BE0F00                  		mov	si, 15		; trans+1
 16077                                  					; return the value here	in packet
 16078                                  
 16079                                  		; fall into vid_into_packet
 16080                                  
 16081                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 16082                                  
 16083                                  ; return pointer to vid in bds at es:di in packet[si]
 16084                                  
 16085                                  		; 19/10/2022
 16086                                  vid_into_packet:
 16087 000018F4 1E                      		push	ds		; return pointer to vid	in bds at es:di	in packet[si]
 16088 000018F5 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]
 16089 000018F9 83C74B                  		add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 16090 000018FC 8938                    		mov	[bx+si], di
 16091 000018FE 83EF4B                  		sub	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 16092 00001901 8C4002                  		mov	[bx+si+2], es
 16093 00001904 1F                      		pop	ds
 16094                                  dofloppy:	; 18/12/2022
 16095 00001905 C3                      		retn
 16096                                  
 16097                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16098                                  
 16099                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16100                                  ;   hidensity - examine a drive/media descriptor to set the media type. if
 16101                                  ;   the media descriptor is not f9 (not 96tpi or 3 1/2), we return and let the
 16102                                  ;   caller do the rest. otherwise, we pop off the return and jump to the tail
 16103                                  ;   of getbp. for 3.5" media, we just return.
 16104                                  ;
 16105                                  ;   inputs:	es:di point to correct bds for this drive
 16106                                  ;		ah has media byte
 16107                                  ;
 16108                                  ;   outputs:	carry clear
 16109                                  ;		    no registers modified
 16110                                  ;		carry set
 16111                                  ;		    al = sectors/fat
 16112                                  ;		    bh = number of root directory entries
 16113                                  ;		    bl = sectors per track
 16114                                  ;		    cx = number of sectors
 16115                                  ;		    dh = sectors per allocation unit
 16116                                  ;		    dl = number of heads
 16117                                  ;
 16118                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16119                                  
 16120                                  hidensity:
 16121                                  
 16122                                  ; check for correct drive
 16123                                  		
 16124                                  		; 12/12/2022
 16125 00001906 26F6452302              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 2		
 16126                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 2 ; is it special?	
 16127                                  					; [es:di+BDS.flags], fchangeline
 16128 0000190B 74F8                    		jz	short dofloppy	; no, do normal floppy test
 16129                                  
 16130                                  ; we have a media byte that is pretty complex. examine drive information
 16131                                  ; table to see what kind it is.
 16132                                  
 16133 0000190D 26807D2202              		cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 2 ; is it single-media?
 16134 00001912 74F1                    		jz	short dofloppy	; [es:di+BDS.formfactor], ffSmall
 16135                                  					; yes, use fatid...
 16136                                  ; 96 tpi drive?
 16137 00001914 80FCF9                  		cmp	ah, 0F9h
 16138 00001917 75EC                    		jnz	short dofloppy
 16139                                  
 16140                                  ;------ If formfactor of drive = ffother or ff288 it has to be
 16141                                  ;------ a 720K diskette
 16142                                  
 16143                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 16144 00001919 268A4522                		mov	al, [es:di+22h]	; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 16145 0000191D 3C07                    		cmp	al, 7
 16146                                  		;cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 7 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 16147                                  					; ffOther
 16148 0000191F 7413                    		jz	short Is720K
 16149 00001921 3C09                    		cmp	al, 9
 16150                                  		;cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 9 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 16151                                  					; ff288
 16152 00001923 740F                    		jz	short Is720K
 16153 00001925 B007                    		mov	al, 7		; seven	sectors	/ fat
 16154 00001927 BB0FE0                  		mov	bx, 57359	; 224*256+0Fh
 16155                                  					; 224 root dir entries
 16156                                  					; & 0Fh sector max
 16157 0000192A B96009                  		mov	cx, 2400	; 80*15*2
 16158                                  					; 80 tracks, 15 sectors/track,
 16159                                  					; 2 sides
 16160                                  		; 02/09/2023
 16161 0000192D 5A                      		pop	dx		; pop off return address
 16162 0000192E BA0201                  		mov	dx, 258		; 1*256+2
 16163                                  					; sectors/allocation unit
 16164                                  					; & head max
 16165                                  		;add	sp, 2		; pop off return address
 16166 00001931 E9C5ED                  		jmp	Has1		; return to tail of getbp
 16167                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16168                                  
 16169                                  Is720K:
 16170                                  		; 02/09/2023
 16171 00001934 5B                      		pop	bx		; pop off return address	
 16172                                  		;add	sp, 2		; pop off return address
 16173 00001935 E98EED                  		jmp	Has720K		; return to 720K code
 16174                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16175                                  
 16176                                  		; 18/12/2022
 16177                                  ;dofloppy:
 16178                                  		;retn
 16179                                  
 16180                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 16181                                  
 16182                                  ; 16/10/2022
 16183                                  
 16184                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16185                                  ; set_changed_dl - sets flag bits according to bits set in bx.
 16186                                  ;		   essentially used to indicate changeline, or format.
 16187                                  ;
 16188                                  ;   inputs:	dl contains physical drive number
 16189                                  ;		bx contains bits to set in the flag field in the bdss
 16190                                  ;   outputs:	none
 16191                                  ;   registers modified: flags
 16192                                  ;
 16193                                  ;	called from int13 hooker.  Must preserve ALL registers!!!
 16194                                  ;
 16195                                  ; in the virtual drive system we *must* flag the other drives as being changed
 16196                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16197                                  
 16198                                  set_changed_dl:	
 16199 00001938 06                      		push	es
 16200 00001939 57                      		push	di
 16201                                  		;les	di, ds:start_bds
 16202                                  		; 19/10/2022
 16203 0000193A C43E[1901]              		les	di, [start_bds]
 16204                                  
 16205                                  ; note: we assume that the list is non-empty
 16206                                  
 16207                                  scan_bds:				
 16208 0000193E 26385504                		cmp	[es:di+4], dl	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 16209 00001942 7504                    		jnz	short get_next_bds
 16210                                  
 16211                                  ; someone may complain, but this *always* must be done when a disk change is
 16212                                  ; noted. there are *no* other compromising circumstances.
 16213                                  
 16214 00001944 26095D23                		or	[es:di+23h], bx	; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 16215                                  					; signal change	on other drive
 16216                                  get_next_bds:				
 16217 00001948 26C43D                  		les	di, [es:di]	; [es:di+BDS.link]
 16218                                  					; go to	next bds
 16219 0000194B 83FFFF                  		cmp	di, 0FFFFh
 16220 0000194E 75EE                    		jnz	short scan_bds	; loop unless we hit end of chain
 16221 00001950 5F                      		pop	di
 16222 00001951 07                      		pop	es
 16223 00001952 C3                      		retn
 16224                                  
 16225                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 16226                                  
 16227                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16228                                  ; checkromchange - see if external program has diddled rom change line.
 16229                                  ;
 16230                                  ;   inputs:	es:di points to current bds.
 16231                                  ;   outputs:	zero set - no change
 16232                                  ;		zero reset - change
 16233                                  ;   registers modified: none
 16234                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16235                                  
 16236                                  checkromchange:	
 16237                                  		;test	word [es:di+BDS.flags], fchanged ; 40h
 16238                                  		; 10/12/2022
 16239 00001953 26F6452340              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 40h
 16240                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 40h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 16241                                  					; fchanged
 16242 00001958 C3                      		retn
 16243                                  
 16244                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 16245                                  
 16246                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16247                                  ; resetchanged - restore value of change line
 16248                                  ;
 16249                                  ;   inputs:	es:di points to current bds
 16250                                  ;   outputs:	none
 16251                                  ;   registers modified: none
 16252                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16253                                  
 16254                                  resetchanged:	
 16255                                  		;and	word [es:di+BDS.flags], ~fchanged ; 0FFBFh	
 16256                                  		; 10/12/2022
 16257 00001959 26806523BF              		and	byte [es:di+23h], 0BFh
 16258                                  		;and	word [es:di+23h], 0FFBFh ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 16259                                  					; ~fchanged
 16260 0000195E C3                      		retn
 16261                                  
 16262                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 16263                                  
 16264                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16265                                  ; haschange - see if drive can supply change line
 16266                                  ;
 16267                                  ;   inputs:	es:di points to current bds
 16268                                  ;   outputs:	zero set - no change line available
 16269                                  ;		zero reset - change line available
 16270                                  ;   registers modified: none
 16271                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16272                                  
 16273                                  haschange:
 16274                                  		;test	word [es:di+BDS.flags], fchangeline ; 2
 16275                                  		; 10/12/2022
 16276 0000195F 26F6452302              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 2		
 16277                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 2 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 16278                                  					; fchangeline
 16279 00001964 C3                      		retn
 16280                                  
 16281                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16282                                  
 16283                                  ; 16/10/2022
 16284                                  
 16285                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16286                                  ; set_volume_id      -	main routine, calls other routines.
 16287                                  ; read_volume_id     -	read the volume id and tells if it has been changed.
 16288                                  ; transfer_volume_id -	copy the volume id from tmp to special drive.
 16289                                  ; check_volume_id    -	compare volume id in tmp area with one expected for drive.
 16290                                  ; fat_check          -	see of the fatid has changed in the specified drive.
 16291                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16292                                  
 16293                                  ; set_volume_id
 16294                                  ;   if drive has changeline support, read in and set the volume_id
 16295                                  ; and the last fat_id byte. if no change line support then do nothing.
 16296                                  ;
 16297                                  ;   on entry:
 16298                                  ;	es:di points to the bds for this disk.
 16299                                  ;	ah contains media byte
 16300                                  ;
 16301                                  ;   on exit:
 16302                                  ;	carry clear:
 16303                                  ;	   successful call
 16304                                  ;	carry set
 16305                                  ;	   error and ax has error code
 16306                                  
 16307                                  set_volume_id:				
 16308 00001965 52                      		push	dx		; save registers
 16309 00001966 50                      		push	ax
 16310 00001967 E8F5FF                  		call	haschange	; does drive have changeline support?
 16311 0000196A 740B                    		jz	short setvret	; no, get out
 16312 0000196C E81000                  		call	read_volume_id
 16313 0000196F 7209                    		jb	short seterr
 16314 00001971 E8A800                  		call	transfer_volume_id ; copy the volume id	to special drive
 16315 00001974 E8E2FF                  		call	resetchanged	; restore value	of change line
 16316                                  setvret:				
 16317                                  		; 10/12/2022
 16318                                  		; cf = 0
 16319                                  		;clc			; no error, clear carry flag
 16320 00001977 58                      		pop	ax		; restore registers
 16321 00001978 5A                      		pop	dx
 16322 00001979 C3                      		retn
 16323                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16324                                  
 16325                                  seterr:					
 16326 0000197A 5A                      		pop	dx		; pop stack but don't overwrite ax
 16327 0000197B 5A                      		pop	dx		; restore dx
 16328 0000197C C3                      		retn
 16329                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16330 0000197D 0000                    root_sec:	dw 0			; root sector #
 16331                                  
 16332                                  ; 16/10/2022
 16333                                  ;ROOTSEC equ root_sec - DOSBIOSEG_2C7h		
 16334                                  ; 09/12/2022
 16335                                  ROOTSEC equ root_sec
 16336                                  
 16337                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 16338                                  
 16339                                  ; 16/10/2022
 16340                                  
 16341                                  ; read_volume_id read the volume id and tells if it has been changed.
 16342                                  ;
 16343                                  ;   on entry:
 16344                                  ;	es:di points to current bds for drive.
 16345                                  ;
 16346                                  ;   on exit:
 16347                                  ;	carry clear
 16348                                  ;	    si = 1  no change
 16349                                  ;	    si = 0  ?
 16350                                  ;	    si = -1 change
 16351                                  ;
 16352                                  ;	carry set:
 16353                                  ;	    error and ax has error code.
 16354                                  
 16355                                  read_volume_id:
 16356 0000197F 52                      		push	dx		; preserve registers
 16357 00001980 51                      		push	cx
 16358 00001981 53                      		push	bx
 16359 00001982 50                      		push	ax
 16360 00001983 06                      		push	es		; stack the bds last
 16361 00001984 57                      		push	di
 16362 00001985 1E                      		push	ds		; point es to Bios_Data
 16363 00001986 07                      		pop	es
 16364 00001987 BF[A108]                		mov	di, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 16365 0000198A BE[9508]                		mov	si, nul_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 16366                                  		;mov	cx, 11		; PCDOS 7.1 - 02/09/2023
 16367 0000198D B90C00                  		mov	cx, 12		; initialize tmp_vid to	null vi_id
 16368 00001990 F3A4                    		rep movsb
 16369 00001992 5F                      		pop	di
 16370 00001993 07                      		pop	es
 16371 00001994 268A450B                		mov	al, [es:di+11]	; [es:di+BDS.fats]
 16372                                  					; # of fats
 16373 00001998 268B4D11                		mov	cx, [es:di+17]	; [es:di+BDS.fatsecs]
 16374                                  					; sectors / fat
 16375 0000199C F6E1                    		mul	cl		; size taken by	fats
 16376 0000199E 26034509                		add	ax, [es:di+9]	; [es:di+BDS.resectors]
 16377                                  					; add on reserved sectors
 16378                                  					;
 16379                                  					; ax is	now sector # (0	based)
 16380                                  		; 17/10/2022
 16381 000019A2 2EA3[7D19]              		mov	[cs:ROOTSEC], ax
 16382                                  		;mov	word ptr cs:198Fh, ax ; [cs:root_sec]
 16383                                  					; 0070h:3EFFh =	2C7h:198Fh
 16384 000019A6 268B450C                		mov	ax, [es:di+12]	; [es:di+BDS.direntries]
 16385                                  					; # root dir entries
 16386 000019AA B104                    		mov	cl, 4		; 16 entries/sector
 16387 000019AC D3E8                    		shr	ax, cl		; divide by 16
 16388                                  		;mov	cx, ax		; cx is	# of sectors to	scan
 16389                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1, one byte opcode)
 16390 000019AE 91                      		xchg	ax, cx		; cx is	# of sectors to	scan
 16391                                  next_sec:
 16392 000019AF 51                      		push	cx		; save outer loop counter
 16393 000019B0 2EA1[7D19]              		mov	ax, [cs:ROOTSEC]
 16394                                  		;mov	ax, word ptr cs:198Fh ; [cs:root_sec]
 16395                                  					; get sector #
 16396 000019B4 268B4D13                		mov	cx, [es:di+19]	; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 16397                                  					; sectors / track
 16398 000019B8 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 16399 000019BA F7F1                    		div	cx
 16400                                  
 16401                                  ; set up registers for call to read_sector
 16402                                  
 16403 000019BC 42                      		inc	dx		; dx= sectors into track
 16404                                  					; ax= track count from 0
 16405 000019BD 88D1                    		mov	cl, dl		; sector to read
 16406 000019BF 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 16407 000019C1 26F77515                		div	word [es:di+21] ; [es:di+BDS.heads]
 16408                                  					; # heads on this disc
 16409 000019C5 88D6                    		mov	dh, dl		; head number
 16410 000019C7 88C5                    		mov	ch, al		; track	#
 16411 000019C9 E83BEE                  		call	read_sector	; get first sector of the root directory,
 16412                                  					; ds:bx	-> directory sector
 16413 000019CC 723F                    		jb	short readviderr
 16414 000019CE B91000                  		mov	cx, 16		; # of dir entries in a	block of root
 16415 000019D1 B008                    		mov	al, 8		; volume label bit
 16416                                  fvid_loop:
 16417                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 16418 000019D3 382F                    		cmp	[bx], ch ; 0				
 16419                                  		;cmp	byte [bx], 0 ; end of dir?
 16420 000019D5 7433                    		jz	short no_vid	; yes, no vol id
 16421 000019D7 803FE5                  		cmp	byte [bx], 0E5h ; empty entry?
 16422 000019DA 7405                    		jz	short ent_loop	; yes, skip
 16423 000019DC 84470B                  		test	[bx+11], al	; is volume label bit set in fcb?
 16424 000019DF 750F                    		jnz	short found_vid	; jmp yes
 16425                                  ent_loop:
 16426 000019E1 83C320                  		add	bx, 32		; add length of	directory entry
 16427 000019E4 E2ED                    		loop	fvid_loop
 16428 000019E6 59                      		pop	cx		; outer loop
 16429 000019E7 2EFF06[7D19]            		inc	word [cs:ROOTSEC]
 16430                                  		;inc	word ptr cs:198Fh ; inc word [root_sec]
 16431                                  					; next sector
 16432 000019EC E2C1                    		loop	next_sec	; continue
 16433                                  notfound:
 16434                                  		; 02/09/2023
 16435                                  		;xor	si, si
 16436 000019EE EB13                    		jmp	short fvid_ret
 16437                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16438                                  
 16439                                  found_vid:
 16440                                  		; 02/09/2023
 16441                                  		; cf = 0  ('test' instruction clears cf)  			
 16442 000019F0 59                      		pop	cx		; clean stack of outer loop counter
 16443 000019F1 89DE                    		mov	si, bx		; point	to volume_id
 16444 000019F3 06                      		push	es		; preserve current bds
 16445 000019F4 57                      		push	di
 16446 000019F5 1E                      		push	ds
 16447 000019F6 07                      		pop	es		; point es to Bios_Data
 16448 000019F7 BF[A108]                		mov	di, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 16449 000019FA B90B00                  		mov	cx, 11		; VOLID_SIZ-1
 16450                                  					; length of string minus nul
 16451 000019FD F3A4                    		rep movsb		; mov volume label to tmp_vid
 16452                                  		;xor	al, al
 16453                                  		; 02/09/2023
 16454 000019FF 91                      		xchg	ax, cx		; ax = 0
 16455 00001A00 AA                      		stosb			; null terminate
 16456                                  		;;xor	si, si
 16457                                  		; 02/09/2023
 16458                                  		;xchg	ax, si		; si = 0
 16459 00001A01 5F                      		pop	di		; restore current bds
 16460 00001A02 07                      		pop	es
 16461                                  fvid_ret:
 16462                                  		; 02/09/2023
 16463 00001A03 31F6                    		xor	si, si ; 0
 16464                                  				
 16465 00001A05 58                      		pop	ax
 16466                                  		; 10/12/2022
 16467                                  		; cf = 0
 16468                                  		;clc
 16469                                  rvidret:
 16470 00001A06 5B                      		pop	bx		; restore registers
 16471 00001A07 59                      		pop	cx
 16472 00001A08 5A                      		pop	dx
 16473 00001A09 C3                      		retn
 16474                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16475                                  
 16476                                  no_vid:
 16477 00001A0A 59                      		pop	cx		; clean stack of outer loop counter
 16478                                  		;jmp	short notfound	; not found
 16479                                  		; 02/09/2023
 16480 00001A0B EBF6                    		jmp	short fvid_ret
 16481                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16482                                  
 16483                                  readviderr:
 16484 00001A0D 5E                      		pop	si		; trash the outer loop counter
 16485 00001A0E 5E                      		pop	si		; caller's ax, return error code instead 
 16486 00001A0F EBF5                    		jmp	short rvidret
 16487                                  
 16488                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16489                                  		; 02/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (IO.SYS optimization)
 16490                                  		; PCDOS 7.1 - IBMBIO.COM - BIOSCODE:1DCFh 
 16491                                  preset_volid_addr:
 16492 00001A11 BE[A108]                		mov	si, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME    "
 16493                                  		;
 16494                                  		; PCDOS 7.1
 16495                                  		;add	di, 125		; BDS.volid
 16496                                  		;mov	cx, 11		; VOLID_SIZ (12 for MSDOS 5.0-6.22 versions)
 16497                                  		; MSDOS 6.21 (MSDOS 5.0 & 6.?)
 16498 00001A14 83C74B                  		add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 16499 00001A17 B90C00                  		mov	cx, 12		; VOLID_SIZ
 16500                                  		;
 16501 00001A1A FC                      		cld
 16502 00001A1B C3                      		retn
 16503                                  
 16504                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 16505                                  
 16506                                  ; transfer_volume_id - copy the volume id from tmp to special drive
 16507                                  ;
 16508                                  ; inputs:	es:di has current bds
 16509                                  ; outputs:	bds for drive has volume id from tmp
 16510                                  
 16511                                  transfer_volume_id:
 16512 00001A1C 57                      		push	di		; copy the volume id from tmp to special drive
 16513                                  		;push	si
 16514 00001A1D 51                      		push	cx
 16515                                  		; 27/12/2023
 16516 00001A1E 56                      		push	si
 16517                                  
 16518                                  		;mov	si, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 16519                                  		;;add	di, BDS.volid
 16520                                  		;add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 16521                                  		;;mov	cx, VOLID_SIZ
 16522                                  		;mov	cx, 12		; VOLID_SIZ
 16523                                  		;cld
 16524                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 16525 00001A1F E8EFFF                  		call	preset_volid_addr
 16526                                  
 16527 00001A22 F3A4                    		rep movsb
 16528                                  		
 16529                                  		; 27/12/2023
 16530 00001A24 5E                      		pop	si
 16531                                  chk_volid_ok:
 16532 00001A25 59                      		pop	cx
 16533                                  		;pop	si
 16534 00001A26 5F                      		pop	di
 16535 00001A27 C3                      		retn
 16536                                  
 16537                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 16538                                  
 16539                                  ;  check_volume_id - compare volume id in tmp area with
 16540                                  ;		     one expected for drive
 16541                                  ;
 16542                                  ;   inputs:	es:di has current bds for drive
 16543                                  ;   outputs:	zero true means it matched
 16544                                  
 16545                                  check_volume_id:
 16546 00001A28 57                      		push	di
 16547 00001A29 51                      		push	cx
 16548                                  		
 16549                                  		;mov	si, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 16550                                  		;;add	di, BDS.volid
 16551                                  		;add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 16552                                  		;;mov	cx, VOLID_SIZ
 16553                                  		;mov	cx, 12		; VOLID_SIZ
 16554                                  		;cld
 16555                                  		; 02/09/2023 (PCDOS 7.1)
 16556 00001A2A E8E4FF                  		call	preset_volid_addr
 16557                                  
 16558 00001A2D F3A6                    		repe cmpsb		; are the 2 volume_ids the same?
 16559                                  		
 16560                                  		; 27/12/2023
 16561                                  		;pop	cx
 16562                                  		;pop	di
 16563                                  		;retn
 16564 00001A2F EBF4                    		jmp	short chk_volid_ok
 16565                                  
 16566                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 16567                                  
 16568                                  ;   fat_check - see of the fatid has changed in the specified drive.
 16569                                  ;	      - uses the fat id obtained from the boot sector.
 16570                                  ;
 16571                                  ;   inputs:	medbyt is expected fat id
 16572                                  ;		es:di points to current bds
 16573                                  ;
 16574                                  ;   output:	si = -1 if fat id different,
 16575                                  ;		si = 0 otherwise
 16576                                  ;
 16577                                  ;   no other registers changed.
 16578                                  
 16579                                  fat_check:
 16580 00001A31 50                      		push	ax
 16581 00001A32 31F6                    		xor	si, si		; say fat id's are same.
 16582 00001A34 A0[1F01]                		mov	al, [medbyt]	; 19/10/2022
 16583 00001A37 263A4510                		cmp	al, [es:di+10h]	; [es:di+BDS.media]
 16584                                  					; compare it with the bds medbyte
 16585 00001A3B 7401                    		jz	short okret1	; carry	clear
 16586 00001A3D 4E                      		dec	si
 16587                                  okret1:
 16588 00001A3E 58                      		pop	ax
 16589 00001A3F C3                      		retn
 16590

 16608                                  number2mod	equ (number2div % 16)
 16609                                  
 16610                                  %if (number2mod>0) & (number2mod<16) ; 17/09/2023
 16611                                  		times (16-number2mod) db 0
 16612                                  %endif
 16613                                  
 16614                                  ;align 16
 16615                                  
 16616                                  ; 09/12/2022
 16617                                  BCODE_END	equ $ - BCode_start
 16618                                  ; 29/09/2023
 16619                                  BCODEEND:
 16620                                  ;SYSINITSEG	equ IOSYSCODESEG+(BCODE_END>>4)
 16621                                  ; 13/12/2022
 16622                                  SYSINITOFFSET	equ BCODE_END
 16623                                  SYSINITSEG	equ IOSYSCODESEG+(SYSINITOFFSET>>4)
 16624                                  
 16625                                  ; 30/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.2
 16626                                  ; (SYSINITSEG is 473h for MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 16627                                  
 16628                                  ;--- End of DOSBIOS code segment ---------------------------------------------
 16629                                  
 16630                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 16631                                  ; 01/05/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0 
 16632                                  ; ============================================================================
 16633                                  ; end of BIOSCODE

 16640                                  ; (IO.SYS) SYSINIT SEGMENT 
 16641                                  ;=============================================================================
 16642                                  ; 09/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 16643                                  ; 30/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)

 16646                                  
 16647                                  ; ****************************************************************************
 16648                                  ; SYSINIT.BIN (MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS) - RETRO DOS v4.0 by ERDOGAN TAN - 21/10/2022
 16649                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16650                                  ; Last Update: 04/01/2023 (Modified IO.SYS)  ((Previous: 30/12/2022))
 16651                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16652                                  ; Beginning: 03/06/2018 (Retro DOS 3.0), 21/03/2019 (Retro DOS 4.0)
 16653                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16654                                  ; Assembler: NASM version 2.15
 16655                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16656                                  ;	   ((nasm sysinit6.s -l sysinit6.lst -o SYSINIT6.BIN -Z error.txt)) 	
 16657                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16658                                  ; Modified from 'sysinit2.s' (SYSINIT2.BIN) file of Retro DOS v3.0 (6/7/2018)
 16659                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16660                                  ; Derived from 'SYSINIT1.ASM' and 'SYSINIT2.ASM' files of MSDOS 6.0
 16661                                  ; source code by Microsoft, 1991 
 16662                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16663                                  ; Derived from 'SYSINIT.ASM' file of MSDOS 2.0 (IBM PCDOS v2.0) source code
 16664                                  ; by Microsoft, 12/10/1983
 16665                                  ; ****************************************************************************
 16666                                  ; main file: 'retrodos4.s'
 16667                                  ; incbin 'SYSINIT3.BIN' ; (SYINITSEG)
 16668                                  
 16669                                  ; 30/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.2 
 16670                                  ; Retro DOS v4.0 - 2019
 16671                                  ; SYSINIT (MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS) draft: 'sysinit3.s' (01/07/2019)
 16672                                   
 16673                                  ; 21/10/2022
 16674                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16675                                  ; This source code (version) is based on SYSINIT source code of disassembled
 16676                                  ; MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS file (SYSINIT.BIN) 
 16677                                  ; Dissassembler: Hex-Rays Interactive Disassembler (IDA)
 16678                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 16679                                  ; Binary file splitter & joiner: FFSJ v3.3
 16680                                  
 16681                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 16682                                  ; SYSINIT.TXT (27/01/1983)
 16683                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 16684                                  ;    SYSINIT is  a module linked behind the OEM bios.  It takes
 16685                                  ;over  the  system  initialization  after  the  OEM  bios   has
 16686                                  ;performed any  initialization  it  needs  to  do.   Control is
 16687                                  ;transfered with a long jump to the external  variable  SYSINIT
 16688                                  ;
 16689                                  ;
 16690                                  ;   The OEM  has  the  following  variables declared external:
 16691                                  ;
 16692                                  ;   CURRENT_DOS_LOCATION    WORD
 16693                                  ;
 16694                                  ;This word  contains  the  segment  number of the DOS before it
 16695                                  ;is relocated.  The OEM bios must set this value.
 16696                                  ;
 16697                                  ;   FINAL_DOS_LOCATION      WORD
 16698                                  ;
 16699                                  ;This word contains the segment number of the DOS after SYSINIT
 16700                                  ;moves it.  The OEM bios must set this value.
 16701                                  ;
 16702                                  ;   DEVICE_LIST             DWORD
 16703                                  ;
 16704                                  ;This  double  word  pointer  points  to  the  linked  list  of
 16705                                  ;character and block device drivers.  The  OEM  must  set  this
 16706                                  ;value.
 16707                                  ;
 16708                                  ;   MEMORY_SIZE             WORD
 16709                                  ;
 16710                                  ;This word  contains  the  number  of  RAM  paragraphs.  If the
 16711                                  ;bios doesn't set  this  variable  SYSINIT  will  automatically
 16712                                  ;calculate it.   NOTE:  systems with PARITY checked memory must
 16713                                  ;size memory in the BIOS.  SYSINITs method is to  write  memory
 16714                                  ;and read it back until it gets a mismatch.
 16715                                  ;
 16716                                  ;   DEFAULT_DRIVE           BYTE
 16717                                  ;
 16718                                  ;This is  the initial default drive when the system first comes
 16719                                  ;up.  drive a=0, drive b=1,  etc.   If  the  bios  doesn't  set
 16720                                  ;it then drive a is assumed.
 16721                                  ;
 16722                                  ;   BUFFERS                 BYTE
 16723                                  ;
 16724                                  ;This is  the  default  number of buffers for the system.  This
 16725                                  ;value may be overridden by the user in  the  CONFIG.SYS  file.
 16726                                  ;It is DBed to 2 in SYSINIT it should be greater than 1.
 16727                                  ;
 16728                                  ;   FILES                   BYTE
 16729                                  ;
 16730                                  ;This is  the  default  number  of  files for the system.  This
 16731                                  ;value may be overridden by the user in  the  CONFIG.SYS  file.
 16732                                  ;It is  DBed  to  8 in SYSINIT, values less than 5 are ignored.
 16733                                  ;
 16734                                  ;   SYSINIT                 FAR
 16735                                  ;
 16736                                  ;The entry  point  of  the  SYSINIT  module.  OEM BIOS jumps to
 16737                                  ;this label at the end of its INIT code.
 16738                                  ;
 16739                                  ;   The OEM  has  the  following  variables declared public:
 16740                                  ;
 16741                                  ;   RE_INIT                 FAR
 16742                                  ;
 16743                                  ;This is an entry point which allows the BIOS to do some INIT
 16744                                  ;work  after  the  DOS is initialized.  ALL REGISTERS MUST BE
 16745                                  ;PRESERVED.  On entry DS points to the first available memory
 16746                                  ;(after  the DOS).  DS:0 points to a 100H byte program header
 16747                                  ;prefix which represents  the  "program"  currently  running.
 16748                                  ;This  program  should  be  thought  of  as  the OEM BIOS and
 16749                                  ;SYSINIT taken together.  This is not  a  normal  program  in
 16750                                  ;that  no  memory  is  allocated to it, it is running in free
 16751                                  ;memory.
 16752                                  ;NOTES:
 16753                                  ;     At the time this routine is called SYSINIT occupies the
 16754                                  ;highest 10K of memory ("highest" is determined by the  value
 16755                                  ;of the MEMORY_SIZE variable), DO NOT DO WRITES THERE.
 16756                                  ;     Since this is called AFTER DOS is initialized, you can
 16757                                  ;make system calls.  This also implies that the code for this
 16758                                  ;routine    CANNOT   be   thrown   away   by   use   of   the
 16759                                  ;FINAL_DOS_LOCATION since the DOS has already been moved.
 16760                                  ;     If you don't want  anything done just set this to point
 16761                                  ;at a FAR RET instruction.
 16762                                  
 16763                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 16764                                  ; TITLE   BIOS SYSTEM INITIALIZATION
 16765                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 16766                                  
 16767                                  ;include version.inc
 16768                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 16769                                  
 16770                                  ;FALSE   EQU     0
 16771                                  ;TRUE    EQU     0FFFFh
 16772                                  
 16773                                  ;IBMVER	    EQU     TRUE
 16774                                  ;IBMCOPYRIGHT EQU   FALSE
 16775                                  ;STACKSW    EQU	    TRUE		;Include Switchable Hardware Stacks
 16776                                  ;IBMJAPVER  EQU     FALSE		; If TRUE set KANJI true also
 16777                                  ;MSVER      EQU     FALSE
 16778                                  ;ALTVECT    EQU     FALSE		; Switch to build ALTVECT version
 16779                                  ;KANJI      EQU     FALSE
 16780                                  
 16781                                  ;(MSDOS 6.0, versiona.inc, 1991)
 16782                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 16783                                  ;MAJOR_VERSION  EQU	6
 16784                                  ;;MINOR_VERSION	EQU	0	;6.00
 16785                                  ;MINOR_VERSION  EQU	21	;6.21  ; 21/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 16786                                  
 16787                                  ; 22/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0)
 16788                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 16789                                  ;MAJOR_VERSION   EQU	5
 16790                                  ;MINOR_VERSION   EQU	0
 16791                                  
 16792                                  ; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21)
 16793                                  MAJOR_VERSION   EQU	6
 16794                                  MINOR_VERSION   EQU	22
 16795                                  
 16796                                  expected_version equ	(MINOR_VERSION<<8)+MAJOR_VERSION
 16797                                  
 16798                                  ;DOSREVNM equ	00000000b       ; m037 - bits 0-2 = revision number of DOS
 16799                                  				; currently 0.
 16800                                  DOSREVNM equ	00000111b	; [[[ 7 for Retro DOS v4.0 ]]] (21/03/2019)	
 16801                                  DOSINROM equ	00001000B       ; bit 3 of ver flags returned in BH
 16802                                  DOSINHMA equ	00010000B       ; bit 4 of ver flags 
 16803                                  
 16804                                  ;      if1
 16805                                  ;      %OUT  ... for DOS Version 5.00 ...
 16806                                  ;      endif
 16807                                  
 16808                                         ;******************************
 16809                                         ;Each assembler program should:
 16810                                         ;  mov ah,030h                   ;DOS Get Version function
 16811                                         ;  int 021h                      ;Version ret. in AX,minor version first
 16812                                         ;  cmp ax,expected_version       ;ALL utilities should check for an
 16813                                         ;  jne error_handler             ; EXACT version match.
 16814                                         ;******************************
 16815                                  
 16816                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 16817                                  ; device definitions
 16818                                  
 16819                                  ;Attribute bit masks
 16820                                  DEVTYP  EQU     8000h           ;Bit 15 - 1  if Char, 0 if block
 16821                                  DEVIOCTL EQU    4000h           ;Bit 14 - CONTROL mode bit
 16822                                  ISFATBYDEV EQU  2000h           ;Bit 13 - Device uses FAT ID bytes, comp media.
 16823                                  ISCIN   EQU     0001h           ;Bit 0 - This device is the console input.
 16824                                  ISCOUT  EQU     0002h           ;Bit 1 - This device is the console output.
 16825                                  ISNULL  EQU     0004h           ;Bit 2 - This device is the null device.
 16826                                  ISCLOCK EQU     0008h           ;Bit 3 - This device is the clock device.
 16827                                  ISIBM   EQU     0010h           ;Bit 4 - This device is special
 16828

 16842 00000001 ??                      .REQUNIT:	resb 1		;Device unit number
 16843 00000002 ??                      .REQFUNC:	resb 1		;Type of request
 16844 00000003 ????                    .REQSTAT:	resw 1		;Status Word
 16845 00000005 ????????????????                	resb 8		;Reserved for queue links
 16846                                  .size:
 16847                                  endstruc
 16848                                  
 16849                                  ;Status word masks
 16850                                  STERR   EQU     8000H           ;Bit 15 - Error
 16851                                  STBUI   EQU     0200H           ;Bit 9 - Buisy
 16852                                  STDON   EQU     0100H           ;Bit 8 - Done
 16853                                  STECODE EQU     00FFH           ;Error code
 16854                                  WRECODE EQU     0
 16855                                  
 16856                                  ;Function codes
 16857                                  DEVINIT EQU     0               ;Initialization
 16858                                  DINITHL EQU     26              ;Size of init header
 16859                                  DEVMDCH EQU     1               ;Media check
 16860                                  DMEDHL  EQU     15              ;Size of media check header
 16861                                  DEVBPB  EQU     2               ;Get BPB
 16862                                  DEVRDIOCTL EQU  3               ;IOCTL read
 16863                                  DBPBHL  EQU     22              ;Size of Get BPB header
 16864                                  DEVRD   EQU     4               ;Read
 16865                                  DRDWRHL EQU     22              ;Size of RD/WR header
 16866                                  DEVRDND EQU     5               ;Non destructive read no wait (character devs)
 16867                                  DRDNDHL EQU     14              ;Size of non destructive read header
 16868                                  DEVIST  EQU     6               ;Input status
 16869                                  DSTATHL EQU     13              ;Size of status header
 16870                                  DEVIFL  EQU     7               ;Input flush
 16871                                  DFLSHL  EQU     15              ;Size of flush header
 16872                                  DEVWRT  EQU     8               ;Write
 16873                                  DEVWRTV EQU     9               ;Write with verify
 16874                                  DEVOST  EQU     10              ;Output status
 16875                                  DEVOFL  EQU     11              ;Output flush
 16876                                  DEVWRIOCTL EQU  12              ;IOCTL write
