 35028                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35029                                  ;
 35030                                  ; Procedure Name	: umb_insert
 35031                                  ;
 35032                                  ; Inputs		: DOSDATA:UMB_HEAD = start of umb chain
 35033                                  ;			: BX = seg address of UMB to be linked in
 35034                                  ;			: DX = size of UMB to be linked in paras
 35035                                  ;			; DS = data
 35036                                  ;
 35037                                  ; Outputs		: links the UMB into the arena chain
 35038                                  ;
 35039                                  ; Uses			: AX, CX, ES, DX, BX
 35040                                  ;
 35041                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35042                                  
 35043                                  umb_insert:
 35044 00003253 1E                      	push	ds
 35045                                  
 35046                                  	; 31/12/2022
 35047                                  	; ds = cs
 35048                                  
 35049                                  	;mov	ds,[cs:DevDOSData]
 35050 00003254 8E1E[671F]              	mov	ds,[DevDOSData] ; 31/12/2022 
 35051                                  	;mov	ds,[8Ch]
 35052 00003258 8E1E8C00                	mov	ds,[UMB_ARENA]		; es = UMB_HEAD
 35053 0000325C 8CD8                    	mov	ax,ds
 35054 0000325E 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 35055                                  ui_next:
 35056 00003260 39D8                    	cmp	ax,bx			; Q: is current block above
 35057                                  					;    new block
 35058 00003262 770F                    	ja	short ui_insert		; Y: insert it
 35059                                  					; Q: is current block the
 35060                                  					;    last
 35061 00003264 26803E00005A            	cmp	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 35062 0000326A 745C                    	je	short ui_append		; Y: append new block to chain
 35063                                  					; N: get next block
 35064 0000326C 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax			; M005
 35065                                  	;call	get_next		; ax = es = next block
 35066 0000326E E83B01                  	call	_get_next_ ; 13/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 35067 00003271 EBED                    	jmp	short ui_next
 35068                                  
 35069                                  ui_insert:
 35070 00003273 8CD9                    	mov	cx,ds			; ds = previous arena
 35071 00003275 41                      	inc	cx			; top of previous block
 35072                                  
 35073 00003276 29D9                    	sub	cx,bx
 35074 00003278 F7D9                    	neg	cx			; cx = size of used block
 35075                                  	;mov	byte [0],'M'
 35076 0000327A C60600004D              	mov	byte [ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 35077                                  	;mov	word [1],8
 35078 0000327F C70601000800            	mov	word [ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 35079                                  	;mov	[3],cx
 35080 00003285 890E0300                	mov	[ARENA.SIZE],cx	
 35081                                  	;mov	word [8],4353h ; 'SC'
 35082 00003289 C70608005343            	mov	word [ARENA.NAME],'SC' ; 4353h
 35083                                  
 35084                                  ; prepare the arena at start of new block
 35085                                  
 35086 0000328F 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx
 35087 00003291 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 35088 00003297 26C70601000000          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],arena_owner_system ; 0
 35089                                  					; mark as free
 35090 0000329E 83EA02                  	sub	dx,2			; make room for arena at
 35091                                  					; start & end of new block
 35092 000032A1 2689160300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],dx
 35093                                  
 35094                                  ; prepare arena at end of new block
 35095                                  	
 35096 000032A6 01D3                    	add	bx,dx
 35097 000032A8 43                      	inc	bx
 35098 000032A9 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx			; es=arena at top of new block
 35099 000032AB 43                      	inc	bx			; bx=top of new block
 35100                                  
 35101                                  					; ax contains arena just above
 35102                                  					; this block
 35103 000032AC 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx			; ax = size of used block
 35104                                  	
 35105 000032AE 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal
 35106 000032B4 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 35107 000032BB 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax	
 35108 000032BF 26C70608005343          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME],'SC' ; 4353h
 35109                                  
 35110 000032C6 EB47                    	jmp	short ui_done
 35111                                  
 35112                                  ui_append:
 35113                                  					; es = arena of last block	
 35114 000032C8 2603060300              	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]	; ax=top of last block-1 para
 35115 000032CD 26832E030001            	sub	word [es:ARENA.SIZE],1	; reflect the space we are
 35116                                  					; going to rsrv on top of this 
 35117                                  					; block for the next arena.

 35122 000032DB 40                      	inc	ax
 35123 000032DC 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx			; ax=top of prev block - 
 35124                                  					;    seg. address of new block
 35125 000032DE F7D8                    	neg	ax
 35126                                  
 35127 000032E0 8EC1                    	mov	es,cx			; ds = arena of unused block
 35128                                  
 35129 000032E2 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal
 35130 000032E8 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 35131 000032EF 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax	
 35132 000032F3 26C70608005343          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME],'SC'
 35133                                  
 35134                                  ; prepare the arena at start of new block
 35135 000032FA 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx
 35136 000032FC 26C60600005A            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end
 35137 00003302 26C70601000000          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],arena_owner_system
 35138                                  					; mark as free
 35139 00003309 4A                      	dec	dx			; make room for arena
 35140 0000330A 2689160300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],dx	
 35141                                  ui_done:

 35143 0000330F 1F                      	pop	ds
 35144                                  	; ds = cs ; 31/12/2022
 35145                                  ;uc_done:	; 18/12/2022
 35146                                  au_exit:	; 09/09/2023
 35147 00003310 C3                      	retn

 35151                                  ; procedure : AllocUMB
 35152                                  ;
 35153                                  ;	Allocate all UMBs and link it to DOS arena chain
 35154                                  ;
 35155                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35156                                  
 35157                                  AllocUMB:
 35158                                  	; 31/12/2022
 35159                                  	; ds = cs
 35160 00003311 E84700                  	call	InitAllocUMB		; link in the first UMB
 35161 00003314 72FA                    	jc	short au_exit		; quit on error
 35162                                  au_next:
 35163 00003316 E87000                  	call	umb_allocate		; allocate
 35164 00003319 7205                    	jc	short au_coalesce
 35165 0000331B E835FF                  	call	umb_insert		; & insert till no UMBs
 35166 0000331E EBF6                    	jmp	short au_next
 35167                                  au_coalesce:
 35168                                  	; 09/09/2023
 35169                                  ;	call	umb_coalesce		; coalesce all UMBs
 35170                                  ;au_exit:
 35171                                  ;	; 31/12/2022
 35172                                  ;	; ds = cs
 35173                                  ;	retn
 35174                                  
 35175                                  	; 09/09/2023
 35176                                  	;jmp	short umb_coalesce
 35177                                  
 35178                                  ; 09/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 35179                                  
 35180                                  ; 13/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 35181                                  
 35182                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35183                                  ;
 35184                                  ;**	umb_coalesce - Combine free blocks ahead with current block
 35185                                  ;
 35186                                  ;	Coalesce adds the block following the argument to the argument block,
 35187                                  ;	if it's free. Coalesce is usually used to join free blocks, but
 35188                                  ;	some callers (such as $setblock) use it to join a free block to it's
 35189                                  ;	preceeding allocated block.
 35190                                  ;
 35191                                  ;	EXIT	'C' clear if OK
 35192                                  ;		  (ds) unchanged, this block updated
 35193                                  ;		  (ax) = address of next block, IF not at end
 35194                                  ;		'C' set if arena trashed
 35195                                  ;	USES	cx, di, ds, es
 35196                                  ;
 35197                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35198                                  
 35199                                  umb_coalesce:
 35200                                  	; 31/12/2022
 35201                                  	; ds = cs
 35202 00003320 1E                      	push	ds ; *!
 35203                                  
 35204 00003321 31FF                    	xor	di, di
 35205                                  
 35206                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevDOSData]
 35207                                  	; 31/12/2022
 35208 00003323 8E06[671F]              	mov	es,[DevDOSData]
 35209 00003327 268E068C00              	mov	es,[es:UMB_ARENA]	; es = UMB_HEAD
 35210                                  uc_nextfree:
 35211 0000332C 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 35212 0000332E 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax
 35213                                  	;cmp	[es:1],di
 35214 00003330 26393E0100              	cmp	[es:ARENA.OWNER],di	; Q: is current arena free
 35215 00003335 7407                    	je	short uc_again		; Y: try to coalesce with next block
 35216                                  					; N: get next arena
 35217 00003337 E86B00                  	call	get_next		; es, ax = next arena
 35218 0000333A 72D3                    	jc	short uc_done	; *!
 35219 0000333C EBEE                    	jmp	short uc_nextfree
 35220                                  uc_again:
 35221 0000333E E86400                  	call	get_next		; es, ax = next arena
 35222 00003341 72CC                    	jc	short uc_done	; *!
 35223                                  uc_check:
 35224 00003343 26393E0100              	cmp     [es:ARENA.OWNER],di	; Q: is arena free
 35225 00003348 75E2                    	jne	short uc_nextfree	; N: get next free arena
 35226                                  					; Y: coalesce
 35227 0000334A 268B0E0300              	mov     cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]      ; cx <- next block size
 35228 0000334F 41                      	inc     cx                      ; cx <- cx + 1 (for header size)
 35229                                  	;add	[3],cx
 35230 00003350 010E0300                	add     [ARENA.SIZE],cx		; current size <- current size + cx
 35231 00003354 268A0D                  	mov     cl,[es:di]              ; move up signature
 35232 00003357 880D                    	mov     [di],cl
 35233 00003359 EBE3                    	jmp     short uc_again		; try again
 35234                                  
 35235                                  	; 18/12/2022

 35287                                  ;
 35288                                  ; Procedure Name	: umb_allocate
 35289                                  ;
 35290                                  ; Inputs		: DS = data
 35291                                  ;
 35292                                  ; Outputs		: if UMB available
 35293                                  ;				Allocates the largest available UMB and 
 35294                                  ;			  	BX = segment of allocated block
 35295                                  ;				DX = size of allocated block
 35296                                  ;				NC
 35297                                  ;			  else 
 35298                                  ;				CY
 35299                                  ;
 35300                                  ; Uses			: BX, DX
 35301                                  ;

 35304                                  umb_allocate:
 35305                                  	; 31/12/2022
 35306                                  	; ds = cs

 35309 0000338C BAFFFF                  	mov	dx,0FFFFh		; try to allocate largest
 35310                                  					;   possible
 35311                                  	; 31/12/2022
 35312 0000338F FF1E[501F]              	call	far [DevXMSAddr]
 35313                                  	;call	far [cs:DevXMSAddr]
 35314                                  					; dx now contains the size of
 35315                                  					; the largest UMB
 35316 00003393 09D2                    	or	dx,dx
 35317 00003395 740B                    	jz	short ua_err
 35318                                  	
 35319 00003397 B410                    	mov	ah,XMM_REQUEST_UMB ; 16
 35320                                  
 35321                                  	; 31/12/2022
 35322 00003399 FF1E[501F]              	call	far [DevXMSAddr]
 35323                                  	;call	far [cs:DevXMSAddr]
 35324                                  
 35325 0000339D 83F801                  	cmp	ax,1			; Q: was the reqst successful
 35326                                  	;jne	short ua_err		; N: error
 35327                                  	; 27/07/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 35328 000033A0 7601                    	jna	short ua_done ; if ax=1 then cf=0, else cf=1 (ax=0)
 35329                                  ua_err:
 35330 000033A2 F9                      	stc	
 35331                                  
 35332                                  	;clc
 35333                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35334                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35335                                  	; cf=0
 35336                                  	;clc 
 35337                                  ua_done:
 35338 000033A3 58                      	pop	ax
 35339 000033A4 C3                      	retn

 35378                                  ; procedure : LinkFirstUMB

 35385                                  	; 31/12/2022
 35386                                  	; ds = cs

 35389

 35391                                  ; dx = size of UMB
 35392                                  
 35393                                  	; 31/12/2022
 35394                                  	; ds = cs
 35395

 35397 000033BF B106                    	mov	cl,6
 35398 000033C1 D3E0                    	shl	ax,cl			; ax = size in paragraphs
 35399                                  
 35400 000033C3 89C1                    	mov	cx,ax			; cx = size in paras
 35401 000033C5 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx			; ax = - size of unused block
 35402                                  
 35403 000033C7 F7D8                    	neg	ax
 35404                                  
 35405                                  	;sub	cx,1			; cx = first umb_arena
 35406                                  	; 09/09/2023

 35408 000033CA 8EC1                    	mov	es,cx			; es = first umb_arena
 35409                                  	
 35410 000033CC 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 35411 000033D2 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 35412                                  					
 35413 000033D9 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax	
 35414 000033DD 26C70608005343          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME],'SC' ; 4353h
 35415

 35417                                  
 35418 000033E4 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx			; es has first free umb seg
 35419 000033E6 26C60600005A            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 35420 000033EC 26C70601000000          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],arena_owner_system ; 0	
 35421                                  					; mark as free 
 35422 000033F3 4A                      	dec	dx			; make room for arena
 35423 000033F4 2689160300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],dx	
 35424                                  
 35425                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevDOSData]
 35426                                  	; 31/12/2022

 35428                                  	; 18/09/2023
 35429 000033FD 26890E8C00              	mov	[es:UMB_ARENA],cx

 35432                                  					;  data segment with the arena
 35433                                  					;  just below Top of Mem

 35436                                  
 35437                                  	;mov	di,DOS_ARENA ; 24h

 35439                                  	; 18/09/2023
 35440 00003402 268E062400              	mov	es,[es:DOS_ARENA]
 35441 00003407 31FF                    	xor	di,di
 35442                                  ;scan_next
 35443                                  ; 09/12/2022
 35444                                  scannext:
 35445 00003409 26803D5A                	cmp	byte [es:di],arena_signature_end  ; 'Z'
 35446 0000340D 740C                    	je	short got_last
 35447

 35449 00003411 2603060300              	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 35450 00003416 40                      	inc	ax
 35451 00003417 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 35452                                  	;jmp	short scan_next
 35453                                  	; 09/12/2022
 35454 00003419 EBEE                    	jmp	short scannext
 35455                                  got_last:
 35456                                  	;sub	word [es:ARENA.SIZE],1
 35457                                  	; 09/09/2023
 35458 0000341B 26FF0E0300              	dec	word [es:ARENA.SIZE]
 35459                                  
 35460 00003420 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 35461                                  	;clc
 35462                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35463                                  	; 11/12/2022
 35464                                  	; cf=0
 35465                                  	;clc
 35466 00003426 C3                      	retn
 35467                                  
 35468                                  ; 11/12/2022
 35469                                  ;;lfu_err:
 35470                                  ;	;stc

 35473                                  ;	; cf=1
 35474                                  ;	;stc
 35475                                  ;	retn

 35478                                  ;
 35479                                  ; procedure : ShrinkUMB
 35480                                  ;
 35481                                  ;	Shrinks the current UMB in use, so that the unused portions
 35482                                  ;	of the UMB is given back to the DOS free mem pool
 35483                                  ;
 35484                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35485                                  
 35486                                  ShrinkUMB:
 35487                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35488                                  	; ds = cs
 35489 00003427 833E[4A1F]00            	cmp	word [DevUMBAddr],0
 35490                                  	;cmp	word [cs:DevUMBAddr],0
 35491 0000342C 741F                    	je	short su_exit
 35492 0000342E 06                      	push	es
 35493                                  	; 01/01/2023
 35494                                  	;push	bx
 35495                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35496                                  	;mov	bx,[cs:DevUMBFree]
 35497                                  	;sub	bx,[cs:DevUMBAddr]
 35498                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevUMBAddr]
 35499 0000342F 8B1E[4E1F]              	mov	bx,[DevUMBFree]
 35500 00003433 2B1E[4A1F]              	sub	bx,[DevUMBAddr]
 35501 00003437 8E06[4A1F]              	mov	es,[DevUMBAddr]
 35502                                  	
 35503 0000343B B8004A                  	mov	ax,4A00h
 35504 0000343E CD21                    	int	21h
 35505                                  		; DOS - 2+ - ADJUST MEMORY BLOCK SIZE (SETBLOCK)
 35506                                  		; ES = segment address of block to change
 35507                                  		; BX = new size in paragraphs
 35508 00003440 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 35509 00003442 48                      	dec	ax
 35510 00003443 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 35511 00003445 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8
 35512                                  	; 01/01/2023
 35513                                  	;pop	bx
 35514 0000344C 07                      	pop	es
 35515                                  su_exit:
 35516 0000344D C3                      	retn

 35528                                  	; ds = cs
 35529 0000344E 1E                      	push	ds
 35530 0000344F 06                      	push	es
 35531                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35532 00003450 803E[661F]00            	cmp	byte [FirstUMBLinked],0
 35533                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:FirstUMBLinked],0

 35535                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35536 00003457 8E06[671F]              	mov	es,[DevDOSData]
 35537                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevDOSData]	; get DOS data seg
 35538 0000345B 268E1E2400              	mov	ds,[es:DOS_ARENA]
 35539 00003460 268B3E8C00              	mov	di,[es:UMB_ARENA]
 35540                                  ulu_next:
 35541 00003465 E83DFF                  	call	get_next
 35542 00003468 720D                    	jc	short ulu_x
 35543 0000346A 39C7                    	cmp	di,ax			; is the next one UMB ?
 35544 0000346C 7404                    	je	short ulu_found
 35545 0000346E 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax
 35546 00003470 EBF3                    	jmp	short ulu_next
 35547                                  ulu_found:
 35548                                  	;mov	byte [0],'Z'
 35549 00003472 C60600005A              	mov     byte [ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 35550                                  ulu_x:

 35552 00003478 1F                      	pop	ds
 35553 00003479 C3                      	retn

 35555                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 35556                                  ; SYSINIT2.ASM - MSDOS 6.0 - 1991
 35557                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 35558                                  ; 14/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 35559                                  
 35560                                  ; Multiple configuration block support  Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35561                                  ;
 35562                                  ; Summary:
 35563                                  ;
 35564                                  ;   The procedure "organize" crunches the in-memory copy of config.sys
 35565                                  ;   into lines delimited by CR/LF (sometimes no CR, but *always* an LF)
 35566                                  ;   with the leading "keyword=" replaced by single character codes (eg, B
 35567                                  ;   for BUFFERS, D for DEVICE, Z for any unrecognized keyword); see comtab
 35568                                  ;   and/or config.inc for the full list.
 35569                                  ;
 35570                                  ;   [blockname] and INCLUDE are the major syntactical additions for multi-
 35571                                  ;   configuration support. blockname is either MENU, which contains one
 35572                                  ;   or more MENUITEM lines, an optional MENUDEFAULT (which includes optional
 35573                                  ;   time-out), or any user-defined keyword, such as NETWORK, CD-ROM, etc.
 35574                                  ;   INCLUDE allows the current block to name another block for inclusion
 35575                                  ;   during the processing phase of CONFIG.SYS. An INCLUDE is only honored
 35576                                  ;   once, precluding nasty infinite-loop scenarios. If blocks are present
 35577                                  ;   without a MENU block, then only lines inside COMMON blocks are processed.
 35578                                  ;
 35579                                  ; Example:
 35580                                  ;
 35581                                  ;   [menu]
 35582                                  ;   menuitem=misc,Miscellaneous
 35583                                  ;   menuitem=network,Network Configuration
 35584                                  ;   menudefault=network,15
 35585                                  ;
 35586                                  ;   [network]
 35587                                  ;   include misc
 35588                                  ;   device=foo
 35589                                  ;
 35590                                  ;   [misc]
 35591                                  ;   device=bar
 35592                                  ;   include alternate
 35593                                  ;
 35594                                  ;   [alternate]
 35595                                  ;   device=tar
 35596                                  ;
 35597                                  ;
 35598                                  ;   When the menu is displayed
 35599                                  ;
 35600                                  ;    1. Miscellaneous
 35601                                  ;    2. Network Configuration
 35602                                  ;
 35603                                  ;   #2 is highlighted as the default option, and will be automatically
 35604                                  ;   selected after 15 seconds. It will invoke the following lines in the
 35605                                  ;   following order:
 35606                                  ;
 35607                                  ;       DEVICE=BAR
 35608                                  ;       DEVICE=TAR
 35609                                  ;       DEVICE=FOO
 35610                                  ;
 35611                                  
 35612                                  ;MULTI_CONFIG equ 1
 35613                                  
 35614                                  ; the following depend on the positions of the various letters in switchlist
 35615                                  
 35616                                  switchnum	equ 11111000b ; 0F8h	; which switches require number
 35617                                  
 35618                                  flagec35	equ 00000100b ; 4	; electrically compatible 3.5 inch disk drive
 35619                                  flagdrive	equ 00001000b ; 8 
 35620                                  flagcyln	equ 00010000b ; 16
 35621                                  flagseclim	equ 00100000b ; 32
 35622                                  flagheads	equ 01000000b ; 64
 35623                                  flagff		equ 10000000b ; 128
 35624                                  
 35625                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35626                                  ; 19/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 35627                                  
 35628                                  ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:3E78h
 35629                                  
 35630                                  ; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 35631                                  ; MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:3054h
 35632                                  
 35633 0000347A 00                      insert_blank:	db 	0
 35634

 35637                                  ; procedure : setparms
 35638                                  ;
 35639                                  ; the following set of routines is used to parse the drivparm = command in
 35640                                  ; the config.sys file to change the default drive parameters.
 35641                                  ;

 35643                                  
 35644                                  setparms:
 35645 0000347B 1E                      	push	ds
 35646 0000347C 50                      	push	ax
 35647 0000347D 53                      	push	bx
 35648 0000347E 51                      	push	cx
 35649 0000347F 52                      	push	dx
 35650                                  
 35651 00003480 0E                      	push	cs
 35652 00003481 1F                      	pop	ds
 35653                                  
 35654 00003482 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx
 35655 00003484 8A1E[3649]              	mov	bl,[drive]
 35656                                  	; 18/12/2022
 35657 00003488 43                      	inc	bx
 35658                                  	;inc	bl			; get it correct for ioctl call
 35659                                  					; (1=a,2=b...)
 35660 00003489 BA[0E48]                	mov	dx,deviceparameters
 35661                                  	;mov	ah,IOCTL ; 44h
 35662                                  	;mov	al,GENERIC_IOCTL ; 0Dh
 35663                                  	; 04/07/2023
 35664 0000348C B80D44                  	mov	ax,(IOCTL<<8)|GENERIC_IOCTL
 35665                                  	;mov	ch,RAWIO ; 8
 35666                                  	;mov	cl,SET_DEVICE_PARAMETERS ; 40h
 35667                                  	; 04/07/2023
 35668 0000348F B94008                  	mov	cx,(RAWIO<<8)|SET_DEVICE_PARAMETERS 
 35669 00003492 CD21                    	int	21h
 35670                                  
 35671                                  ; 27/07/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 35672 00003494 8A26[3749]              	mov	ah,[switches]
 35673                                  	;mov	al,[deviceparameters+20]
 35674 00003498 A0[2248]                	mov	al,[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK]
 35675 0000349B 8A0E[3649]              	mov	cl,[drive]
 35676                                  ;
 35677                                  ;; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35678                                  ;	;;mov	ax,Bios_Data		; get Bios_Data segment
 35679                                  ;	;mov	ax,KERNEL_SEGMENT ; 70h
 35680                                  ;	; 21/10/2022
 35681                                  ;	;mov	ax,DOSBIODATASEG ; 0070h	
 35682                                  ;	;mov	ds,ax			; set Bios_Data segment
 35683                                  ;
 35684                                  ;	; 27/07/2023
 35685                                  ;	;;test	word [cs:switches],flagec35 ; 4
 35686                                  ;	;test	byte [cs:switches],flagec35
 35687                                  ;	;jz	short not_ec35
 35688                                  ;
 35689                                  ;	; 27/07/2023
 35690                                  ;	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35691                                  ;	;;test	word [switches],flagec35 ; 4
 35692                                  ;	; 12/12/2022
 35693                                  ;	;test	byte [switches],flagec35 ; 4
 35694                                  ;	;jz	short eot_ok
 35695                                  ;	
 35696                                  	;mov	cl,[cs:drive]		; which drive was this for?
 35697                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35698                                  	;mov	cl,[drive]
 35699                                  	; 27/07/2023
 35700                                  	;mov	ax,DOSBIODATASEG ; 0070h	
 35701                                  	;mov	ds,ax
 35702                                  
 35703 0000349F BA7000                  	mov	dx,DOSBIODATASEG
 35704 000034A2 8EDA                    	mov	ds,dx
 35705

 35707 000034A7 7408                    	jz	short not_ec35
 35708                                  
 35709                                  	;mov	al,1			; assume drive 0
 35710                                  	;shl	al,cl			; set proper bit depending on drive
 35711                                  	;;or	[531h],al ; (MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS Offset SYINIT:3EACh)
 35712                                  	;or	[ec35_flag],al		; set the bit in the permanent flags
 35713                                  	; 27/07/2023
 35714 000034A9 B401                    	mov	ah,1
 35715 000034AB D2E4                    	shl	ah,cl
 35716 000034AD 0826[2005]              	or	[ec35_flag],ah
 35717                                  
 35718                                  ; 07/07/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 35719                                  ;	MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYINIT:3EB0h	
 35720                                  ; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35721                                  not_ec35:
 35722                                  ;	Now adjust the BIOS's EOT variable if our new drive has more
 35723                                  ;	sectors per track than any old ones.
 35724                                  
 35725                                  	; 27/07/2023
 35726                                  	;;mov	al,[cs:deviceparameters+20]
 35727                                  	;mov	al,[cs:deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK]
 35728                                  	
 35729                                  	;cmp	al,[12Ch] ; (MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS Offset SYINIT:3EB4h)
 35730 000034B1 3A06[2C01]              	cmp	al,[eot]
 35731 000034B5 7603                    	jbe	short eot_ok
 35732 000034B7 A2[2C01]                	mov	[eot],al
 35733                                  eot_ok:
 35734 000034BA 5A                      	pop	dx			; fix up all the registers
 35735 000034BB 59                      	pop	cx
 35736 000034BC 5B                      	pop	bx
 35737 000034BD 58                      	pop	ax
 35738 000034BE 1F                      	pop	ds ; 13/05/2019
 35739 000034BF C3                      	retn

 35743                                  ; procedure : diddleback
 35744                                  ;
 35745                                  ; replace default values for further drivparm commands
 35746                                  ;

 35771                                  ; procedure : parseline
 35772                                  ;
 35773                                  ; entry point is parseline. al contains the first character in command line.
 35774                                  ;
 35775                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35776                                  
 35777                                  	; 03/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)

 35785

 35787                                  
 35788                                  	;push	cs ; *
 35789                                  	;pop	ds ; *
 35790                                  
 35791                                  nextswtch:
 35792                                  	cmp	al,cr			; carriage return?
 35793                                  	je	short done_line
 35794                                  	cmp	al,lf			; linefeed?
 35795                                  	je	short put_back		; put it back and done
 35796                                  
 35797                                  ; anything less or equal to a space is ignored.

 35801                                  	cmp	al,'/'

 35820                                  	;jmp	short exitpl		; exit if error
 35821

 35859                                  ; procedure : check_switch
 35860                                  ;
 35861                                  ; processes a switch in the input. it ensures that the switch is valid, and
 35862                                  ; gets the number, if any required, following the switch. the switch and the
 35863                                  ; number *must* be separated by a colon. carry is set if there is any kind of
 35864                                  ; error.

 35868                                  ; 09/09/2023

 36134                                  ;
 36135                                  ; procedure : setdeviceparameters
 36136                                  ;
 36137                                  ; setdeviceparameters sets up the recommended bpb in each bds in the
 36138                                  ; system based on the form factor. it is assumed that the bpbs for the
 36139                                  ; various form factors are present in the bpbtable. for hard files,
 36140                                  ; the recommended bpb is the same as the bpb on the drive.
 36141                                  ; no attempt is made to preserve registers since we are going to jump to
 36142                                  ; sysinit straight after this routine.
 36143                                  ;
 36144                                  ;	if we return carry, the DRIVPARM will be aborted, but presently
 36145                                  ;	  we always return no carry
 36146                                  ;
 36147                                  ;	note:  there is a routine by the same name in msdioctl.asm
 36148                                  ;
 36149                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36150                                  
 36151                                  ; 15/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 36152                                  
 36153                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 36154                                  
 36155                                  	; 03/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 36156                                  	; (SYSINIT:3FC4h)
 36157                                  
 36158                                  	; 09/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 36159                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - SYSINIT:4236h)
 36160                                  
 36161                                  setdeviceparameters:
 36162                                  	; 03/01/2023
 36163                                  	; ds = cs
 36164                                  
 36165 0000359F 06                      	push	es
 36166

 36168 000035A1 07                      	pop	es

 36173 000035AB 7506                    	jne	short got_80

 36176                                  							; 48 tpi=40 cyl
 36177                                  got_80:

 36179 000035B5 8BB7[B649]              	mov	si,[bpbtable+bx]	; get address of bpb
 36180

 36210                                  	;mov	[deviceparameters+22],ax

 36212                                  
 36213                                  heads_not_altered:
 36214                                  
 36215                                  ; set up correct media descriptor byte and sectors/cluster
 36216                                  ;   sectors/cluster is always 2 except for any one sided disk or 1.44M
 36217

 36219                                  	; 02/11/2022
 36220                                  	;mov	byte [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERCLUSTER],2
 36221                                  	; 03/01/2023

 36223 000035E0 A2[1748]                	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERCLUSTER],al ; 2

 36226

 36228

 36232

 36234                                  	; ax = 2
 36235 000035E9 3906[2448]              	cmp	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_HEADS],ax ; >2 heads?
 36236                                  	;cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_HEADS],2 ; >2 heads?
 36237 000035ED 773C                    	ja	short got_correct_mediad ; just use default if heads>2
 36238                                  
 36239 000035EF 7524                    	jne	short only_one_head	; one head, do one head stuff
 36240                                  
 36241                                  ;	two head drives will use the mediadescriptor from the bpb
 36242                                  
 36243 000035F1 88FB                    	mov	bl,bh			; get mediadescriptor from bpb
 36244                                  
 36245                                  ;	two sided drives have two special cases to look for. One is
 36246                                  ;	   a 320K diskette (40 tracks, 8 secs per track). It uses
 36247                                  ;	   a mediaid of 0fch. The other is 1.44M, which uses only
 36248                                  ;	   one sector/cluster.
 36249                                  
 36250                                  ;	any drive with 18secs/trk, 2 heads, 80 tracks, will be assumed
 36251                                  ;	   to be a 1.44M and use only 1 sector per cluster. Any other
 36252                                  ;	   type of 2 headed drive is all set.
 36253

 36709 0000379A FE06[5103]              	inc	byte [cmmt]
 36710                                  
 36711                                  get_cmt_end:

 36713 000037A1 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf

 36715                                  end_commd_line_brdg: 
 36716 000037A5 E997FE                  	jmp	end_commd_line		; else jmp to end_commd_line
 36717                                  
 36718                                  org_put_zero:				; make the filename in front of
 36719 000037A8 26C60500                	mov	byte [es:di],0		;  the comment string to be an asciiz.
 36720 000037AC 47                      	inc	di

 36722                                  
 36723                                  end_file_slash: 			; al = "/" option char.

 36748

 36753 000037DF 3C20                    	cmp	al,' '  ; 20h
 36754 000037E1 77EF                    	ja	short org5
 36755                                  
 36756                                  	; 09/09/2023
 36757                                  	; (Note: PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM does not contain M051 modification)
 36758                                  
 36759                                  					; M051 - Start
 36760                                  	; 03/01/2023
 36761                                  	; ds = cs
 36762 000037E3 803E[5403]55                    cmp	byte [cmd_indicator],CONFIG_DEVICEHIGH

 36865                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36866                                  ;
 36867                                  ; procedure : skip_comment
 36868                                  ;
 36869                                  ;skip the commented string until lf, if current es:si-> a comment string.
 36870                                  ;in) es:si-> string
 36871                                  ;	 cx -> length.
 36872                                  ;out) zero flag not set if not found a comment string.
 36873                                  ;	  zero flag set if found a comment string and skipped it. al will contain
 36874                                  ;	  the line feed character at this moment when return.
 36875                                  ;	  ax register destroyed.
 36876                                  ;	  if found, si, cx register adjusted accordingly.
 36877                                  ;
 36878                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36879                                  
 36880                                  	; 03/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 36881                                  	; (SYSINIT:428Dh)
 36882                                  
 36883                                  skip_comment:
 36884 00003847 E3EA                    	jcxz	noget		; get out of the organize routine.
 36885                                  
 36886                                  	; 03/01/2023
 36887                                  	; ds = cs	
 36888                                  
 36889 00003849 803E[5003]00            	cmp	byte [com_level],0
 36890                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:com_level],0 ; only check it if parameter level is 0.
 36891 0000384E 752C                    	jne	short no_commt	 ; (not inside quotations)
 36892                                  
 36893 00003850 803E[5103]01            	cmp	byte [cmmt],1
 36894                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:cmmt],1
 36895 00003855 7225                    	jb	short no_commt
 36896                                  
 36897 00003857 268A04                  	mov	al,[es:si]
 36898                                  	
 36899 0000385A 3806[5203]              	cmp	[cmmt1],al
 36900                                  	;cmp	[cs:cmmt1],al
 36901 0000385E 751C                    	jne	short no_commt
 36902                                  
 36903 00003860 803E[5103]02            	cmp	byte [cmmt],2
 36904                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:cmmt],2
 36905 00003865 750A                    	jne	short skip_cmmt
 36906                                  
 36907 00003867 268A4401                	mov	al,[es:si+1]
 36908                                  	
 36909 0000386B 3806[5303]              	cmp	[cmmt2],al
 36910                                  	;cmp	[cs:cmmt2],al
 36911 0000386F 750B                    	jne	short no_commt
 36912                                  skip_cmmt:
 36913 00003871 E3C0                    	jcxz	noget		; get out of organize routine.
 36914 00003873 268A04                  	mov	al,[es:si]
 36915 00003876 46                      	inc	si
 36916 00003877 49                      	dec	cx
 36917 00003878 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf		; line feed?
 36918 0000387A 75F5                    	jne	short skip_cmmt
 36919                                  no_commt:
 36920 0000387C C3                      	retn

 36930                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36931                                  ;
 36932                                  ;   kbd_read: wait for keystroke
 36933                                  ;
 36934                                  ;   INPUT
 36935                                  ;       DS == CS == sysinitseg
 36936                                  ;
 36937                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36938                                  ;       Carry SET to clean boot, CLEAR otherwise
 36939                                  ;
 36940                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36941                                  ;       All
 36942                                  ;
 36943                                  ;   HISTORY
 36944                                  ;       Created 16-Nov-1992 by JeffPar
 36945                                  ;
 36946                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36947                                  
 36948                                  kbd_read:
 36949 0000387D F606[DA46]02                    test    byte [bDisableUI],2
 36950 00003882 7520                            jnz     short kbd_nodelay
 36951                                  
 36952 00003884 1E                              push    ds              ; the bios timer tick count is incremented
 36953 00003885 29C0                            sub     ax,ax           ; 18.2 times per second;
 36954 00003887 8ED8                            mov     ds,ax           ; watch the timer tick count for 37 transitions
 36955                                  	;mov	dx,[046Ch]	; get initial value
 36956                                  kbd_loop:
 36957 00003889 B401                            mov     ah,1            ;
 36958 0000388B CD16                            int     16h             ; peek the keyboard
 36959 0000388D 7514                            jnz	short kbd_loopdone ; something's there, get out
 36960 0000388F B402                            mov     ah,2            ; peek the shift states
 36961 00003891 CD16                            int     16h             ;
 36962 00003893 A803                            test    al,03h          ; either right or left shift key bits set?
 36963 00003895 750C                            jnz	short kbd_loopdone ; yes
 36964 00003897 A16C04                          mov     ax,[046Ch]	;
 36965                                  	;sub	ax,dx           ; get difference
 36966                                  	; 15/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 36967 0000389A 2E2B06[8603]            	sub	ax,[cs:_timer_lw_] ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:42E5h        
 36968                                  
 36969 0000389F 3C25                    	cmp     al,37           ; reached limit?  ; (2 seconds)
 36970 000038A1 72E6                            jb	short kbd_loop	; not yet
 36971                                  kbd_loopdone:
 36972 000038A3 1F                              pop     ds              ; delay complete!
 36973                                  kbd_nodelay:
 36974 000038A4 29DB                            sub     bx,bx           ; assume clean boot
 36975 000038A6 B402                            mov     ah,2            ; peek the shift states
 36976 000038A8 CD16                            int     16h             ;
 36977 000038AA A803                            test    al,03h          ; either right or left shift key bits set?
 36978 000038AC 7407                            jz      short kbd_notshift ; no
 36979 000038AE 43                              inc     bx              ; yes
 36980 000038AF 43                              inc     bx
 36981                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4301h
 36982 000038B0 800E[DE46]04            	or	byte [bQueryOpt],4
 36983                                  kbd_notshift:                   ;
 36984 000038B5 B401                            mov     ah,1            ; peek the keyboard
 36985 000038B7 CD16                            int     16h             ;
 36986 000038B9 743E                            jz	short kbd_test	; no key present
 36987 000038BB 08C0                            or      al,al           ; is it a function key?
 36988 000038BD 753A                            jnz	short kbd_test	; no
 36989                                  
 36990                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:430Bh
 36991 000038BF 80FC62                          cmp     ah,62h          ; CTRL F5
 36992 000038C2 7405                            je	short kbd_cfg_bypass
 36993                                  	
 36994 000038C4 80FC3F                          cmp     ah,3Fh          ; F5 function key?
 36995 000038C7 750D                            jne	short kbd_notf5	; no
 36996                                  kbd_cfg_bypass:
 36997 000038C9 BA[714B]                        mov     dx,_$CleanMsg
 36998 000038CC E8DD0B                          call    print
 36999                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:431Bh
 37000 000038CF 800E[DE46]04            	or	byte [bQueryOpt],4 
 37001 000038D4 EB16                            jmp     short kbd_eat   ; yes, clean boot selected
 37002                                  kbd_notf5:
 37003                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4322h
 37004 000038D6 80FC65                          cmp     ah,65h          ; CTRL F8
 37005 000038D9 7405                            je	short kbd_cfg_confirm
 37006                                  
 37007 000038DB 80FC42                          cmp     ah,42h          ; F8 function key?
 37008 000038DE 7523                            jne	short kbd_exit	; no
 37009                                  kbd_cfg_confirm:
 37010 000038E0 BA[AF4B]                        mov     dx,_$InterMsg
 37011 000038E3 E8C60B                          call    print           ;
 37012 000038E6 B301                            mov     bl,1            ; yes, interactive-boot option enabled
 37013 000038E8 881E[DE46]                      mov     [bQueryOpt],bl  ; change default setting
 37014                                  kbd_eat:                        ;
 37015 000038EC B400                            mov     ah,0            ;
 37016 000038EE CD16                            int     16h             ; eat the key we assumed was a signal
 37017 000038F0 C606[E446]FF                    mov	byte [secElapsed],-1
 37018 000038F5 09DB                            or      bx,bx           ;
 37019 000038F7 7405                            jz	short kbd_clean	;
 37020                                  kbd_test:                       ;
 37021 000038F9 80FB02                          cmp     bl,2            ;
 37022 000038FC 7205                            jb	short kbd_exit	;
 37023                                  kbd_clean:                      ;
 37024 000038FE E86E08                          call    disable_autoexec; yes, tell COMMAND to skip autoexec.bat
 37025 00003901 F9                              stc                     ; set carry to indicate abort
 37026 00003902 C3                              retn			;
 37027                                  kbd_exit:                       ;
 37028 00003903 F8                              clc                     ; clear carry to indicate success
 37029 00003904 C3                              retn			;

 37032                                  ;
 37033                                  ;   set_numlock: set numlock LED
 37034                                  ;
 37035                                  ;   INPUT
 37036                                  ;       ES:SI -> numlock setting (ie, "ON" or "OFF")
 37037                                  ;
 37038                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37039                                  ;       None
 37040                                  ;
 37041                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37042                                  ;       None
 37043                                  ;
 37044                                  ;   HISTORY
 37045                                  ;       Created 16-Nov-1992 by JeffPar
 37046                                  ;
 37047                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37048                                  
 37049                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2
 37050                                  
 37051                                  set_numlock:
 37052                                          ; 04/01/2023
 37053                                  	;push	ax
 37054 00003905 1E                              push    ds
 37055 00003906 29C0                            sub     ax,ax
 37056 00003908 8ED8                            mov     ds,ax
 37057 0000390A 268B04                          mov     ax,[es:si]      ; get 1st 2 bytes of value (ON or OF)
 37058 0000390D 2E3B06[4C4B]                    cmp     ax,[cs:OnOff+2]	; should we turn it off?
 37059 00003912 7507                            jne	short not_off	; no
 37060 00003914 80261704DF                      and     byte [0417h],~20h ; 0DFh
 37061 00003919 EB0D                            jmp     short set_done
 37062                                  not_off:
 37063 0000391B 2E3B06[4A4B]                    cmp     ax,[cs:OnOff]	; should we turn it on?
 37064 00003920 F9                              stc
 37065 00003921 7505                            jne	short set_done	; no
 37066 00003923 800E170420                      or      byte [0417h],20h
 37067                                  set_done:
 37068 00003928 1F                              pop     ds
 37069                                  	; 04/01/2023
 37070                                  	;pop	ax
 37071 00003929 C3                              retn

 37075                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37076                                  ;
 37077                                  ;   menu_check:  check for presence of menu (and other) configuration blocks
 37078                                  ;
 37079                                  ;   INPUT
 37080                                  ;       CX == "organized" config.sys memory image length
 37081                                  ;    ES:SI -> "organized" config.sys memory image
 37082                                  ;       DS == CS == sysinitseg
 37083                                  ;
 37084                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37085                                  ;       Same as above; the idea is that menu_check simply transforms
 37086                                  ;       a block-structured config.sys image into a conventional image,
 37087                                  ;       based on the user's block selection and any other boot-time options
 37088                                  ;       the user may have employed...
 37089                                  ;
 37090                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37091                                  ;       All
 37092                                  ;
 37093                                  ;   NOTES
 37094                                  ;       [count] and [org_count] are set to the new config.sys image length
 37095                                  ;
 37096                                  ;   HISTORY
 37097                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37098                                  ;
 37099                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37100                                  
 37101                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 37102                                  	; (SYSINIT:4378h)
 37103                                  
 37104                                  menu_check:
 37105                                  
 37106                                  ;   Search for SWITCHES, determine if /N or /F are present; if so, then
 37107                                  ;   disable clean/interactive boot options
 37108                                  
 37109 0000392A 51                              push    cx              ;
 37110 0000392B 56                              push    si              ;
 37111 0000392C 29DB                            sub     bx,bx           ; remains ZERO until first block
 37112                                  swchk_loop:                     ;
 37113 0000392E E83507                          call    get_char        ; get first char of current line
 37114 00003931 724C                            jc	short swchk_end	; hit eof
 37115 00003933 3C5B                            cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ; '['
 37116 00003935 7503                            jne	short swchk_next1 ;
 37117 00003937 43                              inc     bx              ; remember that we've seen a block
 37118 00003938 EB40                            jmp     short swchk_nextline
 37119                                  swchk_next1:                    ;
 37120 0000393A 3C4E                            cmp     al,CONFIG_NUMLOCK
 37121 0000393C 750E                            jne	short swchk_next2 ;
 37122 0000393E 09DB                            or      bx,bx           ; only do NUMLOCK commands that exist
 37123 00003940 7538                            jnz	short swchk_nextline ; before the first block
 37124 00003942 E8C0FF                          call    set_numlock     ; REM it out so we don't act on it later, too
 37125 00003945 26C644FF30                      mov     byte [es:si-1],CONFIG_REM
 37126 0000394A EB2E                            jmp     short swchk_nextline
 37127                                  swchk_next2:                    ;
 37128 0000394C 3C31                            cmp     al,CONFIG_SWITCHES
 37129 0000394E 752A                            jne	short swchk_nextline ; this line ain't it
 37130                                  swchk_scan:                     ;
 37131 00003950 E81307                          call    get_char        ; look for /N or /F
 37132                                  swchk_scan1:                    ;
 37133 00003953 3C0A                            cmp     al,LF           ; end of line?
 37134 00003955 7423                            je	short swchk_nextline ; yes
 37135 00003957 3C2F                            cmp     al,'/'          ; switch-char?
 37136 00003959 75F5                            jne	short swchk_scan ; no
 37137 0000395B E80807                          call    get_char        ;
 37138 0000395E 24DF                            and     al,~20h ; 0DFh	; convert to upper case
 37139 00003960 3A06[961E]                      cmp     al,[swit_n+1]	; 'N'
 37140 00003964 7507                            jne	short swchk_scan2 ; no
 37141 00003966 800E[DA46]01                    or      byte [bDisableUI],1
 37142 0000396B EBE3                            jmp	short swchk_scan ; continue looking for switches of interest
 37143                                  swchk_scan2:                    ;
 37144 0000396D 3A06[A21E]                      cmp     al,[swit_f+1]	; 'F'
 37145 00003971 75E0                            jne	short swchk_scan1 ; no
 37146 00003973 800E[DA46]02                    or      byte [bDisableUI],2
 37147 00003978 EBD6                            jmp     short swchk_scan ; continue looking for switches of interest
 37148                                  swchk_nextline:                 ;
 37149 0000397A E8C306                          call    skip_opt_line   ;
 37150 0000397D EBAF                            jmp     short swchk_loop ;
 37151                                  swchk_end:                      ;
 37152 0000397F 5E                              pop     si              ;
 37153 00003980 59                              pop     cx              ;
 37154                                  
 37155                                  ;   Do the keyboard tests for clean/interactive boot now, but only if
 37156                                  ;   the DisableUI flag is still clear
 37157                                  
 37158 00003981 F606[DA46]01                    test    byte [bDisableUI],1
 37159 00003986 7508                            jnz	short menu_search
 37160                                  ;
 37161                                  ;   Wait for 2 seconds first, UNLESS the /F bit was set in bDisableUI, or
 37162                                  ;   there is anything at all in the keyboard buffer
 37163                                  ;
 37164 00003988 E8F2FE                          call    kbd_read
 37165 0000398B 7303                            jnc	short menu_search
 37166 0000398D E9EE01                          jmp	menu_abort
 37167                                  
 37168                                  ;   Search for MENU block; it is allowed to be anywhere in config.sys
 37169                                  
 37170                                  menu_search:
 37171 00003990 29DB                            sub     bx,bx           ; if no MENU, default to zero for no_selection
 37172 00003992 BF[1F47]                        mov     di,szMenu	;
 37173 00003995 E80304                          call    find_block      ; find the MENU block
 37174 00003998 7337                            jnc	short menu_found ;
 37175 0000399A C606[1747]00                    mov     byte [szBoot],0
 37176 0000399F E90C02                          jmp	no_selection ; not found
 37177                                  
 37178                                  ;   Process the requested menu color(s)
 37179                                  
 37180                                  menu_color:
 37181 000039A2 51                      	push	cx              ;
 37182 000039A3 52                      	push	dx              ;
 37183                                  	;;mov	dx,0007h        ; default color setting
 37184                                  	; 10/09/2023
 37185                                  	;mov	dl,7 ; !*!
 37186 000039A4 E89E06                  	call	get_number	; get first number
 37187 000039A7 80E30F                  	and	bl,0Fh  ; !**!	; first # is foreground color (for low nibble)
 37188 000039AA 88DD                    	mov	ch,bl           ; save it in CH
 37189                                  	; 01/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization) by Erdogan Tan 
 37190                                  	; (high nibble of dl is 0)
 37191                                  	;and	dl,0F0h	; !*!	; (low nibble of dl would be zero)
 37192                                  	;or	dl,bl		; (low nibble of dl is 7) ! 14/08/2023
 37193 000039AC 88DA                    	mov	dl,bl	; 14/08/2023
 37194 000039AE E83108                  	call	delim           ; did we hit a delimiter
 37195 000039B1 750E                    	jne	short check_color ; no, all done
 37196 000039B3 E88F06                  	call	get_number	; get next number
 37197 000039B6 80E30F                  	and	bl,0Fh		; second # is background color (for high nibble)
 37198 000039B9 88DE                    	mov	dh,bl           ; save it in DH
 37199                                  	; 10/09/2023
 37200                                  	;and	dl,0Fh	; !**!	;
 37201 000039BB B104                    	mov	cl,4            ;
 37202 000039BD D2E3                    	shl	bl,cl           ;
 37203 000039BF 08DA                    	or	dl,bl           ;
 37204                                  check_color:
 37205 000039C1 38F5                    	cmp	ch,dh           ; are foreground/background the same?
 37206 000039C3 7503                    	jne	short set_color	; no
 37207 000039C5 80F208                  	xor	dl,08h          ; yes, so modify the fgnd intensity
 37208                                  set_color:
 37209 000039C8 8816[D546]              	mov	[bMenuColor],dl ;
 37210 000039CC 5A                      	pop	dx              ;
 37211 000039CD 59                      	pop	cx              ;
 37212 000039CE E9A900                  	jmp	menu_nextitem
 37213                                  
 37214                                  ;   Back to our regularly scheduled program (the COLOR and other goop
 37215                                  ;   above is there simply to alleviate short jump problems)
 37216                                  
 37217                                  menu_found:
 37218 000039D1 C606[DF46]01                    mov     byte [bDefBlock],1
 37219                                          ;mov	word [offDefBlock],0
 37220 000039D6 C606[E346]FF                    mov     byte [secTimeOut],-1
 37221 000039DB 8026[DE46]FD                    and     byte [bQueryOpt],~2 ; 0FDh
 37222                                  	; 10/09/2023
 37223 000039E0 29D2                    	sub	dx,dx
 37224 000039E2 8916[E146]              	mov	[offDefBlock],dx ; 0
 37225                                  
 37226 000039E6 E85706                          call    skip_opt_line   ; skip to next line
 37227                                  	; 10/09/2023
 37228                                  	;sub	dx,dx		; initialize total block count (0 => none yet)
 37229                                  
 37230                                  ;   Process the menu block now
 37231                                  
 37232                                  menu_process:
 37233 000039E9 E87A06                          call    get_char        ; get first char of current line
 37234 000039EC 722E                            jc	short to_menu_getdefault ; could happen if menu block at end (rare)
 37235 000039EE 247F                            and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 37236 000039F0 3C5B                            cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ; BEGIN implies END
 37237 000039F2 7428                            je	short to_menu_getdefault
 37238 000039F4 3C4F                            cmp     al,CONFIG_SUBMENU
 37239 000039F6 744D                            je	short menu_item	; go process sub-menu

 37241 000039FA 7449                            je	short menu_item	; go process menu item
 37242 000039FC 3C41                            cmp     al,CONFIG_MENUDEFAULT
 37243 000039FE 741E                            je	short menu_default ; go process menu default

 37246 00003A04 3C4E                            cmp     al,CONFIG_NUMLOCK
 37247 00003A06 740F                            je	short menu_numlock ;

 37249 00003A0A 746E                            je	short menu_nextitem ;
 37250 00003A0C E8C307                          call    any_delim       ; allow blank lines and such
 37251 00003A0F 7469                            je	short menu_nextitem ;
 37252 00003A11 F9                              stc                     ;
 37253 00003A12 E82607                          call    print_error     ; non-MENU command!
 37254 00003A15 EB63                            jmp     short menu_nextitem
 37255                                  menu_numlock:
 37256 00003A17 E8EBFE                          call    set_numlock
 37257 00003A1A EB5E                            jmp     short menu_nextitem
 37258                                  to_menu_getdefault:
 37259 00003A1C EB62                            jmp     short menu_getdefault
 37260                                  
 37261                                  ;   Save the offset of the default block name, we'll need it later
 37262                                  
 37263                                  menu_default:
 37264 00003A1E 8936[E146]                      mov     [offDefBlock],si; save address of default block name
 37265 00003A22 803E[E446]00                    cmp     byte [secElapsed],0
 37266 00003A27 751A                            jne	short timeout_skip ; secElapsed is only zero for the FIRST menu,
 37267 00003A29 E8EA05                          call    skip_token      ; and for subsequent menus IF nothing was typed;
 37268 00003A2C 724C                            jc	short menu_nextitem ; secElapsed becomes -1 forever as soon as
 37269 00003A2E E8FB05                          call    skip_delim      ; something is typed
 37270 00003A31 7247                            jc	short menu_nextitem ;
 37271 00003A33 89DE                            mov     si,bx           ;
 37272 00003A35 E80D06                          call    get_number      ; get number (of seconds for timeout)
 37273 00003A38 80FB5A                          cmp     bl,90           ; limit it to a reasonable number
 37274                                  	;jb	short timeout_ok ; (besides, 99 is the largest # my simple
 37275 00003A3B 7602                            jna	short timeout_ok ; 01/08/2023
 37276 00003A3D B35A                    	mov     bl,90           ;  display function can handle)
 37277                                  timeout_ok:                    ;
 37278 00003A3F 881E[E346]                      mov     [secTimeOut],bl ;
 37279                                  timeout_skip:
 37280 00003A43 EB35                            jmp     short menu_nextitem
 37281                                  
 37282                                  ;   Verify that this is a valid menu item by searching for the named block
 37283                                  
 37284                                  menu_item:
 37285                                  	;cmp	dl,9	; 04/01/2023
 37286 00003A45 80FA09                          cmp     dl,MAX_MULTI_CONFIG ; have we reached the max # of items yet?
 37287 00003A48 7330                            jae	short menu_nextitem ;
 37288 00003A4A 89F7                            mov     di,si           ; DS:DI -> block name to search for
 37289 00003A4C E83303                          call    srch_block      ;
 37290 00003A4F 7406                            je	short menu_itemfound ;
 37291 00003A51 F9                              stc                     ;
 37292 00003A52 E8E606                          call    print_error     ; print error and pause
 37293 00003A55 EB23                            jmp     short menu_nextitem ; if not found, ignore this menu item
 37294                                  
 37295                                  ;   srch_block, having succeeded, returns DI -> past the token that it
 37296                                  ;   just matched, which in this case should be a descriptive string; ES:SI
 37297                                  ;   and CX are unmodified
 37298                                  
 37299                                  menu_itemfound:
 37300 00003A57 42                              inc     dx              ; otherwise, increment total block count
 37301 00003A58 89D3                            mov     bx,dx           ; and use it to index the arrays of offsets
 37302 00003A5A 8887[E546]                      mov	[abBlockType+bx],al
 37303 00003A5E 01DB                            add     bx,bx           ; of recorded block names and descriptions
 37304                                  
 37305                                  ;   There should be a description immediately following the block name on
 37306                                  ;   MENUITEM line; failing that, we'll just use the block name as the
 37307                                  ;   description...
 37308                                  
 37309 00003A60 89B7[EF46]                      mov     [aoffBlockName+bx],si
 37310 00003A64 89B7[0347]                      mov     [aoffBlockDesc+bx],si
 37311 00003A68 89DF                            mov     di,bx           ; skip_delim modifies BX, so stash it in DI
 37312 00003A6A E8A905                          call    skip_token      ;
 37313 00003A6D 720B                            jc	short menu_nextitem ; hit eol/eof
 37314 00003A6F E8BA05                          call    skip_delim      ;
 37315 00003A72 7206                            jc	short menu_nextitem ; hit eol/eof
 37316 00003A74 87FB                            xchg    bx,di           ;
 37317 00003A76 89BF[0347]                      mov     [aoffBlockDesc+bx],di
 37318                                  
 37319                                  menu_nextitem:
 37320 00003A7A E8C305                          call    skip_opt_line   ;
 37321 00003A7D E969FF                          jmp     menu_process    ; go back for more lines
 37322                                  
 37323                                  ;   Display menu items now, after determining which one is default
 37324                                  
 37325                                  menu_getdefault:
 37326 00003A80 08D2                            or      dl,dl           ; where there any valid blocks at all?
 37327 00003A82 7505                            jnz	short menu_valid ; yes
 37328 00003A84 29DB                            sub     bx,bx           ; no, so force autoselect of 0
 37329 00003A86 E9ED00                          jmp     menu_autoselect ; (meaning: process common blocks only)
 37330                                  menu_valid:
 37331 00003A89 29DB                            sub     bx,bx           ;
 37332 00003A8B 8816[E046]                      mov     [bMaxBlock],dl  ; first, record how many blocks we found
 37333 00003A8F 8B3E[E146]                      mov     di,[offDefBlock];
 37334 00003A93 09FF                            or      di,di           ; does a default block exist?
 37335 00003A95 741C                            jz	short menu_nodefault ; no
 37336 00003A97 43                              inc     bx              ; yes, walk name table, looking for default
 37337                                  menu_chkdefault:
 37338 00003A98 53                              push    bx              ;
 37339 00003A99 01DB                            add     bx,bx           ;
 37340 00003A9B 8BB7[EF46]                      mov     si,[aoffBlockName+bx]
