 37341 00003A9F B98000                          mov     cx,128          ; arbitrary maximum length of a name
 37342 00003AA2 1E                              push    ds              ;
 37343 00003AA3 06                              push    es              ;
 37344 00003AA4 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 37345 00003AA5 E81A03                          call    comp_names      ; is this block the same as the default?
 37346 00003AA8 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 37347 00003AA9 5B                              pop     bx              ;
 37348 00003AAA 7409                            je	short menu_setdefault ; yes
 37349 00003AAC 43                              inc     bx              ;
 37350 00003AAD 3A1E[E046]                      cmp     bl,[bMaxBlock]  ; all done searching?
 37351 00003AB1 76E5                            jbe	short menu_chkdefault ; not yet
 37352                                  menu_nodefault:
 37353 00003AB3 B301                            mov     bl,1            ; if no default, force default to #1
 37354                                  menu_setdefault:
 37355 00003AB5 881E[DF46]                      mov     [bDefBlock],bl  ; yes, this will be the initial current block
 37356                                  
 37357                                  ;   If the timeout was explicitly set to 0 (or technically, anything that
 37358                                  ;   failed to resolve to a number, like "NONE" or "EAT POTATOES"), then we're
 37359                                  ;   supposed to skip menu display and run with the specified default block;
 37360                                  ;   however, if the user hit Enter prior to boot, thereby requesting fully
 37361                                  ;   INTERACTIVE boot, then we shall display the menu block anyway (though still
 37362                                  ;   with no timeout)
 37363                                  
 37364 00003AB9 803E[E346]00                    cmp     byte [secTimeOut],0 ; is timeout zero? (ie, assume default)
 37365 00003ABE 750A                            jne	short menu_display ; no
 37366 00003AC0 F606[DE46]01                    test    byte [bQueryOpt],1 ; yes, but was INTERACTIVE requested?
 37367 00003AC5 7503                            jnz	short menu_display ; yes, so *don't* assume default after all
 37368 00003AC7 E9C700                          jmp     not_topmenu	;
 37369                                  
 37370                                  ;   Reset the mode, so that we know screen is clean and cursor is home
 37371                                  
 37372                                  menu_display:
 37373 00003ACA B40F                            mov     ah,0Fh          ; get current video mode
 37374 00003ACC CD10                            int     10h             ;
 37375 00003ACE B400                            mov     ah,00h          ; just re-select that mode
 37376 00003AD0 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 37377 00003AD2 06                              push    es              ;
 37378 00003AD3 B84000                          mov     ax,40h          ; reach down into the ROM BIOS data area
 37379 00003AD6 8EC0                            mov     es,ax           ; and save the current (default) video page
 37380 00003AD8 26A14E00                        mov     ax,[es:004Eh]   ; start address and page #, in case the
 37381 00003ADC A3[DC46]                        mov     [wCRTStart],ax  ; undocumented QUIET option was enabled
 37382 00003ADF 26A06200                        mov     al,[es:0062h]   ;
 37383 00003AE3 A2[DB46]                        mov     [bCRTPage],al   ;
 37384 00003AE6 A1[D646]                        mov     ax,[bMenuPage]	; select new page for menu
 37385 00003AE9 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 37386 00003AEB B80006                          mov     ax,0600h        ; clear entire screen
 37387 00003AEE 8A3E[D546]                      mov     bh,[bMenuColor] ; using this color
 37388 00003AF2 29C9                            sub     cx,cx           ; upper left row/col
 37389                                          ;mov	dl,[es:CRT_Cols] 
 37390 00003AF4 268A164A00                      mov	dl,[es:4Ah]
 37391 00003AF9 FECA                    	dec     dl              ;
 37392                                          ;mov	dh,[es:CRT_Rows];
 37393 00003AFB 268A368400                      mov	dh,[es:84h]
 37394 00003B00 08F6                    	or      dh,dh           ; # of rows valid?
 37395 00003B02 7504                            jnz	short menu_clear ; hopefully
 37396 00003B04 8A36[D946]                      mov     dh,[bLastRow]   ; no, use a default
 37397                                  menu_clear:
 37398 00003B08 CD10                            int     10h             ; clear the screen using the req. attribute
 37399 00003B0A 07                              pop     es              ;
 37400 00003B0B 8836[D946]                      mov     [bLastRow],dh   ; save DH
 37401 00003B0F BA[EC4B]                        mov     dx,_$MenuHeader
 37402 00003B12 E89709                          call    print           ; cursor now on row 3 (numbered from 0)
 37403                                  
 37404 00003B15 F606[DA46]01                    test    byte [bDisableUI],1
 37405 00003B1A 751F                            jnz     short menu_nostatus
 37406 00003B1C 8A3E[D646]                      mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ;
 37407 00003B20 8A36[D946]                      mov     dh,[bLastRow]   ; restore DH
 37408 00003B24 B200                            mov     dl,0            ; print the status line on row DH, col 0,
 37409 00003B26 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ; now that we can trash the cursor position
 37410 00003B28 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 37411 00003B2A BA[3A4C]                        mov     dx,_$StatusLine
 37412 00003B2D E87C09                          call    print           ;
 37413 00003B30 B403                            mov     ah,3            ; get cursor position
 37414 00003B32 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 37415 00003B34 80EA02                          sub     dl,2            ;
 37416 00003B37 8816[D846]                      mov     [bLastCol],dl   ; save column where status char will go
 37417                                  
 37418                                  menu_nostatus:
 37419 00003B3B BB0100                          mov     bx,1            ; now prepare to display all the menu items
 37420                                  menu_disploop:
 37421 00003B3E E8B002                          call    print_item	; print item #BL
 37422 00003B41 43                              inc     bx              ; why "inc bx"? because it's a 1-byte opcode
 37423 00003B42 3A1E[E046]                      cmp     bl,[bMaxBlock]  ; all done?
 37424 00003B46 76F6                            jbe	short menu_disploop ; not yet
 37425                                  
 37426                                  ;   Set cursor position to just below the menu items
 37427                                  
 37428 00003B48 B200                            mov     dl,0            ; select column
 37429 00003B4A 88DE                            mov     dh,bl           ;
 37430 00003B4C 80C604                          add     dh,4            ; select row below menu
 37431 00003B4F 8A3E[D646]                      mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ;
 37432 00003B53 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position beneath the block list
 37433 00003B55 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 37434                                  
 37435 00003B57 BA[274C]                        mov     dx,_$MenuPrmpt
 37436 00003B5A E84F09                          call    print           ;
 37437 00003B5D E82903                          call    select_item     ; make a selection, return # in BX
 37438 00003B60 BA[F849]                        mov     dx,crlfm	
 37439 00003B63 E84609                          call    print           ;
 37440 00003B66 FF36[DA46]                      push    word [bDisableUI]
 37441 00003B6A 800E[DA46]01                    or      byte [bDisableUI],1
 37442 00003B6F E86704                          call    show_status     ; clear the status line now
 37443 00003B72 8F06[DA46]                      pop     word [bDisableUI]
 37444                                  
 37445                                  ;   Now begins the "re-organization" process...
 37446                                  
 37447                                  menu_autoselect:
 37448 00003B76 83FBFF                          cmp     bx,-1 ; 0FFFFh	; clean boot requested?
 37449 00003B79 7508                            jne	short normal_boot ; no
 37450 00003B7B E8F105                          call    disable_autoexec; basically, add a /D to the command.com line
 37451                                  menu_abort:
 37452 00003B7E 29C9                            sub     cx,cx           ; then immediately exit with 0 config.sys image
 37453 00003B80 E9E400                          jmp	menu_exit	;
 37454                                  
 37455                                  normal_boot:
 37456 00003B83 83FBFE                          cmp     bx,-2 ; 0FFFEh	; back to top-level menu?
 37457 00003B86 7509                            jne	short not_topmenu ; no
 37458 00003B88 8B0E[5603]                      mov     cx,[count]      ; yes, start all over
 37459 00003B8C 29F6                            sub     si,si           ;
 37460 00003B8E E9FFFD                          jmp     menu_search
 37461                                  
 37462                                  not_topmenu:
 37463 00003B91 80BF[E546]4F                    cmp     byte [abBlockType+bx],CONFIG_SUBMENU
 37464 00003B96 7510                            jne	short not_submenu
 37465 00003B98 01DB                            add     bx,bx           ;
 37466 00003B9A 8BBF[EF46]                      mov     di,[aoffBlockName+bx]
 37467 00003B9E E8E101                          call    srch_block      ; THIS CANNOT FAIL!
 37468 00003BA1 89FE                            mov     si,di           ;
 37469 00003BA3 89D9                            mov     cx,bx           ; ES:SI and CX are ready for another round
 37470 00003BA5 E929FE                          jmp     menu_found
 37471                                  
 37472                                  not_submenu:
 37473 00003BA8 01DB                            add     bx,bx           ; get BX -> name of selected block
 37474 00003BAA 8B9F[EF46]                      mov     bx,[aoffBlockName+bx]
 37475                                  
 37476                                  ;   BX should now either be ZERO (meaning no block has been selected) or
 37477                                  ;   the offset relative to ES of the block name to be processed (along with
 37478                                  ;   all the "common" lines of course)
 37479                                  
 37480                                  no_selection:
 37481 00003BAE 891E[E146]                      mov     [offDefBlock],bx; save selection
 37482 00003BB2 8B0E[5603]                      mov     cx,[count]      ; reset ES:SI and CX for reprocessing
 37483 00003BB6 29F6                            sub     si,si           ;
 37484 00003BB8 1E                              push    ds              ;
 37485 00003BB9 8E1E[9714]                      mov     ds,[config_wrkseg]; this is where we'll store new config.sys image
 37486 00003BBD 29FF                            sub     di,di           ;
 37487                                  
 37488                                  ;   ES:SI-> config.sys, DS:DI -> new config.sys workspace
 37489                                  ;
 37490                                  ;   Work our way through the config.sys image again, this time copying
 37491                                  ;   all lines that are (A) "common" lines outside any block or (B) lines
 37492                                  ;   within the requested block. Lines inside INCLUDEd blocks are transparently
 37493                                  ;   copied by copy_block in a recursive fashion; the amount of recursion is
 37494                                  ;   limited by the fact INCLUDE statements are REMed by copy_block as they are
 37495                                  ;   processed and by the number of unique INCLUDE stmts in config.sys...
 37496                                  ;
 37497                                  ;   BUGBUG 20-Mar-1992 JeffPar: If we can figure out the lower bound of the
 37498                                  ;   stack we're running on, then we should check it inside copy_block
 37499                                  
 37500                                  copyblock_loop:
 37501 00003BBF 53                              push    bx              ; save selected block name
 37502 00003BC0 E82F01                          call    copy_block      ; process (named or common) block
 37503 00003BC3 5B                              pop     bx              ;
 37504 00003BC4 7232                            jc	short move_config ; hit eof
 37505                                  
 37506                                  ;   copy_block can only return for two reasons: it hit eof or a new block
 37507                                  
 37508                                  copyblock_begin:
 37509                                  
 37510                                  ; 10/09/2023
 37511                                  %if 0
 37512                                          push    ax              ;
 37513                                          push    cx              ;
 37514                                          push    si              ;
 37515                                          push    di              ; always do "common" blocks
 37516                                          mov     di,szCommon
 37517                                          push    ds              ;
 37518                                          push    cs              ;
 37519                                          pop     ds              ;
 37520                                          call    comp_names      ;
 37521                                          pop     ds              ;
 37522                                          pop     di              ;
 37523                                          pop     si              ;
 37524                                          pop     cx              ;
 37525                                          pop     ax              ;
 37526                                          je	short copyblock_check
 37527                                  %endif
 37528                                  	; 10/09/2023
 37529 00003BC6 57                      	push	di
 37530 00003BC7 BF[2447]                	mov	di,szCommon	; always do "common" blocks
 37531 00003BCA E81602                  	call	comp_names_x	; (comp_names_safe)
 37532 00003BCD 5F                      	pop	di
 37533 00003BCE 740F                    	je	short copyblock_check
 37534                                  
 37535 00003BD0 09DB                            or      bx,bx           ; is there a block name to check?
 37536 00003BD2 7414                            jz	short copyblock_skip ; no
 37537 00003BD4 57                              push    di              ;
 37538 00003BD5 89DF                            mov     di,bx           ; check block against given block name
 37539 00003BD7 1E                              push    ds              ;
 37540 00003BD8 06                              push    es              ;
 37541 00003BD9 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 37542 00003BDA E8E501                          call    comp_names      ; is this the block we really want to do?
 37543 00003BDD 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 37544 00003BDE 5F                              pop     di              ;
 37545                                  copyblock_check:
 37546 00003BDF 7217                            jc	short move_config ; hit eof
 37547 00003BE1 7505                            jne	short copyblock_skip ;
 37548 00003BE3 E85A04                          call    skip_opt_line   ;
 37549 00003BE6 EBD7                            jmp	short copyblock_loop
 37550                                  
 37551                                  copyblock_skip:                 ;
 37552 00003BE8 E85504                          call    skip_opt_line   ; this ain't the block we wanted, so skip it
 37553 00003BEB E87804                          call    get_char        ;
 37554 00003BEE 7208                            jc	short move_config ; hit eof
 37555 00003BF0 247F                            and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 37556 00003BF2 3C5B                            cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ;
 37557 00003BF4 74D0                            je	short copyblock_begin
 37558 00003BF6 EBF0                            jmp     short copyblock_skip ; anything else is just skipped
 37559                                  ;
 37560                                  ;   To create as little risk to the rest of SysInit as little as possible,
 37561                                  ;   and to free the workspace at "config_wrkseg" for creating an environment,
 37562                                  ;   copy the new config.sys image to "confbot"
 37563                                  ;
 37564                                  move_config:
 37565 00003BF8 89F9                            mov     cx,di           ; now copy workspace at DS:DI to "confbot"
 37566 00003BFA 51                              push    cx              ;
 37567                                  ;
 37568                                  ;   But first, copy the CONFIG=<configuration><0> string to the workspace,
 37569                                  ;   since the configuration name only currently exists in the "confbot" area
 37570                                  ;
 37571                                   	;mov	cx,7
 37572 00003BFB B90700                  	mov     cx,szMenu-szBoot-1
 37573 00003BFE BE[1747]                        mov     si,szBoot	; first copy the CONFIG= part
 37574 00003C01 47                              inc     di              ; skip a byte, in case absolutely nothing
 37575                                                                  ; was copied to the workspace, because we always
 37576                                                                  ; zero the first byte of the workspace (below)
 37577                                  copy_boot: 
 37578                                  	;lods    byte ptr cs:[si];
 37579 00003C02 2E                              cs
 37580 00003C03 AC                      	lodsb
 37581 00003C04 8805                    	mov     [di],al         ;
 37582 00003C06 47                              inc     di              ;
 37583 00003C07 E2F9                            loop    copy_boot       ;
 37584                                  
 37585 00003C09 06                              push    es              ; then copy the configuration name
 37586                                          ;mov	cx,128-7	; put an upper limit on the name, to be safe
 37587                                  	; 04/01/2023
 37588 00003C0A B179                    	mov	cl,128-7
 37589 00003C0C 2E8B36[E146]            	mov     si,[cs:offDefBlock]; ES:SI -> default block name
 37590 00003C11 09F6                            or      si,si           ; valid?
 37591 00003C13 7505                            jnz	short l1	; yes
 37592 00003C15 0E                              push    cs              ;
 37593 00003C16 07                              pop     es              ;
 37594 00003C17 BE[2447]                        mov     si,szCommon
 37595 00003C1A 268A04                  l1:     mov     al,[es:si]      ;
 37596 00003C1D E8B205                          call    any_delim       ;
 37597 00003C20 7406                            je	short l2	;
 37598 00003C22 8805                            mov     [di],al         ;
 37599 00003C24 46                              inc     si              ;
 37600 00003C25 47                              inc     di              ;
 37601 00003C26 E2F2                            loop    l1              ;
 37602 00003C28 C6050A                  l2:     mov     byte [di],lf	; terminate the configuration string
 37603 00003C2B 07                              pop     es              ;
 37604                                  
 37605                                  ;   Now we can copy "config_wrkseg" (DS) to "confbot" (ES)
 37606                                  
 37607 00003C2C 29FF                            sub     di,di           ;
 37608 00003C2E 2E893E[9514]                    mov     [cs:config_envlen],di
 37609 00003C33 29F6                            sub     si,si           ;
 37610 00003C35 59                              pop     cx              ; recover the size of "config_wrkseg"
 37611                                  
 37612 00003C36 51                              push    cx              ;
 37613 00003C37 F3A4                            rep     movsb           ; moved!
 37614 00003C39 59                              pop     cx              ;
 37615 00003C3A 8CD8                            mov     ax,ds           ;
 37616 00003C3C 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 37617                                  
 37618                                  ;   Now that the config_wrkseg is available once again, we shall
 37619                                  ;   use it to create an environment. The first thing to go in will be
 37620                                  ;   the "CONFIG=configuration" thing. It is also important to zero
 37621                                  ;   the first byte of the workspace, so that copy_envvar knows the buffer
 37622                                  ;   is empty.
 37623                                  
 37624 00003C3D 06                              push    es              ;
 37625 00003C3E 8EC0                            mov     es,ax           ;
 37626 00003C40 46                              inc     si              ; ES:SI -> "CONFIG=configuration"
 37627 00003C41 26C606000000                    mov     byte [es:0],0	;empty the environment block
 37628 00003C47 E82600                          call    copy_envvar     ; copy envvar at ES:SI to "config_wrkseg"
 37629 00003C4A 07                              pop     es
 37630                                  
 37631                                  ;   Before returning, restore the default video page setting but do NOT
 37632                                  ;   do it using INT 10h's Set Active Page function, because if the menu was
 37633                                  ;   displayed on a different page, then it's because we don't want to see
 37634                                  ;   all the device driver/TSR goop (which goes to the default page)
 37635                                  
 37636                                  menu_done:
 37637 00003C4B 803E[D646]00                    cmp     byte [bMenuPage],0
 37638 00003C50 7415                            je	short menu_exit	;
 37639 00003C52 06                              push    es              ;
 37640 00003C53 B84000                          mov     ax,40h          ;
 37641 00003C56 8EC0                            mov     es,ax           ;
 37642 00003C58 A1[DC46]                        mov     ax,[wCRTStart]  ;
 37643 00003C5B 26A34E00                        mov     [es:004Eh],ax   ;
 37644 00003C5F A0[DB46]                        mov     al,[bCRTPage]   ;
 37645 00003C62 26A26200                        mov     [es:0062h],al   ;
 37646 00003C66 07                              pop     es              ;
 37647                                  menu_exit:
 37648 00003C67 890E[5603]                      mov     [count],cx      ; set new counts
 37649 00003C6B 890E[5803]                      mov     [org_count],cx  ;
 37650                                          ; 10/09/2023 (*) - Erdogan Tan
 37651                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:46D3h
 37652                                  	; PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - SYSINIT:491Ah
 37653                                  	;sub	si,si           ; always return ES:SI pointing to config.sys
 37654 00003C6F C3                      	retn
 37655                                  
 37656                                  ; (*) NOTE: MSDOS 6.0 source code (SYSINIT2.ASM) contains 'sub si,si' at this
 37657                                  ;	position (then 'retn' just after it)
 37658                                  ;	but MSDOS 6.21 and PCDOS 7.1 SYSINITs contain only 'retn' here.
 37659                                  
 37660                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37661                                  ;
 37662                                  ;   copy_envvar:  copy the envvar at ES:SI to "config_wrkseg"
 37663                                  ;
 37664                                  ;   INPUT
 37665                                  ;    ES:SI -> environment variable (in the form "var=string<cr/lf>")
 37666                                  ;
 37667                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37668                                  ;       config_envlen (ie, where to put next envvar) updated appropriately
 37669                                  ;       carry set if error (eg, missing =); clear otherwise
 37670                                  ;
 37671                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37672                                  ;       None
 37673                                  ;
 37674                                  ;   NOTES
 37675                                  ;       None
 37676                                  ;
 37677                                  ;   HISTORY
 37678                                  ;       Created 29-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37679                                  ;
 37680                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37681                                  
 37682                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 37683                                  	; (SYSINIT:46D4h)
 37684                                  
 37685                                  copy_envvar:
 37686 00003C70 51                              push    cx              ;
 37687 00003C71 56                              push    si              ;
 37688 00003C72 1E                              push    ds              ;
 37689 00003C73 06                              push    es              ;
 37690 00003C74 06                              push    es              ;
 37691 00003C75 8E06[9714]                      mov     es,[config_wrkseg] ; ES:DI to point to next available byte
 37692 00003C79 1F                              pop     ds                 ; DS:SI to point to envvar
 37693                                  
 37694                                  ;   Have to calculate the length of the variable name (and if we hit
 37695                                  ;   the end of the line before we hit '=', then it's curtains for this
 37696                                  ;   config.sys line)
 37697                                  ;
 37698                                  ;   The check for NULL is important because copy_envvar is also used to copy
 37699                                  ;   the initial CONFIG= setting, which will have been zapped by a NULL if no
 37700                                  ;   menu block existed (in order to prevent the creation of an environment)
 37701                                  
 37702 00003C7A 29C9                            sub     cx,cx           ;
 37703                                  copy_varlen:                    ;
 37704 00003C7C AC                              lodsb                   ;
 37705 00003C7D 08C0                            or      al,al           ; NULL?
 37706                                          ;stc	; 10/09/2023 (x)
 37707 00003C7F 746B                            jz	short copy_envexit ; yes, abort
 37708 00003C81 3C0D                            cmp     al,cr           ;
 37709                                          ;stc	; 10/09/2023 (x)
 37710 00003C83 7467                            je	short copy_envexit
 37711 00003C85 3C0A                            cmp     al,lf           ;
 37712                                          ;stc	; 10/09/2023 (x)
 37713 00003C87 7463                            je	short copy_envexit
 37714 00003C89 41                              inc     cx              ;
 37715 00003C8A 3C3D                            cmp     al,'='          ;
 37716 00003C8C 75EE                            jne	short copy_varlen
 37717 00003C8E B000                            mov     al,0            ;
 37718 00003C90 8A24                            mov     ah,[si]         ; save char after '='
 37719 00003C92 29CE                            sub     si,cx           ; back up to given varname
 37720 00003C94 49                              dec     cx              ; CX == # of bytes in varname
 37721 00003C95 29FF                            sub     di,di           ; start looking for DS:SI at ES:0
 37722                                  copy_varsrch:
 37723 00003C97 263805                          cmp     byte [es:di],al
 37724 00003C9A 7425                            je	short copy_envprep ; search failed, just copy var
 37725 00003C9C 89FB                            mov     bx,di           ; ES:BX -> start of this varname
 37726 00003C9E 51                              push    cx              ;
 37727 00003C9F 56                              push    si              ;
 37728 00003CA0 F3A6                            repe    cmpsb           ;
 37729 00003CA2 5E                              pop     si              ;
 37730 00003CA3 59                              pop     cx              ;
 37731 00003CA4 7531                            jne	short copy_varnext ; no match, skip to next varname
 37732 00003CA6 26803D3D                        cmp     byte [es:di],'='
 37733 00003CAA 752B                            jne     short copy_varnext ; no match, there's more characters
 37734                                  
 37735                                  ;   Previous occurrence of variable has been found; determine the
 37736                                  ;   entire length and then destroy it
 37737                                  
 37738 00003CAC B9FFFF                          mov     cx,-1           ;
 37739 00003CAF F2AE                            repne   scasb           ; guaranteed to get null (since we put it there)
 37740 00003CB1 56                              push    si              ;
 37741 00003CB2 89FE                            mov     si,di           ;
 37742 00003CB4 89DF                            mov     di,bx           ;
 37743 00003CB6 2E8B0E[9514]                    mov     cx,[cs:config_envlen]
 37744 00003CBB 29F1                            sub     cx,si           ; destroy variable now
 37745                                  	;rep movs byte ptr es:[di],byte ptr es:[si]
 37746                                  	;;db 0F3h,26h,0A4h ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4724h
 37747                                  
 37748 00003CBD F3                      	rep	; 0F3h
 37749 00003CBE 26                      	es	; 26h
 37750 00003CBF A4                      	movsb	; 0A4h
 37751                                  
 37752 00003CC0 5E                      	pop     si
 37753                                  copy_envprep:
 37754 00003CC1 80FC0D                          cmp     ah,cr          ; if there is nothing after the '='
 37755 00003CC4 741D                            je	short copy_envdel ; then just exit with variable deleted
 37756 00003CC6 80FC0A                          cmp     ah,lf           ;
 37757 00003CC9 7418                            je	short copy_envdel
 37758                                          ;jmp	short copy_envloop
 37759                                  	; 04/01/2023
 37760                                  copy_envloop:                  ;
 37761 00003CCB AC                      	lodsb                   ;
 37762 00003CCC 3C0D                    	cmp	al,cr           ;
 37763 00003CCE 7410                    	je	short copy_envdone
 37764 00003CD0 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf           ;
 37765 00003CD2 740C                    	je	short copy_envdone
 37766 00003CD4 AA                      	stosb                   ;
 37767 00003CD5 EBF4                    	jmp	short copy_envloop
 37768                                  
 37769                                  copy_varnext:                   ;
 37770 00003CD7 51                              push    cx              ;
 37771 00003CD8 B9FFFF                          mov     cx,-1           ;
 37772 00003CDB F2AE                            repne   scasb           ;
 37773 00003CDD 59                              pop     cx              ;
 37774 00003CDE EBB7                            jmp	short copy_varsrch
 37775                                  
 37776                                  	; 04/01/2023
 37777                                  ;copy_envloop:                  ;
 37778                                  ;	lodsb                   ;
 37779                                  ;	cmp	al,cr           ;
 37780                                  ;	je	short copy_envdone
 37781                                  ;	cmp	al,lf           ;
 37782                                  ;	je	short copy_envdone
 37783                                  ;	stosb                   ;
 37784                                  ;	jmp	short copy_envloop
 37785                                  
 37786                                  copy_envdone:                   ;
 37787 00003CE0 28C0                            sub     al,al           ; do SUB to clear carry as well
 37788 00003CE2 AA                              stosb                   ; always null-terminate these puppies
 37789                                  copy_envdel:                    ;
 37790 00003CE3 268805                          mov     [es:di],al      ; and stick another null to terminate the env.
 37791 00003CE6 2E893E[9514]                    mov     [cs:config_envlen],di
 37792                                  	; 10/09/2023 (x) - Erdogan Tan
 37793 00003CEB F9                      	stc ; in order to clear carry flag via cmc (compact code trick!)
 37794                                  copy_envexit:                   ;
 37795 00003CEC F5                      	cmc ; (x) ; reverse carry flag status (je -> cf=1)
 37796 00003CED 07                              pop     es              ;
 37797 00003CEE 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 37798 00003CEF 5E                              pop     si              ;
 37799 00003CF0 59                              pop     cx              ;
 37800                                  
 37801                                  copy_done:	; 18/12/2022
 37802 00003CF1 C3                              retn
 37803                                  
 37804                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37805                                  ;
 37806                                  ;   copy_block:  copy the current block to the new config.sys workspace
 37807                                  ;
 37808                                  ;   INPUT
 37809                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in "organized" config.sys memory image
 37810                                  ;    ES:SI -> remaining bytes in "organized" config.sys memory image
 37811                                  ;    DS:DI -> new config.sys workspace (equal in size to the original
 37812                                  ;             config.sys image) where the current block is to be copied
 37813                                  ;
 37814                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37815                                  ;       Same as above
 37816                                  ;       AL also equals the last character read from the organized image
 37817                                  ;
 37818                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37819                                  ;       All
 37820                                  ;
 37821                                  ;   NOTES
 37822                                  ;       None
 37823                                  ;
 37824                                  ;   HISTORY
 37825                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37826                                  ;
 37827                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37828                                  
 37829                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 37830                                  	; (SYSINIT:4759h)
 37831                                  
 37832                                  copy_block:
 37833 00003CF2 E87103                          call    get_char        ; check for include
 37834 00003CF5 72FA                            jc	short copy_done	;
 37835 00003CF7 247F                    	and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 37836 00003CF9 3C5B                    	cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ; another BEGIN implies END as well
 37837 00003CFB 74F4                            je	short copy_done ;
 37838                                  
 37839 00003CFD 3C4A                            cmp     al,CONFIG_INCLUDE ; 'J'
 37840 00003CFF 88E0                            mov     al,ah           ; AL == the original line code
 37841 00003D01 753A                            jne	short copy_line	; not an "include" line
 37842                                  
 37843                                  ;   We have hit an "INCLUDE" line; first, REM out the line so that we
 37844                                  ;   never try to include the block again (no infinite include loops please),
 37845                                  ;   then search for the named block and call copy_block again.
 37846                                  
 37847 00003D03 26C644FF30                      mov     byte [es:si-1],CONFIG_REM ; '0'
 37848 00003D08 57                              push    di              ;
 37849                                  
 37850 00003D09 BF[1F47]                        mov     di,szMenu
 37851 00003D0C E8D400                          call    comp_names_safe ; don't allow INCLUDE MENU
 37852 00003D0F 7426                            je	short copy_skip	;
 37853                                  
 37854 00003D11 BF[2447]                        mov     di,szCommon
 37855 00003D14 E8CC00                          call    comp_names_safe ; don't allow INCLUDE COMMON
 37856 00003D17 741E                            je	short copy_skip	;
 37857                                  
 37858 00003D19 89F7                            mov     di,si           ; try to find the block
 37859 00003D1B E86400                          call    srch_block      ;
 37860 00003D1E 89FA                            mov     dx,di           ;
 37861                                  	; 10/09/2023
 37862                                  	;pop    di              ;
 37863 00003D20 7514                            jne	short copy_error ; no such block
 37864 00003D22 5F                      	pop	di  ; 10/09/2023
 37865 00003D23 51                              push    cx              ;
 37866 00003D24 89D9                            mov     cx,bx           ;
 37867 00003D26 56                              push    si              ;
 37868 00003D27 4A                              dec     dx              ;
 37869 00003D28 89D6                            mov     si,dx           ;
 37870 00003D2A E80E03                          call    skip_line       ; skip the rest of the "block name" line
 37871 00003D2D E8C2FF                          call    copy_block      ; and copy in the rest of that block
 37872 00003D30 5E                              pop     si              ;
 37873 00003D31 59                              pop     cx              ;
 37874 00003D32 28C0                            sub     al,al           ; force skip_opt_line to skip...
 37875 00003D34 EB2B                            jmp     short copy_nextline
 37876                                  
 37877                                  copy_error:
 37878                                  	; 10/09/2023
 37879 00003D36 F8                      	clc
 37880                                  copy_skip:
 37881 00003D37 5F                              pop     di
 37882                                  ;copy_error:
 37883                                  	; 10/09/2023 (cf=0)
 37884                                  	;clc                    ;
 37885 00003D38 E80004                          call    print_error     ; note that carry is clear, no pause
 37886 00003D3B EB24                            jmp     short copy_nextline
 37887                                  
 37888                                  ;   Copy the line at ES:SI to the current location at DS:DI
 37889                                  
 37890                                  copy_line:
 37891 00003D3D 8805                            mov     [di],al         ;
 37892 00003D3F 47                              inc     di              ;
 37893 00003D40 3C20                            cmp     al,' '          ; is this is a "real" line with a "real" code?
 37894 00003D42 721D                            jb	short copy_nextline ; no
 37895 00003D44 2E803E[9A14]00                  cmp     byte [cs:config_multi],0
 37896 00003D4A 7409                            je	short copy_loop	; not a multi-config config.sys, don't embed #s
 37897 00003D4C E81700                          call    get_linenum	; BX == line # of line @ES:SI
 37898 00003D4F 891D                            mov     [di],bx         ; stash it immediately following the line code
 37899 00003D51 47                              inc     di              ;
 37900 00003D52 47                              inc     di              ;
 37901 00003D53 EB08                            jmp     short copy_next ;
 37902                                  copy_loop:                      ;
 37903 00003D55 E80E03                          call    get_char        ;
 37904 00003D58 7297                            jc	short copy_done ; end of file
 37905 00003D5A 8805                            mov     [di],al         ;
 37906 00003D5C 47                              inc     di              ;
 37907                                  copy_next:
 37908 00003D5D 3C0A                            cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah	; done with line?
 37909 00003D5F 75F4                            jne	short copy_loop	; nope
 37910                                  
 37911                                  copy_nextline:
 37912 00003D61 E8DC02                          call    skip_opt_line   ;
 37913 00003D64 EB8C                            jmp     short copy_block
 37914                                  
 37915                                  	; 18/12/2022
 37916                                  ;copy_done:
 37917                                          ;retn
 37918                                  
 37919                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37920                                  ;
 37921                                  ;   get_linenum:  return line # (in BX) of current line (@ES:SI)
 37922                                  ;
 37923                                  ;   INPUT
 37924                                  ;    ES:SI -> some line in the config.sys memory image
 37925                                  ;
 37926                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37927                                  ;       BX == line # (relative to 1)
 37928                                  ;
 37929                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37930                                  ;       DX
 37931                                  ;
 37932                                  ;   NOTES
 37933                                  ;       None
 37934                                  ;
 37935                                  ;   HISTORY
 37936                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37937                                  ;
 37938                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37939                                  
 37940                                  get_linenum:
 37941 00003D66 50                              push    ax              ;
 37942 00003D67 29DB                            sub     bx,bx           ; BX == line # (to be returned)
 37943 00003D69 51                              push    cx              ;
 37944 00003D6A 89F2                            mov     dx,si           ; DX == the offset we're looking for
 37945 00003D6C 56                              push    si              ;
 37946 00003D6D 2E8B0E[5603]                    mov     cx,[cs:count]   ;
 37947 00003D72 29F6                            sub     si,si           ; prepare to scan entire file
 37948                                  get_linenum_loop:               ;
 37949 00003D74 E8C402                          call    skip_line       ;
 37950 00003D77 7205                            jc	short get_linenum_done
 37951 00003D79 43                              inc     bx              ;
 37952 00003D7A 39D6                            cmp     si,dx           ; have we exceeded the desired offset yet?
 37953 00003D7C 72F6                            jb	short get_linenum_loop ; no
 37954                                  get_linenum_done:               ;
 37955 00003D7E 5E                              pop     si              ;
 37956 00003D7F 59                              pop     cx              ;
 37957 00003D80 58                              pop     ax              ;
 37958 00003D81 C3                              retn
 37959                                  
 37960                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37961                                  ;
 37962                                  ;   srch_block:  searches entire config.sys for block name @ES:DI
 37963                                  ;
 37964                                  ;   INPUT
 37965                                  ;       ES -> config.sys image
 37966                                  ;    ES:DI -> block name to find
 37967                                  ;
 37968                                  ;   OUTPUT
 37969                                  ;       ZF flag set, if found
 37970                                  ;    ES:DI -> just past the name in the block heading, if found
 37971                                  ;       BX == # bytes remaining from that point, if found
 37972                                  ;
 37973                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 37974                                  ;       None
 37975                                  ;
 37976                                  ;   NOTES
 37977                                  ;       This differs from "find_block" in that it searches the ENTIRE
 37978                                  ;       config.sys image, not merely the remaining portion, and that it
 37979                                  ;       takes a pointer to block name that is *elsewhere* in the image
 37980                                  ;       (ie, ES) as opposed to some string constant in our own segment (DS).
 37981                                  ;
 37982                                  ;   HISTORY
 37983                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 37984                                  ;
 37985                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37986                                  
 37987                                  srch_block:	          ; returns BX -> named block in CONFIG.SYS
 37988 00003D82 50                              push    ax              ;
 37989 00003D83 51                              push    cx              ;
 37990 00003D84 2E8B0E[5603]                    mov     cx,[cs:count]   ;
 37991 00003D89 56                              push    si              ;
 37992 00003D8A 29F6                            sub     si,si           ;
 37993 00003D8C 1E                              push    ds              ;
 37994 00003D8D 06                              push    es              ;
 37995 00003D8E 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 37996 00003D8F E80900                          call    find_block      ;
 37997 00003D92 89F7                            mov     di,si           ;
 37998 00003D94 89CB                            mov     bx,cx           ;
 37999 00003D96 1F                              pop     ds              ;
 38000 00003D97 5E                              pop     si              ;
 38001 00003D98 59                              pop     cx              ;
 38002 00003D99 58                              pop     ax              ;
 38003                                  find_exit: ; 16/04/2019
 38004 00003D9A C3                              retn			;
 38005                                  
 38006                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38007                                  ;
 38008                                  ;   find_block:  searches rest of config.sys for block name @DS:DI
 38009                                  ;
 38010                                  ;   INPUT
 38011                                  ;    DS:DI -> block name to find
 38012                                  ;    ES:SI -> remainder of config.sys image
 38013                                  ;       CX == remaining size of config.sys image
 38014                                  ;
 38015                                  ;   OUTPUT
 38016                                  ;       ZF flag set, if found (also, CF set if EOF)
 38017                                  ;    ES:SI -> where the search stopped (at end of block name or EOF)
 38018                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 38019                                  ;
 38020                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 38021                                  ;       AX
 38022                                  ;
 38023                                  ;   NOTES
 38024                                  ;       This differs from "srch_block" in that it searches only the
 38025                                  ;       remaining portion of the config.sys image and leaves SI and CX
 38026                                  ;       pointing to where the search left off, and that it takes a pointer
 38027                                  ;       to search string in our own segment (DS:DI instead of ES:DI).
 38028                                  ;
 38029                                  ;   HISTORY
 38030                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 38031                                  ;
 38032                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38033                                  
 38034                                  find_block:
 38035 00003D9B E8C802                          call    get_char        ; get line code
 38036 00003D9E 72FA                            jc	short find_exit	; end of file
 38037 00003DA0 247F                            and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY
 38038 00003DA2 3C5B                            cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ; beginning of a block?
 38039 00003DA4 740C                            je	short check_line ; no
 38040 00003DA6 3C4A                            cmp     al,CONFIG_INCLUDE
 38041 00003DA8 7513                            jne	short next_line	;
 38042 00003DAA 2E800E[9A14]01                  or	byte [cs:config_multi],1
 38043 00003DB0 EB0B                            jmp     short next_line ;
 38044                                  check_line:
 38045 00003DB2 2E800E[9A14]01                  or      byte [cs:config_multi],1
 38046 00003DB8 E80700                          call    comp_names      ; compare block names
 38047 00003DBB 76DD                            jbe	short find_exit	; end of file, or names matched
 38048                                  next_line:
 38049 00003DBD E88002                          call    skip_opt_line   ; no, so skip to next line
 38050 00003DC0 EBD9                            jmp	short find_block  ;
 38051                                  ;find_exit:
 38052                                  ;	retn
 38053                                  
 38054                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38055                                  ;
 38056                                  ;   comp_names:  compares keyword @DS:DI to position in config.sys @ES:SI
 38057                                  ;
 38058                                  ;   INPUT
 38059                                  ;    DS:DI -> keyword to compare
 38060                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 38061                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 38062                                  ;
 38063                                  ;   OUTPUT
 38064                                  ;       ZF flag set, if match (also, CF set if EOF)
 38065                                  ;    ES:SI -> where the comparison stopped (at end of block name or EOF)
 38066                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 38067                                  ;
 38068                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 38069                                  ;       AX
 38070                                  ;
 38071                                  ;   NOTES
 38072                                  ;       None
 38073                                  ;
 38074                                  ;   HISTORY
 38075                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 38076                                  ;
 38077                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38078                                  
 38079                                  comp_names:
 38080 00003DC2 57                              push    di              ;
 38081                                  comp_loop:                      ;
 38082 00003DC3 E8A002                          call    get_char        ;
 38083 00003DC6 7210                            jc	short comp_exit	;
 38084 00003DC8 E80704                          call    any_delim       ; is next character a delimiter?
 38085 00003DCB 8A25                            mov     ah,[di]         ; (get next character we're supposed to match)
 38086 00003DCD 740B                            je	short comp_almost ; yes, it *could* be a match
 38087 00003DCF 47                              inc     di              ;
 38088 00003DD0 25DFDF                          and     ax,~2020h ; 0DFDFh 
 38089                                  				; BUGBUG -- assumes both names are alphanumeric -JTP
 38090 00003DD3 38E0                            cmp     al,ah           ; match?
 38091 00003DD5 74EC                            je	short comp_loop ; yes, keep looking at the characters
 38092 00003DD7 F8                              clc                     ; prevent erroneous eof indication: clear carry
 38093                                  comp_exit:                      ;
 38094 00003DD8 5F                              pop     di              ;
 38095 00003DD9 C3                              retn			;
 38096                                  comp_almost:                    ;
 38097 00003DDA 86E0                            xchg    al,ah           ; we don't know for sure if it's a match
 38098 00003DDC E8F303                          call    any_delim       ; until we verify that the second string has
 38099 00003DDF 86E0                            xchg    al,ah           ; been exhausted also...
 38100 00003DE1 EBF5                            jmp     short comp_exit ; if we are, this call to any_delim will tell...
 38101                                  
 38102                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38103                                  
 38104                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 38105                                  comp_names_x:
 38106                                  	;
 38107                                  comp_names_safe:
 38108 00003DE3 50                              push    ax
 38109 00003DE4 51                              push    cx
 38110 00003DE5 56                              push	si
 38111 00003DE6 1E                              push    ds
 38112 00003DE7 0E                              push    cs
 38113 00003DE8 1F                              pop     ds
 38114 00003DE9 E8D6FF                          call    comp_names
 38115 00003DEC 1F                              pop     ds
 38116 00003DED 5E                      	pop	si
 38117 00003DEE 59                              pop     cx
 38118 00003DEF 58                              pop     ax
 38119 00003DF0 C3                              retn
 38120                                  
 38121                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38122                                  ;
 38123                                  ;   print_item:  display menu item #BL
 38124                                  ;
 38125                                  ;   INPUT
 38126                                  ;       BL == menu item # to display
 38127                                  ;
 38128                                  ;   OUTPUT
 38129                                  ;       Menu item displayed, with appropriate highlighting if BL == bDefBlock
 38130                                  ;
 38131                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 38132                                  ;       None
 38133                                  ;
 38134                                  ;   NOTES
 38135                                  ;       This function saves/restores the current cursor position, so you
 38136                                  ;       needn't worry about it.
 38137                                  ;
 38138                                  ;   HISTORY
 38139                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 38140                                  ;
 38141                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38142                                  
 38143                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 38144                                  	; (SYSINIT:485Ah)
 38145                                  
 38146                                  print_item:		; prints menu item #BL (1 to N)
 38147 00003DF1 50                              push    ax              ;
 38148 00003DF2 53                              push    bx              ;
 38149 00003DF3 51                              push    cx              ;
 38150 00003DF4 52                              push    dx              ;
 38151 00003DF5 56                              push    si              ;
 38152 00003DF6 B403                            mov     ah,03h          ; get cursor position
 38153 00003DF8 8A3E[D646]                      mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ; always page zero
 38154 00003DFC CD10                            int     10h             ; DH/DL = row/column
 38155 00003DFE 52                              push    dx              ; save it
 38156 00003DFF B402                            mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position
 38157 00003E01 88DE                            mov     dh,bl           ;
 38158 00003E03 80C603                          add     dh,3            ;
 38159 00003E06 B205                            mov     dl,5            ;
 38160 00003E08 CD10                            int     10h             ; set cursor position for correct row/col
 38161 00003E0A 88D8                            mov     al,bl           ;
 38162 00003E0C 0430                            add     al,'0'          ; convert menu item # to ASCII digit
 38163 00003E0E 8A26[D546]                      mov     ah,[bMenuColor] ; normal attribute
 38164 00003E12 3A1E[DF46]                      cmp     bl,[bDefBlock]  ; are we printing the current block?
 38165 00003E16 7510                            jne	short print_other ; no
 38166 00003E18 80CC70                          or      ah,70h          ; yes, set bgnd color to white
 38167 00003E1B 88E5                            mov     ch,ah           ;
 38168 00003E1D B104                            mov     cl,4            ;
 38169 00003E1F D2C5                            rol     ch,cl           ;
 38170 00003E21 38E5                            cmp     ch,ah           ; are fgnd/bgnd the same?
 38171 00003E23 7503                            jne	short print_other ; no
 38172 00003E25 80F408                          xor     ah,08h          ; yes, so modify the fgnd intensity
 38173                                  print_other:                    ;
 38174 00003E28 B700                            mov     bh,0            ;
 38175 00003E2A 01DB                            add     bx,bx           ;
 38176 00003E2C 8BBF[0347]                      mov     di,[aoffBlockDesc+bx]
 38177 00003E30 88E3                            mov     bl,ah           ; put the attribute in the correct register now
 38178 00003E32 8A3E[D646]                      mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ; get correct video page #
 38179 00003E36 B409                            mov     ah,09h          ; write char/attr
 38180 00003E38 B90100                          mov     cx,1            ;
 38181 00003E3B CD10                            int     10h             ;
 38182 00003E3D FEC2                            inc     dl              ; increment column
 38183 00003E3F B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 38184 00003E41 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 38185                                          ;mov	ax,0900h+'.'    ;
 38186 00003E43 B82E09                          mov	ax,092Eh
 38187 00003E46 CD10                    	int     10h             ; display '.'
 38188 00003E48 FEC2                            inc     dl              ; increment column
 38189 00003E4A B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 38190 00003E4C CD10                            int     10h             ;
 38191                                          ;mov	ax,0900h+' '    ;
 38192 00003E4E B82009                          mov	ax,0920h
 38193 00003E51 CD10                    	int     10h             ; display ' '
 38194 00003E53 FEC2                            inc     dl              ; increment column
 38195 00003E55 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 38196 00003E57 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 38197 00003E59 06                              push    es              ;
 38198                                  print_loop:                     ;
 38199 00003E5A 268A05                          mov     al,[es:di]	; get a character of the description
 38200 00003E5D 47                              inc     di              ;
 38201 00003E5E 3C09                            cmp     al,TAB ; 9	; substitute spaces for tabs
 38202 00003E60 7502                            jne	short print_nontab ;
 38203 00003E62 B020                            mov     al,' '          ;
 38204                                  print_nontab:                   ;
 38205 00003E64 3C20                            cmp     al,' '          ;
 38206 00003E66 7215                            jb	short print_done ; stop at the 1st character < space
 38207 00003E68 3C24                            cmp     al,'$'          ;
 38208 00003E6A 7411                            je	short print_done ; also stop on $
 38209 00003E6C B409                            mov     ah,09h          ; display function #
 38210 00003E6E CD10                            int     10h             ;
 38211 00003E70 FEC2                            inc     dl              ; increment column
 38212 00003E72 80FA4E                          cmp     dl,78           ; far enough?
 38213 00003E75 7306                            jae	short print_done ; yes
 38214 00003E77 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 38215 00003E79 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 38216 00003E7B EBDD                            jmp	short  print_loop
 38217                                  print_done:                     ;
 38218 00003E7D 07                              pop     es              ;
 38219 00003E7E 5A                              pop     dx              ;
 38220 00003E7F B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 38221 00003E81 CD10                            int     10h             ; restore previous row/col
 38222 00003E83 5E                              pop     si              ;
 38223 00003E84 5A                              pop     dx              ;
 38224 00003E85 59                              pop     cx              ;
 38225 00003E86 5B                              pop     bx              ;
 38226 00003E87 58                              pop     ax              ;
 38227 00003E88 C3                              retn			;
 38228                                  
 38229                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38230                                  ;
 38231                                  ;   select_item:  wait for user to select menu item, with time-out
 38232                                  ;
 38233                                  ;   INPUT
 38234                                  ;       None
 38235                                  ;
 38236                                  ;   OUTPUT
 38237                                  ;       BX == menu item # (1-N), or -1 for clean boot
 38238                                  ;       Selected menu item highlighted
 38239                                  ;       Cursor positioned beneath menu, ready for tty-style output now
 38240                                  ;
 38241                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 38242                                  ;       None
 38243                                  ;
 38244                                  ;   NOTES
 38245                                  ;       None
 38246                                  ;
 38247                                  ;   HISTORY
 38248                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 38249                                  ;
 38250                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38251                                  
 38252                                  select_item:		; returns digit value in BX (trashes AX/CX/DX)
 38253 00003E89 8A1E[DF46]                      mov     bl,[bDefBlock]  ; BL will be the default block #
 38254 00003E8D 88D8                            mov     al,bl           ;
 38255 00003E8F E83701                          call    disp_num        ;
 38256 00003E92 E84401                          call    show_status     ; display current interactive status
 38257 00003E95 803E[E346]FF                    cmp     byte [secTimeOut],-1
 38258 00003E9A 7452                            je	short input_key	; no time-out, just go to input
 38259 00003E9C B42C                            mov     ah,GET_TIME ; 2Ch
 38260 00003E9E CD21                            int     21h             ;
 38261 00003EA0 88F7                            mov     bh,dh           ; BH = initial # of seconds
 38262                                  check_time:
 38263 00003EA2 A0[E346]                        mov     al,[secTimeOut] ;
 38264 00003EA5 2A06[E446]                      sub     al,[secElapsed] ;
 38265 00003EA9 730D                            jae	short show_time	;
 38266 00003EAB 800E[DE46]02                    or      byte [bQueryOpt],2  ; disable all further prompting
 38267 00003EB0 C606[E446]00                    mov     byte [secElapsed],0
 38268 00003EB5 E9F600                          jmp	select_done	; time's up!
 38269                                  show_time:
 38270 00003EB8 53                              push    bx              ;
 38271 00003EB9 88C3                            mov     bl,al           ; save # in BL
 38272 00003EBB 8A3E[D646]                      mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ;
 38273 00003EBF B403                            mov     ah,03h          ; get cursor position
 38274 00003EC1 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 38275 00003EC3 52                              push    dx              ;
 38276 00003EC4 80C208                  	add	dl,8		; move cursor to the right
 38277 00003EC7 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position
 38278 00003EC9 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 38279 00003ECB BA[9A4C]                        mov     dx,_$TimeOut
 38280 00003ECE E8DB05                          call    print           ; print the "Time remaining: " prompt
 38281 00003ED1 88D8                            mov     al,bl           ; recover # from BL
 38282 00003ED3 98                              cbw                     ; this works because AL is always <= 90
 38283 00003ED4 B10A                            mov     cl,10           ;
 38284 00003ED6 F6F1                            div     cl              ; AL = tens digit, AH = ones digit
 38285 00003ED8 88E1                            mov     cl,ah           ;
 38286 00003EDA 0430                            add     al,'0'          ;
 38287 00003EDC B40E                            mov     ah,0Eh          ;
 38288 00003EDE CD10                            int     10h             ; write TTY tens digit
 38289 00003EE0 88C8                            mov     al,cl           ;
 38290 00003EE2 0430                            add     al,'0'          ;
 38291 00003EE4 B40E                            mov     ah,0Eh          ;
 38292 00003EE6 CD10                            int     10h             ; write TTY ones digit
 38293 00003EE8 5A                              pop     dx
 38294 00003EE9 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position back to where it was
 38295 00003EEB CD10                            int     10h             ;
 38296 00003EED 5B                              pop     bx              ;
 38297                                  input_key:
 38298 00003EEE B406                            mov     ah,RAW_CON_IO ; 6
 38299 00003EF0 B2FF                            mov     dl,0FFh         ; input request
 38300 00003EF2 CD21                            int     21h             ;
 38301 00003EF4 751F                            jnz	short got_key	;
 38302 00003EF6 803E[E346]FF                    cmp     byte [secTimeOut],-1; is there a time-out?
 38303 00003EFB 74F1                            je	short input_key	; no, just go back to input
 38304 00003EFD B42C                            mov     ah,GET_TIME     ;
 38305 00003EFF CD21                            int     21h             ; DH = seconds
 38306 00003F01 88F4                            mov     ah,dh           ;
 38307 00003F03 28FE                            sub     dh,bh           ; should generally be zero or one
 38308 00003F05 88E7                            mov     bh,ah           ;
 38309 00003F07 7302                            jnc	short got_time	;
 38310 00003F09 B601                            mov     dh,1            ; it wrapped back to zero, so assume one
 38311                                  got_time:
 38312 00003F0B 08F6                            or      dh,dh           ; any change?
 38313 00003F0D 74DF                            jz	short input_key	; no
 38314 00003F0F 0036[E446]                      add     [secElapsed],dh ;
 38315 00003F13 EB8D                            jmp	short check_time ;
 38316                                  got_key:
 38317 00003F15 50                              push    ax              ;
 38318 00003F16 B8FFFF                          mov     ax,-1           ; zap both secTimeOut and secElapsed
 38319 00003F19 8706[E346]                      xchg    [secTimeOut],ax
 38320 00003F1D 3CFF                            cmp     al,-1           ; was time-out already disabled?
 38321 00003F1F 740E                            je	short timeout_disabled ; yes
 38322 00003F21 53                              push    bx              ; let's disable # seconds display
 38323 00003F22 B8200A                          mov     ax,0A20h        ; write multiple spaces
 38324 00003F25 8B1E[D546]                      mov     bx,[bMenuColor]
 38325 00003F29 B95000                          mov     cx,80           ; 80 of them, to be safe
 38326 00003F2C CD10                            int     10h             ; to completely obliterate # seconds display
 38327 00003F2E 5B                              pop     bx   		;
 38328                                  
 38329                                  timeout_disabled:
 38330 00003F2F 58                              pop     ax              ;
 38331 00003F30 08C0                            or      al,al           ; extended key pressed?
 38332 00003F32 755A                            jnz	short normal_key ; no
 38333 00003F34 CD21                            int     21h             ; get the next part of the key then
 38334 00003F36 74B6                            jz	short input_key	; hmmm, what happened to the second part?
 38335                                  
 38336 00003F38 3C48                            cmp     al,48h          ; up arrow?
 38337 00003F3A 7510                            jne	short not_up	; no
 38338 00003F3C 80FB01                          cmp     bl,1            ; are we as up as up can get?
 38339 00003F3F 76AD                            jbe	short input_key	; yes, ignore it
 38340 00003F41 FE0E[DF46]                      dec     byte [bDefBlock] ;
 38341 00003F45 E8A9FE                          call    print_item      ; re-print the current item
 38342 00003F48 FECB                            dec     bl              ; and then print the new current item
 38343 00003F4A EB12                            jmp     short print1
 38344                                  not_up:
 38345 00003F4C 3C50                            cmp     al,50h          ; down arrow?
 38346 00003F4E 7518                            jne	short not_down	; no
 38347 00003F50 3A1E[E046]                      cmp     bl,[bMaxBlock]  ; are we as down as down can get?
 38348 00003F54 7310                            jae	short to_input_key ; yes, ignore it
 38349 00003F56 FE06[DF46]                      inc     byte [bDefBlock] ;
 38350 00003F5A E894FE                          call    print_item      ; re-print the current item
 38351 00003F5D 43                              inc     bx              ; and then print the new current item
 38352                                  print1: 
 38353 00003F5E 88D8                    	mov     al,bl           ;
 38354                                  print2: 
 38355 00003F60 E88EFE                  	call    print_item      ;
 38356 00003F63 E86300                          call    disp_num        ;
 38357                                  to_input_key:
 38358 00003F66 EB86                            jmp	short input_key ; 10/09/2023
 38359                                  not_down:
 38360 00003F68 F606[DA46]01                    test    byte [bDisableUI],1
 38361 00003F6D 75F7                            jnz	short to_input_key ; don't allow F8 or F5
 38362 00003F6F 3C42                            cmp     al,42h          ; F8 function key?
 38363 00003F71 750B                            jne	short not_f8	; no
 38364 00003F73 8036[DE46]01                    xor     byte [bQueryOpt],1
 38365 00003F78 E85E00                          call    show_status     ;
 38366 00003F7B E970FF                          jmp     input_key	;
 38367                                  not_f8:
 38368 00003F7E 3C3F                            cmp     al,3Fh          ; F5 function key?
 38369 00003F80 75E4                            jne	short to_input_key ; no
 38370                                  	; 02/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 38371                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:49EBh
 38372                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - SYSINIT:4C32h)
 38373 00003F82 800E[DE46]04            	or	byte [bQueryOpt],4 ; no more queries
 38374 00003F87 BBFFFF                          mov     bx,-1           ; special return code (-1) indicating clean boot
 38375 00003F8A B020                            mov     al,' '          ; don't want to display anything really;
 38376 00003F8C EB26                            jmp     short disp_input ; just want to display the cr/lf sequence...
 38377                                  
 38378                                  normal_key:
 38379 00003F8E 3C0D                            cmp     al,0Dh          ; Enter?
 38380 00003F90 741C                            je	short select_done ; yes
 38381 00003F92 3C08                            cmp     al,08h          ; backspace?
 38382 00003F94 7504                            jne	short not_backspace ; no
 38383 00003F96 BBFEFF                          mov     bx,-2 ; 0FFFEh	; yes, special return code
 38384 00003F99 C3                              retn			;
