 38385                                  not_backspace:
 38386 00003F9A 2C30                            sub     al,'0'          ; is greater than '0'?
 38387 00003F9C 76C8                            jbe	short to_input_key ; no
 38388 00003F9E 3A06[E046]                      cmp     al,[bMaxBlock]  ; is less than or equal to the maximum digit?
 38389 00003FA2 77C2                            ja	short to_input_key ; no
 38390 00003FA4 A2[DF46]                        mov	[bDefBlock],al  ;
 38391 00003FA7 E847FE                          call    print_item      ; redisplay the current selection
 38392 00003FAA 88C3                            mov     bl,al           ; set new selection
 38393 00003FAC EBB2                            jmp	short print2
 38394                                  
 38395                                  select_done:
 38396 00003FAE B700                            mov     bh,0            ; return a full 16-bit value (for indexing)
 38397 00003FB0 88D8                            mov     al,bl           ;
 38398 00003FB2 0430                            add     al,'0'          ; convert it into a digit, then display it
 38399                                  
 38400                                  	; fall into disp_input
 38401                                  
 38402                                  ; 16/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 38403                                  
 38404                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38405                                  ;
 38406                                  ;   disp_input:  display a single character + cr/lf
 38407                                  ;
 38408                                  ;   INPUT
 38409                                  ;       AL == character to display
 38410                                  ;
 38411                                  ;   OUTPUT
 38412                                  ;       None
 38413                                  ;
 38414                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 38415                                  ;       None
 38416                                  ;
 38417                                  ;   NOTES
 38418                                  ;       This function is used not only for the menu input selection but
 38419                                  ;       also for the interactive line prompting (the y/n/a thing).
 38420                                  ;
 38421                                  ;   HISTORY
 38422                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 38423                                  ;
 38424                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38425                                  
 38426                                  
 38427                                  disp_input:
 38428 00003FB4 50                      	push	ax
 38429                                  	;cmp	al,' '
 38430                                  	;jae	short disp_ok
 38431                                  	;mov	al,' '
 38432                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO:SYS (Optimization)
 38433 00003FB5 B220                    	mov	dl,' ' ; 20h
 38434 00003FB7 38D0                    	cmp	al,dl
 38435 00003FB9 7602                    	jna	short disp_input_ok
 38436                                  disp_ok:
 38437 00003FBB 88C2                    	mov	dl,al
 38438                                  disp_input_ok:
 38439 00003FBD B402                    	mov	ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2
 38440 00003FBF CD21                    	int	21h
 38441 00003FC1 BA[F849]                	mov	dx,crlfm
 38442 00003FC4 E8E504                  	call	print
 38443 00003FC7 58                      	pop	ax
 38444 00003FC8 C3                      	retn
 38445                                  
 38446                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38447                                  
 38448                                  disp_num:
 38449 00003FC9 53                              push    bx
 38450 00003FCA 0430                            add     al,'0'
 38451 00003FCC B40A                            mov     ah,0Ah
 38452 00003FCE 8B1E[D546]                      mov     bx,[bMenuColor]
 38453 00003FD2 B90100                          mov     cx,1
 38454 00003FD5 CD10                            int     10h
 38455 00003FD7 5B                              pop     bx
 38456 00003FD8 C3                              retn
 38457                                  
 38458                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38459                                  ;
 38460                                  ;   show_status:  display current interactive mode setting (on/off/none)
 38461                                  ;
 38462                                  ;   INPUT
 38463                                  ;       None
 38464                                  ;
 38465                                  ;   OUTPUT
 38466                                  ;       None
 38467                                  ;
 38468                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 38469                                  ;       None
 38470                                  ;
 38471                                  ;   NOTES
 38472                                  ;       None
 38473                                  ;
 38474                                  ;   HISTORY
 38475                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 38476                                  ;
 38477                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38478                                  
 38479                                  show_status:
 38480 00003FD9 53                              push    bx              ; BL = video page #
 38481 00003FDA 8B1E[D546]                      mov     bx,[bMenuColor]
 38482 00003FDE B403                            mov     ah,03h          ; get cursor position
 38483 00003FE0 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 38484 00003FE2 52                              push    dx              ; save it
 38485 00003FE3 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position
 38486 00003FE5 8B16[D846]                      mov     dx,[bLastCol]   ; set correct row/col
 38487 00003FE9 F606[DA46]01                    test    byte [bDisableUI],1
 38488 00003FEE 740C                            jz	short show_onoff ; just show on/off
 38489 00003FF0 B200                            mov     dl,0            ;
 38490 00003FF2 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 38491 00003FF4 B8200A                          mov     ax,0A20h        ; write multiple spaces
 38492 00003FF7 B95000                          mov     cx,80           ; 80 of them, to be exact
 38493                                  	; 10/09/2023
 38494                                  	;int	10h             ; to obliterate the status line
 38495 00003FFA EB11                            jmp     short show_done ;
 38496                                  show_onoff: 
 38497 00003FFC CD10                            int     10h
 38498                                  		; - VIDEO - WRITE CHARACTERS ONLY AT CURSOR POSITION
 38499                                  		; AL = character, BH = display page - alpha mode
 38500                                  		; BL = color of character (graphics mode, PCjr only)
 38501                                  		; CX = number of times to write character
 38502                                  
 38503 00003FFE A0[964C]                        mov     al,[_$NO]	; assume OFF
 38504 00004001 803E[DE46]01                    cmp     byte [bQueryOpt],1 ; is interactive mode on?
 38505 00004006 7503                            jne	short show_noton ; no
 38506 00004008 A0[924C]                        mov     al,[_$YES]	; yes
 38507                                  show_noton:                     ;
 38508 0000400B B40E                            mov     ah,0Eh          ; write TTY
 38509                                  show_done:	; 10/09/2023
 38510 0000400D CD10                            int     10h             ;
 38511                                  ;show_done:                     ;

 38520                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38521                                  ;
 38522                                  ;   skip_token: advances ES:SI/CX past the current token
 38523                                  ;
 38524                                  ;   INPUT
 38525                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 38526                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 38527                                  ;
 38528                                  ;   OUTPUT
 38529                                  ;       CF set if EOL/EOF hit
 38530                                  ;       AL == 1st char of delimiter
 38531                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past the delimiter
 38532                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 38533                                  ;
 38534                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 38535                                  ;       AX
 38536                                  ;
 38537                                  ;   NOTES
 38538                                  ;       None
 38539                                  ;
 38540                                  ;   HISTORY
 38541                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 38542                                  ;
 38543                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38544                                  
 38545                                  skip_token:
 38546 00004016 E84D00                          call    get_char
 38547 00004019 7210                            jc	short skip_token_done
 38548 0000401B E8B401                          call    any_delim
 38549 0000401E 75F6                            jne	short skip_token
 38550                                  skip_check_eol:
 38551 00004020 3C0D                            cmp     al,cr ; 0Dh
 38552 00004022 7406                            je	short skip_token_eol
 38553 00004024 3C0A                            cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 38554 00004026 7402                            je	short skip_token_eol
 38555 00004028 F8                              clc
 38556                                          ;jmp	short skip_token_done
 38557 00004029 C3                      	retn
 38558                                  skip_token_eol:
 38559 0000402A F9                              stc
 38560                                  skip_token_done:
 38561 0000402B C3                              retn
 38562                                  
 38563                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38564                                  ;
 38565                                  ;   skip_delim: advances ES:SI/CX past the current delimiter
 38566                                  ;
 38567                                  ;   INPUT
 38568                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 38569                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 38570                                  ;
 38571                                  ;   OUTPUT
 38572                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 38573                                  ;       AL == 1st char of token
 38574                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past the token
 38575                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 38576                                  ;    ES:BX -> new token (since ES:SI is already pointing 1 byte past token)
 38577                                  ;
 38578                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 38579                                  ;       AX
 38580                                  ;
 38581                                  ;   NOTES
 38582                                  ;       None
 38583                                  ;
 38584                                  ;   HISTORY
 38585                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 38586                                  ;
 38587                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38588                                  
 38589                                  skip_delim:	; returns carry set if eol/eof
 38590 0000402C E83700                          call    get_char        ;
 38591 0000402F 8D5CFF                          lea     bx,[si-1]       ; also returns BX -> next token
 38592 00004032 72F7                            jc	short skip_token_done ;
 38593 00004034 E8AB01                          call    delim           ;
 38594 00004037 74F3                            je	short skip_delim ;
 38595 00004039 EBE5                            jmp	short skip_check_eol  ; 13/05/2019
 38596                                  
 38597                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38598                                  ;
 38599                                  ;   skip_opt_line: same as skip_line provided AL != LF
 38600                                  ;
 38601                                  ;   INPUT
 38602                                  ;       AL == last character read
 38603                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 38604                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 38605                                  ;
 38606                                  ;   OUTPUT
 38607                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 38608                                  ;       AL == 1st char of new line
 38609                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st char of new line
 38610                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 38611                                  ;
 38612                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 38613                                  ;       AX
 38614                                  ;
 38615                                  ;   NOTES
 38616                                  ;       In other words, the purpose here is to skip to the next line,
 38617                                  ;       unless ES:SI is already sitting at the front of the next line (which
 38618                                  ;       it would be if the last character fetched -- AL -- was a linefeed)
 38619                                  ;
 38620                                  ;   HISTORY
 38621                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 38622                                  ;
 38623                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38624                                  
 38625                                  ; 03/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 38626                                  ;skip_opt_line:
 38627                                  ;	cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 38628                                  ;	je	short skip_line_done
 38629                                       
 38630                                  	; fall into skip_line
 38631                                  
 38632                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38633                                  ;
 38634                                  ;   skip_line: skip to the next line
 38635                                  ;
 38636                                  ;   INPUT
 38637                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 38638                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 38639                                  ;
 38640                                  ;   OUTPUT
 38641                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 38642                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st char of new line
 38643                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 38644                                  ;
 38645                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 38646                                  ;       AX
 38647                                  ;
 38648                                  ;   NOTES
 38649                                  ;       None
 38650                                  ;
 38651                                  ;   HISTORY
 38652                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 38653                                  ;
 38654                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38655                                  
 38656                                  skip_line:
 38657 0000403B E82800                          call    get_char
 38658 0000403E 7204                            jc	short skip_line_done
 38659                                  skip_opt_line:	; 03/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 38660 00004040 3C0A                            cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 38661 00004042 75F7                            jne	short skip_line
 38662                                  skip_line_done:
 38663                                  num_done:	; 18/12/2022
 38664 00004044 C3                              retn

 38666                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38667                                  ;
 38668                                  ;   get_number: return binary equivalent of numeric string
 38669                                  ;
 38670                                  ;   INPUT
 38671                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 38672                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 38673                                  ;
 38674                                  ;   OUTPUT
 38675                                  ;       AL == non-digit encountered
 38676                                  ;       BX == binary #
 38677                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st non-digit
 38678                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 38679                                  ;
 38680                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 38681                                  ;       AX
 38682                                  ;
 38683                                  ;   NOTES
 38684                                  ;       None
 38685                                  ;
 38686                                  ;   HISTORY
 38687                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 38688                                  ;
 38689                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38690                                  
 38691                                  ; 13/05/2019
 38692                                  
 38693                                  get_number:
 38694 00004045 29DB                            sub     bx,bx           ; BX = result
 38695                                  num_loop:
 38696 00004047 E81C00                          call    get_char        ;
 38697 0000404A 72F8                            jc	short num_done	;
 38698 0000404C 3C30                            cmp     al,'0'          ; convert to value
 38699 0000404E 72F4                            jb	short num_done	; no more number
 38700 00004050 3C39                            cmp     al,'9'          ;
 38701 00004052 77F0                            ja	short num_done	;
 38702 00004054 50                              push    ax              ;
 38703 00004055 B80A00                          mov     ax,10           ;
 38704 00004058 52                              push    dx              ;
 38705 00004059 F7E3                            mul     bx              ;
 38706 0000405B 5A                              pop     dx              ;
 38707 0000405C 89C3                            mov     bx,ax           ;
 38708 0000405E 58                              pop     ax              ;
 38709 0000405F 2C30                            sub     al,'0'          ;
 38710 00004061 98                              cbw                     ;
 38711 00004062 01C3                            add     bx,ax           ;
 38712 00004064 EBE1                            jmp	short num_loop	;
 38713                                  
 38714                                  	; 18/12/2022
 38715                                  ;num_done:
 38716                                          ;retn

 38718                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38719                                  ;
 38720                                  ;   get_char:  return next character, advance ES:SI, and decrement CX
 38721                                  ;
 38722                                  ;   INPUT
 38723                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 38724                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 38725                                  ;
 38726                                  ;   OUTPUT
 38727                                  ;       AL == next character
 38728                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past next character
 38729                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 38730                                  ;
 38731                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 38732                                  ;       AX
 38733                                  ;
 38734                                  ;   NOTES
 38735                                  ;       None
 38736                                  ;
 38737                                  ;   HISTORY
 38738                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 38739                                  ;
 38740                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38741                                  
 38742                                  get_char:
 38743 00004066 83E901                          sub     cx,1            ; use SUB to set carry,zero
 38744 00004069 7205                            jb	short get_fail	; out of data
 38745                                          ;lods	byte ptr es:[si] ;
 38746 0000406B 26                      	es	
 38747 0000406C AC                      	lodsb
 38748 0000406D 88C4                            mov     ah,al           ;
 38749 0000406F C3                              retn			;
 38750                                  get_fail:                       ; restore CX to zero
 38751 00004070 B90000                          mov     cx,0            ; leave carry set, zero not set
 38752                                  nearby_ret:
 38753 00004073 C3                              retn

 38755                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38756                                  ;
 38757                                  ;   query_user: ask user whether to execute current config.sys command
 38758                                  ;
 38759                                  ;   INPUT
 38760                                  ;       AL == current command code
 38761                                  ;    ES:SI -> current command line in config.sys
 38762                                  ;    config_cmd == current command code, but with QUERY bit intact
 38763                                  ;                  (00h used to generate "Process AUTOEXEC.BAT" prompt)
 38764                                  ;
 38765                                  ;   OUTPUT
 38766                                  ;       CF set if command should be ignored (it is also REM'ed out)
 38767                                  ;
 38768                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 38769                                  ;       BX, CX, DX, DI
 38770                                  ;
 38771                                  ;   NOTES
 38772                                  ;       None
 38773                                  ;
 38774                                  ;   HISTORY
 38775                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 38776                                  ;
 38777                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38778                                  
 38779                                  	; 31/12/2022 - Retro UNIX 386 v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 38780                                  	; (SYSINIT:4AE5h)
 38781                                  
 38782                                  	; 12/12/2022
 38783                                  query_user:
 38784 00004074 F606[DE46]04                    test    byte [bQueryOpt],4	; answer no to everything?
 38785                                  	; 01/01/2023
 38786 00004079 7403                    	jz	short qu_1		;
 38787 0000407B E9B900                  	jmp	skip_all
 38788                                  	; 12/12/2022
 38789                                  	;;jmp	short skip_all		;
 38790                                  	;jnz	short skip_all
 38791                                  qu_1:
 38792 0000407E F606[DE46]02            	test    byte [bQueryOpt],2	; answer yes to everything?
 38793 00004083 75EE                            jnz	short nearby_ret	; yes (and return carry clear!)
 38794 00004085 50                              push    ax                      ;
 38795 00004086 A0[9914]                        mov     al,[config_cmd]         ;
 38796 00004089 F606[DE46]01                    test    byte [bQueryOpt],1	; query every command?
 38797 0000408E 7506                            jnz	short query_all		; yes
 38798 00004090 A880                            test    al,CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY  ;
 38799                                  	; 01/01/2023
 38800 00004092 7502                    	jnz	short query_all		;
 38801                                  	; 12/12/2022
 38802                                  	;;jmp	short do_cmd		;
 38803                                  	;jz	short do_cmd ; cf=0
 38804                                  
 38805                                  	; 01/01/2023
 38806 00004094 58                      	pop	ax
 38807 00004095 C3                      	retn

 38809                                  query_all:
 38810                                  
 38811                                  ;   Search for the command code (AL) in "comtab", and then print
 38812                                  ;   out the corresponding keyword, followed by the rest of the actual
 38813                                  ;   line pointed to by ES:SI
 38814                                  
 38815 00004096 56                              push    si                      ; save pointer to rest of CONFIG.SYS line
 38816 00004097 BA[EC4C]                        mov     dx,_$AutoPrmpt    	;
 38817 0000409A 247F                            and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 38818 0000409C 7450                            jz	short generic_prompt	; config_cmd must have been 0
 38819                                  
 38820 0000409E 88C6                            mov     dh,al                   ; save config_cmd in DH
 38821 000040A0 29DB                            sub     bx,bx                   ;
 38822 000040A2 BF[2B47]                        mov     di,comtab		;
 38823                                  find_match:                             ;
 38824 000040A5 8A1D                            mov     bl,[di]                 ; get size of current keyword
 38825 000040A7 08DB                            or      bl,bl                   ;
 38826 000040A9 7425                            jz	short line_print	; end of table
 38827 000040AB 47                              inc     di                      ;
 38828 000040AC 3A01                            cmp     al,[di+bx]              ; match?
 38829 000040AE 7405                            je	short cmd_match		; yes
 38830 000040B0 8D7901                          lea     di,[di+bx+1]            ; otherwise, skip this command code
 38831                                  	; 13/05/2019	
 38832 000040B3 EBF0                            jmp	short find_match	; loop
 38833                                  cmd_match:                              ;
 38834 000040B5 8A4DFF                          mov     cl,[di-1]               ;
 38835 000040B8 B500                            mov	ch,0                    ;
 38836 000040BA B402                            mov     ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2
 38837                                  cmd_print:                              ;
 38838 000040BC 8A05                            mov     al,[di]                 ;
 38839 000040BE 47                              inc     di                      ;
 38840 000040BF 88C2                            mov     dl,al                   ;
 38841 000040C1 CD21                            int     21h                     ;
 38842 000040C3 E2F7                            loop    cmd_print               ;
 38843 000040C5 B23D                            mov     dl,'='                  ;
 38844 000040C7 80FE56                          cmp     dh,CONFIG_SET  ; 'V'    ; for SET commands, don't display a '='
 38845 000040CA 7502                            jne	short cmd_notset	;
 38846 000040CC B220                            mov     dl,' '                  ;
 38847                                  cmd_notset:
 38848 000040CE CD21                            int     21h                     ; '=' looks funny on SET commands
 38849                                  line_print:                             ;
 38850                                  	;lods	byte ptr es:[si]        ;
 38851 000040D0 26                              es
 38852 000040D1 AC                      	lodsb
 38853 000040D2 08C0                    	or      al,al                   ;
 38854 000040D4 7502                            jnz	short non_null		;
 38855 000040D6 B020                            mov     al,' '                  ;
 38856                                  non_null:                               ;
 38857 000040D8 3C20                            cmp     al,' '                  ; control code?
 38858 000040DA 720F                            jb	short prompt_user	; yes, assume end of line
 38859 000040DC 7505                            jne	short non_space		;
 38860                                          ; 10/09/2023
 38861 000040DE 263804                  	cmp	[es:si],al ; 20h
 38862                                  	;cmp	byte [es:si],' '	;
 38863 000040E1 7208                            jb	short prompt_user	;
 38864                                  non_space:                              ;
 38865 000040E3 88C2                            mov     dl,al                   ;
 38866 000040E5 B402                            mov     ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2	;
 38867 000040E7 CD21                            int     21h                     ;
 38868 000040E9 EBE5                            jmp	short line_print	;
 38869                                  
 38870                                  prompt_user:                            ;
 38871 000040EB BA[8A4C]                        mov     dx,_$InterPrmpt		;
 38872                                  
 38873                                  generic_prompt:
 38874 000040EE E8BB03                          call    print                   ;
 38875                                  input_loop:                             ;
 38876 000040F1 B400                            mov     ah,0                    ; read a key
 38877 000040F3 CD16                            int     16h                     ;
 38878 000040F5 08C0                            or      al,al                   ; is it a function key?
 38879 000040F7 750F                            jnz	short not_func		; no
 38880 000040F9 80FC3F                          cmp     ah,3Fh                  ; F5 function key?
 38881 000040FC 75F3                            jne	short input_loop	; no
 38882 000040FE A0[964C]                        mov     al,[_$NO]                  ;
 38883 00004101 800E[DE46]04                    or      byte [bQueryOpt],4	; no more queries
 38884 00004106 EB21                            jmp     short legal_char        ;
 38885                                  not_func:
 38886 00004108 24DF                            and     al,~20h ; 0DFh		; converting to upper case
 38887 0000410A 3A06[964C]                      cmp     al,[_$NO]		; verify character is legal
 38888 0000410E 7419                            je	short legal_char	;
 38889 00004110 3A06[924C]                      cmp     al,[_$YES]		;
 38890 00004114 7413                            je	short legal_char	;
 38891 00004116 803E[9914]00                    cmp     byte [config_cmd],0	;
 38892 0000411B 74D4                            je	short input_loop	; don't allow Esc on this query
 38893 0000411D 3C1B                            cmp     al,1Bh                  ; Esc?
 38894 0000411F 75D0                            jne	short input_loop	;
 38895 00004121 800E[DE46]02                    or      byte [bQueryOpt],2	; no more interactive boot prompts
 38896 00004126 A0[924C]                        mov     al,[_$YES]
 38897                                  legal_char:                             ;
 38898 00004129 E888FE                          call    disp_input              ;
 38899 0000412C 5E                              pop     si                      ; restore pointer to rest of CONFIG.SYS line
 38900                                  
 38901 0000412D 3A06[964C]                      cmp     al,[_$NO]		; process line?
 38902 00004131 7403                            je	short skip_cmd		; no
 38903                                  	; 12/12/2022
 38904 00004133 F8                      	clc
 38905                                  do_cmd:
 38906 00004134 58                      	pop     ax			;
 38907                                  	; 12/12/2022
 38908                                  	; cf=0
 38909                                  	;clc				; just do the command
 38910 00004135 C3                      	retn
 38911                                  
 38912                                  skip_cmd:
 38913 00004136 58                      	pop     ax			;
 38914                                  skip_all:
 38915 00004137 B430                    	mov     ah,CONFIG_REM ; '0'	; fake out the rest of sysinit's processing
 38916 00004139 F9                      	stc
 38917 0000413A C3                      	retn

 38974                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 38975                                  
 38976                                  ;   This function is very simple: it merely prepends a "/D" to the
 38977                                  ;   command-line for the shell; this (undocumented) switch disables
 38978                                  ;   AUTOEXEC.BAT processing and the date/time prompt that is usually
 38979                                  ;   displayed when there's no AUTOEXEC.BAT.
 38980                                  
 38981                                  disable_autoexec:
 38982                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS -  SYSINIT:4BE2h
 38983                                  	; 17/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 38984                                  
 38985 0000416F F606[DE46]04            	test	byte [bQueryOpt],4
 38986 00004174 7443                    	jz	short disable_exit
 38987 00004176 F606[D446]01            	test	byte [dae_flag],1
 38988 0000417B 753C                    	jnz	short disable_exit
 38989 0000417D 800E[D446]01            	or	byte [dae_flag],1
 38990                                          ;or	byte [bQueryOpt],2 ; MSDOS 6.0 
 38991 00004182 810E[DE46]0201          	or      word [bQueryOpt],102h	; [bDefBlock] = 1
 38992 00004188 BA4420                  	mov     dx,'D ' ; 2044h
 38993                                  dae_1:
 38994                                  	; 03/08/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (optimization)
 38995 0000418B A0[1346]                        mov	al,[def_swchr]
 38996                                  	;mov	al,[command_line-1]     ; get default switchchar
 38997 0000418E 08C0                            or      al,al                   ; anything there?
 38998 00004190 7427                            jz	short disable_exit	; no, disable_autoexec already called
 38999 00004192 8A1E[1446]                      mov     bl,[command_line]       ;
 39000 00004196 B700                            mov     bh,0                    ; BX == command-line length
 39001 00004198 89D9                            mov     cx,bx                   ;
 39002 0000419A 80C303                          add     bl,3                    ;
 39003 0000419D 80FB7E                          cmp     bl,126                  ;
 39004 000041A0 7717                            ja	short disable_exit	;
 39005 000041A2 881E[1446]                      mov     [command_line],bl       ; update length
 39006 000041A6 81C3[1546]                      add     bx,command_line+1	; make sure we move the NULL too
 39007 000041AA 41                              inc     cx                      ; (just for consistency sake)
 39008                                  disable_loop:                           ;
 39009 000041AB 8A67FD                          mov     ah,[bx-3]               ;
 39010 000041AE 8827                            mov     [bx],ah                 ;
 39011 000041B0 4B                              dec     bx                      ;
 39012 000041B1 E2F8                            loop    disable_loop            ;
 39013 000041B3 8847FE                          mov     [bx-2],al               ;
 39014                                  	;mov	word [bx-1],'D ' ; 2044h ; /D is stuffed into place now
 39015 000041B6 8957FF                  	mov	[bx-1],dx  ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4C29h		
 39016                                          ;mov	byte [command_line-1],0 ;
 39017                                  disable_exit:                           ;
 39018 000041B9 C3                              retn
 39019                                  
 39020                                  CheckQueryOpt:	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.YSYS - SYSINIT:4C2Dh

 39043

 39048                                  ;%if 0
 39049                                  ;;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 39050                                  ;
 39051                                  any_delim:
 39052 000041D2 3C0D                    	cmp	al,cr
 39053 000041D4 7427                    	je	short delim_ret
 39054 000041D6 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf
 39055 000041D8 7423                    	je	short delim_ret
 39056 000041DA 3C5B                    	cmp	al,'['
 39057 000041DC 741F                    	je	short delim_ret
 39058 000041DE 3C5D                    	cmp	al,']'
 39059 000041E0 741B                    	je	short delim_ret
 39060                                  ;
 39061                                  ;;endif ;MULTI_CONFIG
 39062                                  ;%endif ; 02/11/2022

 39065                                  	; (SYSINIT:3450h)

 39067 000041E2 3C2F                    	cmp	al,'/'		; ibm will assume "/" as an delimeter.
 39068 000041E4 7417                    	je	short delim_ret
 39069

 39071 000041E8 7413                    	je	short delim_ret
 39072                                  
 39073                                  org_delim:			; used by organize routine except for getting
 39074 000041EA 3C20                    	cmp	al,' '          ; the filename.

 39076 000041EE 3C09                            cmp     al,tab ; 9
 39077 000041F0 740B                    	je	short delim_ret
 39078 000041F2 3C3D                    	cmp	al,'='
 39079 000041F4 7407                    	je	short delim_ret
 39080 000041F6 3C2C                    	cmp	al,','
 39081 000041F8 7403                    	je	short delim_ret
 39082 000041FA 3C3B                    	cmp	al,';'
 39083

 39085                                  
 39086                                  ; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2
 39087                                  ;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 39088                                  ;   Make sure there's no chance of a false EOF indication
 39089 000041FC F8                      	clc
 39090                                  ;endif
 39091                                  	; 02/11/2022
 39092                                  delim_ret:
 39093                                  	; 04/01/2023
 39094                                  	; cf = 0
 39095                                  nl_ret:	; 10/09/2023
 39096 000041FD C3                      	retn

 39157                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39158                                  ; 
 39159                                  ; procedure : mapcase
 39160                                  ;
 39161                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39162                                  
 39163                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retro DOS 4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 39164                                  
 39165                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS 4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 39166                                  	; (SYSINIT:4C7Eh)
 39167                                  mapcase:
 39168 0000421E 51                      	push	cx
 39169 0000421F 56                      	push	si
 39170 00004220 1E                      	push	ds
 39171                                  
 39172 00004221 06                      	push	es
 39173 00004222 1F                      	pop	ds
 39174                                  
 39175                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 39176                                  
 39177                                  ; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS 4.2
 39178                                  
 39179                                  ;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 39180 00004223 88C3                    	mov	bl,al			; same cmd code this line
 39181                                  ;else
 39182                                  ;	xor	si,si
 39183                                  ;endif
 39184                                  	; 02/11/2022
 39185                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS 4.2
 39186                                  	;xor	si, si
 39187                                  
 39188                                  convloop:
 39189 00004225 AC                      	lodsb
 39190 00004226 3C61                    	cmp	al,'a'
 39191 00004228 7209                    	jb	short noconv
 39192 0000422A 3C7A                    	cmp	al,'z'
 39193 0000422C 7705                    	ja	short noconv
 39194 0000422E 2C20                    	sub	al,20h
 39195 00004230 8844FF                  	mov	[si-1],al
 39196                                  noconv:
 39197                                  
 39198                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 39199                                  
 39200                                  ; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS 4.2
 39201                                  ;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 39202                                  
 39203                                  ;   When MULTI_CONFIG enabled, "mapcase" is used to map everything to
 39204                                  ;   upper-case a line at a time, after we've been able to figure out whether
 39205                                  ;   the line is a SET command or not (since we don't want to upper-case
 39206                                  ;   anything after the "=" in a SET)
 39207                                  ;
 39208 00004233 80FB56                  	cmp	bl,CONFIG_SET  ; 'V'	; preserve case for part of the line?
 39209 00004236 7504                    	jne	short check_eol		; no, just check for end-of-line
 39210 00004238 3C3D                    	cmp	al,'='                  ; separator between SET var and value?
 39211 0000423A 740A                    	je	short convdone		; yes
 39212                                  check_eol:
 39213 0000423C 3C0D                    	cmp	al,cr
 39214 0000423E 7406                    	je	short convdone
 39215 00004240 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf
 39216 00004242 7402                    	je	short convdone
 39217                                  ;endif
 39218                                  	; 02/11/2022
 39219 00004244 E2DF                    	loop	convloop
 39220                                  convdone:
 39221 00004246 1F                      	pop	ds
 39222 00004247 5E                      	pop	si
 39223 00004248 59                      	pop	cx
 39224 00004249 C3                      	retn

 39230                                  ; round the values in memlo and memhi to paragraph boundary.
 39231                                  ; perform bounds check.
 39232                                  ;

 39235                                  round:
 39236                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 39237 0000424A 1E                      	push	ds
 39238 0000424B 0E                      	push	cs
 39239 0000424C 1F                      	pop	ds
 39240

 39242                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:memlo]
 39243 0000424E A1[6203]                	mov	ax,[memlo]
 39244                                  
 39245 00004251 E8DBCE                  	call	ParaRound		; para round up
 39246                                  
 39247                                  	;add	[cs:memhi],ax
 39248 00004254 0106[6403]              	add	[memhi],ax
 39249                                  	;mov	word [cs:memlo],0
 39250 00004258 C706[6203]0000          	mov	word [memlo],0

 39252 0000425E A1[6403]                	mov	ax,[memhi]

 39254 00004261 3B06[A502]              	cmp	ax,[ALLOCLIM]

 39260 0000426C 7416                    	jz	short skip_set_devmarksize

 39275 00004284 58                      	pop	ax

 39281                                  	; cf = 0

 39342                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39343                                  ;
 39344                                  ; procedure : getnum
 39345                                  ;
 39346                                  ; getnum parses a decimal number.
 39347                                  ; returns it in ax, sets zero flag if ax = 0 (may be considered an
 39348                                  ; error), if number is bad carry is set, zero is set, ax=0.
 39349                                  ;
 39350                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39351                                  
 39352                                  getnum:
 39353 000042BD 53                      	push	bx
 39354 000042BE 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx			; running count is zero
 39355                                  b2:
 39356 000042C0 E8F2FF                  	call	todigit 		; do we have a digit ?
 39357 000042C3 7247                    	jc	short badnum		; no, bomb
 39358                                  
 39359 000042C5 93                      	xchg	ax,bx			; put total in ax
 39360 000042C6 53                      	push	bx			; save digit (0 to 9)
 39361                                  	;mov	bx,10			; base of arithmetic
 39362                                  	; 12/12/2022
 39363 000042C7 B30A                    	mov	bl,10
 39364 000042C9 F7E3                    	mul	bx			; shift by one decimal digit
 39365 000042CB 5B                      	pop	bx			; get back digit (0 to 9)
 39366 000042CC 00D8                    	add	al,bl			; get total
 39367 000042CE 80D400                  	adc	ah,0			; make that 16 bits
 39368 000042D1 7239                    	jc	short badnum		; too big a number
 39369                                  
 39370 000042D3 93                      	xchg	ax,bx			; stash total
 39371                                  
 39372 000042D4 E830FF                  	call	getchr			;get next digit
 39373 000042D7 722D                    	jc	short b1		; no more characters
 39374 000042D9 3C20                    	cmp	al,' ' 			; space?
 39375 000042DB 741F                    	je	short b15		; then end of digits
 39376 000042DD 3C2C                    	cmp	al,',' 			; ',' is a seperator!!!
 39377 000042DF 741B                    	je	short b15		; then end of digits.
 39378 000042E1 3C09                    	cmp	al, tab ; 9		; tab
 39379 000042E3 7417                    	je	short b15
 39380 000042E5 2E3A06[AE02]            	cmp	al,[cs:sepchr]		; allow 0 or special separators
 39381 000042EA 7410                    	je	short b15
 39382 000042EC 3C2F                    	cmp	al,'/'			; see if another switch follows
 39383                                  	; 12/12/2022
 39384                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 39385                                  	;nop				; cas - remnant of old bad code
 39386                                  	;nop
 39387 000042EE 740C                    	je	short b15
 39388 000042F0 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf			; line-feed?
 39389 000042F2 7408                    	je	short b15
 39390 000042F4 3C0D                    	cmp	al,cr			; carriage return?
 39391 000042F6 7404                    	je	short b15
 39392 000042F8 08C0                    	or	al,al			; end of line separator?
 39393 000042FA 75C4                    	jnz	short b2		; no, try as a valid char...
 39394                                  b15:
 39395 000042FC 2EFF06[5603]            	inc	word [cs:count]		; one more character to s...
 39396 00004301 2EFF0E[5A03]            	dec	word [cs:chrptr]	; back up over separator
 39397                                  b1:
 39398 00004306 89D8                    	mov	ax,bx			; get proper count
 39399 00004308 09C0                    	or	ax,ax			; clears carry, sets zero accordingly
 39400 0000430A 5B                      	pop	bx
 39401 0000430B C3                      	retn
 39402                                  badnum:
 39403                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 39404                                  	;mov	byte [cs:sepchr],0
 39405 0000430C 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax			; set zero flag, and ax = 0
 39406                                  	; 12 /12/2022
 39407 0000430E 2EA2[AE02]              	mov	[cs:sepchr],al ; 0
 39408 00004312 5B                      	pop	bx
 39409 00004313 F9                      	stc				; and carry set
 39410 00004314 C3                      	retn
 39411                                  
 39412                                  ;****************************************************************************
 39413                                  
 39414                                  setdoscountryinfo:
 39415                                  
 39416                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39417                                  ;input: es:di -> pointer to dos_country_cdpg_info
 39418                                  ;	ds:0  -> buffer.
 39419                                  ;	si = 0
 39420                                  ;	ax = country id
 39421                                  ;	dx = code page id. (if 0, then use ccsyscodepage as a default.)
 39422                                  ;	bx = file handle
 39423                                  ;	this routine can handle maximum 438 country_data entries.
 39424                                  ;
 39425                                  ;output: dos_country_cdpg_info set.
 39426                                  ;	 carry set if any file read failure or wrong information in the file.
 39427                                  ;	 carry set and cx = -1 if cannot find the matching country_id, 
 39428                                  ;	 codepage_id in the file.
 39429                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39430                                  
 39431                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 39432                                  	; (SYSINIT:4D83h)
 39433                                  
 39434                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 39435                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - SYSINIT:4FCAh)	
 39436                                  
 39437 00004315 57                      	push	di
 39438 00004316 50                      	push	ax
 39439 00004317 52                      	push	dx
 39440                                  
 39441 00004318 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx
 39442 0000431A 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx
 39443 0000431C B80002                  	mov	ax,512			;read 512 bytes
 39444 0000431F E84301                  	call	readincontrolbuffer	;read the file header
 39445 00004322 724A                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 39446                                  
 39447 00004324 06                      	push	es
 39448 00004325 56                      	push	si
 39449                                  
 39450 00004326 0E                      	push	cs
 39451 00004327 07                      	pop	es
 39452                                  
 39453 00004328 BF[7945]                	mov	di,country_file_signature ; db 0FFh,'COUNTRY'
 39454 0000432B B90800                  	mov	cx,8			;length of the signature
 39455 0000432E F3A6                    	repz	cmpsb
 39456                                  
 39457 00004330 5E                      	pop	si
 39458 00004331 07                      	pop	es
 39459 00004332 753A                    	jnz	short setdosdata_fail 	;signature mismatch
 39460                                  
 39461 00004334 83C612                  	add	si,18			;si -> county info type
 39462 00004337 803C01                  	cmp	byte [si],1		;only accept type 1 (currently only 1 header type)
 39463 0000433A 7532                    	jne	short setdosdata_fail 	;cannot proceed. error return
 39464                                  
 39465 0000433C 46                      	inc	si			;si -> file offset
 39466 0000433D 8B14                    	mov	dx,[si]			;get the info file offset.
 39467 0000433F 8B4C02                  	mov	cx,[si+2]
 39468 00004342 B80018                  	mov	ax,6144			;read 6144 bytes.
 39469 00004345 E81D01                  	call	readincontrolbuffer	;read info
 39470 00004348 7224                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 39471                                  
 39472 0000434A 8B0C                    	mov	cx,[si]			;get the # of country, codepage combination entries
 39473 0000434C 81F9B601                	cmp	cx,438			;cannot handle more than 438 entries.
 39474 00004350 771C                    	ja	short setdosdata_fail
 39475                                  
 39476 00004352 46                      	inc	si
 39477 00004353 46                      	inc	si			;si -> entry information packet
 39478 00004354 5A                      	pop	dx			;restore code page id
 39479 00004355 58                      	pop	ax			;restore country id
 39480 00004356 5F                      	pop	di
 39481                                  
 39482                                  setdoscntry_find:			;search for desired country_id,codepage_id.
 39483 00004357 3B4402                  	cmp	ax,[si+2]		;compare country_id
 39484 0000435A 7509                    	jne	short setdoscntry_next
 39485                                  
 39486                                  	;cmp	dx,0			;no user specified code page ?
 39487                                  	;je	short setdoscntry_any_codepage ;then no need to match code page id.
 39488                                  	; 10/09/2023
 39489 0000435C 09D2                    	or	dx,dx ; cmp dx,0
 39490 0000435E 7413                    	jz	short setdoscntry_any_codepage
 39491 00004360 3B5404                  	cmp	dx,[si+4]		;compare code page id
 39492 00004363 7411                    	je	short setdoscntry_got_it
 39493                                  
 39494                                  setdoscntry_next:
 39495 00004365 0334                    	add	si,[si]			;next entry
 39496 00004367 46                      	inc	si
 39497 00004368 46                      	inc	si			;take a word for size of entry itself
 39498 00004369 E2EC                    	loop	setdoscntry_find
 39499                                  
 39500                                  	;mov	cx,-1			;signals that bad country id entered.
 39501                                  	; 10/09/2023
 39502 0000436B 49                      	dec	cx ; 0 -> -1
 39503                                  setdoscntry_fail:
 39504 0000436C F9                      	stc
 39505 0000436D C3                      	retn
 39506                                  
 39507                                  setdosdata_fail:
 39508 0000436E 5E                      	pop	si
 39509 0000436F 59                      	pop	cx
 39510 00004370 5F                      	pop	di
 39511 00004371 EBF9                    	jmp	short setdoscntry_fail
 39512                                  
 39513                                  setdoscntry_any_codepage:		;use the code_page_id of the country_id found.
 39514 00004373 8B5404                  	mov	dx,[si+4]
 39515                                  
 39516                                  setdoscntry_got_it:			;found the matching entry
 39517 00004376 2E8916[8145]            	mov	[cs:cntrycodepage_id],dx ;save code page id for this country.
 39518 0000437B 8B540A                  	mov	dx,[si+10]		;get the file offset of country data
 39519 0000437E 8B4C0C                  	mov	cx,[si+12]
 39520 00004381 B80002                  	mov	ax,512 			;read 512 bytes
 39521 00004384 E8DE00                  	call	readincontrolbuffer
 39522 00004387 72E3                    	jc	short setdoscntry_fail
 39523                                  
 39524 00004389 8B0C                    	mov	cx,[si]			;get the number of entries to handle.
 39525 0000438B 46                      	inc	si
 39526 0000438C 46                      	inc	si			;si -> first entry
 39527                                  
 39528                                  setdoscntry_data:
 39529 0000438D 57                      	push	di			;es:di -> dos_country_cdpg_info
 39530 0000438E 51                      	push	cx			;save # of entry left
 39531 0000438F 56                      	push	si			;si -> current entry in control buffer
 39532                                  
 39533 00004390 8A4402                  	mov	al,[si+2]		;get data entry id
 39534 00004393 E8A400                  	call	getcountrydestination	;get the address of destination in es:di
 39535 00004396 727C                    	jc	short setdoscntry_data_next ;no matching data entry id in dos
 39536                                  
 39537 00004398 8B5404                  	mov	dx,[si+4]		;get offset of data
 39538 0000439B 8B4C06                  	mov	cx,[si+6]
 39539 0000439E B80042                  	mov	ax,4200h
 39540 000043A1 F9                      	stc
 39541 000043A2 CD21                    	int	21h			;move pointer
 39542 000043A4 72C8                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail

 39677                                  getcountrydestination:
 39678                                  
 39679                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39680                                  ;get the destination address in the dos country info table.
 39681                                  ;
 39682                                  ;input: al - data id
 39683                                  ;	es:di -> dos_country_cdpg_info
 39684                                  ;on return:
 39685                                  ;	es:di -> destination address of the matching data id
 39686                                  ;	carry set if no matching data id found in dos.
 39687                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39688                                  
 39689                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 39690                                  	; (SYSINIT:4EB2h)
 39691                                  
 39692                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 39693                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - SYSINIT:50F9h)
 39694

 39698                                  					;skip the reserved area, syscodepage etc.

 39748                                  
 39749                                  readincontrolbuffer:
 39750                                  
 39751                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39752                                  ;move file pointer to cx:dx
 39753                                  ;read ax bytes into the control buffer. (should be less than 2 kb)
 39754                                  ;si will be set to 0 hence ds:si points to the control buffer.
 39755                                  ;
 39756                                  ;entry:  cx,dx offset from the start of the file where the read/write pointer
 39757                                  ;	 be moved.
 39758                                  ;	 ax - # of bytes to read
 39759                                  ;	 bx - file handle
 39760                                  ;	 ds - buffer seg.
 39761                                  ;return: the control data information is read into ds:0 - ds:0200.
 39762                                  ;	 cx,dx value destroyed.
 39763                                  ;	 carry set if error in reading file.
 39764                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39765                                  
 39766 00004465 50                      	push	ax			;# of bytes to read
 39767 00004466 B80042                  	mov	ax,4200h
 39768 00004469 F9                      	stc
 39769 0000446A CD21                    	int	21h			;move pointer
 39770 0000446C 59                      	pop	cx			;# of bytes to read
 39771 0000446D 7209                    	jc	short ricb_exit
 39772                                  
 39773 0000446F 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx			;ds:dx -> control buffer
 39774 00004471 31F6                    	xor	si,si
 39775 00004473 B43F                    	mov	ah,3Fh			;read into the buffer
 39776 00004475 F9                      	stc
 39777 00004476 CD21                    	int	21h			;should be less than 1024 bytes.
 39778                                  ricb_exit:
 39779 00004478 C3                      	retn

 39787                                  set_country_path:
 39788                                  
 39789                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39790                                  ;in:  ds - sysinitseg, es - confbot, si -> start of the asciiz path string
 39791                                  ;     dosinfo_ext, cntry_drv, cntry_root, cntry_path
 39792                                  ;     assumes current directory is the root directory.
 39793                                  ;out: ds:di -> full path (cntry_drv).
 39794                                  ;     set the cntry_drv string from the country=,,path command.
 39795                                  ;     ds, es, si value saved.
 39796                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39797                                  
 39798                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 39799                                  	; (SYSINIT:4EF4h)
 39800                                  
 39801                                  	; 10/09/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 IO.SYS (Optimization)
 39802                                  	; (Retrodos v5.0 Pre-Works)
 39803                                  	; (PCDOS 7.1 IBMBIO.COM - SYSINIT:513Bh)
 39804                                  
 39805                                  	push	si
 39806                                  
 39807                                  	push	ds			;switch ds, es
 39808                                  	push	es
 39809                                  	pop	ds
 39810                                  	pop	es			;now ds -> confbot, es -> sysinitseg
 39811                                  
 39812                                  	call	chk_drive_letter	;current ds:[si] is a drive letter?
 39813                                  	jc	short scp_default_drv 	;no, use current default drive.
 39814                                  
 39815                                  	mov	al,[si]
 39816                                  	inc	si
 39817                                  	inc	si			;si -> next char after ":"
 39818                                  	jmp	short scp_setdrv
 39819                                  
 39820                                  scp_default_drv:
 39821                                  	mov	ah,19h
 39822                                  	int	21h
 39823                                  	add	al,"A"			;convert it to a character.
 39824                                  
 39825                                  scp_setdrv:
 39826                                  	mov	[cs:cntry_drv],al	;set the drive letter.
 39827                                  	mov	di,cntry_path
 39828                                  	mov	al,[si]
 39829                                  	cmp	al, "\"
 39830                                  	je	short scp_root_dir
 39831                                  
 39832                                  	cmp	al,"/"			;let's accept "/" as an directory delim
 39833                                  	;je	short scp_root_dir
 39834                                  	;jmp	short scp_path
 39835                                  	; 04/01/2023
 39836                                  	jne	short scp_path
 39837                                  
 39838                                  scp_root_dir:
 39839                                  	dec	di			;di -> cntry_root
 39840                                  scp_path:
 39841                                  	call	move_asciiz		;copy it
 39842                                  
 39843                                  	mov	di,cntry_drv
 39844                                  scpath_exit:
 39845                                  
 39846                                  	push	ds			;switch ds, es
 39847                                  	push	es
 39848                                  	pop	ds
 39849                                  	pop	es			;ds, es value restored
 39850                                  
 39851                                  	pop	si
 39852                                  	retn
 39853                                  
 39854                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 39855                                  
 39856                                  chk_drive_letter:
 39857                                  
 39858                                  ;check if ds:[si] is a drive letter followed by ":".
 39859                                  ;assume that every alpha character is already converted to upper case.
 39860                                  ;carry set if not.
 39861                                  
 39862                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2
 39863                                  
 39864                                  	push	ax
 39865                                  	cmp	byte [si],"A"
 39866                                  	;jb	short cdletter_no
 39867                                  	jb	short cdletter_exit
 39868                                  	cmp	byte [si],"Z"
 39869                                  	ja	short cdletter_no
 39870                                  	cmp	byte [si+1],":"
 39871                                  	;jne	short cdletter_no
 39872                                  	;jmp	short cdletter_exit
 39873                                  	; 04/01/2023
 39874                                  	je	short cdletter_exit
 39875

 39877                                  	stc
